MAT 1:1 Agha ndo mahina gha lukolo lwa Yesu Kilisto ywa kibheleko kya Daudi, ywa kibheleko kya Abulahamu.
MAT 1:2 Abulahamu kakinlela Isaka, na Isaka kakinlela Yakobu, na Yakobu kakinlela Yuda na alongo bhake.
MAT 1:3 Yuda kakinlela Pelesi papamu na Zela, bhene mama ywabhe kakibhegha Tamali, na Pelisi kakinlela Esiloni, na Esiloni kakinlela Alamu,
MAT 1:4 Alamu kakinlela Aminadabu, na Aminadabu kakinlela Nashoni, na Nashoni kakinlela Salimoni,
MAT 1:5 Salimoni kakinlela Boasi, na mama ghwake Boasi kakibhegha Lahabu, Boasi kakibhegha tate ghwake Obedi na mama ghwake Obedi kakibhegha Luti, na Obedi kakinlela Yese.
MAT 1:6 Yese kakinlela Mutwa Daudi. Daudi kakinlela Selemani, kwa yula nhumbu ywa Ulia
MAT 1:7 Selemani kakinlela Lehoboamu, na Lehoboamu kakinlela Abiya, na Abiya kakinlela Asa.
MAT 1:8 Asa kakinlela Yehoshafati, na Yohoshafati kakinlela Yolamu, na Yolamu kakinlela Usia.
MAT 1:9 Usia kakinlela Yotamu, na Yotamu kakinlela Ahasi, na Ahasi kakinlela Hesekia.
MAT 1:10 Hesekia kakinlela Manase, na Manase kakinlela Amoni, na Amoni kakinlela Yosia.
MAT 1:11 Yosia kakinlela Yekonia na alongo bhake, Mumanjubha gha kuhamihwa kughenda ku Babeli.
MAT 1:12 Mbole ya Akaayahudi kuhamihwa kughenda ku Babeli, Yekonia kakinlela Shealitieli, na Shealitieli kakinlela Selubabeli.
MAT 1:13 Salubabeli kakinlela Abihudi, na Abihudi kakinlela Eliakimu na Eliakimu kakinlela Asoli.
MAT 1:14 Asoli kakinlela Sadoki, na Sadoki kakinlela Akimo, na Akimo kakinlela Elihudi.
MAT 1:15 Elihudi kakinlela Eliasali, na Eliasali kakinlela Matani, na Matani kakinlela Yakobu,
MAT 1:16 naywo Yakobu kakinlela Yosefu ywakabheghite nngwana ghwa Malia mama ghwake Yesu, na Yesu ndo ywakakemwa Kilisto.
MAT 1:17 Habhu, hibheleko hyoha kutandila Abulahamu mbaka Daudi kukibhegha hibheleko kumi na ncheche, kangi kutandila Daudi mbaka kihamo kila kya ku Babeli kukibhegha hibheleko hingi kumi na ncheche, na kangi kutandila kihamo kya ku Baneli mbaka Kilisto kukibhegha hibheleko hingi kumi na ncheche.
MAT 1:18 Kubhelekwa kwa Yesu Kilisto kukibhegha naha, Malia mama ywake Yesu kakitalikila kuhetwa na Yosefu, peni kukali na kughonja papamu, Malia kakibhonekana kabhegha na ndumbu kwa makakala gha Nhuki ywa Chapanga.
MAT 1:19 Naywo Yosefu nngwana ghwake, kiyaha kakibhegha mundu ywa maha, kakipala ng'obhe kumpegha honi Maliamu pakindabhanji, ndo kakilamula kunleka kwa mbwepo.
MAT 1:20 Basi, pakabheghite mu kuwacha kutenda nnando aghwo, lihoka ywa Chapanga kakimbwitukila mumaloto na kakinng'ombela, “Yosefu mwana ywa Daudi, ghukotoke kuyoghopa kuntola Malia kabheghe nhumbu ghwako, kiyaha mata ghakamilite ndo kwa makakala gha Nhuki ywa Chapanga.
MAT 1:21 Katapapa mwana nnume, na ghwenga ghwanpegha mwana aywo lihina lyake Yesu, kiyaha mwene ndo kataalopoha bhandu kubhuka mu ulemwa ghwabhe.”
MAT 1:22 Basi, agha ghoha ghabwitukila ngati ghatwihilike ghala ghakalongelite Bambo kwa njila ya mbuye ywa Chapanga.
MAT 1:23 Nnole, “Kamwalilinda katakamula ndumbo, naywo katapapa mwana nnume, Mwana aywo katakemwa lihina lyake Emanueli.” Fwambulo yake, “Chapanga papamu na twenga.”
MAT 1:24 Naywo Yosefu pakayumukite mung'ono, kakitenda handa lihoka ywa Bambo pakanng'ombilite, kakintola nhumbu ywake.
MAT 1:25 Peni kanatyanga naywo ng'obhe mbaka Malia pakapapite mwana nnume. Naywo Yosefu kakinkema yula mwana lihina lyake Yesu.
MAT 2:1 Yesu kakibhelekwa kumbwani ya Betelehemu, mu nkoa ghwa Yudea, manjubha agho Helode kakibhegha mutwa. Kamu, mbole ya kubhelekwa Yesu, bhanautendehi bha kumanya ndondwa kuhuma mbande ya ngeha bhakehika ku Yelusalemu
MAT 2:2 bhakikonya, “Kabhengha kwoki aywo mwana ywakabhelekitwe, ywakapala kubhegha Mutwa ywa Akaayahudi? Tuyibhona ndondwa yake payibwitukila kungeha, na twenga tuhika kumtundamila.”
MAT 2:3 Mutwa Helode pakayihwite nnando aghu kakibhaghaya, ywombe papamo na bhandu boha bhubho bha ku Yelusalemu.
MAT 2:4 Basi kakiakema papamu mandundame akulu bhoha na ahunda bha Malaghilo gha Musa, kakiakonya “Kilisto katabhelekwa kwoki?”
MAT 2:5 Bhombe bhakinng'ombela, “Katabhelekwa kumbwani ya Betelehemu kunkoa ghwa Yudea,” Handa pakalembite mbuye ywa Chapanga.
MAT 2:6 “Naghwenga Bethelehemu munnima ghwa Yudea, Ghwenga ghunndoko ng'obhe nkati ya hitami ihwadali hya ku Yudea; Mana, kwa ghwenga katabwituka kilongohi ywakapala kualongoha bhandu bhangu Akaaisilaeli.”
MAT 2:7 Apo ndo Helode kakiakema pambwegha abho atendehi bha kumanya ndondwa, kakiakonya bhammanyihe nndaluko ghwa tela ghuubhonekanite yila ndondwa.
MAT 2:8 Mbole kakibhalaghila aghende Betelehemu pakiaghombela. “Nng'ende mukahingukihe maha mihalo ya mwana aywo. Mbole ya kummona mumuyihile mihalo yake, ngati na nenga ng'ende kuntundamila.”
MAT 2:9 Mbole ya kunnyihwa Mutwa, abho atendehi bha kumanya ndondwa bhakibhuka, na kamu yila ndondwa bhaayibhonite mbande ya ngeha yikialongoha, nabhombe bhakiyitughila mbaka payiyimite pakabheghite mwana.
MAT 2:10 Paayibhonite yila ndondwa yiyima bhakiyelelwa na kulumbilila kwa uyelelo.
MAT 2:11 Paayingilite unyumba bhakimmona mwana papamu na Malia mama ghwake, bhakichutama na bhakintundamila. Ndo bhakihughula hupo hyabhe, bhakinpegha mahabha na ubano na ntela ghwa bhana.
MAT 2:12 Mbole Chapanga kakiakinya mululoto bhakotoke kummuyila Helode, ndo bhakibhuya ukaya kwabhe kwa njila yingi.
MAT 2:13 Mbole ya bhala ahenja kubhuka, lihoka ywa Chapanga kakinbwitukila Yosefu mu maloto, na kunng'ombela, “Ghuyumuke na ghuntole mwana papamu na mama ghwake na mmutukile ku Misili. Ntame akwo mbaka panukughombela, kiyaha Helode kangupala kunkoma mwana ayu.”
MAT 2:14 Habhu, Yosefu kakibhuka pakilo kakintola mwana papamu na mama ghwake, na bhakighenda ku Misili.
MAT 2:15 Bhakitama akwo mbaka pakahweghite Helode. Nnando aghu ghukibwituka ngati litwihilike lilagho lyakalongilite Bambo kwa ngulu ya mbuye, pakalongela, “Nikinkema mwana ghwangu kuhuma ku Misili.”
MAT 2:16 Helode pakang'amulite kukita bhala atendehi bha kumanya ndondwa bhantindila kya luhunga, kakikalala muno. Kakikwilikiha bhana alumi bhoha mu kitami kya Betelehemu na mumbwegha mbwegha yake akomwe, kutandila bhala bhana bhoha bhaabheghite na ngungwa mbili mbaka hing'enya. Kakitenda habhu kubhukana na manjubha kupita kutandila pakakonganite na bhala atendehi bha kumanya ndondwa.
MAT 2:17 Ndo paghakitwihilikite malagho ghala ghaakambukitwe na mbuye Yelemia
MAT 2:18 “Lilobhe liyihwanika akwo Lama, Kililo na makukuliko matangalo. Laheli kangualilila bhana bhake; na kalema kukamulwa mabhoko, kiyaha bhoha bhahwegha.”
MAT 2:19 Mbole ya kuhwegha Helode, lihoka ywa Chapanga kakinbwitukila Yosefu mumaloto akwo Misili,
MAT 2:20 kakinng'ombela, “Ghuyumuke, ghuntole mwana papamu na mama ywake, ghubhuye kangi ku Isilaeli, kiyaha bhala bhaapalite kunkoma mwana ahwegha kala.”
MAT 2:21 Basi, Yosefu kakiyimuka, kakintola mwana papamu na mama ywake, bhakibhuya mu nnima ghwa Isilaeli.
MAT 2:22 Peni Yosefu kakiyoghopa kughenda akwo pakayihwite kukita Alikelao kaghuhala utabhala ghwa tate ghwake Helode. Mbole ya kukinywa na lihoka ywa Chapanga mu maloto, bhakighenda mbande ya ku Galilaya,
MAT 2:23 na kakighenda kutama kukitami kiikemitwe Nasaleti. Habhu ndo ghakitwihilika malagho ghaakambukitwe na mabuye, “Katakemwa mundu ywa Kunasaleti.”
MAT 3:1 Mumanjubha ghala Yohane yunakubatisa kakihika pakalandamiha mu kibhala kya Yudea, na kulongela,
MAT 3:2 “Nneke ulemwa ghwenu, kiyaha ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa chapanga ghuheghelela.”
MAT 3:3 Ayu ndo Yohane ywene ndo mbuye Isaya kakilondola ya kya ywombe pakalongela, “Lilobhe la mundu lingukema kukibhala, ‘Munntendekehele Bambo njila yake, nng'ololehe ndyangilo yake.’”
MAT 3:4 Yohane kakihwala mapinda ghaatendekehitwe kwa mayuni gha nnyama ywaakemitwe ngamia, na nkungi ghwa liyula mu kibhuno kyake. Hilyo hyaki hikibhegha mapalala na bhuchi.
MAT 3:5 Bhandu bhakinng'endela kuhuma ku Yelusalemu, na mbande hyoha ya Yudea na mumilima ya mbwegha mbwegha ya lukemba lwa Yoludani.
MAT 3:6 Nabho bhakilipetula ulemwa ghwabhe, na kakiabatisa mulukemba lwa Yoludani.
MAT 3:7 Peni pakaabhonite Akaafalisayo na Akasadukayo bhangung'endela ngati abatiswe, kakiaghombela, “Mwenga bhandu ahakata handa liyoka. Ndo ghani ywakaakinyite kukihepetuka kiyaghabhu kiipala kuhika?
MAT 3:8 Basi, mulilahe kwa mandendelo kukita mulipetula,
MAT 3:9 na kangi nkotoke kuhwacha na kulongela, ‘Tati ywetu Abulahamu.’ Ninguaghombela hoto, Chapanga kaahotola kutendekeha kibheleko kya Abulahamu kuhuma mu malibho agha.
MAT 3:10 Hata naha, libhaghu libhikwa kala mu ngigha hya nkongo. Nkongo ghwohele ghwangali kupambika mapambiko gha maha, ghwaadumulwa na kutagwa mu mwoto.
MAT 3:11 Nenga nunguabatisa kwa machi kubhoneha kukita mulipetula. Peni ywakapala kuhika mbole ya nenga kabhegha na makakala kupitingana nenga, na yingunnogha ng'obhe hata kuyegha hilatu hyake. Mwene kataabatisa kwa Nhuki ywa Chapanga na kwa mwoto.
MAT 3:12 Ywombe kakamula mumabhoko ghake kipalo kya kupetela mbunje hyake, naywombe katakilima muno kibhanja kya kukubhatila, ngati kakungane ngano hyaki mu luhanja, na mayeyele kaghayoche kwa mwoto ghwangahimika.”
MAT 3:13 Mumanjubha agho Yesu kakihuma ku Galilaya na kakihika mu lukemba lwa Yoludani, ngati kabatiswe na Yohane.
MAT 3:14 Peni Yohane kakiyigha kunkanikiha pakanng'ombela, “Nenga ningupala kubatiswa na ghwenga, na ghwenga ghunguhika kubatiswa na nenga!”
MAT 3:15 Peni Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghuyitikile yibheghe habhu kwa hinu. Mana habhu yingutunogha kutenda ghakaghapala Chapanga.” Habhu Yohane kakinnyitikila.
MAT 3:16 Naywo Yesu pakabatiswite kala, kamu pakahumite mu machi, pindulu kunane kwa Chapanga kukihughuka, kakimmona Nhuki ywa Chapanga pakihuluka handa ngunda na kutula unani mwake.
MAT 3:17 Mbole lilobhe kuhuma kunane kwa Chapanga likilongela, “Ayu ndo Mwana ywangu mpalo, yunyelelwa naywo.”
MAT 4:1 Mbole Yesu kakilongohwa na Nhuki ywa Chapanga mbaka kukibhala ngati kakang'ehwe na Nchipila.
MAT 4:2 Kakilikunga manjubha mbinda mabhoko ncheche pamuhi na pakilo, kuuhiko yikimmina muno njala.
MAT 4:3 Mbole, Nchipila kakinhikila na kunng'ombela, “Handa ghwenga ndo Mwana ywa Chapanga, ghughakwilikihe maganga agha ghabheghe mangate.”
MAT 4:4 Peni Yesu kakinnyanga, “Yityekwa mu Malembo gha Chapanga, ‘Mundu katalama ng'obhe kwa kulyegha lingate ghweka, ngati kwa kila lilagho liikambukwa kwa nngulo ya Chapanga.’ ”
MAT 4:5 Mbole Nchipila kakintola Yesu mbaka ku Yelusalemu, Kitami king'anyimo kakimmika kunane kukinembanemba kya Nyumba ya Chapanga,
MAT 4:6 na kakinng'ombela, “Handa ghwenga Mwana ywa Chapanga, ghuliponehe pahi, kiyaha yityekwa mumalembo, ‘Chapanga kataakwilikiha Mahoka bhake, na bhombe bhaakukingama mu mabhoko ghabhe, ghukotoke kuponekela mu liganga.’ ”
MAT 4:7 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Malembo mang'anyimo ghangulongela, ‘Ghukotoke kunng'eha Bambo Chapanga ghwako.’ ”
MAT 4:8 Mbole Nchipila kakintola Yesu mbaka kukinemba kya kitumbi kitandamaho na kakinnaha ghubhutwa ghwoha ghwa nnima na unyanyi ghwake.
MAT 4:9 Kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Agha ghoha ndaghupegha handa ghwanjutamila mayughwa na kundundamila.”
MAT 4:10 Peni Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghubhuke muulongolo ghwangu, ghwenga Nchipila. Kiyaha malembo ghangulongela, ‘Ghuntundamile Bambo Chapanga ghwako, na ghuntumikile ywombe ghweka.’ ”
MAT 4:11 Basi, Nchipila kakinneka, nabho mahoka bha Chapanga bhakihika kuntumikila.
MAT 4:12 Yesu pakayihwite kukita Yohane Yunakubatisa kahwindwa ku kibhopo, ywombe kakighenda akwo Galilaya.
MAT 4:13 Kakibhuka Nasaleti, kakighenda kutama ku Kapelinaumu kitami kiibheghiti mbwegha ya lihibha lya Galilaya, mu mbakilo ya kitami kya Sabuloni na Nafutali.
MAT 4:14 Ghakitendekwa habhu ngati lilagho lyakalongelite mbuye Isaya litwihilike kukita,
MAT 4:15 “Milima ya Sabuloni na ghwa Naftali, milima yiibheghite mu mbwegha ya njila yiighenda kulihibha kumwambo ya lukemba Yolodani, Galilaya, nnima ya bhandu bha milima yingi.
MAT 4:16 Bhandu bhala bhaatamite mulubhindu Bhalubhona lubhwelu lukulu. Nabho bhaatamiteghe mu nnima ghwa lubhindu na bhwaghalili ghwa kuhwegha lubhwelo lubhang'aliha.”
MAT 4:17 Kutandila apo, Yesu kakiyanda kulandamiha pakalongela, “Mulipetule, kiyaha Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga ghuheghelela.”
MAT 4:18 Yesu pakabheghite mukutyanga mumbwegha ya lihibha lya Galilaya, kakiabhona alongo abhili aghomeha homba, Simoni ywakakemwa Petili na Andelea ywakabheghite nnongo ghwake, paaghomeha homba kwa njaho.
MAT 4:19 Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mundughile, na nenga ndabhatenda munyeghele bhandu handa aghomeha pabhayegha homba mulubhagha lwabhe.”
MAT 4:20 Kamu bhakihileka njaho hyabhe na bhakintughila.
MAT 4:21 Pabhaghendite paulogolo kya mandina, kakiabhona akalongo bhangi abhili, Yakobu na Yohane, bhana wa Sebedayo. Abha bhakibhegha nkati ya bhwato papamo na tati ghwabhe Sebedayo, paatandambuha njaho hghabhe. Ndo Yesu kakiakema,
MAT 4:22 kamu bhakighuleka bhwato papamu na tate ghwabhe, bhakintughila Yesu.
MAT 4:23 Yesu kakighenda mu hitami hyoha hya ku Galilaya, kakihunda mu hitutuhi ya kukonganikila Akaayahudi na kulandamiha Nhalo ghwa Maha ya kya ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga, kakilamiha mihehemela nhanganganiko na matamwa ghaabheghite nagho bhandu.
MAT 4:24 Mihalo yake yikikwila mbande hyoha hya ku Silia, na atamwa bhoha bhaabheghite na matamwa nhanganganiko, na bhala bhaabheghite na himbamanda nhanganganiko, bhaakwelitwe na mandilu, bhaabheghite na kihilika na alelebhaho, bhakigheghwa kwa Yesu, naywo kakialamiha bhoha.
MAT 4:25 Himati hitangalo hya bhandu bhakintughila, kuhuma ku Galilaya na Dekapoli na Yelusalemu na Yudea na kumwambo ya lukemba Yoludani.
MAT 5:1 Yesu pakahibhonite himati hya bhandu, kakikwela kukitumbi na kakitama, na ahundwa bhake bhaking'endela,
MAT 5:2 na ywombe kakiyanda kuahunda.
MAT 5:3 “Bhanonelwa bhoha bhaamanya kukita bhangumpala muno Chapanga mukutama kwabhe, kiyaha Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga ndo ghwabhe.
MAT 5:4 Bhanonelwa bhaakukulika, kiyaha bhaayonjokehwa mwoyo.
MAT 5:5 Bhanonelwa bhaabheghite apole kiyaha bhaapeghwa nnima ghwakaalaghite Chapanga.
MAT 5:6 Bhanonelwa bhaabhegha na njala na kilyakalyaka kya kutenda kila kyakakipala Chapanga kiyaha bhombe bhaayukutihwa.
MAT 5:7 Bhanonelwa bhaabheghite na lipyanda kiyaha bhaamokola lipyanda.
MAT 5:8 Bhanonelwa bhaabhegha na mwoyo ghwa maha, kiyaha bhombe bhatammona Chapanga.
MAT 5:9 Bhanonelwa bhala bhaalinganiha malobhe bhandu, mana bhaakemwa bhana bha Chapanga.
MAT 5:10 Bhanonelwa bhaapungwa kwa kutenda ghala ghakaghapala chapanga, kiyaha Ghubhutwa ghwa Kunani kwa Chapanga ndo ghwabhe.”
MAT 5:11 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela, “Maanonelwa mwenga pala bhandu paabhakokela na kuakambukila uhakata ghwohele kwakya nenga.
MAT 5:12 Nnyelelwe kwa hilulu, kiyaha lilumbo lyenu ndo likulu kunane kwa Chapanga. Mana ndo ubhwabhu abhu ndo bhakiapamanda ambuye bha Chapanga bhaabheghite pakali ya mwenga.”
MAT 5:13 “Mwenga ndo handa mwinyu ghwa nnima. Peni handa mwinyu ghwahobheha unogho ghwake ghwabhuyihwa bhuli kangi unogho ghwake? Ghungunogha kangi ng'obhe kwa kyohele, ngati ghwaataghwa panje ghulibhatwe na bhandu.”
MAT 5:14 “Mwenga ndo lubhwelu lwa nnima. Kitami kiichengwite mu kitumbi kinguhotola ng'obhe kuhihika.
MAT 5:15 Ebu bhandu bhanguyakiha ng'obhe koloboi na kuyigubika na kipumbulu, ngati bhanguyibhika mu kindangabhala, ngati yibhang'alihe bhandu bhoha bhaabheghite unyumba.
MAT 5:16 Ubhwabhu abhu lubhwelu lwenu lung'alihe mu ulongolo ghwa bhandu, ngati amokole kughabhona mandendelo ghenu gha maha na bhantike Tate ghwenu ywakabheghite kunane.”
MAT 5:17 “Nkotoke kuhwacha kukita hika kughabhuha malaghilo gha Musa na mahundo gha ambuye, hika ng'obhe kughabhuha ngati kughatengeleha.
MAT 5:18 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, mbaka nnima na kunane payipala kupita, peni kahone hata kipalamande kichoko kya malaghilo gha Musa kiipala kubhuhwa, mbaka ghoha ghatwihilike.
MAT 5:19 Basi, ywohele ywakakiluka yimu mu ngwiliho njoko kupitingana kwa hyoha, na kuahunda bhandu bhakatende habhu, kaabhegha nndokwa mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga, peni mundu ywakaghatenda malaghilo na kuahunda ayake, aywo kaabhegha nkulu mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga.
MAT 5:20 Ndo mana nunguaghombela yinguakwiliha mughayitikile Malaghilo gha Chapanga kwa kuchweha gumaha muno kupitingana ghula ghwa ahunda bha Malaghilo na Akaafalisayo. Hela bhubho maayingila ng'obhe mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga.”
MAT 5:21 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela, “Nnyihwa kukita bhandu bha makachu paaghombelwa, ‘Ghukotoke kukoma mundu, na mundu ywohele ywakakoma mundu katanoghwa katoswe.’
MAT 5:22 Peni nenga ninguaghombela kukita, mundu ywohele ywakannyaghabhalila nnongo ghwake, katanoghwa katoswe. Ywakannyuyuha nnongo ghwake katayeghwa ku libalasa. Na ywohela ywakanng'ombela nnongo ghwake ‘Ghwenga mmughabhugha ghukotolwe.’ Katanoghwa toso ya kutaghwa mu mwoto ghwa kumambe.
MAT 5:23 Basi, paghuyegha matulo ghako ku likuta na kunu paghukulungwa kukita nnongo ghwako kabhegha na nnando na ghwenga,
MAT 5:24 ghuleke matulo ghako apo paulongolo ghwa likuta, ghughende huti ghukalingane malobhe na nnongo ghwako, mbole ghubhuye na ghutule matulo ghako.”
MAT 5:25 Kangi kakilonela, “Ghulingane malobhe nkokela ghwako kya kuyumbatika paghubhegha naywo munjila kughenda kulibalasa, ngati nkokela ghwako kakotoke kukukamuha mu mabhoko gha nlamula, naywo nlamula katakukamuha mumabhoko gha machonda, na ghwenga ghwaabhopwa mu kibhopo.
MAT 5:26 Kulyaghila nungukughombela, ghwaabhuka kata amwo, mbaka paghukamuha ligwala ya uhiko.”
MAT 5:27 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela, “Nnyihwa kukita bhandu bhakighombelwa, ‘Nkotoke kubhegha atyahe.’
MAT 5:28 Peni nenga nunguaghombela kukita, mundu ywohele ywakannolekeha nndala kwa uhongo ghwa kutyala naywo, aywo katyala naywo kala mumwoyo ghwake.
MAT 5:29 Liho lyako lya kibhoko kya nnilo palighutenda ghutende uhokelo, mbaha ghulikolopole, kuliko mmili ghwoha kutaghwa mu mwoto ghwa kumambe.
MAT 5:30 Handa kibhoko kyako kya nnilo pakighutenda ghutende uhokelo, mbaha ghukidumule, kuliko mmili ghwako ghwoha kutaghwa mu mwoto ghwa kumambe.”
MAT 5:31 “Bhubho yikikambukwa kukita, ‘Mundu ywohele ywakanneka nhumbu ghwake yingukwiliha kanpeghe lihamba lya kulekana.’
MAT 5:32 Peni nenga nunguaghombela, mundu kangunoghwa ng'obhe kunneka nhumbu ywake kwa uhokelo ghwohele, pangi kwa kutenda utyahe, na mundu ywakanneka nhumbu ghwake kwa uhokelo ghwohele ghula, kanguntenda kabheghe ntyahe. Na yula ywakantolela nndala ywakalekitwe, kangutenda utyahe.”
MAT 5:33 “Kangi nnyihwa kukita bhandu bha makachu bhakighombelwa, ‘Ghukotoke kulaghila kulapa kwa uhwangi, ngati ghutwihilihe kilagho kyako kwa kighunnapilite Bambo.’
MAT 5:34 Peni nenga nunguaghombela, nkotoke kulapa yomoo, hangi kwa kunane kwa Chapanga, kiyaha ndo kiteho kya utabhala kya Chapanga,
MAT 5:35 hangi nkotoke kuulapila nnima, kiyaha nnima ndo pahala pamwene pakuyeghemela maghulu ghake, ebu kwa lihina lya Yelusalemu, kiyaha ndo kitami kya Mutwa nkulu.
MAT 5:36 Nkotoke kulapa kwa mitwe yenu, kiyaha ghwahotola ng'obhe kutenda luhwili lumu lubheghe lwambulete ebu lupili.
MAT 5:37 Paghulongela ‘Ena’ Yibheghe ‘Ena’ Na paghulongela ‘Ng'obhe’ Yibheghe ‘Ng'obhe’ Kiyaha ghohele kuchweha kwa agha ghanguhuma kwa yula nhokelo.”
MAT 5:38 “Nnyihwa kukita yikikambukwa, ‘Mundu pakalikuchumbula liho lyako na ghwenga ghunkuchumbule, na mundu pakaghutupula lino lyako na ghwenga ghuntupule lino lyake.’
MAT 5:39 Peni nenga nunguaghombela, nkotoke kummuyihila kibhuyiho kwa mundu nhakata. Mundu pakakubhakula kulikanja lyako lya nnilo, ghumghalambuhile na lingi.
MAT 5:40 Handa mundu ywakapala kukukokela ngati katole lighwanda lyako, ghumpeghe na likoti bhubho.
MAT 5:41 Mundu pakaghulemelela ghupape nhigho ghwake mwanja ghwa maili yimu, ghuupape maili mbili.
MAT 5:42 Ghunpeghe ywakakuyupa, hangi ghukotoke kumdumbila kihogho ywakapala kukuyahika kilibhi.”
MAT 5:43 “Nnyihwa kukita yikikambukwa, ‘Ghunpale ghanja ywako na ghunkalale myanja ywako.’
MAT 5:44 Peni nenga nunguaghombela, muapale amyanja bhenu na mubhayupile bhala bhaabhakalalila,
MAT 5:45 ngati mmokole kubhegha bhana bha Tate ywenu ywakabheghite kunane. Kiyaha ywombe kanguang'aliha luchubha lwake bhandu ahokela na bhandu bha maha, naywo kanguakomela hula bhandu bhanakutenda ghanakunnoghela Chapanga na bhangali kutenda ghangali kunnoghela Chapanga.
MAT 5:46 Pamuapala bhala bhanakuapala ghweka, maapata hupo yoki? Bhuli asumula sumu bhangutenda ng'obhe habhu?
MAT 5:47 Na handa munguatendela gha maha alongo bhenu ghweka, Bhuli mungutenda kyoki kupitingana kwa bhangi? Hata bhandu bhangali kummanya Chapanga bhangutenda ubhwabhu abhu.
MAT 5:48 Kya habhu mwenga mmeghe atwihiliko handa Tate ywenu ywa kunane pakabhegha ntwihiliko.”
MAT 6:1 “Mulindakile, nkotoke kutenda milando ya maha muulongolo ghwa bhandu ngati bhabhatikile, mana pantenda handa habhu, mungumokola ng'obhe hupo kwa Tate ywenu ywakabheghite kunane.”
MAT 6:2 “Basi, pamuapegha hilibhi kapukwa, nkotoke kulandamiha handa paatenda afyangu mu nyumba hya kukongamila Akaayahudi na mu hindandabhanji, ngati atikilwe na bhandu. Kulyaghila nunguaghombela akingama kala hupo yabhe.
MAT 6:3 Peni mwenga pamuapegha hilibhi bhandu kapukwa, mundu ywohele kakotoke kumanya kimukitenda.
MAT 6:4 Ngati matulo ghako ghabheghe gha lupwepo. Ndo Tate ywako ywa Kunane ywakabhona kwa lupwepo katakupeha hupo pakindandabhanji.”
MAT 6:5 “Pammegha munguyupa nkotoke kubhegha handa afyangu, kiyaha bhombe bhangupala kuyupa paayima mu nyumba hya kukonganila Ayahudi na mumbwegha ya njila ngati atikilwe na bhandu. Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, bhombe amokola kala hupo yabhe.
MAT 6:6 Peni ghwenga paghuyupa, ghuyingile mu nyumbakati yako, ghutate nlyango na ghunnyupe Tate ywako ywakabheghite mulupwepo. Naywo Tate ywako ywakabhona mulupwepo katakupegha hupo yako.”
MAT 6:7 “Na mwenga pammegha mukuyupa, nkotoke kulongela malagho ghangamanyikwa handa paatenda bhandu bhangammanya Chapanga. Kiyaha bhombe bhanguhwacha kukita bhaayunilwa kwa malagho ghabhe matangalo.
MAT 6:8 Nkotoke kubhegha handa bhombe, kiyaha Tate ywenu kangumanya kila kimukipala kukali na kunnyupa.
MAT 6:9 Habhu, ndo mungunoghwa kuyupa, ‘Tate ghwetu ghuubheghite kunane, Lihina lyako litikilwe,
MAT 6:10 Ghubhutwa ghwako ghuhike Lighulipala litendeke kunane na litendeke bhubho mu nnima.
MAT 6:11 Ghutupeghe lelo hilyo hyetu hya kila linjubha.
MAT 6:12 Ghutulekekehe ulemwa ghwetu, Handa patualekekeha bhala bhaatuhokela.
MAT 6:13 Ghukotoke kutuyingiha mu mayigho, peni ghutulopohe kuhuma kwa yula nhokelo. Kiyaha Ghubhutwa ndo ghwako na makakala na ukulu hata manjubha ghoha. Ayi mwika.’ ”
MAT 6:14 “Kiyaha pamualekekeha bhandu bhangi mahokelo ghabhe, Tate ywenu ywa Kunane naywo kataalekekeha mwenga bhubho.
MAT 6:15 Peni handa pamualekekeha ng'obhe bhangi bhaabhahokela, na Tate ywenu ywa Kunane kutabhalekekeha ng'obhe uhokelo ghwenu.”
MAT 6:16 “Pamulikunga kulyegha hilyo, nkotoke kutenda handa afyangu, bhaalitenda bhangubhegha na mahyongololo na kukikinala hibhungi hyabhe, ngati abhonekane na bhandu kukita bhalikunga. Kulyaghila nunguaghombela bhombe bhakingama kala hupo yabhe.
MAT 6:17 Peni pamulikunga kulyegha, nkuhe hibhungi hyenu mpakale mahuta mu mitwe hyenu,
MAT 6:18 ngati kulikunga kwa mwenga kukotoke kulibhoneha kwa bhandu bhangi, ngati Tate ywenu ywakatama palupwepo, naywo Tate ywenu ywakabhona mu lupwepo kataapegha hupo yenu.”
MAT 6:19 “Nkotoke kulibhikila luhanja apa pannima, pahala pene hipuluputu na kutu bhanguhanjaghana, na bhanabhwihi bhangutungunyula na kuyibha.
MAT 6:20 Ngati mulibhikile mihanja hyenu kunane kwa Chapanga kwene hipuluputu na kutu bhanguhanjaghana ng'obhe, ebu bhanabhwihi bhangutungunyula kata na kuyibha.
MAT 6:21 Kiyaha palubheghite luhanja lwako, apo ndo mwoyo ghwako ghungubhegha.”
MAT 6:22 “Liho ndo limbamba lya mmili. Handa liho lyako lingubhona maha, mmili ghwako ghwoha ghwaabhegha na bhwelu.
MAT 6:23 Peni handa liho lyako lya maha ng'obhe, mmili ghwako ghwabhegha na lubhindu. Kya habhu, handa bhwelu luubheghite mu nkati yako ndo lubhindu, alwo ndo lubhindu lwa totoloo!”
MAT 6:24 “Kabhone mundu ywakahotola kuatendela mahengo abambo abhili, Kiyaha katankalalila yumu na katanpala yula yungi, ebu katabhegha benibeni na yumu na kumpughana yungi. Maahotola ng'obhe kuntumikila Chapanga na utopelo.”
MAT 6:25 “Habhu nunguaghombela, nkotoke kubhegha na bhwaghalili yakya ubhumi ghwenu, maalyegha niki ebu maanywegha niki abu kwakya mmili ghwenu handa maahwala niki. Bhuli, ubhumi ghwenu ghwapitingana ng'obhe kwa hilyo na mmili kupitingana maghwanda!
MAT 6:26 Mubhalole hiyuni bha kubhwelo, bhombe bhangubhatika ng'obhe mbeyu ebu bhangubena ng'obhe ebu kubhika mbunje muluhanja, peni Tate ywenu ywa kunane kanguapegha hilyo. Bhuli, mwenga chepa bha utopelo kupitingana abho hibhumbe hya kunani?
MAT 6:27 Ndo ghani mu mwenga ywene kwa bhwaghalili katahotola kuliyonjokehela hata lisaa limu mu ubhumi ghwake?”
MAT 6:28 “Namwenga, kya bhuli mungughayila mapinda? Mughahwachile malubha gha kumighunda paghamela, ghangutenda lihengo ng'obhe ebu ghangulitendekehela ng'obhe mapinda ghabhe.
MAT 6:29 Peni nunguaghombela, hata mutwa Sulemani mwene muukulu ghwake ghwoha kakihwalihwa ng'obhe maha handa limoo lya agha malubha.
MAT 6:30 Basi, handa Chapanga kangughahwaliha habhu manyahi gha kunng'unda, ghene ghangubhegha lelo na kilabho ghangutaghwa mu mwoto, Mwenga bhandu bha uhyubhalilo nchoko! Bhuli Chapanga kataandendela ng'obhe mwenga kupitingana malubha agho?”
MAT 6:31 “Hinu nkotoke kubhegha na bhwaghalili, pannongela, ‘Twaalyegha niki?’ Ebu ‘Twaanywegha niki?’ Ebu ‘Twaahwala niki?’
MAT 6:32 Mana bhandu bhangammanya Chapanga ndo bhangughayila agho, peni Tate ywenu ywa Kunani kangumanya kukita mungunoghwa kubhegha na ahyo hyoha.
MAT 6:33 Peni mughupalahe huti Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga, na kughayitikila malaghilp ghake na ghangi ghoha maayonjokehelwa.
MAT 6:34 Hino, nkotoke kughayila kilabho, kiyaha kilabho yalighayila yene. Yingunoghwa kwa kila linjubha libheghe na maghayo ghake.”
MAT 7:1 Mbole Yesu kakilongela, “Ghukotoke kunng'ombela mundu ywohele kukita ghwenga ndo nhakata, paghutenda habhu Chapanga kataghughombela ghwenga ndo mundu nhakata,
MAT 7:2 mana kyabhula pamunng'ombela mundu yungi ndo nhakata, ndo bhubho Chapanga kataghughombela ghwenga ndo nhakata na kipimilo kilakila kighukitumila kwa yungi ndo Chapanga katakitumila kwa ghwenga.
MAT 7:3 Kyaniki ghungululola lukapi luubheghite mu liho lya nnongo ghwako, peni ghungulilola ng'obhe ghumwene libaku luubheghite mu liho lyako?
MAT 7:4 Ebu, ghunguhotola bhuli kung'ombela nnongo ghwako, ‘Ghuleke huti nulubhuhe lukapi luubheghite mu liho lyako, peni liho lyako libhegha na libaku?’
MAT 7:5 Ghwenga nfyangu, ghulibhuhe huti ghumwene libaku liibheghite mu liho lyako, na mbole ghwahotola kubhona maha na kubhuha lukapi luubheghite mu liho lya nnongo ywako.”
MAT 7:6 “Nkotoke kuapegha galu hilibhi hing'anyimo, bhaaghalambuka na kuakwalambula mabhene, na nkotoke kuapegha maghulubhe hilibhi hya utopelo, kiyaha bhahilibhata.”
MAT 7:7 “Nnyupe kwa Chapanga, namwenga maapeghwa, mpalahe namwenga maamokola, nkong'onde nlyango na mwenga maahughulihwa nlyango.
MAT 7:8 Mana kila ywakayupa kangupeghwa, ywakapalaha kangumokola na yunakukong'onda nlyango kanguhughulighwa nlyango.
MAT 7:9 Bhuli, kabhegha ywoheli mu mwenga ywene mwana ywake pakannyupa lingate katampegha libho?
MAT 7:10 Ebu, handa pakannyupa homba katampegha liyoka?
MAT 7:11 Basi, handa mwenga mmegha maahokelo, mungumanya kuapegha bhana bhenu hilibhi hya maha, kulyaghila Tate ywenu ywabheghite Kunane kataapegha kyanalumu hilibhi hya maha bhala bhanakunnyupa.”
MAT 7:12 “Basi, ghoha ghamughapala kutendelwa na bhandu, na mwenga mubhatendele ubhwabhu abhu. Mana aghu ndo utwihiliko ghwa Malaghilo gha Musa na mahundo gha mambuye bha Chapanga.”
MAT 7:13 “Nnyingile kupitila nlyango ghuukepite, mana nlyango na njila yiighenda kuuhobhelo yikonda, na bhaaghenda mu njila ayi ndo atangalo.
MAT 7:14 Peni njila yiighenda ku ubhumi yikepa, na nlyango ghwa kuyingilila amwo ndo ghukepa, ndo bhandu bhamandina bhaapala kuyibhona njila ayi.”
MAT 7:15 “Mulindakile na ambuye ahwangi, bhanakuhika kwa mwenga kunu paahwala mpinda handa mene kwa panje, peni unyumba abhegha handa galu bha kunhitu.
MAT 7:16 Mutabhamanya kwa mapambika ghabhe ghene ndo mandendelo ghabhe. Bhuli, bhandu bhangunokola misabibu mu mihomi ebu tini mu mitunguluja?
MAT 7:17 Ubhwabhu abhu nkongo ghwa maha ghungupambika mapambika gha maha, na nkongo nhakata ghupambika mapambika mahakata.
MAT 7:18 Nkongo ghwa maha ghunguhotola kata kupambika mapambika mahakata na nkongo nhakata ghunguhotola kata kupambika mapambiko gha maha.
MAT 7:19 Nkongo ghwohele ghwangapambika mapambika gha maha ghwaadumulwa na kutaghwa mu mwoto.
MAT 7:20 Habhu, mutabhamanya kwa ndendelo yabhe.”
MAT 7:21 “Chepa kila mundu ywakang'ombela, ‘Bambo, Bambo,’ katayingila mu ghubhutwa ghwa kunane, ngati ndo yula ywakatwihiliha ghanakunnoghela Tate ywangu ywa kunane.
MAT 7:22 Linjubha alyo bhandu atangalo bhatanng'ombela, ‘Bambo, Bambo, tukilandamiha Lilagho lyako kwa lihina lyako na kubhuha mandilu na kutenda mihabho mitangalo!’
MAT 7:23 Ndo ndabhaghombela, ‘Kulyaghila nikibhamanya ng'obhe. Mmuke kwa nenga, mwenga atenda mahokelo.’ ”
MAT 7:24 “Habhu, ywohele yunakuyihwa malagho ghangu na kughatenda, ndo handa mundu yunamahala ywakachengite nyumba yake mulitalabha.
MAT 7:25 Hula yikikoma, na ngumbwa ya machi yikihika na liyegha likipula na kuyituta nyumba yila, peni yikighwegha ng'obhe kiyaha kitamiho kyake kikibhegha mu litalabha.”
MAT 7:26 “Peni ywohele yunakuyihwa malagho ghangu na kutenda kata, aywo ndo handa mundu mmughabhugha ywakachengiti nyumba yake mu nhanga.
MAT 7:27 Hula yikikoma, na ngemba yikimema machi ngumbwa na liyegha lukipula na kuyituta nyumba yila, nayo yikighwegha na nging'indo yikibhegha ngulu.”
MAT 7:28 Yesu pakayomolite kulongela agho, lumati lwa bhandu lukikangahwa muno na mahundo ghake.
MAT 7:29 Kiyaha kakihunda handa mundu yunalikalama, hangi chepa handa ahunda bhabhe bha Malaghilo.
MAT 8:1 Yesu pakahulukite kukitumbi, lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukintughila.
MAT 8:2 Mundu yumu yunamaloha kakihika na kakinchutamila mayughwa paking'ombela, “Bambo, handa ghungupala, ghwahotola kunyoha.”
MAT 8:3 Yesu kakigholoha kibhoko kyake, kakinnyabhika pakalongela, “Nungupala ghuyoheke.” Kamu yula mundu kakilama maloha ghake.
MAT 8:4 Mbole Yesu kaking'ombela, “Ghuyihwe, ghukotoke kunng'ombela ywohele, ngati ghughende ghukalibhonehe kwa ndundame, na kutula matulo gha ghalaghilitwe na Musa ngati yibheghe ubhoneho kukita ghulamihwa.”
MAT 8:5 Yesu pakayingiliti ku Kapelinaumu, machonda yumu kilongohi kakinhikila pakinnyupa utangwo,
MAT 8:6 kakilongela, “Bambo, ndumitumi ghwangu kaghonja ukaya, ntamwa ghwa ulelebhalo kangi kangubhina munu.”
MAT 8:7 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ndahika na kunlamiha.”
MAT 8:8 Peni yula kilongohi ywa machonda kakinng'ombela, “Bambo, nenga nungunoghwa ng'obhe kwa ghwenga kuyingila mu lubhagha lwangu. Peni ghukambuke lilagho ghweka, na nndumindumi ghwangu katalama.
MAT 8:9 Kiyaha na nenga ndo mundu numeghite na makakala, abhegha machonda pahi ya nenga. Panunng'ombela ayu ‘Ghughende,’ naywo kangughenda, na yungi panung'ombela ‘Ghuhike.’ Naywo kanguhika. Na panung'ombela nndumindumi ghwangu ‘Ghutende kilibhi aki.’ Naywo kangutenda.”
MAT 8:10 Yesu pakayihwite malagho ago kakikangacha, na kakiaghombela bhala bhandu bhaantughilite, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, nenga nangammona ng'obhe mundu ywohele hata mu Isilaeli, kabhegha na uhyubhalilo handa aghu.
MAT 8:11 Basi, nunguaghombela kukita bhandu atangalo bhaahika kuhuma kungeha na kulutipikila luchubha, nabho bhaatama mu chekwa ya kulyegha papamu na Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobu mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunani kwa Chapanga.
MAT 8:12 Peni bhala bhene Akaaisilaeli atangalo bhaahwacha ghubhutwa aghwo ndo ghwabhe, bhatataghwa panji mulubhindu, akwo bhaalila na kuhyagha mino.”
MAT 8:13 Mbole Yesu kakinng'ombela yula machonda kilongohi, “Ghughende ukaya kwako, na yibheghe handa paghuhyubhalila.” Na yula ndumindumi ywake kakilama lisaa lila lila.
MAT 8:14 Yesu pakahikite ukaya kwa Petili, kakimmona mama ywa nhumbu ywa Petili kaghonja paulili kangubhina nhehemela.
MAT 8:15 Kakinnyabhikila kibhoko aywo mama na utamwa ghukinleka, kakiyinuka na kuyanda kukeya kuntelekela.
MAT 8:16 Payihikite makimuhi bhakinnyeghela bhandu atangalo bhaabheghite na mandilu. Naywo kakighabhuha ghala mandilu kwa lilagho lyake na kualamiha atamwa bhoha.
MAT 8:17 Agha ghakitendeka ngati litwihilike lila lilagho liikambukitwe na mbuye Isaya handa, “Ywombe katola mihehemela yetu na katola matamwa gha twenga.”
MAT 8:18 Yesu pakabhonite lumati lwa bhandu paluntindila, kakiakwilikiha ahundwa bhake bhayomboke kumwambo ya lihibha.
MAT 8:19 Nhunda yumu ywa malaghilo kakinng'endela, pakinng'ombela, “Nhunda, nenga ndakutughila kwohele kughupala kughenda.”
MAT 8:20 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Mabhweha abhegha na mbako, na hiyuni abhegha na hiyumba, peni Mwana ghwa Mundu kabhegha ng'obhe na pakupumulila.”
MAT 8:21 Mundu yungi mu ahundwa bhake kakinng'ombela, “Bambo, ghundegheke huti nikankulile tate ghwangu.”
MAT 8:22 Peni Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghundughile, ghubhaleke bhaaghweghite abhakulile bhala bhaaghweghite bhabhe.”
MAT 8:23 Yesu kakikwela mubhwato, na ahundwa bhake bhakintughila.
MAT 8:24 Paabheghite mu mwanja, pindulu likibwituka likusi likulu mu lihibha mbaka bhwato ghukiyanda kudibala kwa mayukano, peni Yesu kakibhegha kaghonja ng'ono.
MAT 8:25 Ahundwa bhake bhaking'endela, bhakinnyumuha paalongela, “Bambo, ghutulopohe, tunguhwegha.”
MAT 8:26 Naywo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mwenga bhandu munakuhyubhalila kyamandina, kiyaha niki munguyoghopa?” Mbole kakiyinuka na kakililakalila lila likusi na lihibha, na kukibhegha tuli.
MAT 8:27 Bhala bhandu bhakikangacha, paalongela, “Ayu ndo mundu ywa kya bhuli mbaka likusi na lihibha hingunnyitikila!”
MAT 8:28 Yesu pakahikite kumwambo, ku nnima ghwa Akaagelasi, bhandu abhili bhaakwelitwe na mandilu bhakikongana na Yesu paahuma ku mandogholo. Bhandu abha bhakibhegha akalipa munu, mbaka kahone mundu ywakahotolite kupita mu njila yila.
MAT 8:29 Bhakituta kyobho paakilongela, “Ghubhegha na niki na twenga, Mwana ghwa Chapanga? Bhuli ghunguhika apa kutupamanda kukali ya linjubha liikwilikihitwe?”
MAT 8:30 Patali pamandina kuhuma pahala paabheghite, kukibhegha na lumati lwa maghulubhe paluhakilwa.
MAT 8:31 Ghala mandilu ghakinnyupa Yesu, “Handa paghutubhuha, ghutuleke tughende, tuyingile mu lula lumati lwa maghulubhe.”
MAT 8:32 Kakiaghombela, “Nng'ende.” Habhu bhakiabhuka bhandu bhala. Lumati lwoha lwa maghulubhe likihulukila kwa lubhilo uhelelo nkulu ghwa kitumbi, likiyingila mu luhibha na likihwegha mumachi.
MAT 8:33 Bhala bhaabheghiti mu kuahakila maghulubhe bhakibhutuka lubhilo na bhakeyingila mu kitami, bhakighenda kuaghomela bhandu mihalo hyoha ya milando yiibhabwitukilite bhala bhandu bhaakwelitwe na mandilu.
MAT 8:34 Mbole bhandu bhoha bha nnima ghula bhakibhuka na kughenda kukongana na Yesu. Na paammonite bhakinnyupa kabhuke mu nnima ghwabhe.
MAT 9:1 Yesu kakikwela mubhwato, kakiyomboka lihibha na kuhika mu kitami kyabhe.
MAT 9:2 Linjubha alyo alyo bhakinnyeghela mundu ywakalelebhalite, kaghonjekwa mu likahe. Yesu pakabhonitie kuhyubhalila kwabhe, kakinng'ombela yula ywakalelebhalite, “Ghukotoke kutunyuka mwoyo mwana ghwangu, ghulekekehwa ulemwa ghwako.”
MAT 9:3 Kwakya nnando aghwo, amoo bha ahunda bha malaghilo bhakiyanda kuhwacha mu myoyo yabhe, “Mundu ayu kangukundula.”
MAT 9:4 Peni Yesu kakighamanya mahwacho ghabhe, kakiaghombela, “Kiyaha niki munguhwacha uhokelo mu myoyo yenu?
MAT 9:5 Kyoki kiibheghite kiyeyebhu, kulongela, ‘Ulemwa ghwako ghulekekehwa,’ ebu kulongela, ‘Ghuyime ghutyange?’
MAT 9:6 Peni nungupala mmanye kukita Mwana ywa Mundu kabhegha na makakala gha kulekekeha ulemwa mu nnima” Ndo kakinng'ombela yula mundu ywakalelebhalite, “Ghuyime ghutole likahe lyako na ghughende ukaya kwako.”
MAT 9:7 Yula mundu kakiyima, na kakighenda ukaya kwake.
MAT 9:8 Bhandu bhoha mulula lumati paabhonite agho bhakiyingilwa lyogha, bhakintika Chapanga, ywakaapeghite makakala ghala kwa bhandu.
MAT 9:9 Yesu pakabheghite mu kubhuka akwo, kakimmona mundu yumu lihina lyake Matayu katama pakusulumula sumu. Kakinng'ombela, “Ghundughile.” Matayu kakibhuka na kakintughila.
MAT 9:10 Yesu pakabheghite mulubhagha lya Matayu katama kulyegha hilyo, asumula sumu atangalo na bhanaulemwa bhakihika kutama papamu naywo na ahundwa bhake.
MAT 9:11 Afalisayu paabhonite milando ayi, bhakiakonya ahundwa bhake, “Kiyaha niki nhunda ghwenu kangulyegha papamu na asumula sumu na bhanaulemwa?”
MAT 9:12 Peni Yesu pakaghayihwite agho kakiaghombela, “Bhandu bhanga utamwa bhangumpomela ng'obhe nng'anga ngati bhala bhanautamwa bhangumpomela.
MAT 9:13 Basi, nng'ende mukalihunde fwambulo ya malagho agha, ‘Ningupomela lipyanda, ngati chepa nyambi.’ Kiyaha hika ng'obhe kuakema bhaabheghiti bha maha, ngati bhanaulemwa.”
MAT 9:14 Ahundwa ghwa Yohane yunakubatisa bhakihika na kunkonya Yesu, “Kya bhuli twenga na Akaafalisayu tungulikunga, peni ahundwa bhako bhangulikunga ng'obhe?”
MAT 9:15 Yesu kakiayanga, “Bhuli, ahenja bha yunakutolela bhaahotola bhuli kukukulika paabhegha na yunakutolela? Linjubha lyahika pakabhuka bambo yunakutolela, apo ndo bhatalikunga.”
MAT 9:16 “Kahone mundu ywakapabhika kipabhiko kya hyono mu likama, kiyaha kila kipabhiko kyakakuka mu likama alyo na pala pakapabhikiti paayonjokeheka.
MAT 9:17 Ebu bhandu angubhika ng'obhe difwai ya hyono mu nhako ghwa liyula ghuuhakaliti. Handa paatenda naha ghula nhako ghwa liyula lwaabaluka na difwai ya yitika. Na nhako ghwa liyula lyakanjaghanika, peni difwai ya hyono yabhikwaha mu hibhigha ya liyula lya hyono, na hibhigha yaabhegha tela.”
MAT 9:18 Yesu pakabheghite kangulongela agho, kamu kakiyingila kilongohi ywa nyumba ya kukonganila Akaayahudi, kakinchutamila mayughwa muulongolo ghwake na kunng'ombela, “Nhinja ghwangu kahwegha hinu hinu. Peni ghughende na ghunnyabhikile kibhoko kyako naywo katalama.”
MAT 9:19 Yesu kakibhuka na kakilongohana naywo, ahundwa bhake nabho bhakintughila.
MAT 9:20 Lisaa alyo alyo nndala yumu ywakabheghite na liholobhela kwa ngungwa kumi na ibhili, kakinhikila Yesu kya kuhyetu na kakilibyala lipinda lyake,
MAT 9:21 Kiyaha kakilighombela mumwoyo ghwake, “Handa ndalibyala lipinda lyake, ndaalama.”
MAT 9:22 Yesu kakikilibhuka, naywo pakammonitie kakinng'ombela, “Nhinja ghwangu, ghukotoke kutunyuka mwoyo, kuhyubhalila kwako kukulamiha.” Naywo yula nndala kakilama lisaa lilalila.
MAT 9:23 Yesu pakahikite kulubhagha lwa yula kilongohi ywa nyumba ya kukonganila Ayahudi, kakiabhona bhandu bhakipyemba filimbi na lumati lwa bhandu lukibhegha lungukukulika,
MAT 9:24 kakiaghombela, “Mmuke, kiyaha nhinja kahwegha ng'obhe ngati kaghonja.” Peni bhombe bhakinheka.
MAT 9:25 Mbole lumati lwa bhandu lukibhuhwa panje, Yesu kakiyingila unyumba na kakinkamula kibhoko, yula nhinja kakiyumuka.
MAT 9:26 Mihalo ayi yikikwila munnima ghula ghwoha.
MAT 9:27 Yesu pakabheghite mukubhuka pala, bhangabhona abhili bhakintughila, bhakiyobha kyobho na bhakilongela, “Mwana ywa Daudi ghutupeghe lipyanda.”
MAT 9:28 Yesu pakayingiliti munyumba bhala bhangabhona bhakinhikila. Naywo kakiakonya, “Munguhyubhalila kukita ndahotola kutenda nnando aghu?” Bhakinnyanga, “Ena Bambo.”
MAT 9:29 Ndo Yesu kakiabyala meho ghabhe na kulongela, “Na yibheghe kwa mwenga handa panhyubhalila.”
MAT 9:30 Meho ghabhe ghakihughuka. Yesu kakiakanikiha, pakalongela, “Nnole, mundu ywohele kakotoke kughumanya nnando aghu.”
MAT 9:31 Peni bhombe bhakighenda na kulandamiha mihalo ya Yesu mu nnima ghula ghwoha.
MAT 9:32 Bandu bhala abhili paabheghite bhangubhuka, mundu yumu ywakakwelitwe na mandilu na ywakabheghite ng'obhe na uhotolo ghwa kulongela kakiyeghwa kwa Yesu.
MAT 9:33 Kamu, palibhuhitwe lila lindilu, yula ywangahotola kulongela kakilongela. Lula lumati lwa bhandu lukikangacha na kulongela, “Nnando handa aghu ghunabhonekana ng'obhe mu Isilaeli.”
MAT 9:34 Peni Afalisayu bhakilongela, “Aywo kangughabhuha mandilu kwa makakala gha nkulu ghwa mandilu.”
MAT 9:35 Yesu kakityangila muhitami hyoha na hijiji, pakahunda munyumba hyabhe hya kukonganila Akaayahudi, pakalandamiha Nhalo ghwa Maha ghwa Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga na kulamiha atamwa kwoha mu bhandu.
MAT 9:36 Pakaabhonita bhandu himati himati kakiabhonela luhungu kiyaha bhangughaya kyangali utangwo, handa mene bhangali na nhakila.
MAT 9:37 Habhu kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Mabeno ndo matangalo peni atendalihengo bhamandina,
MAT 9:38 Basi, munnyupe Bambo ywa mabeno, ngati kabhalaghile atendalihengo bhabene mabeno ghake.”
MAT 10:1 Yesu kakiakema bhala ahundwa bhake kumi na abhili, kakiapegha makalama gha kughabhingabhinga mandilu na kulamiha matamwa ghoha.
MAT 10:2 Agha ndo mahina ghabhe bhala ahundwa kumi na abhili, ghwa ulongohi ndo Simoni ywakakemitwe Petili na Andelea nnongo ghwake, Yakobu mwana ghwa Sebedayu na Yohane nnongo ghwake,
MAT 10:3 Filipo na Batolomayu, Tomasi na Matayu ywakabheghite nsumula sumu na Yakobu mwana ywa Alufayu na Tadei,
MAT 10:4 Simoni mundu ywakatutanilite nnima ghwake Yuda Isikaliyote ywakankilukite Yesu.
MAT 10:5 Yesu kakialaghila abho kumi na abhili na kuapegha malagho, “Nkotoke kughenda kwa bhandu bhaabheghite ng'obhe Ayahudi, hangi nkotoke kuyingila mu kitami kyohele kya Akaasamalila.
MAT 10:6 Peni mbaha nngende kwa Akaisilaeli bhaahobhite handa mene.
MAT 10:7 Panng'enda mukalandamihe pannongela, ‘Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghuheghelela.’
MAT 10:8 Mualamihe atamwa, mukaahyuhe bhaahweghite, mubhayohe bhabheghite na maloha, mmuhe mandilu. Mpeghwa yaghi, na mwenga muapeghe yaghi.
MAT 10:9 Nkotoke kutola sahabu, ebu madini ghaakemwa fesa, ebu ngalabha mumihako ya mikungi yenu.
MAT 10:10 Nkotoke kutola nhako ghwa mu mwanja, ebu maghwanda mabhili, ebu makubasi ghangi, ebu nkongocho, kiyaha ntendalihengu kangunoghwa kukingama mulyo ghwake.”
MAT 10:11 “Pannyingila mu kitami ebu kijiji kyohele, mumpalahe mundu ywakapala kuakingama, na ntame kwa ywombe mbaka pampala kubhuka.
MAT 10:12 Pannyingila mu lubhagha, muajambuhe huti uhihimilo ghubheghe namwenga.
MAT 10:13 Handa abhegha bhandu bha maha munyumba ayi Chapanga kabhanonele. Peni handa abhegha ng'obhe bhandu bha maha, Chapanga kataanonela ng'obhe bhandu abho.
MAT 10:14 Handa mundu kanguakingama ng'obhe kubhayihwa mwenga. Basi, mpumunde lihu mumaghulu ghenu pammegha mu kubhuka mu nyumba ayo.
MAT 10:15 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, linjubha lya toso, kitami akyo kyamokola kihyato kikulu kupitingana kila kyaakimokolite bhandu bha hitami hya Sodoma na Gomola.”
MAT 10:16 “Nnole nungualaghila handa mene munkati ya galu bha kunhitu. Hinu mmeghe na malango handa liyoka na apole handa ngunda.
MAT 10:17 Mulindakile na bhandu, kiyaha bhatabhayegha mu njengakaya yabhe na kuatuta mu nyumba hyabhe hya ngonganilo.
MAT 10:18 Maayeghwa kwa atabhala na abhatwa kwakya nenga, ngati mmokole muaghombele bhombe yakya nenga na kwa bhandu bhaabheghite ng'obhe Ayahudi.
MAT 10:19 Peni paabhayegha munjengakaya, nkotoke kuhwacha kya kulongela, kiyaha maapeghwa kya kulongela lisaa alyo alyo.
MAT 10:20 Mana chepa mwenga mumpala kulongela, ngati Nhuki ywa Tate ywenu kutalongela kupitila mwenga.”
MAT 10:21 “Nnongo katankiluka nnongo ywake kakomwe, na tate katankiluka mwana ywake, bhana bhataakiluka abhele bhabhe na kuatenda akomwe.
MAT 10:22 Bhandu bhataapala ng'obhe mwenga kwakya kuhyubhalila nenga. Peni yunakulimbilila mbaka kuuhiko aywo katalopohwa.
MAT 10:23 Bhandu paabhapamanda mukitami kimu nng'ende kitami kingi. Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, mayiyomola ng'obhe hitami hyoha hya ku Isilaeli kukali na kubhuya kwa Mwana ywa Mundu.”
MAT 10:24 “Nhundwa kaahotola ng'obhe kulikweha kwa nnhunda ywake ebu nndumitumi kaahotola ng'obhe kulikweha kwa bambo ywake.
MAT 10:25 Nhundwa kangunoghwa kubhegha handa nhunda ywake, na nndumindumi kangunoghwa kubhegha handa bambo ywake. Handa nenga ndo nkulu ywa nyumba yenu bhangungema Belisebuli, bhuli mwenga chepa bhaabhakema mahina mahakata kyanalumu!”
MAT 10:26 “Basi, nkotoke kubhayoghopa bhandu abho, kiyaha kahone kiigubikitwe kyene kyangagubutuligwa, na kila kiihihitwe kyaahumbulwa.
MAT 10:27 Linuaghombela mwenga mu mbwepo, mwenga mulilongele pakindandabhanji, na lila linubhapwepwela, mulilandamihe ngati kila mundu kaliyihwe.
MAT 10:28 Nkotoke kubhayoghopa bhala bhanakughukoma mmili peni bhaahotola kata kuukoma nhuki. Mungunoghwa munnyoghope Chapanga ywakahotola kughukanjaghana nhuki na mmili mu mwoto ghwa kumambe.
MAT 10:29 Bhuli, hidunduli abhili bhanguhemelwa ng'obhe kwa ligwala yimu ghweka? Peni kahone hata yumu ywabhe ywakapala kuponeka kyangali kummanya Tate ywenu.
MAT 10:30 Hata hwili hya mitwe hyenu Chapanga kahimanya mmalango ghwake.
MAT 10:31 Habhu nkotoke kuyoghopa, kiyaha mwenga bha maha muno muulongolo ghwa Chapanga kupitingana hidunduli atangalo.”
MAT 10:32 “Mundu ywohele ywakanyitikila nenga muulongolo ghwa bhandu, na nenga ndannyitikila ywombe muulongolo ghwa Tate ywangu ywa kunane.
MAT 10:33 Peni ywohele ywakangana nenga mu ulongolo ghwa bhandu, na nenga ndankana mu ulongolo ghwa Tate ywangu ywa kunane.”
MAT 10:34 “Nkotoke kuhwacha kukita nyegha uhihimilo mu nnima, nyegha ng'obhe uhihimilo ngati ngondo.
MAT 10:35 Kiyaha hika kuatenda tate na mwana ywake nnume abheghe amyanja, kangi nhinja na mama ywake abheghe amyanja, nakamwa na mama ywa nngwana ywake,
MAT 10:36 na amyanja bha mundu bhaabhegha bha mukaya yake.”
MAT 10:37 “Mundu ywohele ywakampala tate ywake ebu mama ywake kupitingana nenga, kangunoghwa ng'obhe kubhegha nhundwa ywangu. Na ywohele ywakampala mwana ywake ebu nhinja ywake kupitingana nenga, kangunoghwa ng'obhe kubhegha nhundwa ywa nenga.
MAT 10:38 Kangi mundu ywohele ywakatola ng'obhe lupingika lwake na kundughila, kangunoghwa ng'obhe kubhegha nhundwa ywanenga.
MAT 10:39 Ywombe ywakapala kuulamiha ubhumi ghwake kataghuhobheha, naywo ywombe ywakapala kuuhobheha ubhumi ghwake kwakya nenga kataulopoha.”
MAT 10:40 “Mundu ywohele ywakaatekula mwenga kangundekula nenga na ywohele kangundekula nenga, kanguntekula ywakalaghilite.
MAT 10:41 Mundu ywohele ywakantekula mbuye kiyaha aywo ndo mbuye, kaakingama hupo ya mbuye, na ywakantekula mundu ywa maha muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, kaakingama hupo ya mundu ywa maha muulongolo ghwa Chapanga.
MAT 10:42 Mundu ywohele ywakapala kumpegha nnobho ghwa machi, yumu ywa abha adoko kiyaha ndo ahundwa bhangu, kulyaghila nunguaghombela, katapeghwa hupo yake.”
MAT 11:1 Yesu pakayomolite kualaghila ahundwa bhake kumi na abhili, kakibhuka apo na kakighenda kulandamiha na kuhunda mu hitami hyabhe.
MAT 11:2 Yohane yunakubatisa pakabheghite mu kibhopo, kakiyihwa mihalo yakatenditi Kilisto, kakialaghila ahundwa bhake,
MAT 11:3 ngati bhakankonye, “Ghwenga ndo yula ywakapala kuhika, ebu tunlindilile yungi?”
MAT 11:4 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mmuye mukanng'ombele Yohane milando yimuyiyihwa na kuyibhona.
MAT 11:5 Bhangabhona bhangumokola kubhona, ngwabhengwabhe bhangutyanga, bhanamaloha bhanguyohwa, bhangayihwa bhanguyihwa, bhaahweghiti bhanguhyuhwa na kapukwa bhangulandamihwa Nhalo ghwa Maha.
MAT 11:6 Kanonelwa mundu yula ywakabheghite ng'obhe na bhwaghalili na nenga.”
MAT 11:7 Bhala ahundwa bha Yohane paabheghite mu kubhuka, Yesu kakiyanda kughomba na bhandu kwa kya Yohane Yunakubatisa. Kakiakonya, “Panng'endite ku kibhala, mukighenda kubhona niki? Nndenge paghupulwa na liyegha?
MAT 11:8 Handa chepa, mukighenda kubhona niki? Mundu ywakahwaliti mapinda gha maha? Aka kaa, bhala bhaahwaliti mapinda gha maha bhangutama mu nyumba ya abhatwa!
MAT 11:9 Basi, mukighenda kubhona niki? Bhuli, kummona mbuye ghwa Chapanga? Ena, kulyaghila mukighenda kummona ywakabheghite nkulu kupitingana mbuye ywa Chapanga.
MAT 11:10 Aywo ndo ywene mihalo yake yikityekwa, ‘Nnole nungunlaghila mjumbe ywa nenga kakulongolele muulongolo ghwako, ywakapala kuyitendekeha njila yako’
MAT 11:11 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, mu bhandu bhoha bhaabhelekitwe na adala, kanabwituka ng'obhe mundu ywakabheghite nkulu kupitingana Yohane Yunakubatisa, hata habhu, yula ywakabheghite nchoko mu ghubhutwa ghwa kunane, ndo nkulu kupitingana Yohane.
MAT 11:12 Kutandila manjubha gha Yohane Yunakubatisa mbaka hinu, Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghungupundangilwa kwa makakala, na bhabheghite na makakala bhanguyigha kughutola ghubhutwa aghwo.
MAT 11:13 Mana mambuye bhoha na malaghilo gha Musa mbaka manjubha gha Yohane Yunakubatisa, bhakilondola milando yiipala kubhegha manjubha agha.
MAT 11:14 Handa mmegha kala kuyitikila ali, ywombe Yohana ndo Eliya ywakalondolitwe kukita katahika.
MAT 11:15 Ywakabheghite na makutu, kayihwe.”
MAT 11:16 “Peni kibheleko aki nikihwananihe na kilibhi ghani? Kingulihwana na bhana bhaatamite paligulio paabhakema ayabhe na kualongela,
MAT 11:17 ‘Tukiahonela ng'oma, peni mukikina ng'obhe, tukiayimbila luyimbo lwa kibhembo peni mukikukulika ng'obhe.’
MAT 11:18 Kiyaha Yohane yunakubatisa kakihika, kakilikunga na kakinywegha ng'obhe difwai, nabho bhakilongela, ‘Aywo kakwelwa na lindilu!’
MAT 11:19 Mwana ywa Mundu kakihika, kakilyegha na kunywegha, nabho bhangulongela, ‘Nnole, ayu ndo nhukila na nlobhi, nng'anja ywa asumula sumu na bhanaulemwa.’ Peni malangu gha Chapanga ghangubhonehwa kubhegha gha maha kubhukana na mandendelo ghake.”
MAT 11:20 Mbole Yesu kakiyanda kuhikinya hitami hyakatendite mihabho mitangalo kupitingana kwingi, kiyaha bhandu bhake bhakilipetula ng'obhe.
MAT 11:21 “Kimmone, mwenga mabhandu bha Kolazini na bha ku Betisaida. Kiyaha handa mihabho yiitendikite kwa mwenga, yingalitendekite kwa bhandu bha ku Tilo na bha ku Sidoni, bhandu abho bhangalipetulite kutandila makachu kwa kuhwala malobota na kulityelemeka malihu.
MAT 11:22 Peni nunguaghombela, mu linjubha lya toso, mwenga maamokola toso ngulu kupitingana bhandu bha ku Tilo na bha ku Sidoni.
MAT 11:23 Na mwenga mabhandu bha Kapelinaumu, bhuli, maakwehwa mbaka kunane kwa Chapanga? Aka kaa, maahuluhwa mbaka pahi munu. Mihabho yiitendikite kwa mwenga yingalitendekite kwa bhandu bha Sodoma, kitami kyabhe kingabheghite mbaka lelo.
MAT 11:24 Peni nunguaghombela kukita, linjubha lya toso mwenga maamokola kihyato kikulu kupitingana kya bhandu bha Sodoma.”
MAT 11:25 Mumanjubha agho Yesu kakilongela, “Ningukulumba Tate, Bambo ghwa kunane na nnima, kiyaha ghukiyihiha mihalo ayi kwa bhanamalango na asomi, na ghughagubutula kwa bhaabheghite handa bhana hing'enya.
MAT 11:26 Ena Tate, ghukighatenda habho kiyaha yikikunogheha.
MAT 11:27 Tate ghwangu, kambegha hilibhi hyoha. Kahone mundu ywakammanya Mwana ngati Tate, ebu kahone ywakammanya Tate maha nga Mwana na ywohele yula mwene Mwana kapala kunhwimulila Tate ghwake.”
MAT 11:28 “Nhike kwa nenga mabhoha munng'ayaghaya na kutopehwa na mihigho, na nenga ndabhapumuliha.
MAT 11:29 Mulikunge kingongolo kyangu, mulihunde kwa nenga, kiyaha nenga ndo npole na yunauhwamo ghwa mwoyo, na myoyo yenu yaapumulila.
MAT 11:30 Kiyaha kingongolo kyangu kiyeyembhu, na nhigho ghunuapegha muupape ndo nnyeyebhu.”
MAT 12:1 Linjubha limu, Yesu kakibhegha kangutyanga mu mighunda ya ngano Mulinjuba lya Kupumulila. Na ahundwa bhake bhakibhegha na njala, ndo bhakiyanda kughadunyula mahonjo gha ngano na kulyegha mbunje hyake.
MAT 12:2 Peni Afalisayo paaghubhonite nnando agho, bhakinng'ombela Yesu, “Ghulole, ahundwa bhako bhangutenda nnando ghuukanikihwa Mulinjubha lya Kupumulila!”
MAT 12:3 Yesu kakiayanga, “Bhuli, munasoma ng'obhe kyakatendite Daudi na ayake paabheghite na njala?
MAT 12:4 Kakiyingila mu Nyumba ya Chapanga na kakilyegha mangati ghaabhikitwe muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, ywombe ebu abho ayake bhakinoghwa ng'obhe kughalyegha, maha bhakiteghekwa kulyegha andundame ghweka chabhe.
MAT 12:5 Ebu munasoma ng'obhe mu kitabho kya Malaghilo gha Musa kukita kila linjubha lya kupumulila andundame bhanguhokela Malaghilo mu Nyumba ya Chapanga peni angubhonekana ng'obhe kukita ahokela?
MAT 12:6 Nunguaghombela hoto kukita, ywakabheghite nkulu kupitingana Nyumba ya Chapanga kabhegha apa.
MAT 12:7 Handa mungamanyite mana ya malagho agha, ‘Ningupala lipyanda, ngati ng'obhe nyambi,’ mangaatosite ng'obhe bhandu bhangauhokelo,
MAT 12:8 kiyaha Mwana ywa Mundu ndo Bambo ywa Linjubha lya Kupumulila.”
MAT 12:9 Yesu kakibhuka apo na kakiyingila munyumba yabhe ya kukonganila,
MAT 12:10 Amwo kakibhegha mundu ywakalelebhalite kibhoko. Bhombe paakipalaha kihokonyo kya kunkokela Yesu, ndo bhakinkonya Yesu, “Bhuli yibhegha tela kulamiha mulinjubha lya Kupumulila?”
MAT 12:11 Yesu kakiayanga, “Ndo ghani mu mwenga ywakabheghite na mene ywake ywene kachumbukila mulibhumba Linjubha lya Kupumulila, katammuha ng'obhe?
MAT 12:12 Peni mundu ywa utopelo kupitingana mene. Basi, yibhegha tela kutenda gha maha Mulinjubha lya kupumulila.”
MAT 12:13 Ndo kakinng'ombela yula mundu, “Kigholohe kibhoko kyako.” Kakikigholoha nakyo kikibhegha kyamaha handa kila kingi.
MAT 12:14 Peni Akaafalisayo bhakibhuka panje na bhakighombana yakya kunkoma Yesu.
MAT 12:15 Peni Yesu pakaghamanyite mahwacho ghabhe, kakibhuka pahala apo. Bhandu atangalo bhakintughila, naywo kakialamiha bhoha,
MAT 12:16 kakiaghombela bhala bhakaalamihite kukita akotoke kulongela ywombe ndo ghani.
MAT 12:17 Ngati litwihilike lila lilagho lyakakambukite mbuye Isaya pakilongela,
MAT 12:18 “Ghulole nndumitumi ywangu yununhaghulite, npalo ghwangu yununhaghulite, nyelelwa naywo. Ndaabhika nhuki ghwangu kwa ywombe, Naywo katalandamiha ghala ghanuapala bhandu bhaghatende munnima hyoha.
MAT 12:19 Katalimbana ng'obhe na bhandu ebu kuyobha kyobho, hangi kahone ywakapala kuyihwa lilobhe lyake mu njila.
MAT 12:20 Nndenge ghuubajanganite kataudumula ng'obhe, Ebu lutambi lututuma lyohi katauhima ng'obhe, Mbaka pakapala kutwihiliha toso ya ghala ghaapala kutendekwa yatabhale
MAT 12:21 Na kwa ywombe bhandu bha milima hyoha yaabhika udumbilo ghwabhe.”
MAT 12:22 Bhandu bhakinnyeghela mundu ywakakwelitwe na lindilu, naywo ndo ywangabhona na ywangahotola kulongela, Yesu kakinlamiha naywo kakihotola kulongela na kubhona.
MAT 12:23 Bhandu bhoha bhakikangacha na kulongela, “Bhuli, ayu chepa Mwana ywa Daudi?”
MAT 12:24 Peni Afalisayu paayihwite nnando aghwo bhakilongela, “Mundu ayu kangughabhuha mandilu kwa makakala gha Belisebuli aywo ndo nkulu ywa mandilu.”
MAT 12:25 Yesu pakaghamanyite mahwacho ghabhe, kakiaghombela, “Ghubhutwa ghwohele ghuughabhanikite mu himati himati hinakupingikana, ghwaaghendelela kata kubhegha, na nnima ghwohele ebu lubhagha lwohele luughabhanika mu himati himati hinakupingikana ghwatengeleheka kata.
MAT 12:26 Handa Nchipila kangumminga Nchipila, kangulipingika mwene. Basi, ubhutwa ghwake ghwatengelehwa bhuli?
MAT 12:27 Na nenga handa nungughabhuha mandilu kwa makakala gha Belisebuli, bhuli afwasi bhenu angughabhuha mandilu kwa makakala gha ghani? Hinu naha, abho ndo bhataatosa mwenga.
MAT 12:28 Peni handa nenga nungughabhuha mandilu kwa Nhuki ghwa Chapanga, ndo nmanye kukita Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga ghubhahikila.”
MAT 12:29 “Ebu mundu katahotola bhuli kuyingila mu nyumba ya mundu yunamakakala na kughupoka utopelo ghwake handa kanammopa ng'obhe yula yuna makakala? Pakammopa kala, kulyaghila katahotola kumpoka utopelo ghwake.”
MAT 12:30 “Ywoheli yunakubhegha ng'obhe papamu na nenga kangumbingikiha, na ywakakungana ng'obhe papamu na nenga, kangupwilinganya.
MAT 12:31 Basi, nunguaghombela, bhandu bhaalekekehwa, ulemwa ghwohele na ngundulo, peni ywaankundula Nhuki ghwa Chapanga kaalekekehwa kata.
MAT 12:32 Mundu ywohele ywakakambuka lilagho kihyengo kya Mwana ghwa Mundu katalekekehwa, peni ywohele yaakambuka lilagho kihyengo kya Nhuki ghwa Chapanga kahone kulekekehwa, mu nnima aghu ebu mu nnima ghuupala kuhika.”
MAT 12:33 “Ghuutende nkongo ghubheghe ghwa maha na mapambiko ghake ghaabhegha gha maha, ebu ghuutende nkongo ghubheghe nhakata na mapambika ghake ghaabhegha mahakata, kiyaha nkongo ghwaamanyikwa kwa mapambika ghake.
MAT 12:34 Mwenga kibheleko kya liyoka. Mahotola bhuli kukambuka mihalo ya mah, na mwenga malemwa? Kiyaha nnomo ghwa mundu ghwaakambuka ghala gha memiti mu mwoyo ghwake.
MAT 12:35 Mundu ywa maha ghuyibhuha mihalo ya maha kuhuma muluhanja lwa mwoyo ghwake, naywo mundu nhakata kangubhuha malagho mahakata kuhuma muluhanja lwa mwoyo ghwake.”
MAT 12:36 “Peni nunguaghombela, mulinjubha lya toso bhandu bhaabhuha mmalango mumalagho ghoha gha uhila mahala ghabhaghakambukite.
MAT 12:37 Kiyaha kwa malagho ghako ghwaabhalangwa kukita ghwangauhokelo muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, kwa malagho ghako ghwatoswa.”
MAT 12:38 Mbole amoo bha Afalisayo na ahunda bha malaghilo bhakinng'ombela Yesu, “Nhunda tungupala kubhona naho kuhuma kwa ghwenga.”
MAT 12:39 Peni ywombe kakiayanga, “Kibheleko kihakata na kya utyahe kingupala naho. Peni kyaakamuhwa ng'obhe naho ywohele ngati nga yila ya mbuye Yona.
MAT 12:40 Kiyaha handa bhula Yona pakabheghite mulutumbo lwa homba Ywakakemwa nyangumi kwa manjubha mandatu pamuhi na pakilo, ubhwabhu abhu Mwana ywa Mundu katabhegha mu mwoyo ghwa nnima majubha mandatu, pamuhi na pakilo.
MAT 12:41 Linjubha lya toso bhandu bha Ninawi bhaayima papamu na kibheleko aki na kukitosa, kiyaha bhombe bhakilipetula paalandamihitwe na Yona, hinu apa kabhegha nkulu kupitingana Yona.
MAT 12:42 Mutwa nndala ywa kusini katayima mu linjubha lya toso na katakitosa kibheleko aki, kiyaha mwene kakihika kuhuma ku uhiko ghwa nnima ngati kakaghayihwe mahala gha Solomoni na mu mwenga kabhegha nkulu kupitingana Solomoni.”
MAT 12:43 “Lindilu palimmuka mundu, lyabhyelabyela pahala paabheghite ng'obhe na machi pakipalaha ng'ebhu ya kupumulila, peni katamokola ng'obhe.
MAT 12:44 Mbole lyaalongela, ‘Ndabhuya mu nyumba yangu yimukite’ Naywo pakabhuya kaayibhona yila nyumba ya yaghi, yipyaghilwa na kubhikwa maha.
MAT 12:45 Mbole lyaaghenda na kubhayegha mandilu bhangi saba, ahakata kupitingana ywombe, nabho bhaayingila na kutama amwo. Na kuuhiko aywo mundu katabhegha tepatepa kupitingana kalongohi. Habhu ndo yabhegha kwa kibheleko aki kihakata.”
MAT 12:46 Yesu pakabheghite mukulongela na lumati lwa bhandu, mama ywake na alongo bhake bhakiyima panje bhakipala kuyobhela naywo.
MAT 12:47 Ndo mundu yumu kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Bambo, mama ywako na alongo bhako ayima panje, bhangupala kuyobhela na ghwenga.”
MAT 12:48 Peni Yesu kakinnyanga na kunng'ombela yula mundu, “Mama ghwangu ndo ghani, na alongo bhangu ndo aghani?”
MAT 12:49 Palapala, kakiakigholohela kibhoko kyake kuabhonea ahundwa bhake, pakilongela, “Abha ndo mama ywangu na alongo bhangu.
MAT 12:50 Kiyaha ywohele ywakatenda mapalo gha Tate ywangu ywa kunane, aywo ndo nnongo ywangu, nhacha ywangu na mama ywangu.”
MAT 13:1 Linjubha alyo alyo Yesu kakihuma panje ya nyumba na kakitama pambweha ya Lihibha.
MAT 13:2 Lumati lukulu munu lwa bhandu lukikwemukana pa lukintindila mbaka yikinkwiliha kayingile mu bhwato na kakitama amwo, na bhandu bhoha bhakeyima mu mbwegha ya luhibha.
MAT 13:3 Ndo kakiaghombela milando miyoloho kwa mihwano, pakalongela, “Nkanda lutupi kakighenda kukweta mbeyu hyaki kunng'unda.
MAT 13:4 Pakabheghite mu kukweta mbeyu ahyo, yingi yikiponeka umbwegha ya njila, hiyuni bhakiihonyola.
MAT 13:5 Mbeyu yingi yikiponeka mu malibho ghaabheghite na lutupi luchoko. Kamu, yikibhonekana yikimela kya kulopokela kiyaha lutupi lukibhegha luchoko.
MAT 13:6 Peni luchubha paluhomokite, mimela yila yikiyuma kiyaha hikibhegha ng'obhe na ngigha ndali.
MAT 13:7 Mbeyu yingi yikiponeka mu mikongo ya mihomi, nahyo yikiyukwa na mihomi ahyo.
MAT 13:8 Mbeyu yingi yikiponeka mu lutupi lwa mbosela nayo yikimela na kupambika mapambika, yimu kwa mbinda mabhoko kumi, yingi kwa mbinda mabhoko sita na yingi kya mbinda mabhoko ndatu.”
MAT 13:9 Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Yunamakutu na kayihwe.”
MAT 13:10 Ahundwa bhake Yesu bhaking'endela na bhaknkonya, “Kiyaha niki ghunguyobhela na bhandu kwa mihwano?”
MAT 13:11 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mwenga nnonelwa kuyimanya mbwepo ya Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane, peni abha bhanapeghwa ng'obhe kughamanya agha ghoha.
MAT 13:12 Mana mundu ywohele ywene kangumanya yakya ghubbhutwa ghwa kunane, Chapanga katannyokehela kumanya kyanalumu, peni yula ywakamanya kachoko yakya Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane, Chapanga katabhuha hata kila kichoko kyakakimanya.
MAT 13:13 Ndo mana nunguyobhela nabho kwa mihwano, kiyaha bhangulolekeha ghanughatenda peni handa bhangughabhona ng'obhe, bhanguyihwa ghanughalongela peni bhangughayihwa ng'obhe na bhangumanya ng'obhe.
MAT 13:14 Habhu, kwa bhombe ghungutwihilika ulondohi ghwa mbuye Isaya pakalongelite, ‘Abha bhandu bhaayihwa na kuyihwa, peni bhaamanya ng'obhe, kulola bhaalola, peni bhaabhona ng'obhe.
MAT 13:15 Kiyaha mioyo ya bhandu abha yibhegha na unonopo, bhanguyihwa ng'obhe kwa makutu ghabhe na bhaghagubika meho ghabhe. Hela bhubo, bhangabhonite kwa meho ghabhe, bhangamanyiti kwa mahala ghabhe na kunkilibhukila na kualamiha, kalongela Bambo, na nenga ningabhalamihite.’ ”
MAT 13:16 “Peni mwenga nnonelwa, kiyaha Chapanga kabhatangatila mwenga mmone na machikilo ghenu ghanguyihwa.
MAT 13:17 Kulyaghila nungubhaghombela, Ambuye atangalo na bhandu bha maha bhakibhegha na uhongo ghwa kughabhona ghala ghamughabhona peni bhakighabhona ng'obhe, na bhakibhegha na uhongo ghwa kughayihwa ghala ghamughayihwa peni bhakighayihwa ng'obhe.”
MAT 13:18 “Basi, mwenga nnyihwe fwambulo ya nhwano ghwa yula mundu ywakaghendite kukweta mbeyu.
MAT 13:19 Mundu ywohele pakayihwa lilagho lya Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga kyanga kulimanya, ndo handa yila mbeyu yiiponikiti munjila, yula Nchipila katahika na kunyahula kila kiibheghite mumwoyo ghwake.
MAT 13:20 Yila mbeyu yiiponikiti mu malibho luubheghite nalutupi luchoko ndo nhwano ghwa mundu ywakayihwa lilagho alyo na kamu kangulikingama kwa kuyelelwa.
MAT 13:21 Peni kabhegha ng'obhe na ngigha mumwoyo ghwake, kataghendelela kulibhika kwa manjubha machoko na paghuhika nndaluko ghwa himbamanda na lung'ahi kwakya lilagho alyo, kamu kangudunyuka mwoyo.
MAT 13:22 Yila mbeyu yiiponikite mu mikongo ya mihomi, ndo nhwano ghwa mundu ywakayihwa alyo lilagho, peni bhwaghalili ghwa nnima aghu na unyeghelehi ghwa utopelo ghunguliyuka lilagho alyo, nalyo kupambika kata.
MAT 13:23 Peni yila mbeyu yiimelite mu lutupi lwa mbosela ndo nhwano ghwa mundu ywakayihwite lilagho alyo na kulimanya. Kulyaghila aywo kangupambika mapambika, paka pambika yimo mbinda mabhoko kumi, yingi mbinda mabhoko sita na yingi mbinda mabhoko ndatu.”
MAT 13:24 Yesu kakiaghombela bhandu nhwano ghungi pakalongela, “Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghungulihwana na mundu ywakakwetiti mbeyu ya maha munng'unda ghwake.
MAT 13:25 Peni bhandu paaghonjite, nmyanja ywake kakihika na kakikweta masapi mumpunga ghula, na kakibhuka.
MAT 13:26 Paghumelite mpunga na kusukuka, masapi nagho ghakibhonekana.
MAT 13:27 Andumindumi bha yula nkolanng'unda bhaking'endela na kunng'ombela, ‘Nkulu, twenga tukikwenta mbeyu ya maha munng'unda ghwako. Hinu, masapi ghahuma kwoki?’
MAT 13:28 Kakiayanga, ‘Nmyanja ndo ywakatendite nnando aghwo.’ Bhakinkonya, ‘Bhuli, ghungupala tughende tukaghatupule?’
MAT 13:29 Peni ywombe kakiayanga, ‘Ng'obhe, nkotoke kughatupulanga, kiyaha pamughatupula masapi maahotola kutupula na mpunga bhubho.
MAT 13:30 Nneke mpunga na misapi yikule papamu mbaka manjubha gha mabeno. Mumanjubha agho gha mabeno ndabhaghombela bhanakubena bhakakungane misapi huti, bhaghabhope hinginja hinginja ngati bhaghayoche mwoto, mbole bhakungane ngano na kuhiyegha mu luhanja lwangu.’ ”
MAT 13:31 Yesu kakiaghombela bhandu nhwano ghungi, “Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghungulihwana na mbeyu ya nkongo ghuukemwa haladali yiitolitwe na mundu yumu na kuyikweta munng'unda ghwake.
MAT 13:32 Mbeyu ayi ndo njoko munu kupitingana mbeyu hyoha, peni payimela kala yingubhegha ngulu kupitingana mimela hyoha. Na kangi yingukula na kubhegha nkongo, mbaka hiyuni ghwa kubhwelo bhanguhika na kuchenga hiyumba mu mapanyu ghake.”
MAT 13:33 Yesu kakiaghombela nhwano ghungi, “Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghungulihwana na amila yene nndala kakitola na kuyihangangana na ukobha hikapu hindatu mbaka ghwoha ghukitutumuka.”
MAT 13:34 Yesu kakiaghombela bhandu agha ghoha kwa nhwano. Kakiaghombela ng'obhe kyohele kyanga nhwano.
MAT 13:35 Ngati lilagho liikambukitwi na mbuye ywa Chapanga libwitukile, “Ndalongela nabho kwa mihwano; ndafwambula ghala ghahihitwe kutandila kubhumbwa kwa nnima aghu.”
MAT 13:36 Mbole Yesu kakialagha bhala bhandu, na kakiyingila mu nyumba. Ahunda bhake bhakinng'endela na bhakenng'ombela, “Ghutufwambulile ghula nhwano ghwa misapi kunng'unda.”
MAT 13:37 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nkweta mbeyu ywa yila mbeyu ya maha ndo Mwana ywa Mundu.
MAT 13:38 Ghula nng'unda ndo nnima aghu. Yila mbeyu ya maha ndo bhala bhandu bhene ghubhutwa ndo ghwabhe. Peni yila misapi ndo bhala bhandu bha yula Nchipila.
MAT 13:39 Nmyanja ywakakwetite ghala misapi ndo Nhipila. Mabeno ndo uhiko ghwa nndaluko na bhanakubena ndo mahoka bha Chapanga.
MAT 13:40 Handa bhula misapi payikunganwa na kuyochwa mwoto, ubhwabhu abhu ndo yabhegha manjubha gha uhiko,
MAT 13:41 Mwana ywa Mundu kataalaghila mahoka bha Chapanga, nabho bhataakungana kuhuma mu Ghubhutwa ghwake bhala bhoha bhanakuyambuha ulemwa, na bhanakutenda uhokelo,
MAT 13:42 na kubhatagha mu mwoto ghwa lihumbika, na akwo bhaalila na kuhyagha mino kubhukana na mabhino makalipa.
MAT 13:43 Mbole bhala bhandu bhaatenda ghanakunnogheha Chapanga handa luchubha mughubhutwa bha Tate ghwabhe. Yunamachikilo na kayihwe.”
MAT 13:44 “Ghubhutwa ghwa kunani ghungulihwana na utopelo ghuhihitwe munng'unda, mundu yumu pakang'amulite kakighuhiha kangi. Kakiyelelwa munu mbaka kakighenda kuhemengana hyoha hyakabheghite nahyo, na kakighuhemela nng'unda ghula.”
MAT 13:45 “Kangi Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapangu ghungulihwana na mundu yumu nhemengana ywakapalaha madini gha lulu.
MAT 13:46 Pakapatite lulu yimu ya utopelo nkulu, kakighenda kuchuusa hyoha hyakabheghite nahyo na kakiihemela lulu yila.”
MAT 13:47 “Kangi, Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga ghungulihwana na njaho yiitaghitwe na aghomeha homba mulihibha, na yikighomeha homba nhanganganiko.
MAT 13:48 Payimemite bhandu bhakiyikwemula pambweha ya lihibha, bhaketama na bhakeahaghula homba bha maha na bhakeabhika mu hikapu hyabhe na bhala bha maha ng'obhe bhakeatagha.
MAT 13:49 Habhu ndo yaabhegha linjubha lya kuuhiko, bbaabwitukila mahoka bha Chapanga na bhataabhaghula bhandu ahakata na bhala bha maha,
MAT 13:50 na kuatagha bhala ahokelo mumwoto ghwa lihumbika. Akwo bhaalila na kuhyagha mino.”
MAT 13:51 Yesu kakiakonya, “Bhuli, muyimanya fwambulo ya agho ghoha?” Bhakinnyanga, “Ena tuyimanya.”
MAT 13:52 Ndo kakiaghombela, “Habhu, nhunda ywa Malaghilo gha Musa ywakabhegha nhundwa ywa Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga kangulihwana na nkolakaya ywakabhuha muuhanja lwake hilibhi hya hyono na hya makachu.”
MAT 13:53 Yesu pakayomolite kulongela mihwano ayi kakibhuka apo,
MAT 13:54 na kakighenda ku kijiji kyake. Akwo kakibhegha kanguahunda bhandu mu nyumba hya ngonganilo hyabhe mbaka bhakikangacha, bhakilongela, “Ayu kaghamokola kwoki malango na mihabho ayi?
MAT 13:55 Bhuli, ayu chepa yula mwana ywa ntendehi ywa uselemala? Bhuli, mama ywake chepa kangukemwa Malia? Na alongo bhake chepa Yakobu na Yosefu na Simoni na Yuda?
MAT 13:56 Na ahacha bhake chepa abha bhangutama papamu na twenga? Basi kaghamokola kwoki agha ghoha?”
MAT 13:57 Ndo bhakinlema. Peni Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mbuyi ywa Chapanga kanguhokamilwa kwoha, ngati chepa mu nnima ghwake mwene na mualongo bhake”
MAT 13:58 Kya habhu, kakitenda ng'obhe mihabho mitangalo kwakya kulepelwa kuhyubhalila kwab bhombe.
MAT 14:1 Mumanjubha agho, Mutwa Helode ywa ku Galilaya kakiyihwa mihalo ya Yesu.
MAT 14:2 Ndo kakiaghombela andumindumi bhake, “Aywo ndo Yohane Yunakubatisa, kahyuka, na makakala gha kutenda mihabho ghangutenda lihengo kwa ywombe.”
MAT 14:3 Helonde ndo ywakankamulite Yohane, na kakimmopa na kakinnhwinda mukibbopo kwakya Helodia nhumbu ywa Filipo nnongo ghwake,
MAT 14:4 kiyaha Yohane kakinnongela Helode kukita, “Yingunoghelwa ng'obhe kwa ghwenga kuntola nndala aywo.”
MAT 14:5 Helode kakipala kunkoma Yohane, peni kakiayoghopa bhandu kiyaha bhombe, bhakinng'amula kukita Yohane kakibhegha Mbuye ywa Chapanga.
MAT 14:6 Linjubha limu muchekwa ya kukulungwa kubhelekwa kwake Helode, nhinja ywa Helodia kakikina muulongolo ghwa bhandu mbaka Helode kakiyelelwa munu,
MAT 14:7 hata kakilagha kwa kulapa, kunpegha aywo nhinja kyohele kyakapala kukiyupa.
MAT 14:8 Naywo kunu pa akinyeghelehwa na mama ywake, kakilongela, “Ghumbeghe mutwe ghwa Yohane Yunakubatisa mu kipalo.”
MAT 14:9 Mutwa kakihyongoloka muno, peni kubhukana kila kilapo kyakalapitie muulongolo ghwa bhandu, kakikwilikiha kukita kapeghwe nyupo yake.
MAT 14:10 Basi, Helode kakikwilikiha Yohane Yunakubatisa kakadumulighwe mutwe mula mukibhopo.
MAT 14:11 Mutwe ghwake ghukiyeghwa mu kipalo, na bhakenpegha yula nhinja, naywo kakinnyeghela mama ywake.
MAT 14:12 Ahundwa bha Yohane bhakihika, na bhakiutola mmili ghwake na bhakighukulila. Mbole bhakighenda kunng'ombela Yesu.
MAT 14:13 Yesu pakayihwite mihalo ya kukomwa kwa Yohane, kakibhuka apo kwa bhwato na kakighenda pahala pangali bhandu ngati kabheghe ghweka. Peni bhandu paamanyite kwakaghendite bhakintughila kupitila kuluhingu kuhuma mu hitami.
MAT 14:14 Basi, pakahulukiti pambwegha ya luhingu, kakilubhona lumati lukulu lwa bhandu, kakiabhonela luhungu na kakialamiha atamwa bhabhe.
MAT 14:15 Payihikite makimuhi, ahundwa bhake bhakinng'endela na bhakinng'ombela, “Apa patubheghite kahone bhandu bhaatama, na luchubha lungutipika. Hinu ghubhalaghe bhandu ngati aghende muhijiji hyabhe bhakalihemelele hilyo.”
MAT 14:16 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Bhangunoghwa ng'obhe abhuke Mwenga muapeghe hilyo.”
MAT 14:17 Peni bhombe bhakinng'ombela, “Tubhegha nagho mangati nhano ghweka na homba abhili.”
MAT 14:18 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Munyeghela apa.”
MAT 14:19 Kakiakwilikiha bhandu atame mumanyahi, mbole kakighatola ghala mangate nhano na bhala homba abhili, kakilolekeha kunane kwa Chapanga kakighanonela na kakighametulanga, mbole kakiapegha ahundwa bhake agho mangati na bhala homba, nabho ahundwa bhake bhakiapegha bhandu abho.
MAT 14:20 Bhandu bhoha bhakilyegha na bhakiyukuta. Mbole ahundwa bhakikungana mahighalo na bhakimemekeha hikapu kumi na hibhili.
MAT 14:21 Mmalango ghwa bhandu bhaalyeghite bhakibhegha alumi elfu nhano, kyanga mmalango ghwa adala na bhana.
MAT 14:22 Kamu, Yesu kakiakwilikiha ahundwa bhake ayingile mubhwato, bhalongolele kumwambo ya lihibha ywombe pakabheghite mukualagha himati hya bhandu.
MAT 14:23 Mbole ya kubhalagha bhandu, kakikwela ku kitumbi ghweka chake kuyupa. Payibheghite makimuhi, ywombe kakibhegha akwo ghweka chake,
MAT 14:24 Na mumasaa agho ghula bhwato ghukiheghelela kuhika pakati ya lihibha, peni yikibhegha mumapughwo kwakya liyegha lighuututite.
MAT 14:25 Pakilo ugheghela na kuchegha, Yesu kakiaghendela ahundwa bhake pakatyanga unani mwa machi.
MAT 14:26 Ahundwa bhake paammonite pakatyanga unani mwa machi bhakiyoghopa munu, bhakilongela, “Ndo lijini” Bhakiyobha kyobho kwa lyogha.
MAT 14:27 Kamu, Yesu kakilongela nabho, “Ntetebhale. Ndo nenga nkotoke kuyoghopa”
MAT 14:28 Petili kakinng'ombela, “Bambo, handa ndo ghwenga hoto, ghung'ombele hike kwaghwenga ndyange unani mwa machi.”
MAT 14:29 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghuhike!” Basi, Petili kakihuluka mubhwato na kakityanga mumachi kakinng'endela Yesu.
MAT 14:30 Peni pakabhonite likusi kakiyingilwa na lyogha, naywo kakiyanda kudibala, kunu pakayobha kyobho, “Bambo, ghunopohe.”
MAT 14:31 Kamu, yesu kakigholoha kibhoko kyake na kakinkamula na kakinng'ombela, “Ghwenga ghwa uhyubhalilo nchoko, kya bhuli ghukibhegha na lyogha?”
MAT 14:32 Na paakwelite mu bhwato likusi likiyima.
MAT 14:33 Ndo bhoha bhaabheghite mubhwato bhakintundamila Yesu paalongela, “Kulyaghila ghwenga ndo Mwana ywa Chapanga.”
MAT 14:34 Bhakiyomboka lihibha na bhakihika ku nnima ghwa Genesaleti
MAT 14:35 Bhandu bha akwo pabhanmanyite kukita ndo Yesu, bhakikweha nhalo aghwo kwoha mu nnima aghwo. Habhu, bhakinnyeghela atamwa bhoha,
MAT 14:36 Bhakinnyupa kabhategheke anbyale nga lupindo lwa lipinda lyake, nabho bhoha bhaanbyalite bhakilamihwa.
MAT 15:1 Mbole, amoo bha Afalisayu na ahunda bha Malaghilo bhakihika kuhuma ku Yelusalemu, bhakinhikila Yesu na bhakinkonya.
MAT 15:2 “Kyabhuli ahundwa bhako bhangughakiluka mahundo gha ahunda bhetu bha makachu? Mana bhombe bhangukuha ng'obhe muhinoghwa handa hitohe hyetu, kukali ya kulyegha.”
MAT 15:3 Yesu kakiayanga, “Kyabhuli na mwenga munguyitikila ng'obhe Malaghilo gha Chapanga kwakya mahundo gha aghohi bhenu?
MAT 15:4 Kiyaha Chapanga kakilongela, ‘Ghubhahokamile Tate na mama ywako na ywakanligha tate ebhu mama ywake, kakomwe.’
MAT 15:5 Peni mwenga munguhunda kukita, handa mundu abhegha na kilibhi kya kuntangatila tate ywake ebhu mama ghwake, peni kalongela, ‘Aki kya Chapanga.’
MAT 15:6 Basi, munguhunda ghungunoghwa ng'obhe kunhokamila tate ebhu mama ywako kwa kuntangatila kumpegha kilibhi akyo. Ndo pamuliyuyuha Lilagho lya Chapanga kwa kutughila mahundo ghenu mabhene.
MAT 15:7 Mwenga maafyangu. Isaya kakilondola tela yakya mwenga pakalongela,
MAT 15:8 ‘Chapanga kangulongela bhandu abha bhangulongela bhanguhokamila, peni myoyo yabhe yibhegha kutali na nenga
MAT 15:9 Kutundamila kwa bhombe kungutangatila ng'obhe kilibhi, bhanguhunda mahundo ghaayandihitwe na bhandu ghweka, na chepa mahundo gha nenga.’ ”
MAT 15:10 Yesu kakilukema lula lumati lwa bhandu na kakiaghombela, “Nnyihwanile na mmanye.
MAT 15:11 Kiintenda mundu kakotoke kuyitikilwa kubhegha muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, chepa kila kiinnyingila mu nnomo ghwake, ngati ndo malagho ghanakummuka munnomo ghwake.”
MAT 15:12 Mbole ahundwa bhake bhakinng'endela na bhakinng'ombela, “Ghungumanya kukita akaafalisayo bhakekalala munu paayihwite mihalo yila yighuyikambukite?”
MAT 15:13 Peni ywombe kakiayanga, “Mmela ghwohele ghuupanditwe ng'obhe na Tate ywangu ywa kunane, ghwatupulwa.
MAT 15:14 Mubhaleke bhene, mana bhombe ndo hilongohi bha bhangabhona, bhaabhalongoha bhangabhona ayabhe. Na handa ywangalbhona katanlongoha ywangabhona nnyaki, bhoha abhili bhaachumbukila mulibhumba.”
MAT 15:15 Petili kakilongela, “Ghutufwambulile mana ya nhwano agho.”
MAT 15:16 Yesu kakiakonya, “Hata mwenga nkali kang'amula?
MAT 15:17 Bhuli, mungumanya ng'obhe kukita kyohele kiyingiliti mu nnomo kyaghenda mu lutumbo na mbole kyabhuhwa panje kupitila mumahi?
MAT 15:18 Peni kila kihuma mu nnomo kinguhuma mu mwoyo, na akyo ndo kinguntenda mundu kakotoke kuyitikilwa muulongolo ghwa Chapanga.
MAT 15:19 Kiyaha mu mwoyo ghanguhuma mahwacho gha uhakata, kukoma, utyahe, ungongola, bhwihi, uyimiho ghwa uhwangi na maligho.
MAT 15:20 Agho ndo ghanguntenda mundu kakotoke kuyitikilwa kubhegha muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, peni kulyegha kyangakuha mabhoko kunguntenda ng'obhe mundu kakotoke kuyitikilwa kubhegha muulongolo ghwa Chapanga.”
MAT 15:21 Yesu kakibhuka pala na kakighenda ku milima yiibheghite ugheghela na mbande hya Tilo na Sidoni.
MAT 15:22 Basi, nndala yumu ywa ku Kaanani ywakatamite ugheghela na mbande ahyo kakinhikila Yesu, kakiyobha kunu pakalongela, “Ghummonele luhungu Bambo, Mwana ywa Daudi, nhinja ywangu kakwelwa na lindilu na kangupamandika munu.”
MAT 15:23 Peni Yesu kakiyanga ng'obhe lilagho. Ndo ahundwa bhake bhaking'endela paannyupa munu, bhakenng'ombela, “Ghunng'ombele kaghende kiyaha kangugendelela kutututila kyobho.”
MAT 15:24 Yesu kakiayanga, “Naghilwa kwakya kualopoha mene bha Chapanga bhaahobhite, bhandu bha Isilaeli.”
MAT 15:25 Peni yula nndala kakihika, pakanchutama mayughwa mukulongolo ghwa Yesu, pakalongela, “Bambo ghundange.”
MAT 15:26 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Yibhegha maha ng'obhe kuhitola hilyo hya bhana na kuataghila galu.”
MAT 15:27 Yula nndala kakinnyanga, “Kulyaghila Bambo, peni hata galu bhangulyegha mahighalo ghaahighalo gha abambo bhabhe.”
MAT 15:28 Ndo Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Nndala, kuhyubhalo kwa ghwenga kubhegha kukulu, yabheghe kwa ghwenga handa mughupala.” Naywo nhinja ywake kakilama kutandila lisaa lila lila.
MAT 15:29 Yesu kakibhuka apo na kakighenda mumbweghambweha ya lihibha lya Galilaya, kakikwela kitumbi na kakitama.
MAT 15:30 Bhandu atangalo bhakinhikila, bhakiayegha atebhalo, ngwabhengwabhe, bhangbhonaa, bhangayihwa, na bhangi atangalo, bhakiatamika mu ulongolo ghwa maghulu ghake naywo Yesu kakialamiha.
MAT 15:31 Bhandu abho bhakikangacha muno paabhonite bhangalongela bhangulongela, atebhalo bhakilamihwa, ngwabhengwabhe bhangutyanga na bhangalola bhangubhona, bhakinkweha Chapanga ywakatundamilwa na Akaaisilaeli.
MAT 15:32 Basi, Yesu kakiakema ahundwa bhake kakiaghombela, “Nungulubhonela luhungu lumati alu lwa bhandu, kiyaha abhegha na nenga kwa manjubha mandatu na abhegha ng'obhe na hilyo hyohele hiihighalite, na nenga mbala ng'obhe kubhalagha paabhegha na njala ngati akotoke kuhima mu njila.”
MAT 15:33 Ahundwa bhake bhakinkonya, “Apa tubhegha pangabhandu, twamokola kwoki hilyo hya kuakwila bhandu abha bhoha?”
MAT 15:34 Yesu kakiakonya, “Mmegha na mangati malingi?” Bhakinnyanga, “Mangate saba na hihomba hyamandina.”
MAT 15:35 Yesu kakilughombela lula lumati lwa bhandu atame pahi.
MAT 15:36 Kakighatola ghala mangate saba na hila hihomba hyamandina, kakinnumba Chapanga, kakihimetula na kakiapegha ahundwa bhake, nabho bhakiaghabhila bhandu.
MAT 15:37 Bhoha bhakilyegha na kuyukuta, mbole ahundwa bhake bhakikungana mahighalo na bhakimemekeha hikapu saba.
MAT 15:38 Bhala bhaalyeghiti bhakibhegha alumi elfu ncheche, kyanga kubhalangwa adala na bhana.
MAT 15:39 Ndo Yesu kakialagha bhandu, kakihubhuka mu bhwato na kakighenda ku mbande ya Magadani.
MAT 16:1 Amoo bha Afalisayo na Asadukayo bhakinhikila Yesu na kung'eha kwa kunnyupa kabhatendele naho kuhuma kunane kwa Chapanga.
MAT 16:2 Peni Yesu kakiayanga, “Payihika makimuhi mwenga mungulongela, ‘Kilabho kwaachegha maha, mana bhwelo lubhegha nkele.’
MAT 16:3 Na malabhila mungulongela ‘Lelo kwabhegha na hula, kiyaha bhwelo lubhegha lukele na mahundi ghabhegha totolo.’ Basi, mwenga mungumanya muno kufwambula midaluko kwa kulola bhwelu, peni mungulepelwa kumanya mmoneho ghwa naho ghabhoneka manjubha agha.
MAT 16:4 Kibheleko kya bhandu ahokelo na kyangali kuhyubhalika kwa Chapanga! Kingupala naho, peni kyapeghwa ng'obhe naho yohele ngati kyapeghwa yila naho ya Yona ghweka.” Yesu kakialeka na kakibhuka.
MAT 16:5 Ahundwa bha Yesu pabhayombokite kumwambo ya lihibha, bhaking'amula kukita bhakilibhala kutola mangate.
MAT 16:6 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mulindakile mulikingikihe na amila ya Afalisayo na Asadukayo.”
MAT 16:7 Bhombe bhakiyanda kughombana bhombe kwa bhombe, paalongela, “Kangulongela habhu kiyaha tutola ng'obhe mangate.”
MAT 16:8 Yesu kakimanya kyakabheghite mukulongela, ndo kakiaghombela, “Mwenga bhandu mummeghite na uhyubhalilo nchoko! Bhuli, mungughombana kyangali kutola mangate?
MAT 16:9 Bhuli, nkali kumanya? Bhuli mungukulugwa ng'obhe pametulite ghala mangate nhano bhakelyegha bhandu elfu nhano? Bhuli, mukimemekeha mahighalo hikapu hilingi?
MAT 16:10 Ebu ghala mangate saba bhakeghabhilwa bhandu elfu ncheche, bhuli mukikungana mahighalo gha hikapu hilingi.
MAT 16:11 Bhuli mukimanya ng'obhe kukita nikibhegha nungulongela ng'obhe na mwenga yakya mihalo ya mangate? Mulindakile na amila ya Afalisayo na Asadukayo.
MAT 16:12 Apo ndo ahundwa bhakimanya kukita kangulongela ng'obhe kwakya amila ya kutendekeha mangate, ngati kwakya mahundo gha Afalisayo na Asadukayo.”
MAT 16:13 Yesu pakahikite mbande ya Kaisalia Filipi, kakiakonya ahundwa bhake, “Bhandu bhangulongela kukita Mwana ywa Mundu ndo ghani?”
MAT 16:14 Bhakinnyanga, “Bhangi bhangulongela kukita ndo Yohane Yunakubatisa, bhangi Eliya, bhangi Yelemia ebu yumoo ywa akaambuye.”
MAT 16:15 Yesu kakiakonya, “Bhuli, mwenga mungulongela kukita nenga ndo ghani?”
MAT 16:16 Simoni Petili kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ndo Kilisto, Mwana ywa Chapanga ywakabheghite na ubhumi.”
MAT 16:17 Yesu kakilongela, “Mbaha ghwenga, Simoni mwana ywa Yona, kiyaha kahone mundu ywohele nhalo aghu, ngati Tate ywangu ywa Kunane ywakakubhonehite.
MAT 16:18 Na nenga ningukughombela, ghwenga ndo Petili na mulitalabha ali ndachenga ngwemuko lya bhandu bhanakunhyubhalila Kilisto, kangi makakala gha kiho ghatalihotola ng'obhe.
MAT 16:19 Ndakupegha kihughulilo kya Ubhutwa ghwa kunane, ngati lyohele lighulitata mu nnima, lyaatatwa na Kunane, na lyohele lighukihughula mu nnima, lyahughulighwa na Kunane bhubho.”
MAT 16:20 Mbole kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake akotoke kunng'ombela mundu ywohele kukita ywombe ndo Kilisto.
MAT 16:21 Kutandila manjubha agho Yesu kakiyanda kuaghombela ahundwa bhake kukita yingunkwiliha kughenda ku Yelusalemu, na kumokola hibamanda hitangalo kwa mayambuho gha aghohi, akulu bha andundame na ahunda bha malaghilo na kukita yaannogha kuhwegha na linjubha lya ndatu katahyuka.
MAT 16:22 Apwo Petili kakintola pambwegha na kakiyanda kunlakalila, kakilongela, “Chapanga kaghatakulile kutali milando ayi, milando ayi yikotoke kukubwitukila.”
