MAT 16:23 Yesu kakinng'alambukila kakinng'ombela Petili, “Ghubhuke muulongolo gwangu, Nchipila. Ghwenga ndo kipingiko kwanenga. Ghwenga ghunguhwacha ng'obhe gha Chapanga ngati gha anabhandu.”
MAT 16:24 Mbole, Yesu kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Mundu ywohele ywakapala kubhegha nfwasi ywangu, yingunkwiliha kalileme mwene, kalutole lupingika lwake na kandughile.
MAT 16:25 Kiyaha ywohele ywakapala kughulopoha ubhumi ghwake kataghuhobheha.
MAT 16:26 Peni mundu ywakaghuhobheha ubhumi ghwake kwakya nenga kataghumokola. Bhuli, mundu katamokola niki handa pakaghumukola utopelo ghwoha ghwa unnima na kunu kanguhobheha ubhumimi ghwake? Ebu mundu katabhuha kilibhi ghani kihyengo kya ubhumi ghwake?
MAT 16:27 Kiyaha Mwana ywa Mundu katahika mu ukulu ghwa Tate ghwake papamu na mahoka bhake, na apo katankamuha kila mundu kubhukana na mandendelo ghake.
MAT 16:28 Nunguaghombela hoto, Abhegha bhangi bahapa apa bhene bhaahwegha ng'obhe kukali na kummona Mwana ywa Mundu pakahika mu Ghubhutwa ghwake.”
MAT 17:1 Mbole ya manjubha sita Yesu kakiatola Petili, na Yakobu na Yohane nnongo ghwake, kakighenda nabho mbaka kunane mwa kitumbi kitandamaho akwo akibhegha ghweka chabhe.
MAT 17:2 Akowo Yesu kakighalambuka kibhungi muulongolo ghwabhe, kibhungi kyake kiking'ala handa lichubha na mapinda ghake ghakibhegha ghambulete handa lung'ali.
MAT 17:3 Kamu, bhala ahundwa andatu bhakiabhona Musa na Eliya, paayobhela na Yesu.
MAT 17:4 Apwo Petili kakinng'ombela Yesu, Bambo, nungubhona maha twenga tutame apa. Na handa ghwapala ndachenga hibanda hindatu, kimu kyako, kingi kya Musa na kingi kya Eliya.
MAT 17:5 Pakabheghite kakali pakalongela agha lihundi liing'anyimiti, likiagubika na lilobhe likilongela kuhuma mulila lihundi, “Ayu ndo Mwana ywangu yunumpala, yunyelilitwi naywo munu, mu nnyihwe ywombe.”
MAT 17:6 Bhala ahundwa paaghayihwite agha bhakeghwegha pahi makukama, na bhakeyingilwa na lyogha.
MAT 17:7 Peni Yesu kakihika na kuabyala kakiaghombela, “Nkotoke kuyoghopa nnyinuke.”
MAT 17:8 Pabhayinulite meho ghabhe, bhakimmona ng'obhe mundu yungi ywohele ngati ndo Yesu ghweka.
MAT 17:9 Paabheghite mukuhuluka ku kitumbi, Yesu kakialaghila, “Nkotoke kunng'ombela mundu ywohele mabhono agha ghamughabhonite, mbaka Mwana ghwa Mundu pakahyuka kuhuma mu kiho.”
MAT 17:10 Bhala ahundwa bhakinkonya, “Kya bhuli ahunda bha malaghilo bhangulongela kukita yingunkwiliha Eliya kahike huti?”
MAT 17:11 Yesu kakiayanga, “Aywo ndo hoto, yingunkwiliha Eliya kahike huti kutendekeha milando hyoha.
MAT 17:12 Peni nunguaghombela, Eliya kahika kala, nabho bhandu bhakimmanya ng'obhe, na bhakintendela ghoha ghabhaghapalite. Ubhwabhu abhu Mwana ywa Mundu katapamandwa mu mabhoko ghabhe.”
MAT 17:13 Ndo bhala ahundwa bhakimanya kukita kakibhegha kanguyobhela nabho mihalo ya Yohane Yunakubatisa.
MAT 17:14 Pabhahikite mu lumati lwa bhandu, mundu yumu kakinhikila Yesu na kunchutamila mayughwa muulongolo ghwake,
MAT 17:15 kakilongela, “Bambo, ghummonele luhungu mwana ywangu. Ywombe kanakihilika na kangubamandika munu. Maghenda maghenda kangughwegha mu mwoto ebhu mu machi.
MAT 17:16 Nikinnyegha kwa ahundwa bhako peni bhakelepelwa kunlamiha.”
MAT 17:17 Yesu kakiyanga, “Mwenga kibheleko kyanga kuhyubhalila na kiihobhite, ndaatama na mwenga mbaka pakiki? Munnyeghe nhongolo apa kwa nenga.”
MAT 17:18 Yesu kakililakalila lila lindilu, nalyo likimmuka yula nhongolona kakilama lisaa lila lila.
MAT 17:19 Mbole, ahundwa bhake bhaking'endela Pahala paabheghite bhombe ghweka chabhe, na bhakinnkonya, “Kiyaha niki twenga tukilepelwa kulibhuha lila lindilu?”
MAT 17:20 Yesu kakiayanga, “Kubhukana na kuyubhalila kwa mwenga kuchoko. Nunguaghombela hoto, pammegha na kuhyubhalila kuchoko handa mbunje ya nkongo nhaladali, maahotola kukighombela kitumbi aki, ‘Ghubhuke apa ghughende pala,’ nakyo kyaabhuka. Hangi kahone nnando ghwangahotoleka kwa mwenga.
MAT 17:21 Lindilu handa ali, habhu lyabhuka kata kyangali kuyupa na kulikunga.”
MAT 17:22 Linjubha limu paabheghite bhangutama papamu na ahundwa bhake akwo Galilaya, Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mwana ywa Mundu katakamuhwa mu mabhoko gha bhandu.
MAT 17:23 Nabho bhatankoma na linjubha lya ndatu katahyuka.” Ahundwa bhake bhakihyongoloka munu.
MAT 17:24 Mbole ya Yesu na ahundwa bhake kuhika ku Kapelinaumu, asumula sumu ya Nyumba ya Chapanga bhakinnhikila Petili na kunnkonya, “Bhuli, nhunda ywenu kanguhomba sumu ya Nyumba ya Chapanga?”
MAT 17:25 Petili kakiayanga, “Ena, ywombe kanguhomba.” Petili pakabhuyite ukaya kukali hata na kunng'ombela kilibhi, Yesu kakiyanda kunkonya, “Ghwenga ghungumanya niki Simoni? Abhatwa bha nnima bhangupongola mapongolo na sumu kuhuma kwa aghani? Bhuli, kuhuma kwa akola nnima bhabe ebu kwa ahenja?”
MAT 17:26 Petili kakinnyanga, “Kuhuma kwa ahenja.” Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Hinu akola nnima bhabhe bhalekekehwa.
MAT 17:27 Peni ngati tukotoke kuakalaliha myoyo yabhe, ghughende ku lihibha ghukataghe ndoana. Ghuntole homba ywa ulongolo ghuunng'omeha, ghubakatule nnomo ghwake, amwo ghwayibhona ngalabha, ghuyitole ghukahombe sumu ya ghwenga na nenga.”
MAT 18:1 Mu manjubha ghala ahundwa bha Yesu bhaking'endela na bhakinkonya, “Ywoki ywakabhegha nkulu mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane?”
MAT 18:2 Yesu kakinkema mwana yumu, na kakinnyimiha pakati yabhe,
MAT 18:3 mbole kakilongela, “Nunguaghombela hoto, handa panng'alambuka ng'obhe kubhegha handa bhana, maayingila ng'obhe mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane.
MAT 18:4 Ywohele ywakalihuluha handa mwana ayu, aywo ndo kaabhegha nkulu mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane.
MAT 18:5 Ywohele yunakunkingama mwana nchoko handa ayu kwakya nenga, kangungingama nenga.”
MAT 18:6 “Handa mundu ywohele kangunnyambuha yumoo ywa bhana adoko abha bhaanakuhyubhalila nenga atende ulemwa, yingabheghite mbaha kwa ywombe kabhopwe libho likulu lya kuhyaghila mu nntandala ghwake na kadibahwe mu machi njulwa gha lihibha.
MAT 18:7 Mutakibhona bhandu bha nnima aghu kubhukana na milando ya yinakuyambuha bhandu bhangi atende ulemwa. Milando ayi mbaka yibheghe, peni kimmone yula ywakayiyambuha.”
MAT 18:8 “Handa kibhoko ebu kighulu kyako kingukuyambuha kutenda ulemwa, ghukidumule na ghukakitaghe kutali na ghwenga. Yibhegha mbaha kwa ghwenga kuyingila mu ubhumi paghubhegha ng'obhe na kibhoko kimu ebu kighulu kimo, peni chepa kutaghwa mu mwoto paghuhegha na mabhoko mabhili ebu maghulu mabhili.
MAT 18:9 Na liho lyako palikuyambuha ghutende ulemwa ghulikopole na kulitagha kutali. Yibha mbaha kwa ghwenga kuyingila mu ulami na liho limo, peni chepa kutaghwa mu mwoto gha manjubha ghoha ghwanga kuhimika paghubhegha na meho mabhili.”
MAT 18:10 “Mulindakile, nkotoke kumpughana yumoo ywa adoko abha. Nunguaghombela, mahoka bhabhe akwo kunane abhegha manjubha ghoha muulongolo ghwa Tate ywangu ywa kunane.
MAT 18:11 Kiyaha Mwana ywa Mundu kakihika kualopoha bhala bhaahobhite.”
MAT 18:12 “Mungubhona bhuli? Handa mundu kabhegha na mene mia yimu, na yumu mubhala pakahobha, kataaleka ng'obhe bhala tisini na tisa ku kitumbi na kughenda kunnonda yula yumu ywakahobhite?
MAT 18:13 Nunguaghombela hoto pakammona, katayelelwa kyanalumu kwakya aywo mene yumu kupitingana kwa bhala tisini na tisa bhangahobha.
MAT 18:14 Ubhwabhu abhu Tate ywenu ywa kunane kangupala ng'obhe hata yumu mu abha adoko kahobhe.”
MAT 18:15 “Handa nnongo ywako kaghuhokela, ghughende ghukammonehe uhokelo ghwake pammegha abhili ghweka chenu. Handa katakuyihwa ghwammokola kangi nnongo ghwako.
MAT 18:16 Handa kaghuyihwa ng'obhe, ghuntole mundu yumu ebu abhili papamu na ywombe, ngati kwa mahwacho gha bhandu abhili ebu andatu nnando ghwohele ghuyimihwe.
MAT 18:17 Handa pakalema kuayihwa abho ghulighombele ngwemuko ya bhandu bhaanhyubhalila Kilisto na abho ayimiho abhili, handa pakalema kuliyihwa ngwemuko alyo, aywo kabheghe kwa ghwenga handa mundu ywangammanya Chapanga na nsumula sumu.”
MAT 18:18 “Nunguaghombela hoto, kyohele kimukitata munnima, kyatatwa kunane, na kubhopa mu nnima kyabhopoleghwa kunane.”
MAT 18:19 “Kangi nunguaghombela, handa abhili mumwenga, bhaayitikilana munnando ghwohele ghwa kuyupa, bhaatendelwa na Tate ywangu ywa kunane.
MAT 18:20 Kiyaha pohele pala paakwemuka bhandu abhili ebu andatu kwakya nenga, nenga mmegha pakati yabhe.”
MAT 18:21 Mbole Petili kakinkonya Yesu, “Bambo, nnongo ghwangu kanhokele mala hilingi na nenga nunlekekehe? Bhuli, mala saba?”
MAT 18:22 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Nungukughombela ng'obhe mala saba ghweka, ngati saba mala sabini.
MAT 18:23 Kiyaha Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghungulihwana na mutwa yumu ywakapalite kukaghula mmalango ghwa ngalabha hyake na andumindumi bhake.
MAT 18:24 Pakayandite kutenda mmalango ghwa ngaabha hyake, mundu yumu ywakabheghite na lighambo lya hichako elfu kumi hya sahabu, kakiyeghwa kwa ywombe.
MAT 18:25 Kiyaha aywo mundu kakibhegha ng'obhe na kya kubhuyiha lila lighambo, bambo ywake kakikwilikiha kachuhuswe ywombe, nhumbu ywake, bhana bhake na hyoha hyakabheghite nahyo ngati lila lighambo libhuyihwe.
MAT 18:26 Yula nndumindumi kakinchutamila mayughwa pakannyupa yula bambo pakalongela, ‘Nungukuyupa ghunimbilile, na nenga ndalibhuyiha lighambo ali’
MAT 18:27 Yula bambo ywa yula nndumindumi kakimmonela luhungu, na kakililekekeha lighambo lyake lyoha na kakinneka kaghende.”
MAT 18:28 “Peni yula nndumindumi pakabheghite mu kubhuka panje, kakikongana na nndumindumi nnyake ywakannyahikilite ligwala mia yimu ya madini gha fesa. Kakinkamula, kakintita ntandala na pakinng'ombela, ‘Ghummuyihile kila kinukuyahikiti.’
MAT 18:29 Yula nndumitumi nnyaki kakichutamila mayughwa, pakinnyupa, ‘Nungukuyupa ghunimbilile, na nenga ndakuhomba lighambo lyako lyoha.’
MAT 18:30 Peni kakilema. Kihyengo kyake, kakighenga kunhwinda mukibhopo mbaka pakabhuyiha lila lighambo.
MAT 18:31 Andumindumi ayake paabhonite ghaabwitukilite, bhakikalala munu, nabho bhakighenda kunng'ombela bambo ghwabhe milando hyoha yiibwitukite.
MAT 18:32 Ndo yula bambo kakinnkema yula nndumindumi na kakinng'ombela, ‘Ghwenga nndumindumi nhakata. Nenga nikighulekekeha lighambo lyako lyoha paghunyupite.
MAT 18:33 Bhuli, yikikungogha ng'obhe kunmonela luhungu nndumindumi nnyako handa nenga panughubhonilite luhungu?’
MAT 18:34 Kwa kiyaghabhu yula bambo ghwake kakinkamuha yula nndumindumi ghwake kwa machonda bha kibhopo ngati kapamandwe mbaka pakahomba lighambo lyoha lyakayahikitwe.”
MAT 18:35 Yesu kakiyomolela pakalongela, “Habhu ndo Tate ywangu ywa kunane katantendela ywohele mu mwenga handa katanlekekeha ng'ohe nnongo ywake ywakanhokelite kuhuma mumwoyo.”
MAT 19:1 Yesu pakayomolite kulongela malagho agho, kakibhuka Galilaya na kakighenda ku Yudea, kumwambo ya lukemba lwa Yoludani.
MAT 19:2 Lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukinntughila, naywo Yesu kakialamiha ukwaku ako.
MAT 19:3 Amoo bha Afaliayu bhaknhikila bhankonye kyakuntegha, “Bhuli, yibhegha tela kwa nngwana kumpegha nhumbu ywake lihamba lya kulekana kwa nnando ghwohele?”
MAT 19:4 Yesu kakiayanga, “Bhuli, mukisoma ng'obhe mumalemba gha Chapanga kukita kundandila makachu apo, Chapanga kakiabhumba mundu nngwana, na mundu nhumbu.
MAT 19:5 Chapanga kakilongela, ‘Kya habhu, mundu katanneka tate ywake na mama ywake naywo bhaalungana na nhumbu ywake na abho abhili bhaabhegha mmili ghumu.’
MAT 19:6 Habhu, abho chepa abhili kangi, ngati abhegha mmili ghumu. Kya abhu kila kyakakilungite Chapanga, mundu kakotoke kughabhaniha.”
MAT 19:7 Peni bhombe bhakinkonya, “Kiyaha niki Musa kakilaghila kukita mundu katanpegha nhumbu ywake lihamba lya kuleka na kunneka?”
MAT 19:8 Yesu kakiayanga, “Musa kakiategheka kualeka ahumbu bhenu kubhukana na unonopo ghwa myoyo yenu. Peni kutandila makachu yikibhegha habhu ng'obhe.
MAT 19:9 Nenga nunguaghombela, mundu ywohele ywakanneka nhumbu ywake, manipangi kwa kutenda utyahe ghweka, pakatolela nhumbu yungi aywo kangutenda utyahe. Naywo ywakatolela yula nhumbu ywakalekitwi kangutenda utyahe ubhwabhu abhu.”
MAT 19:10 Ahundwa bhake bhakinng'ombela, “Handa milando yene ndo habhu kwa nngwana na nhumbu, mbaha mundu kakotoke kutolela.”
MAT 19:11 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Chepa bhandu bhoha bhanakuhotola kulikingama lilagho ali, ngati kwa bhala ghweka bhanakutangatilwa na Chapanga kutenda habhu.
MAT 19:12 Mana kubhegha bhaaponekiliywe na lukuhu kiyaha abhelekwa habhu, bhangi atendwa habhu na bhandu, na bhangi bhalitenda habhu kwakya Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane. Ywombe ywakahotola kulikingama lilagho ali na kalikingame.”
MAT 19:13 Mbole, amoo bhandu bhakennyeghela Yesu bhana adoko ngati kabhayabhikile mabhoko ghake mu mitwe yabhe na kubhayupila. Peni ahundwa bhake bhakialakalila bhala bhaabhayeghite bhana.
MAT 19:14 Yesu kakilongela, “Mualekeke bhana adoko ahike kwa nenga, nkotoke kuakanikiha, kiyaha Ghubhutwa ghwa Kunane ndo ghwa bhala bhaabheghite handa bhana abha.”
MAT 19:15 Naywo kakiayabhikila mabhoko ghake mu mitwe yabhe, mbole, kakibhuka akwo.
MAT 19:16 Mundu yumu kakinhikila Yesu na kakinkonya, “Nhunda ywa maha, ndende nnando ghani ghwa maha ngati mokole ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko?”
MAT 19:17 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Kiyaha niki ghungungema ywa maha? Kahone ywakabhegha ywa maha nga Chapanga ghweka chake. Peni paghupala kuyingila mu ubhumi ghuyitikile ngwilikiho.”
MAT 19:18 Yula mundu kakinkonya, “Ngwilikiho hyoki?” Yesu kakinnyanga, “Kukoma kata, utyahe kata, kuyibha kata, uyimiho ghwa uhwangi kata,
MAT 19:19 ghubhayitikile tate ywako na mama ywako, na ghunpale nnyako handa paghulipala ghumwene.”
MAT 19:20 Yula nhongolo kakinng'ombela, “Agha ghoha nighakamula kala, ndende niki kangi?”
MAT 19:21 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Handa paghupala kubhegha ntwihiiko, ghughende ghukahemengane hilibhi hyoha highubheghite nahyo na ngalabha ahyo ghukaapeghe kapukwa, na ghwabhegha na utopelo ghwa kunane kwa Chapanga, mbole ghuhike ghundughile.”
MAT 19:22 Yula nhongolo pakayihwite agho, kakighenda kunu pakahyongoloka, kiyaha kakibhegha na utopelo ntangalo.
MAT 19:23 Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, yabhegha unonopo kwa yunautopelo kuyingila mu Ghubhutwa ghwa kunanie kwa Chapanga.
MAT 19:24 Nungubhuyila kuaghombela, yabhegha uyeyebhu kwa nnyama ywakakemwa ngamia kupita mu lilanga lya sasia peni chepa kwa yunautopelo kuyingila mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.”
MAT 19:25 Ahundwa bhake paayihwite agho bhakikangacha munu na bhakinkonya, “Ndo ghani hino kaahotola kulopoka?”
MAT 19:26 Peni Yesu kakialolekeha na kakiaghombela. “Kwa anabhandu nnando aghu ghwaahotoleka kata, peni kwa Chapanga milando hyoha yinguhotoleka.”
MAT 19:27 Ndo Petili kakinnyanga, “Ghulole, twenga tuhileka hyoha na kughutughila ghwenga, twaamokola niki?”
MAT 19:28 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, Mwana ywa Mundu pakapala kutama mukiteho kyake kya Utabhala kya ukulu mu unnima ghwa hyono, mwenga mundughilite maatama mu hiteho kumi na ibhili pamuatosa kabila kumi na ibhili hya Isilaeli.
MAT 19:29 Na ywohele ywakalekite nyumba ebu nnongo ebu nhacha ebu tate ebu mama ghwake ebu bhana bhake ebu mighunda, kwakya nenga, katamokola mala mia yimu kuchweha, na katapeghwa ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha ghangapela.
MAT 19:30 Peni atangalo bhaabheghite bha kalongohi bhaabhegha bha uhiko na bhaabheghite bha uhiko bhabhegha bha kalongohi.”
MAT 20:1 “Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghungulihwana na mundu ywakabheghite na nng'unda ghwa misabibu, ywene kakibhuka malabhila putiputi kuabhika atendalihengo mu nng'unda ghwake.
MAT 20:2 Kakilingana nabho kuapegha ligwala limu lya madini gha fesa kwa linjubha, mbole, kakiayegha ku nng'unda ghwake ghwa misabibu.
MAT 20:3 Payihikite musaa ndatu malabhila, kakiabhona bhandu bhangi bhaabheghite ng'obhe na lihengo lya kutenda, ayima mu ligulio.
MAT 20:4 Kakiaghombela, ‘Nng'ende mukatende lihengo munng'unda ghwangu ghwa misabibu, na nenga ndabhapegha kiibhanoghwa.’
MAT 20:5 Basi, bhakighenda. Aywo nkola nng'unda kakibhuka kangi payihikite saa sita na bhubho saa tisa kakitenda ubhwabhu habhu.
MAT 20:6 Hata payihikite saa kumi na yimu makimuhi, kakibhuka kangi, kakiabhona bhandu bhangi bhaayima pala paligulio. Basi, kakiakonya, ‘Kiyaha niki muyima apa leghi leghi tipi kyanga lihengo?’
MAT 20:7 Bhakinnyanga, ‘Kiyaha kakibhegha ng'obhe mundu ywakatupeghite lihengo lya kutenda.’ Naywo kakiaghombela, ‘Nng'ende mukatende lihengo mu nng'unda ghwangu ghwa misabibu.’ ”
MAT 20:8 “Payihikite makimuhi, yula nkola nng'unda ghwa misabibu kakiaghombela nnyimiha ywake, ‘Ghubhakeme atendalihengo na ghubhahombe lihombo lyahabhe, ghutandile kwa bhala bhaninganite nabho kuuhiko na mbole kwa bhala bhaaninganite nabho kalongohi.’
MAT 20:9 Basi, atenda lihengo bhaakemitwe mu saa kumi na yimu, bhakikingama kila yumu ligwala yimu lya madini gha fesa.
MAT 20:10 Habhu, bhala bha kalongohi paahikite bhakihwacha kukita bhaahombwa kyanalumu, peni kila yumu kakihombwa bhula bhula ligwala limu lya madini gha fesa.
MAT 20:11 Paahombitwe kala ligwala lya madini gha fesa, bhakinhyongolekela yula nkola nng'unda,
MAT 20:12 paalongela, ‘abha bhandu bhaahikite kuuhiko bhatenda lihengo kwa lilaa limu ghweka, bhuli ghututendela tela na bhombe kunu twenga tulimbilila lihengo linakutopo, na leghi leghi tipi muluchubha?’ ”
MAT 20:13 “Yula nkola nng'unda kakinnyanga yumoo ywabhe, ‘Ghanja, nughupugha ng'obhe kilibhi. Bhuli, tukilingana ng'obhe nikuhombe lihombo lya ligwala limu kwa linjubha limu?
MAT 20:14 Ghutole lihmbo lyako, ghughende ukaya. Nungupala kunhomba ayu ywa kuuhiko handa panughupeghite ghwenga.
MAT 20:15 Bhuli, nenga nungunoghwa ng'obhe kutenda kila kinukipala muutopelo ghwangu namwene? Bhuli, ghungubhona tama kiyaha nenga ndo mundu ywa maha?’ ”
MAT 20:16 Yesu kakiyomola kwa kulongela, “Ubhwabhu abhu ywa uhiko katabhegha ywa kalongohi na ywa kalongohi katabhegha ywa uhiko.”
MAT 20:17 Yesu papamu na ahundwa bhake atangalo bhakibhegha bhangughenda ku Yelusalemu, pakabheghite munjila, kakiatola bhala ahundwa bhake kumi na abhili, kakighenda nabho pambwegha, na kuyobhela nabho ghweka chabhe, kakiaghombela,
MAT 20:18 “Nnyihwe. Tungughenda ku Yelusalemu, na akwo Mwana ywa Mundu kaayeghwa mumabhoko kwa mandundame akulu na ahunda bha Malaghilo, na akwo bhatantosa kakomwe,
MAT 20:19 mbole, bhatannyegha kwa bhandu bhaabheghite ng'obhe Ayahudi ahotole kunnyuyuha na kuntuta hinjupunjupu na kummamba mulupingika, peni linjubha lya ndatu katahyuhwa.”
MAT 20:20 Apwo mama ywabhe bhana bha Sebedayo kakinhikila Yesu papamu na bhana bhake, kakichutamila mayughwa mu ulongolo ghwake na kunnyupa kilibhi.
MAT 20:21 Yesu kakinnkonya, “Ghungupala niki?” Aywo mama kaking'ombela, “Ghulaghe, kukita yumu ywa abha bhana bhangu abhili, yumu katame mu mbande yako ya nnilo na yungi mu mbande yako ya ngiya ku Ghubhutwa ghwako.”
MAT 20:22 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Mwenga mungukimanya ng'obhe kila kimukiyupa. Bhuli, manguhotola kunyweghela nnobho ghumbala kunyweghela nenga?” Bhakinnyanga, “Tunguhotola.”
MAT 20:23 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nnobho ghwangu ghwa kimbamanda mutaghunywela, peni kutama mbande yangu ya nnilo ebu ya kungiya, ali lyanenga kata kuapegha. Tate ywangu kalamula kala ndo ghani kaatama ku nnilo ebu ku ngiya ya nenga.”
MAT 20:24 Bhala ahundwa bhangi mbinda mabhoko yimu paaghayihwite agho, bhakiakalalila abho alongo abhili.
MAT 20:25 Habhu, Yesu kakiakema bhoha papamu, na kakiaghombela, “Mungumanya kukita atabhala bha nnima aghui bhanguatabhala bhandu kwa makakala, na hilongohi bhabhe bhanguatumikiha bhaabheghite mu utabhala ghwabhe.
MAT 20:26 Peni kwa mwenga yikotoke kubhegha habhu, ngati ywakapala kubhegha nkulu mu mwenga kangunoghwa kabheghe ndumintumi ywa bhoha,
MAT 20:27 na kila ywakapala kubhegha ghwa kalongohi mu mwenga kangunoghwa kabheghe mmandwa ywenu.
MAT 20:28 Handa bhula Mwana ywa Mundu kakihika ng'obhe kutumikilwa, ngati kuatumikkila na kuuhobhegha ubhumi ghwake kwa kuatenda bhandu atangalo ahotole kulopoka.”
MAT 20:29 Yesu na ahundwa bhake paabheghite bhangubhuka ku kitami kya ku Yeliko, lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukintughila.
MAT 20:30 Basi, kukibhegha na bhangalola abhili atama pambwegha ya njila. Pabhayihwite kukita Yesu kangupita apwo, bhakiyobha kyobho paghalongela, “Bambo, Mwana ghwa Daudi, ghutubhonele luhungu.”
MAT 20:31 Lula lumati lwa bhandu lukialakalila na kualongela atame jii. Peni bhombe bhakichweha kuyobha kyobho, “Bambo, Mwana ywa Daudi, chonde ghutubhonele luhungu.”
MAT 20:32 Yesu kakiyima na kakiakema, kakiakonya “Mungupala nuatendele niki?”
MAT 20:33 Bhakinnyanga, “Bambo tungupala tuhotole kubhona.”
MAT 20:34 Yesu kakiabhonela luhungu, kakiabyala meho ghabhe, kamu bhakihotola kubhona, nabho bhakintughila.
MAT 21:1 Yesu na ahundwa bhake pabhaheghelelite kuhika ku Yelusalemu, bhakihika ku Betifage mukitumbi kya Miseituni, apo kakialaghila ahundwa bhake abhili,
MAT 21:2 kakiaghombela, “Nng'ende mbaka ku kijiji kiibheghite muulongolo ghwenu, maammona kaputa kabhopwa, na mwana ywake kabhopwa pambwegha, muabhopole na mubhayeghe kwa nenga.
MAT 21:3 Handa mundu pakabhakonya kiyaha niki munguatola, munnyange, ‘Bambo kanguapala,’ kamu, kataabhuyiha.”
MAT 21:4 Nnando aghu ghukitendekwa ngati ghatwihilike ghala ghaalongelitwe na mbuye,
MAT 21:5 “Mukighombele kitami kya Sayuni, Nnole mutwa ywako kanguhika. Ndo mpole na ywakahika katama unane mwa kaputa, unane na mwa kaputa, mwana ywa kaputa.”
MAT 21:6 Habhu, bhala ahundwa bhakighenda kutenda handa paalaghilitwe na Yesu.
MAT 21:7 Bhakinnyegha yula kaputa na mwana ywake, bhakiyalila ngubho hyabhe mu mighongo yabhe na Yesu kakitama kunane mwabhe.
MAT 21:8 Lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukiyalila ngubho hyabhe munjila, na bhandu bhangi bhakidumula hiputila gha mikongo na kuhiyalila munjila.
MAT 21:9 Lumati lwa bhandu hiilongohanite na bhala bhaantughilite bhakikweha malobhe, “Katikilwe Mwana ywa Daudi. Yunakunemelwa ndo aywo ywakuhika kwa lihina lya Bambo. Tiko kwa Chapanga kunane.”
MAT 21:10 Yesu pakayingilite ku Yelusalemu, kitami kyoha kikibhegha na mbilingembilinge, bhandu bhakibhegha bhangukonya “Ayu ndo ghani?”
MAT 21:11 Bhandu mulula lumati bhakilongela, “Ayu ndo Yesu, mbuye kuhuma ku Nasaleti kitami kya Galilaya.”
MAT 21:12 Basi, Yesu kakiyingila pahala pa Nyumba ya Chapanga, na kakiabhingabhinga bhoha bhaabheghite mu kuhemela na kuchuhusa hilibhi mu Nyumba ya Chapanga, kakihipalangula hindambi hya bhala bhaabheghite mukuhemengana ngalabha na hiteho hya bhanakuhemengana ngunda.
MAT 21:13 Kakiaghombela “Yityekwa mu malembo gha Chapanga, ‘Nyumba yangu yibhegha nyumba kya kutundamila.’ Peni mwenga mukitenda kibheghe mbaku ya apoka.”
MAT 21:14 Bhangalola na bhanautebhalo bhakinng'endela ku Nyumba ya Chapanga, naywo Yesu kakialamiha.
MAT 21:15 Basi, akulu bha andundame na ahunda bha Malaghilo paabhonite milando yakatendite Yesu, na kuayihwa bhana paalumbilila pahala pa Nyumba ya Chapanga paalongela, “Tuntike Mwana ywa Daudi.” Bhombe bhakikalala.
MAT 21:16 Bhakinkonya Yesu, “Bhuli, ghunguyihwa agho ghaaghalongela?” Yesu kakiaghombela, “Ena nunguyihwa! Bhuli, mukisoma ng'obhe Malembo gha Chapanga? ‘Kwa ngulo ya bhana adoko na hing'enya ghubhakwilikiha bhakutike kwa utwihiliko?’ ”
MAT 21:17 Basi, kakialeka, kakibhuka panji ya kitami na kakighenda ku kijiji kya Betania na kakighonja akwo.
MAT 21:18 Yesu pakabheghite kangubhuya kumbwani malabhila putiputi, njala yikimmina.
MAT 21:19 Kakighubhona nkongo ghuukemwa Ntini pambwegha ya njila, kakighughendela, peni ghukibhegha ng'obhe na mapambika ngati ghukibhegha na mahamba ghweka. Basi, kakighughombela ghula nkongo, “Ghukotoke kupambika mapambika kangi.” Pala pala ghula nkongo ghukinyaluka.
MAT 21:20 Ahundwa bhake paabhonite nnando aghu bhakikangacha, bhakinkonya, paalongela, “Yibhegha bhuli nkongo aghu ghwa ntini ghunyaluke kanongola?”
MAT 21:21 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, handa panhyubhalila na nkotoke kubhegha na bhwaghalili, maahotola, chepa ghweka kutenda habhu, ngati hata pamukighombela kitumbi aki, ‘Ghutupuke ghukalitaghe ku lihibha.’ Yaakitendeka habho.
MAT 21:22 Na lyohele limulipala kuyupa mumayupo, malikingama.”
MAT 21:23 Yesu kakiyingila pahala pa Nyumba ya Chapanga, kakiyanda kuhunda, mandundame akulu na hilongohi bha aghohi bhakinhikila na bhakinkonya, “Ghungutenda milando ayi kwa makakala gha ghani? Na ghani ywakakupeghite makakala agha?”
MAT 21:24 Yesu kakiayanga, “Na nenga ndabhakonya likonyo limu, pamunyanga, na nenga ndabhaghombela ndo kwa likalama lyoki nungutenda milando ayi.
MAT 21:25 Ubatisa ghakihuma kwa ghani? Bhuli, ghakihuma kwa kunane ebu kwa bhandu?” Bhakiyanda kughombana bhombe kwa bhombe na kulongela, “Patulongela ghakihuma kunane katatukonya, ‘Kyabhuli mukinhyubhalila ng'obhe?’
MAT 21:26 Na patulongela, ‘Ghakihuma kwa bhandu.’ Yaabwituka bhulwa kiyaha bhandu abha bhoha bhanguhyubhalila kukita Yohane ndo mbuye ywa Chapanga.”
MAT 21:27 Habhu, bhakinnyanga, “Twenga tungumanya ng'obhe.” Naywo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nenga bhubho ndabhaghombela ng'obhe ndo kwa likalama lyoki nungutenda milando ayi.”
MAT 21:28 “Basi, mwenga munguhwacha niki? Mundu yumu kakibhegha na bhana abhili. Kakinng'endela yula ywa kalongohi na kunng'ombela, ‘Mwana ywangu, lelo ghughende ghukatende lihengo munng'unda ghwa misabibu.’
MAT 21:29 Yula mwana kakinnyanga, ‘Nenga ndaaghenda ng'obhe,’ mbole kakikilibhuha mahwacho ghake kakighenda kutenda lihengo.
MAT 21:30 Yula tate kakinng'endela yula mwana ywa ubhili na kakinng'ombela bhula bhula. Ywombe kakinnyanga, ‘Ndaaghenda tate,’ peni kakighenda ng'obhe kutenda lihengo.
MAT 21:31 Ndo ywoki nkati ya abha abhili ywakannyitikilite kyakakipalite tate ywake?” Bhakinnyanga, “Yula ywa kalongohi.” Habhu, Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela, asumula sumu na angongola bhataalongola kuyingila ku Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.
MAT 21:32 Mana Yohane yunakubatisa kakihika kwa mwenga kuabhoneha njila ya hoto ya kutama, mwenga mukinhyubhalila ng'obhe, peni asumula sumu na angongola bhakinhyubhalila. Hata payibhele mwenga pammonite agho ghoha mukilipetula ng'obhe na kunhyubhalila.”
MAT 21:33 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nnyihwe nhwano ghungi, mundu yumu nkola nng'unda kakilima nng'unda ghwa misabibu, kakighutindihila kindupa, kakikimba libhumba lya kukamila difwai. Kakichenga kinala kya ukingikiho. Mbole, kakiayahikila bhanakulima bhamu nng'unda aghwo ghwa misabibu, mwene kakibhuka kakitenda mwanja kughenda ku nnima ghungi.
MAT 21:34 Paghaheghelelite manjubha gha mabeno, kakialaghila andumindumi bhake kwa bhala akulima bhakaayahikilite, ngati apongole mafungu ghake gha mabeno.
MAT 21:35 Bhala bhaayahikilitwe bhakibhakamula bhala andumindumi, yumu bhakintuta, yungi bhakinkoma na yungi bhakintuta kwa malibho.
MAT 21:36 Nkola nng'unda aywo kakialaghila andumundumi bhangi atangalo kupitingana bha kalongohi, nabho bhala bhaayahikilitwe bhakiatendela bhula bhula.
MAT 21:37 Kuuhiko kakinlaghila mwana ywake kwa bhombe pakalongela, ‘Pangi bhatanhokamila mwana ywangu.’
MAT 21:38 Peni bhala bhaayahikilitwe paammonite mwana ywake bhakighombana bhombe kwa bhombe, ‘Ayu ndo yunakuhala. Hinu nhike na tunkome ngati tulitole lipala lyake.’
MAT 21:39 Habhu bhakinkamula, bhakinpiha panje ya nng'unda ghula na bhakinkoma.”
MAT 21:40 Yesu kaakonya, “Hinu, aywo nkola nng'unda ghwa misabibu pakapala kuhika katabhatenda niki bhala bhakaayahikilite nng'unda?”
MAT 21:41 Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Kulyaghila katabhakoma bhandu abho ahokelo, mbole kataayahikila bhandu bhangi nng'unda aghwo bhene bhatampegha lusumulo lwake kwa nndaluko ghuutwihikilite.”
MAT 21:42 Apo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mukisoma ng'obhe nnando mu Malembo? ‘Libho lyaalilemite atendehi bha kuchenga Hinu lighalambuka na kubhegha libho likulu lya kitamiko Bambo ndo ywakatendite nnando aghwo naghwo ndo nnando ghwa kukangaha muno kwa twenga!’ ”
MAT 21:43 Kya habhu nunguaghombela, “Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga ghwaabhuhwa kwa mwenga na kupeghwa bhandu bhangi bhanakutenda milando yakayipala Chapanga Mughubhutwa ghwake.”
MAT 21:44 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela “Mundu ywakapala kughwegha mulibho ali kaadumuka hipalamande palamande, na libho alyo palimponekela mundu, mundu aywo kaahyaghika.”
MAT 21:45 Mandundame akulu na Akaafalisayo paayihwite mihwano ya Yesu, bhaking'amula kukita kanguaghombela bhombe.
MAT 21:46 Kya habhu, bhakipalaha kihokonyo kya kunkamula, peni bhakiayoghopa bhandu kiyaha bhakimmanya Yesu kukita ndo mbuye ywa Chapanga.
MAT 22:1 Yesu kakilongela nabho kangi kwa mihwano, kakiaghombela,
MAT 22:2 “Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane ghungulihwana na mutwa ywakantendekelehite mwana ywake mulyo ghwa chekwa ya kutolela.
MAT 22:3 Kakialaghila andumindumi bhake abhakema bhala bhaalalikitwe mu chekwa ya kutolela, peni bhakilema kuhika.
MAT 22:4 Mbole kakialaghila andumindumi bhangi pakalongela, ‘Mubhaghombele bhala bhaalalikitwi kukita chekwa yibhegha kala kwakya mwenga, njinja kala likambako lya senga na bhana bha senga bhanakuhata na hyakupechula.’
MAT 22:5 Peni bhombe bhakilema, na bhakighenda, ayu kunng'unda ghwake, na yungi ku utendehi ghwake,
MAT 22:6 amoo bhangi bhakiakamula bhala andumindumi bhake na bhakiatendela ndendelo ya honi na kuakoma.
MAT 22:7 Yula mutwa kakikalala muno, kakialaghila machonda bhake bhakaakanjaghane bhala bhanakukoma na kukiyocha mwoto kitami kyabhe.
MAT 22:8 Mbole, kakiaghombela andumindumi bhake, ‘Chekwa ya kutolela yibhegha kala, peni bhala bhanualalikite bhakiyitikila ng'obhe kuhika.
MAT 22:9 Basi, nng'ende mu ngongano ya njila na mukaalalike bhohele bhamubhabhona, bahahike mu mulyo ghwa chekwa ya kutolela.’
MAT 22:10 Bhala andumindumi bhakighenda mu njila na bhakiakungana bhandu bhoha bhaakonganite nabho, bhandu bha maha na ahakata, na lubhagha lwoha lwa chekwa lukimema ahenja.”
MAT 22:11 “Peni mutwa pakayingilite unyumba ngati kabhabhone ahenja, amwo kakimmona mundu yumu kahwala ng'obhe lipinda liinoghwa mu chekwa ya kutolela.
MAT 22:12 Mutwa kakinkonya, ‘Ghanja, ghukiyingila bhuli amu kyanga kuhwala lipinda lya kutolela?’ Yula mundu kakitama jii.
MAT 22:13 Ndo mutwa kakiaghombela andumindumi bhake, ‘Mummope mabhoko na maghulu na mukantaghe panje mulubhindu. Akwo kwabhegha na kililo na kuhyagha mino.’ ”
MAT 22:14 Yesu kakiyomola pakilongela, “Kiyaha bhaalalikitwe atangalo, peni bhahaghulitwe bhamandina.”
MAT 22:15 Mbole, Akaafalisayo bhakibhuka panji, na bhakighambelana atende niki kwakya kung'omeha Yesu kwa malagho ghake.
MAT 22:16 Ndo bhakialaghila afwasi bhabhe papamu na bhandu bha kimati kya Helode nabho bhakinnkonya, “Nhunda, tungukumanya kukita ghwenga ndo mundu ywa maha, na kukita ghunguhunda njila ya Chapanga ya kutenda gha maha kyangali kummaghula mundu.
MAT 22:17 Basi, ghutughombele, ghwenga ghunguhwacha bhuli? Tungunoghwa kunhomba sumu mutwa nkulu ywa Akaaloma ebu chepa?”
MAT 22:18 Peni Yesu kakimanya mahwachilo ghabhe gha uhakata kakiaghombela, “Mwenga maafyangu, kiyaha niki mungupala kundegha?
MAT 22:19 Mummonehe ligwala lya kuhomba sumu.” Bhakinnyeghela ligwala liikemwa dinali,
MAT 22:20 naywo kakiakonya, “Kibhungi aki na lihina ali ndo lya ghani?”
MAT 22:21 Bhakinnyanga, “Lya mutwa nkulu ywa Akaaloma.” Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mumpeghe mutwa nkulu ywa Akaaloma ghaabheghite gha Ywombe, na gha Chapanga mumpeghe ghaabheghite gha Chapanga.”
MAT 22:22 Paayihwite agho bhakikangacha, ndo bhakibhuka na bhakinneka.
MAT 22:23 Linjubha alyo alyo Asadukayo, bhala bhaalongela kukita kahone kuhyuka kuhumu kwa bhaahweghite, bhakinhikila Yesu na kunkonya ngonyo paalongela,
MAT 22:24 “Nhunda, Musa kakilongela, ‘Handa mundu pakahwegha kyanga bhana, nnongo ghwake kantole aywo nhumbu nnekwa ngati kampeghe bhana aywo nnongo ghwake ywakahweghite.’
MAT 22:25 Hino, apa kwa twenga pakibhegha na alongo saba. Yula ywa kalongohi kakitolela nhumbu, naywo kakihwegha kyangali bhana, ndo nnung'una ywake kakinhala aywo nhumbu.
MAT 22:26 Yikibhegha ubhwabhu abhu kwa yula nnongo ywa ubhili na ywa ndatu, mbaka bhoha saba.
MAT 22:27 Mbole, yula nhumbu naywo kakihwegha.
MAT 22:28 Bhuli, linjubha lya kuhyuka, nhumbu aywo katabhegha nhumbu ywa ghani mu bhala alongo saba? Kiyaha bhoha bhakintola nhumbu aywo.”
MAT 22:29 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mwenga munguhokela kiyaha mungumanya ng'obhe Malembo ebu likalama lya Chapanga.
MAT 22:30 Kiyaha bhaahweghiti paapala kuhyuka bhaatolela kata ebu kutolelwa, ngati bhaabhegha handa mahoka bha Chapanga.
MAT 22:31 Peni kwa ghula nnando ghwa bhandu kuhyuka mukisoma ng'obhe kila kyakalongilite Chapanga kukita,
MAT 22:32 ‘Nenga ndo Chapanga ywa Iblahimu, Chapanga ywa Isaka, na Chapanga ywa Yakobu?’ Ywombe chepa Chapanga ywa bhaahweghite, ngati ndo Chapanga ywa bhaabheghite na ubhumi.”
MAT 22:33 Lula lumati lwa bhandu paluyihwite agho, lukikangacha muno kwa mahundo ghake.
MAT 22:34 Afalisayo paayihwite kukita Yesu kakianyamahia, bhala Asadukayo, bakikonganika papamu.
MAT 22:35 Yumoo ywa bhala ahunda bha Malaghilo, kakinkonya likonyo ngati kanteghe, pakalongela,
MAT 22:36 “Nhunda, ndo ngwilikiho yoki Mumalaghilo yiibheghite ngulu kupitingana hyoha?”
MAT 22:37 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghunpale Bambo Chapanga ywako kwa mwoyo ghwako ghwoha na kwa mwoyo ghwako ghwoha na kwa mahala ghako ghoha.
MAT 22:38 Ayi ndo Ngwilikiho yinakunoghwa na kangi ya ulongohi.
MAT 22:39 Na ya ubhili ndo handa ayi, nalyo ndo ali, ‘Ghumpale nndamani ywako handa paghughupala ntima ghwako.’
MAT 22:40 Ngwilikiho ahi mbili hikamulilwa Mumalaghilo ghoha na ambuye bha Chapanga.”
MAT 22:41 Afalisayo paakwemukiti papamu, Yesu kakiakonya,
MAT 22:42 “Munguhwacha niki kunninga Kilisto Nkombohi? Ywombe ndo Mwana ywa ghani?” Bbombe bhakinnyanga, “Ywombe ndo Mwana ywa Daudi.”
MAT 22:43 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Yibhegha bhuli aywo Daudi pakalongohitwe na Nhuki ywa Chapanga kangunkema Kilisto, ‘Bambo?’ Kiyaha kakilongela,
MAT 22:44 ‘Bambo kakinng'ombela Bambo ywangu, ghutame mu mbande yanenga ya nnilo, Mbaka paambala kubhahotola yomo amyanja bhako.’
MAT 22:45 Handa Daudi kangunkema Kilisto, ‘Bambo’ Yibhegha bhuli Kilisto kabheghe mwana ywa Daudi?”
MAT 22:46 Kahone mundu ywakahotolite kunnyanga lilagho. Kutandila linjubha alyo kahone mundu ywakayighite kunkonya kangi.
MAT 23:1 Mbole Yesu kakiaghombela bhala bhandu atangalo papamu na ahundwa bhake bhaabheghite apo,
MAT 23:2 “Ahunda bha Malaghilo na Afalisayo ndo bhaakamuhitwe makakala gha kufwambula Malaghilo gha Musa,
MAT 23:3 Habhu, mungunoghwa kuayitikila na kutenda kyohele kyaabhaghombela. Peni nkotoke kutenda ghala ghaaghatenda, kiyaha bhombe angutenda ng'obhe ghala ghaaghalandamiha.
MAT 23:4 Bhombe bhanguyibhopa mihiho mikulu na kuhibhika mu makombi gha bhandu, peni bhene angulema nga kuyikamula kwa hikonji ghabhe.
MAT 23:5 Bhombe bhangutenda ndendelo yabhe hyoha ngati abhonekane na bhandu, ghabhe bhanguhwala himatiko hinakubhegha na Malembo gha Malaghilo muhibhungi hyabhe na mumabhoko na kutaliha hihundo hya mapinda ghabhe.
MAT 23:6 Bhangupala kutama mu hiteho hya pahala pa kuhokamilwa muchekwa na muhila hiteho hya kuhokamilwa munu munyumba hya kukonganila,
MAT 23:7 Bhangupala kujambuhwa mumagulio na bhagupala bhandu bhaakeme ‘Nhunda.’
MAT 23:8 Peni bhandu akotoke kuakema mwenga ‘Nhunda.’ Kiyaha mabhoha mwenga ndo afwasi bhangu na nhunda ywenu ndo yumu ghweka.
MAT 23:9 Na nkotoke kunkema ywohele ‘Tate’ mu nnima aghu kiyaha mmegha na Tate yumu, naywo kabhegha kunane.
MAT 23:10 Bhandu akotoke kuakema mwenga ‘Hilongohi.’ Kiyaha mmegha naywo kilongohi yumu ghweka, naywo ndo Kilisto.
MAT 23:11 Ywombe ywakabhegha nkulu mu mwenga yibhegha mbaka kabheghe nndumitumi ywenu.
MAT 23:12 Kiyaha mundu ywohele ywakaliyinula katahuluhwa na mundu ywohele ywakalihuluha katayinulwa.”
MAT 23:13 “Kibhabhone mwenga ahunda bha Malaghilo na Afalisayo, maafyangu, kiyaha munguatatila bhandu nlyango ghwa Ghubhutwa ghwa kunane, kunu mabhene munguyingila ng'obhe, na bhala bhaapala kuyingila munguakanikiha.
MAT 23:14 Kibhabhone mwenga ahunda bha Malaghilo Afalisayo, maafyangu, mungulyegha munyumba ya adala alekwa, kunu mungulitenda handa bhamaha, na kwa ufyangu munguyupa mayupo mandandamaho. Habhu, maamokola kihyatu kikulu.”
MAT 23:15 “Kibhabhone mwenga ahunda bha malaghilo na Afalisayo maafyangu, kiyaha mungutindila mu milima na kuyomboka mahibha ngati kuntenda mundu yumu kabheghe Nnyahudi, na pakatenda kala kubhegha mwana ywa kumambe mala mbili kyanalumu.”
MAT 23:16 “Kibhabhone mwenga hilongohi maangabhona. Mwenga mungulongela, ‘Handa mundu pakalapa kwa lihina lya Nyumba ya Chapanga, kilapo akyo kyayaghi, peni pakalapa kwa lihina lya sahabu ya mu Nyumba ya Chapanga, mundu aywo kabhopwa mu kilapo akyo’
MAT 23:17 Mwenga mangalola ahilamahala. Ndo kyoki kiibhegha kikulu kupitingana kingi, yila sahabu ebu yila Nyumba ya Chapanga yinakutenda ayo sahabu yibheghe ya Chapanga?
MAT 23:18 Kangi mungulongela, ‘Mundu pakalapa kwa kindambi kya kuyambikila, chepa kilibhi, peni pakalapa kwa nyambi yiibhegha mukila kindambi, mundu aywo kangubhopwa na kilapo akyo.’
MAT 23:19 Mwenga mangabhona. Ndo kyoki kiibhegha kikulu mu ahyo, yila nyambi, ebu kila kindambi kya nyambi kiitenda ayo nyambi yibheghe ya Chapanga?
MAT 23:20 Habhu, mundu ywakalapa kwa kindami, kangulapa kwa akyo kindambi na ghoha ghaabheghiti unane ghwake.
MAT 23:21 Naywo mundu ywakalapa kwa Nyumba ya Chapanga, kangulapa kwa ayo Nyumba ya Chapanga na kwa aywo ywakatama mu Nyumba ayo.
MAT 23:22 Naywo yunakulapa kwa kunane kwa Chapanga, kangulapa kwa kiteho kya Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga na kwa aywo yaakatama mu kiteho akyo.”
MAT 23:23 “Kibhabhone mwenga ahunda bha malaghilo na Akaafalisayu, maafyangu. Kiyaha munguatenda bhandu atule matulo gha lifungu lya kumi hata kwa manyahi ghanakunungila nyanyi, bisali na lihambanyungu peni munguyileka milando mikulu ya Malaghilo, handa bhula kutenda gha maha muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, luhungu na kuhyubhalila. Agho ghanguakwiliha kughatenda kyanga kughalibhalila ghangi.
MAT 23:24 Mwenga hilongohi mangabhona, mungubhuha libhembe mukiywegho na mungummila nnyama ngamia.”
MAT 23:25 “Kibhabhone mwenga ahunda bha malaghilo na Afalisayo, maafyangu, kiyaha mungughulula nnobho na kipumbulu kwa panje, peni nkati mmema hilibhi muyimokolite kwa upoka na ghwimi.
MAT 23:26 Mwenga maafalisayo mangabhona, ng'ulule huti nkati ya nnobho na hipumbulu, ndo panje paabhegha nyanyi.”
MAT 23:27 “Kibhabhone mwenga ahunda bha Malaghilo na Afalisayu afyangu. Mungulihwana na mandogholo ghaalembitwe chokaa kya panje ghangubhonekana gha nyanyi peni nkati ghabhegha na mihupa ya bhaahweghite na hinyakali hyoha.
MAT 23:28 Ubhwabhu abhu, na mwenga kya panje mungubhonekana mmegha bha maha peni nkati mmema ufyangu na uhokelo.”
MAT 23:29 “Kibhabhone mwenga ahunda bha malaghilo na Afalisayo maafyangu. Mungughachengela mandogholo gha ambuye na kughalemba mandogholo gha bhaabheghite bha maha.
MAT 23:30 Na mungulongela, ‘Handa tungabheghite mumajubha gha aghohi bhetu, tungabheghite ng'obhe papamu nabho ng'obhe mu kuakoma ambuye.’
MAT 23:31 Habhu munguyilimiha mabhene kukita mwenga ndo bhana bha bhandu bhaabhakomiti ambuye.
MAT 23:32 Basi, mughumemekehe nteko ghwa uhakata ghwa atate bhenu.
MAT 23:33 Mwenga kibheleko kya mayoka bhana lusungu, mayibhutuka bhuli toso ya mwoto ghwangahimika?
MAT 23:34 Kya habhu, nnole nunguayeghela ambuye na bhaabheghiti bha maha na bhaabheghite na malango na ahunda. Amoo bhangi matabhakoma na kubhabhamba, amoo bhabhe mutabhahyata hinjupunjupu mu nyumba hyenu hya kukonganila na amoo bhabhe mutabhabhingabhinga kuhuma mukitami kimu mbaka kitami kingi.
MAT 23:35 Habhu, ghula mwahi ghwa bhaabheghite bha maha bhoha, ghuuyitikite munnima aghu, kutandila mwahi ghwa Abeli, ywakatendite ng'obhe uhakata, mbaka mwahi ghwa Sakaliya mwana ywa Balakia, yumunkomite pakati ya pakya Chapanga na kinambi kya lihabha, yabhahikila unani mwa mwenga.
MAT 23:36 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela agha ghoha ghaahika mukibheleko aki.”
MAT 23:37 “Mwenga mabhandu bha Yelusalemu, mubhakomiti ambuye na kuatuta kwa malibho bhala bhaalaghilitwe kwa mwenga. Pakiki nikilitumba kuakungana bhana bhako, handa bhula nguku pakungana bhana bhake mu mapabhatila yake, peni ghukilema.
MAT 23:38 Ghulole kaayileka Nyumba yenu yibheghe mang'obha.
MAT 23:39 Kiyaha nunguaghombela, mamona kangi ng'obhe mbaka lijubha lila panlongela, ‘Kanemelwa ywene yunakuhika kwa Lihina lya Bambo.’”
MAT 24:1 Yesu kakibhuka ku Nyumba ya Chapanga na pakabheghite kangughenda, ahundwa bhake bhaking'endela ngati bhakammonehe Machengo gha Nyumba ya Chapanga.
MAT 24:2 Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Bhuli, mungughabhona agha ghoha? Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, kahone hata libho limu lyahighala kubhegha apa unane mwa libho lingi, ghoha ghaaboghoyolwa.”
MAT 24:3 Yesu pakabheghite katama ku kitumbi kya Miseituni, ahundwa bhake bhakinng'endela ngati abheghe ghweka chabhe, bhakinkonya, “Ghutughombele, milando ayi yaabwitukila pakiki? Na naho yoki yiipala kubhoneha kuhika kwa ghwenga na uhiko ghwa nnima?”
MAT 24:4 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mulindakile, mundu kakotoke kuakuluha.
MAT 24:5 Kiyaha bhandu atangalo bhaahika kwa kulitumila lihina lyangu pabhalongela, ‘Nenga ndo Kilisto Nkombohi.’ Nabho bhataakuluha bhandu atangalo.
MAT 24:6 Maayihwa mihalo ya ngondo na mbwepo hya ngondo, mulindakile nkotoke kuyoghopa, kiyaha agho mbaka ghabwitukile, peni uhiko ghwene ghukali.
MAT 24:7 Bhandu bha nnima ghumu bhaatutana na bhandu bha nnima ghungi na bhandu bha ghubhutwa ghumu bhaatutana na bhandu bha ubhutwa ghungi. Kwaabhegha na lung'ahi lwa njala na milendemo ya lutupi munnima ghwoha.
MAT 24:8 Agha ghoha ndo handa kutandandila kwa lihingili.”
MAT 24:9 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela, “Manjubha agho mwenga maakilukwa, ngati mpamandwe na kukomwa, na mwenga maakalalihwa na bhandu bha milima hyoha kwakya kunhyubhalila nenga.
MAT 24:10 Mumanjubha agho, bhandu atangalo bhaaleka kunyubhalila, na bhaakilukana kila yumu na nnyake na bhaabhapala ng'obhe kiyaha munyubhalila nenga.
MAT 24:11 Mbole bhaabwituka ambuye atangalo ahwangi, na bhataakuluha bhandu atangalo.
MAT 24:12 Kangi upalo ghwa bhandu atangalo ghwaapungula, kubhukana na kuyonjokeheka kwa ulemwa,
MAT 24:13 peni yula ywakabhegha nglii mukunyubhalila nenga mbaka kuuhiko ndo katalopoka.
MAT 24:14 Peni kukali nakuhika ghula uhiko, Nhalo ghwa Maha ghwa Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga ghwalandamihwa munnima ghwoha, ngati bhandu bhoha ghwaghumanye. Ndo ghula uhiko ghwaahika.”
MAT 24:15 “Pamughubhona nnando ghwa kuyoghoha, ghuuyegha uhanjaghano, ghuyima mu Nyumba ya Chapanga handa pakalongelite mbuye Danieli, yunakusoma kangunoghwa kaghumanye nnando agho,
MAT 24:16 ndo bhala bhaabheghiti ku Yudea bhatughile ku hitumbi.
MAT 24:17 Na yula ywakabhegha kulinyakaha lwa nyumba kakotoke kuhuluka ngati kakatole kyohele mu nyumba yake.
MAT 24:18 Ywakabheghegha kung'unda kakotoke kubhuya ukaya kutola ngubho yake.
MAT 24:19 Kibhabhone kwa bhala adala bhaabhegha na ndumbo na bhaabhegha na bhana hinonono mumanjubha agho.
MAT 24:20 Nnyupe ngati kutugha kwa mwenga kukote kubhegha mu manjubha gha malili ebu Linjubha lya Kupumulila.
MAT 24:21 Kiyaha mumanjubha agho kwabhegha na mapungwo makulu ghene ghanabwituka kata kuhuma kubhumbwa kwa nnima mbaka lelo, hangi ghaabwituka kangi ng'obhe.
MAT 24:22 Peni Chapanga kaghupungula kala mmalango ghwa manjubha agho, handa kangatenda habho ng'obhe kahone nga mundu yumo ywakapala kulopoka, peni yakya bhandu bhakaahaghulite manjubha agho Chapanga kaghapungula.”
MAT 24:23 “Mumanjubha agho handa mundu ywohele kataaghombela, ‘Nnole, Kilisto Nkombohi kabhegha apa ebu kabhegha kula,’ nkotoke kuhyubhalila.
MAT 24:24 Kiyaha bhaabwituka makilisto ahwangi na ambuye ahwangi na bhaatenda naho ngulu na mihabho miyoloho ngati kuahokeha bhandu, payihotoleka mbaka bhala bhaahaghulitwe na Chapanga.
MAT 24:25 Mulindakile, nubhaghombela kala kukali na kubwituka kwa milando ayo.”
MAT 24:26 “Hinu mundu ywohela pakaaghombela, ‘Kilisito kabhegha kula ku kibhala,’ nkotoke kughenda akwo. Ebu pakalongela, ‘Killisito kabhegha mu nyumba kati,’ nkotoke kuhyubhalila.
MAT 24:27 Kiyaha handa bhula ndetelehe hya njahe payibwitukila kuhuma kungeha na kubhonekana mbaka kulutipikiti luchubha, habho ndo yaabhegha kuhika kwake Mwana ghwa Mundu.”
MAT 24:28 “Kiyaha pwohele paghubheghite ntumba, akwo ndo bhaakongana hiyuni bhaakemwa tai.”
MAT 24:29 “Pindulu mbole manjubha agho gha mapughwo paghakinda, Chapanga kataluughalambuha luchubha kubhegha lubhindu, lubhalamwehi nagho ghwaanga'aliha ng'obhe na ndondwa yaaponeka kuhuma kunane, na ubhwabhu abhu Chapanga ghaatingihika makakala gha kunane.
MAT 24:30 Ndo yabhonekana naho ya Mwana ghwa Mundu kubhwelo, na bhandu bhoha bha munnima bhaakukulika, nabho bhaammona Mwana ywa Mundu pakahika kubhwelo pakabhegha na makakala na ukulu nkulu.
MAT 24:31 Naywo kataalaghila mahoka bhake kunu paapyemba lupalata, nabho bhataakungana ahaghulwa bhake kuhuma mu mbande hyoha ncheche ya nnima, kuhuma mu uhiko ghumu ghwa nnima mbaka uhiko ghungi.”
MAT 24:32 “Mulihunde kuhuma munkongo ghwa nkuyu, mapanyo ghake paghayanda kutomola mahamba, mungumanya kukita hula hibhegha ugheghela.
MAT 24:33 Ubhwabhu abhu, pammona milando hyoha yingubwituka, mmanye kukita, Mwana ghwa Mundu kabhegha ugheghela.
MAT 24:34 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, kibheleko aki kyaakinda ng'obhe mbaka milando ayi hyoha yibwituke.
MAT 24:35 Kunani na nnima ghwaakinda, peni malagho ghangu ghaakinda ng'obhe.”
MAT 24:36 “Kwa nhalo ghwa linjubha lila na lisaa kahone ywakamanya, hata mahoka bha Chapanga, hangi Mwana, ngati nga Tate ghweka chake.
MAT 24:37 Mana handa payibheghite mumajubha gha Nuhu, ubhwabhu ndo ghabhegha kuhika kwa Mwana ghwa Mundu.
MAT 24:38 Kiyaha majubha ghala kukali na ngumbwa ngulu ya machi kughugubika nnima, bhandu bhakibhegha paakilyegha na kunywegha, paatolela na kutolelwa, mbaka mulinjubha lila Nuhu pakayingiliti mu ghula bhwato nkulu ghuukemwa,
MAT 24:39 na bhakimanya ng'obhe kyohele mbaka payihikite yila ngumbwa ngulu ya machi na kuakokobhola bhoha. Ndo yabhegha ubhwabhu pakapala kuhika Mwana ghwa Mundu.
MAT 24:40 Bhandu abhili bhaabhegha kunng'unda, yumu katanyahulighwa na yungi katalekwa.
MAT 24:41 Adala abhili bhaabhegha mu kuhyagha papamu, yumu kaanyahulighwa na yungi katalekwa.
MAT 24:42 Hino, mulindakile kiyaha mungumanya ng'obhe linjubha lyoki lyaahika Bambo ghwenu.
MAT 24:43 Peni mughumanye nnando aghu kukita, handa nkola kaya kangamanyite mu lisaa lyoki pakilo mwihi katahika, mundu aywo kangaghonjite ng'obhe na kuleka nyumba yake yiboghoyolwe.
MAT 24:44 Habhu na mwenga yinguakwiliha kubha kala, kiyaha Mwana ghwa Mundu katahika mu lisaa limulimanyiti ng'obhe.”
MAT 24:45 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela, “Ndo ywoki ywakabheghite ndumindumi ywa kuhyubhalika na yuna mahala mwene bambo ywake kaammika kuyimilila andumindumi bhangi mu lubhagha lwake, na kabhapeghe hilyo lisaa lya hilyo?
MAT 24:46 Yabhegha tela nndumindumi yula ywene bambo ghwake pakabhuya katammona pakatenda habhu.
MAT 24:47 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, katammika ndumindumi aywo kabheghe nnyimilila ghwa utopelo ghwake ghwoha.
MAT 24:48 Peni handa aywo nndumindumi ndo nhakata, naywo pakalongela mu mwoyo ghwake, ‘Bambo gwangu kangukabhalila kubhuya,’
MAT 24:49 mbole pakayanda kuatuta andumindumi ayaki na kuyanda kulyegha na kunywegha papamu na alobhi,
MAT 24:50 bambo ghwa nndumindumi aywo katahika linjubha lyakamanyiti ng'obhe na lisaa lyakalimanya ng'obhe.
MAT 24:51 Bambo ywake atanhyata muno nndumindumi aywo na kunbhika mu ng'ebhu yimo na afyangu, akwo ndo katalila na kuhyanga mino.”
MAT 25:1 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela, “Manjubha agho, Gubhutwa ghwa Kunani kwa Chapanga ghwabhegha handa akabhali kumi bhaatoliti mambamba ghabhe na kughenda kunkingama bambo yunakutolela.
MAT 25:2 Nhano mu bhombe bhakibhegha ahila mahala, na nhano bhakibhegha na mahala.
MAT 25:3 Bhala ahila mahala bhakitola mambamba ghabhe peni bhakitola ng'obhe na mahuta gha kuyonjokeha mu mambamba,
MAT 25:4 peni bhala bhaabheghite na mahala bhakitola mambamba ghabhe na mahuta ghangi mu kyupa.
MAT 25:5 Yula bambo yunakutolela pakakabhalililte kuhika bhala akabhali bhoha bhakitopelwa ng'ono na bhakighonja.”
MAT 25:6 “Kuuhiko, pakilo totolo pakibhegha na kyobho, ‘Nnole, bambo yunakutolela kanguhika, nng'ende panje mukankingame.’
MAT 25:7 Ndo bhala akabhali bhoha bhakiyumuka na kughatendekeha mambamba ghabhe.
MAT 25:8 Bhala ahila mahala bhakiaghombela bhala bhaabheghite na mahala, ‘Mutupeghe mahuta ghenu kichoko, mambamba ghetu ghanguhimika.’
MAT 25:9 Peni bhala bhaabheghite na mahala bhakiayanga, ‘Kata, kiyaha ghangutukwila ng'obhe twenga na mwenga. Mbaha nng'ende kwa bhanakuhemengana mukahemele mahuta ghenu.’
MAT 25:10 Bhala akamwali abhughabhugha paabheghite bhangughenda kuhemela mahuta, bambo yunakutolela kakihika. Bhala akabhali bhaabheghite kala, bhakiyingila unyumba papamu naywo mu chekwa ya kutolela na nlyango ghukitatwa.”
MAT 25:11 “Mbole, bhala akabhali babhughabhugha nabho bhakihika, na bhakikema, ‘Bambo, Bambo, ghutuhughulile nlyango.’
MAT 25:12 Peni Bambo yunakutolela kakiayanga, ‘Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, nunguamanya ng'obhe.’ ”
MAT 25:13 Yesu kakiyomola pakalongela, “Hinu mulindakile, kiyaha mungumanya ng'obhe linjubha ebu lisaa.”
MAT 25:14 Kangi Yesu kakighendelela pakilongela, “Kangi, Ghubhutwa ghwa Kunani kwa Chapanga ndo handa mundu ywakapalite kughenda kumwanja, kakiakema andumindumi bhake na kuapegha utopelo ghwake.
MAT 25:15 Yumu kakinpegha mihako nhano ya magwala, na yungi mihako mibhili ya magwala, na yungi nhako ghumu ghwa magwala, bhoha bhakipeghwa kwa makakala ghabhe, mbole ywombe kakibhuka.
MAT 25:16 Mbole yula ywakapeghitwe mihako nhano ya ligwala kakighenda kuyitendela mahengo na kakimokola mihako yingi nhano ya magwala.
MAT 25:17 Ubhwabhu abhu yula ywakapeghitwe mihako mibhili ya maghwala kakimokola mihako yingi mibhili ya magwala.
MAT 25:18 Peni yula nndumindumi ywakapeghitwe nhako ghumu ghwa magwala, kakighenda na kakibukula libhumba mulutupi na kakighuhiha ghula nhako ghwa magwala ya bambo ghwake.”
MAT 25:19 “Mbole ya manjubha matangalo yula bambo ywa bhala andumindumi kakibhuya kutenda mmalango na bhombe.
MAT 25:20 Yula nndumindumi ywakapeghitwe mihako nhano ya magwala kakihika, kakiyegha mihako mingi nhano ya magwala. Na kakilongela, ‘Bambo ghukimbegha mihako nhano ya magwala, ghulole njokeheka mihako yingi nhano.’
MAT 25:21 Bambo ghwake kakinng'ombela, ‘Ghutenda maha muno, nndumindumi ghwa maha na ghwa kuhyubhalika, ghutenda maha kwa hilibhi hichoko, ndaghubhika kubhegha nnyimilila ghwa hilibhi hitangalo. Ghuhike ghuyelelwe papamu na bambo ghwako.’ ”
MAT 25:22 “Mbole yula ywakapeghitwe mihako mibhili ya ligwala naywo kakihika. Na kakilongela, ‘Bambo, ghukimbegha mihako mibhili ya magwala. Ghulole nyonjokeha mihako yingi mibhili.’
MAT 25:23 Bambo ywake kakinyanga, ‘Ghutenda maha munu, nndumindumi ghwa maha na ghwa kuhyubhalika, ghutenda maha mu milando michoko, ndaghubhika kubhegha nnyimilila ghwa hilibhi hitangalo. Ghuhike ghuyelelwe papamu na bambo ywako.’ ”
MAT 25:24 “Mbole yula nndumindumi ywakapeghitwe nhako ghumu ghwa magwala kakihika na kakilongela, ‘Bambo, Ningumanya kukita ghwenga ndo mundu n'nonopo munu, ghungubena pala paghupanditi ng'obhe na ghungukungana pala paghukwetite ng'obhe mbeyu.
MAT 25:25 Hinu nikiyoghopa kukita pangi ndaghahobheha maghwala ghako, ndo nikighukulila nhako ghwako mulutupi. Ghulole, nhako ghwako aghu apa ghuutole utopelo ghwako.’
MAT 25:26 Bambo ghwake kakinnyanga, ‘Ghwenga nndumindumi nhakata na ntotoho, ghukimanya kukita ningubena kila kimbatite ng'obhe na kukungana pala pangwetite ng'obhe mbeyu.
MAT 25:27 Hinu, yikikukwiliha kughabhika magwala ghangu kwa bhanakubhuha liba, ngati pamuya ndole yiibheghiti yangu na mapongolo ghake.
MAT 25:28 Habhu, mumpoke aghwo nhako ghwa magwala na mukanpeghe ywakabheghite na mihako mbinda mabhoko yimu.
MAT 25:29 Kiyaha ywohele ywakabhegha na kilibhi katapeghwa na kuyonjokehwa. Peni yula ywakabheghite ng'obhe na kilibhi na kila kyakabheghite nakyo katapokwa.
MAT 25:30 Na ayu nndumindumi nhakata muntaghe panje, mulubhindu, akwo kubhegha na kililo na kuhyagha mino.’ ”
MAT 25:31 “Pakahika Mwana ywa Mundu mu ukulu ghwake na mahoka bha Chapanga bhoha papamu naywo, apo ndo katatama mu kiteho kya utabhala kya ukulu ghwake.
MAT 25:32 Bhandu bha milima hyoha bhaakwemukana mu ulongolo ghwake, naywo kataabhika mbuhi ghweka na mene ghweka handa paatenda nhakila.
MAT 25:33 Kataabhika mene mu mbande yake ya nnilo na mbuhi mbande yake ya ngiya.
MAT 25:34 Ndo mutwa kataaghombela bhala bhaabheghite mu mbande yake ya nnilo, ‘Nhike mwenga muunemilitwe na Tate ghwangu, muumokole Ghubhutwa ghuutendikihitwe kwa kya mwenga kutandila kubhumbwa kwa nnima.
MAT 25:35 Kiyaha pammeghiti na njala mukimbegha hilyo, panyumilitwe, mwenga mukimbegha machi gha kunywegha, na pameghite nhenja mukinngingama,
MAT 25:36 pameghite uhula mukinhwaliha mapinda, pameghite ntamwa mukinlela, na pameghite mu kibhopo mukihika kuntyangila.’ ”
MAT 25:37 “Ndo bhala bhaabheghite bha maha bhakinnyanga, ‘Bambo, ndo linjubha lyoki tukikubhona na njala na tukikulyegheha ebu ghuyumilwa ndo tukikunywegheha machi?
MAT 25:38 Lijubha lyoki tukikubhona nhenja tukikukingama ebu uhula tukikuhwaliha?
MAT 25:39 Kangi lijubha lyoki tukikubhona ntamwa na twenga tukikubhika ebu paghubheghitea mu kibhopo tukikutyangila?’
MAT 25:40 Naywo Mutwa kataayanga, ‘Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, kyohele ki mubhatendilite yumoo ghwa abha akaafuasi bhangu adoko, ndo mukindendela nenga.’ ”
MAT 25:41 “Mbole kataaghombela bhala bhaabheghite mu mbande yake ya ngiya, ‘Mmukane kwa nenga mwenga munkotolitwe, nng'endi mu mwoto ghwa nga kuhimika ghuutendikihitwi kala kwakya Nchipila na andumitumi bhake.
MAT 25:42 Kiyaha pameghite na njala, mukimbegha ng'obhe hilyo, nikinyumilwa, mukimbegha machi ngo'bhe,
MAT 25:43 Nikibhegha nhenja peni mukingingama ng'obhe, nikibhegha uhula peni mukinhwaliha ng'obhe, na pameghite ntamwa kunlela kata na pameghite mu kibhopo mukindyangila ng'obhe.’
MAT 25:44 Ndo bhene nabho bhaanyanga, ‘Bambo linjubha lyoki alyo tukikubhona paghubhegha na njala ebu ghuyumilwa ebu nhenja, ebu uhula ebu paghubhegha ntamwa na mukibhopo na tukikuleka?’
MAT 25:45 Mutwa kataayanga, ‘Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, pala pannemite kubhatangatila yumu ywa abha akaafuasi bhangu adoko, ndo mukilema kundendela nenga.’
MAT 25:46 Hinu abho bhaayingila mukihyato kya manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko, peni bhala bhaabheghite bha maha bhaayingila mu ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko.”
MAT 26:1 Yesu pakayomolite kughalongela malagho agho ghoha, kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake,
MAT 26:2 “Mungumanya kukita mbole ya majubha mabhili yaabhegha Pasaka, naywo Mwana ywa Mundu katakilukwa ngati kabhangalilwe mulupingika.”
MAT 26:3 Ndo hilongohi bha andundame na aghohi bha bhandu bhakikwemukana mu nyumba ya utabhala ya Ndundame Nkulu, lihina lyake Kayafa.
MAT 26:4 Bhakighombana ngati bhankamule Yesu kwa lupwepo na kunkoma.
MAT 26:5 Peni bhakilongela, “Yikotoke kubhegha muchekwa, hela bhubho yaabwitukila bhulwa mubhandu.”
MAT 26:6 Yesu pakabheghite ku Betania mulubhagha lwa Simoni ywakabheghite na maloha,
MAT 26:7 nndala yumu kakinhikila na kyupa kya libho lya alabasita, kiimemite mahuta gha kunungila munu ghaabheghite gha ngalabha ngulu, kakighapopoha mu mutwe ghwa Yesu pakabheghite kangulyegha hilyo.
MAT 26:8 Ahundwa bhake paabhonite agho bhakikalala, bhakilongela, “Kya niki tunguhobheha ghwa ngalabha ahi ngulu?
MAT 26:9 Mahuta agha ghangahemenganitwe kwa ngalabha ngulu na ligwala ayo bhangakamuhitwe makapukwa.”
MAT 26:10 Yesu kakighamanya mahwacho ghabhe, na kakiaghombela, “Kiyaha niki mungunng'aha nndala ayu? Ywombe kandendela nnando ghwa maha muno.
MAT 26:11 Bhandu kapukwa mmegha nabho manjubha ghoha, peni maabhegha ng'obhe na nenga manjubha ghoha.
MAT 26:12 Pakambopokihiti agha mahuta mu mmili ghwangu, ngati kummika kala kwa kukulilwa kwa nenga.
MAT 26:13 Ninguaghombela hoto, kwohele paghulandamihwa Nhalo ghwa Maha munnima ghwoha, nnando aghu ghwakautendite nndala ayu ghwaakambukwa, kwa ukulungwo ghwake.”
MAT 26:14 Mbole Yuda Isikalioti, yumoo ywa bhala kumi na abhili, kakighenda kwa hilongohi bha mandundame
MAT 26:15 na kakikonya, “Mambegha niki handa ndankamuha Yesu kwa mwenga?” Bhakinkamuha hipalamande salasini hya madini gha fesa.
MAT 26:16 Kutandila lisaa alyo Yuda kakipalaha ng'ebhu ya maha ya kunkiluka Yesu.
MAT 26:17 Linjubha lya ulongohi lya chekwa ya mangati ghanga amila, ahundwa bhake bhakinhikila Yesu na bhakinkonya, “Ghungupala tughutendekehele kwoki pakulyeghela Pasaka?”
MAT 26:18 Kakiyanga, “Nng'ende kwa nnume yumu akwo ku kitami, na mukanng'ombele, ‘Nhunda kalongela habhu, lisaa lyangu liheghelela, na mulubhagha lwako ndalyegha Pasaka papamu na ahundwa bhangu.’ ”
MAT 26:19 Ndo ahundwa bhake bhakitenda handa paaghombilitwe na Yesu, nabho bhakitendekeha Pasaka.
MAT 26:20 Payihikite makimuhi Yesu kakitama pakulyeghela papamu na bhala ahundwa kumi na abhili.
MAT 26:21 Na paabheghite bhangulyegha Yesu kakilongela, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela yumu ywenu katangiluka.”
MAT 26:22 Bhene bhakihyongoloka muno, bhakiyanda kukonya yomu mbole ya yungi, “Bhuli Bambo, ndo nenga?”
MAT 26:23 Yesu kakialongela, “Yula ywakachwikite lingate papamu na nenga mukipumbulu, ndo katangiluka.
MAT 26:24 Mwana ywa Mundu kangughenda handa payityekitwe mu Malembo. Peni kimmone yula ywakankiluka yaabhegha mbaha kwa ywombe kangakotokite kubhelekwa.”
MAT 26:25 Mbole, Yuda yula ywakankilukite Yesu kakilongela, “Bhuli nhunda, ndo nenga?” Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ghulongela na kila kighukilongela ndo hoto.”
MAT 26:26 Pabhaabheghiti bhangulyegha, Yesu kakitola lingate kakilumetula, na kakinnumba Chapanga, kakiapegha ahundwa bhake pakalongela, “Ntole, nlyeghe, aghu ndo mmili ghwangu.”
MAT 26:27 Mbole, kakighutola nnobho, kakilumba, kakiapegha pakalongela, “Nnyweghele mabhoha nnobho aghu.
MAT 26:28 Aghu ndo mwahi ghwa nenga ghuubhoneha ninganilo lyangu ndo hoto, mwahi ghuuyitika kwakya kuabhuhila ulemwa bhandu atangalo.
MAT 26:29 Peni nunguaghombela, kutandila hinu ndanywegha kangi ng'obhe difwai ayi ya nsabibu, mbaka linjubha lila pambala kunywegha difwai ya hyono papamu na mwenga mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Tate ghwangu.”
MAT 26:30 Mbole, paayomolite kuyimba lwimbo, bhakibhuka kughenda ku kitumbi kya Miseituni.
MAT 26:31 Basi, Yesu kakiaghombela, “Lelo pakilo bhoha maamutuka na maaneka, kiyaha yityekwa mu Malembo, ‘Ndantuta yunakuhakila, na lumati lwa mene lwapwilinganika.’
MAT 26:32 Peni mbole ya nenga kuhyuka ndabhalongolela kughenda ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:33 Petili kakiyanga, “Hata handa bhoha bhatakuleka, nenga ndakuleka ng'obhe.”
MAT 26:34 Yesu kakinng'ombela Petili, “Kulyaghila nungukughombela, mupakilo ya lelo kukali na njogholo kubhika, ghwangana pandatu.”
MAT 26:35 Peni Petili kakilongela, “Hata handa nungunoghwa kuhwegha papamu na ghwenga, ndakuleka ndwee.” Na ahundwa bhangi bhoha bhakilongela ubhwabhu abhu.
MAT 26:36 Mbole Yesu kakighenda papamu na ahundwa bhake mbaka ku kitogholo kiikemitwe Getisemane, ndo kakiaghombela, “Ntami apa nenga nungughenda pala kuyupa.”
MAT 26:37 Kakintola Petili papamu na bhala bhana abhili bha Sebedayu, naywo kakiyanda kuhyongoloka na kubhaghaya.
MAT 26:38 Mbole kakiaghombela, “Megha na kuhyongoloka mumwoyo hata ugheghela na kuhwegha. Ntame apa papamu na nenga nkotoke kughonja.”
MAT 26:39 Kakighenda kutali kya mandina, kakighwegha makukama pakayupa, kakilongela, “Tate ywangu, handa yaahotoleka, nnobho aghu ghumbitile kutali, hangi yikotoke kubhegha handa mumbala nenga peni yibheghe handa paghupala ghwenga.”
MAT 26:40 Kakiaghendela bhala ahundwa bhake na kakiabhona aghonja kala. Kakinkonya Petili, “Yibhegha bhuli mwenga andatu nnepelwa kutama meho na nenga hata lisaa limo?
MAT 26:41 Nkotoke kughonja, ngati nnyupe nkotoke kuyingila mu mayigho. Kulyaghila nhuki ghubhegha kala, peni mmili ndo nnyoyoho.”
MAT 26:42 Yesu kakialeka kangi na kughenda kuyupa kya ubhili kuyupa, “Tate ywangu, handa yinguhotoleka ng'obhe kimbamanda aki kikulu kikotoke kumbitila, hino, ghutende mughupala.”
MAT 26:43 Pakabhuyite kangi, kakiakolela aghonja, kiyaha bhakitopelwa na ng'ono.
MAT 26:44 Habhu kakialeka, kakighenda kangi kuyupa kya undatu paakilongela malagho ghaghala ghala.
MAT 26:45 Mbole, kakiabhuyila bhala ahundwa na kakiaghombela, “Nkali mungughonja na kupumulila? Nnole, lisaa lihika na Mwana ywa Mundu kangukamuhwa mu mabhoko gha bhandu bhanaulemwa.
MAT 26:46 Nnyinuke, tughende. Nnole yula ywakangiluka kanguheghelela.”
MAT 26:47 Yesu pakabheghitie kakali kangulongela, Yuda, yumu ywa bhala ahundwa kumi na abhili, kakihika pakalongohana na lumati lukulu lwa bhandu bhaabheghite na makechelo na hinduku bhaalaghilitwe na hilongohi bha andundame na hilongohi bha Akaayahudi.
MAT 26:48 Basi, aywo ywakapala kunkiluka kakiapegha kala naho kukita, “Mwene yumbala kumjambuha kwa kunkumbatila ndo munkamule.”
MAT 26:49 Kamu, Yuda kakinhikila Yesu na kumjambuha, “Mwika Nhunda.” Mbole kakinkumbatila.
MAT 26:50 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghanja, ghutende kila kighukihikilite.” Mbole bhala bhandu bhakinng'endela na bhakinkamula Yesu na kummopa.
MAT 26:51 Kamu, yumu ywa bhala bhaabheghite na Yesu pakabhonite agho, kakihomola kihimbi lwake, na kakintuta mmandwa ywa Ndundame Nkulu, na kunkechula lichikilo.
MAT 26:52 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghubhuyihe kihimbi muhala yake, kiyaha bhoha bhanakukoma kwa kihimbi bhaakomwa kwa kihimbi.
MAT 26:53 Bhuli, nungupala mmanye kukita ningahotolite kunnyupa Tate ywangu, naywo kanganyeghelite kyanalumu ya himati kumi na hibhili hya mahoka bhake bha kunane?
MAT 26:54 Peni, handa pandenda habhu, bhuli Malembo gha Chapanga ghangatwihilikite bhuli ghaalongela agha mbaka ghabwituke?”
MAT 26:55 Mu lisaa alyo Yesu kakilughombela lula lumati lwa bhandu, “Muhikila na makechelo na himbongambonga ngati mungamule nenga handa mpoka, manjubha matangalo nikitama ku Nyumba ya Chapanga panuahunda, kiyaha niki mukinngamula ng'obhe?
MAT 26:56 Peni agha ghoha ghabwitukila ngati Malembo ghaatyekitwe na ambuye ghatwihilike.” Ndo ahundwa bhake bhoha bhakibhutuka na bhakinneka.
MAT 26:57 Bhala bhaankamulite Yesu bhakinnyegha kwa Kayafa ywakabheghite Ndundame Nkulu. Na akwo bhakibhegha ahunda bha malaghilo na hilongohi bha Ayahudi.
MAT 26:58 Petili kakintughila kya kutali mbaka ku lubhigho lwa nyumba ya Ndundame Nkulu. Kakiyingila mulubhigho lwa nyumba na kakitama papamu na machonda ngati kabhone kiipala kubwituka.
MAT 26:59 Basi, hilongohi bha Ayahudi, na andundame na libalasa lyoha likipalaha ayimiho bha uhwangi, ngati bhankome Yesu.
MAT 26:60 Peni bhakimokola ng'obhe nnando ghwohele, hata payibhele ayimiho atangalo ahwangi bhakibwituka. Kuuhiko bhakibwituka ayimiho abhili bha uhwangi,
MAT 26:61 bhakilongela, “Mundu ayu kakilongela, ‘Ninguhotola kuyiboghoyola Nyumba ya Chapanga na kuyichenga kangi mu majubha mandatu.’ ”
MAT 26:62 Mbole, Ndundame Nkulu kakiyima na kunng'ombela Yesu, “Bhuli ghwenga ghubhegha ng'obhe na kyakuyanga? Bhandu abha anguyimiha niki kwa ghwenga?”
MAT 26:63 Peni Yesu kakinyamala jii. Ndo Ndundame Nkulu kakinng'ombela, “Ghulape muulongolo ghwa Chapanga yunaubhumi, ghutughombele handa ghwenga ndo Kilisto, Mwana ywa Chapanga.”
MAT 26:64 Yesu kakiyanga, “Ena, handa mughulongela. Peni nunguaghombela bhoha, kutandila hinu maamona Mwana ywa Mundu pakatama mbande ya nnilo ya Chapanga yunamakakala, pakahika mu mahundi gha kunane.”
MAT 26:65 Ndo Ndundame nkulu kakilakatula mapinda ghake pakalongela, “Ayu kangukundula! Kiyaha niki tungupala uyimiho ghungi kangi? Nnole, hinu mwenga nnyihwa agho makundulo.
MAT 26:66 Mwenga mungulamila bhuli nnando aghu?” Bhakinnyanga, “Kangunoghwa kuhwegha.”
MAT 26:67 Mbole bhakinhunila mata ku kibhungi na bhangi bhakinbhakula mabhako,
MAT 26:68 ghwenga Kilisto, “Ghulondole, ndo ghani ywakakubhakulite?”
MAT 26:69 Lisaa alyo Petili kakitama mulubhigho. Nndumindumi yumu nndala ywa Ndundame Nkulu kakinhikila na kakinng'ombela, “Na ghwenga ghukibhegha papamu na Yesu ywa ku Galilaya.”
MAT 26:70 Peni Petili kakikana muulongolo ghwa bhoha pakalongela, “Ningumanya ng'obhe kighukilongela.”
MAT 26:71 Pakabheghite kangubhuka panje kuhika panlyango, nndumindumi yungi nndala kakimmona, na kakiaghombela bhandu bhaabheghite pala, “Mundu ayu kakibhegha papamu na Yesu ywa ku Nasaleti.”
MAT 26:72 Petili kakikana kangi kwa kilapo pakalongela, “Nenga nungummanya ng'obhe mundu aywo.”
MAT 26:73 Mbole kya mandina bhala bhaayimite pala bhakinng'endela Petili na bhakinng'ombela, “Kulyaghila ghwenga ndo yumu ywabhe, kiyaha kuyobhela kwa ghwenga kungulihwana na bhombe.”
MAT 26:74 Ndo Petili kakiyanda kulikundula na kulapa, “Nenga nungummanya ng'obhe mundu aywo.” Kamu mbichi kakibhika.
MAT 26:75 Petili kakihwachila lila lilagho lyakalongilite Yesu, “Kukali na kubhika njogholo, ghwangiluka pandatu.” Kakibhuka panje pakalila kwa kuchwina.
MAT 27:1 Malabhila putiputi hilongohi bha andundame bhoha na hilongo bha Ayahudi bhakikongan kangi, bhatende luhila lwa kunkoma Yesu.
MAT 27:2 Bhakimmopa lughoyi na bhakinnyegha kwa Pilato, ywakabheghite ntabhala ywa Akaaloma.
MAT 27:3 Mbole Yuda ywene ywakankilukite Yesu, pakabhonite kukita Yesu katoswa, kakihyongoloka munu, kakibhuyiha hipalamande salasini hya magwala hyakapeghitwe na hilongohi bha andundame na hilongohi bha Ayahudi.
MAT 27:4 Kakilongela, “Ndenda ulemwa, kiyaha nughukiluka mwahi ghuutendite ng'obhe uhokelo ghwa kukomwa.” Ndo bhakinnyanga, “Aghwo chepa nnando ghwa kughuhwachila twenga, habhu ghumanye ghumwene.”
MAT 27:5 Ndo Yuda kakihitagha hila hipalamande hya magwala ku Nyumba ya Chapanga, kakibhuka na kakighenda kulipopotola mwene.
MAT 27:6 Bhala andundame akulu bhakighatola ghala maghwala na bhakilongela, “Yingunoghwa ng'obhe kuhangangana magwala agha na magwala gha Nyumba ya Chapanga, kiyaha magwala agha ghahombwa ngati mundu kakomwe.”
MAT 27:7 Basi, mbole ya kughombana, bhakilamula kuhemela nng'unda ghwa kingandu kya kubhumbila hyombo hya lutupi, ngati pabheghe pakuakulila ahenja.
MAT 27:8 Ndo mana mbaka lelo bhandu bhangughukema nng'unda aghwo nng'unda ghwa mwahi.
MAT 27:9 Ndo likitwihilika lila lilagho lya mbuye Yelemia kukita, “Bhakitola hipalamande salasini hya magwala, bei yakapangilitwe na bhandu bha Isilaeli,
MAT 27:10 bhakihemelela nng'unda ghwa kingandu kya kubhumbila hyombo hya lutupi, handa bhula Bambo pakakwilikihite.”
MAT 27:11 Linjuba alyo alyo Yesu pakayimite muulongolo ghwa Pilato, nkulu ywa nkoa ywa Akaaloma, naywo kakinkonya Yesu, “Bhuli, Ghwenga ndo Mutwa ywa Akaayahudi?” Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ghungulongela.”
MAT 27:12 Peni hilongohi bha andundame na hilongohi bha Ayahudi paankokilite kakiyanga ng'obhe lilagho.
MAT 27:13 Ndo Pilato kakinkonya, “Bhuli, ghunguyihwa ng'obhe ngokelo ahyo highukokelwa?”
MAT 27:14 Peni Yesu kakinnyanga ng'obhe hata kwa lilagho limu, kya habhu ntabhala kakikangacha munu.
MAT 27:15 Basi, yikibhegha hitohe mulinjubha lya chekwa ntabhala ywa Aloma kummopola mmopwa yumu ywakahaghulitwe na lumati lwa bhandu.
MAT 27:16 Manjubha agho kakibhegha mmopwa yumu nhakata, ywakakemitwe Balaba.
MAT 27:17 Basi, lumati lwa bhandu palukonganite, Pilato kakiakonya, “Mungupala nubhabhopolele ywoki, Balaba ebu Yesu ywene ywakakemwa Kilisto?”
MAT 27:18 Kiyaha kakimanya kukita Yesu kakikamuhwa kwa ywombe kiyaha bhakimmonela tama.
MAT 27:19 Pilato pakatamite pa kiteho kyake kya toso, nhumbu ywake kakintaghila lilobhe ali, “Ghukotoke kuliyingiha mungokelo ywa mundu ayu ywa maha, kiyaha lelo mbamandika muno maloto kwakya ywombe.”
MAT 27:20 Peni hilongohi bha andundame na aghohi bhakilunyegheleha lula lumati lwa bhandu kukita ayupe ngati kabhopolelwe Balaba na Yesu kakakomwe.
MAT 27:21 Nkulu ghwa nkoa kakiakonya kangi, “Ndo ywoki mu abha abhili mungupala nibhahughulilile?” Bhakiyanga, “Balaba.”
MAT 27:22 Pilato kakiaghombela, “Hinu, ndende niki kwa ayu ywakakemwa Kilisto?” Bhakinnyanga, “Ghummambe mulupingika.”
MAT 27:23 Pilato kakiakonya, “Kiyaha niki? Katenda uhokelo ghwoki?” Peni bhombe bhakighendelela kuyobha kyobho, “Ghummambe mulupingika.”
MAT 27:24 Pilato pakabhonite katahotola ng'obhe kutenda kyohele, na kukita bhulwa ghunguyonjokeheka, kakitola machi, kakikuha mabhoko ghake muulongolo ghwa lula lumati lwa bhandu, pakalongela, “Nenga megha ng'obhe munnando ghwa kiho kya mundu ayu, maamanya mabhene.”
MAT 27:25 Bhandu bhoha bhakiyanga, “Chapanga katuhyate twenga na bhana bhetu kwa kiho kya mundu ayu.”
MAT 27:26 Ndo, kakiabhopolela Balaba na mbole ya kukwilikiha kuntuta Yesu hinjupunjupu hya liyula lya ndomondo hiikwatilitwe ndoana, kakimmuha ngati kabhambwe.
MAT 27:27 Mbole, machonda bha Pilato, bhakinnyegha Yesu muludamu lwa utabhala, na machonda bhoha bhakintindila.
MAT 27:28 Bhakinhula mapinda ghake na bhakinhwaliha lipinda lya salabati,
MAT 27:29 Mbole, bhakitendekeha kilemba kya mihomi na bhakinhwika mumutwe ghwake. Bhakinpegha nhimbati mu kibhoko kyake kya nnilo, bhakichutama mayughwa muulongolo ghwake paalongela, “Mwika, Mutwa ywa Akaayahudi.”
MAT 27:30 Bhakinhunila mata, na bhakighutola ghula nhimbati mu mabhoko ghake na bhakintuta mu mutwe ghwake.
MAT 27:31 Mbole ya kuntendela agho, bhakinhula lila lipinda, bhakinhwaliha kangi lipinda lyake, na bhakintola ngati bhakammambe mulupingika.
MAT 27:32 Paabheghite munjila, bhakikongana na mundu yumu ywa ku Kilene, lihina lyake Simoni, nabho machonda bhakinkwilikiha kalugheghe lula lupingika.
MAT 27:33 Bhakihika pahala paakemitwe Goligota, fwambulo yake pahala palihuhu lya mutwe.
MAT 27:34 Bhakinpegha difwai yiihanganganitwe na lusunga. Peni Yesu pakapahite kakilema kunywegha.
MAT 27:35 Paammabite kala, bhakighabhana mapinda ghake kwa kutenda usimbi.
MAT 27:36 Mbole, bhakitama ngati bhankingikihe.
MAT 27:37 Unani mwa mutwe ghwake, mulupingika, bhaibhika lipapi liilembitwe, “AYU NDO YESU, MUTWA YWA AKAAYAHUDI.”
MAT 27:38 Mbole Apoka abhili bhakibhambwa papamu na ywobe kila mundu mulupingika lwake, yumu mbande yake ya nnilo na yungi mbande ya ngiya ya Yesu.
MAT 27:39 Bhandu bhaabheghite bhangupita ugheghela na apo, bhakinligha kunu paanokola mitwe yabhe na kunheka, paalongela,
MAT 27:40 “Ghwenga, ghuupala kuboghoyola Nyumba ya Chapanga na kuchenga kwa manjubha mandatu, hinu ghulilopole ghumwene na ghuhuluke muupingika. Handa ghwenga ndo Mwana ywa Chapanga.”
MAT 27:41 Ubhwabhu abhu, hilongohi bha andundame na ahunda bha Malaghilo na aghohi bhakinhwangila, paalongela,
MAT 27:42 “Kakialopoha bhangi, peni kanguhotola ng'obhe kulilopoha mwene. Ywombe ndo Mutwa ghwa Isilaeli. Hinu, kahuluke kuhuma mulupingika ndo twaanhyubhalila.
MAT 27:43 Kakinndumbila Chapanga, hino, Chapanga kanlopole handa kangupala, kiyaha ywombe kakilongela, ‘Nenga ndo Mwana ywa Chapanga.’ ”
MAT 27:44 Na bhala apoka bhaabhambitwe papamu na Yesu bhakinligha ubhwabhu abhu.
MAT 27:45 Kutandila saa sita mbaka saa tisa nnima ghwoha likbhegha lubhindu totoloo.
MAT 27:46 Payihikite saa tisa Yesu kakilila kwa lilobhe likulu, “Eloi, Eloi lama Sabakitani?” Fwambulo yake, “Chapanga ywangu, Chapanga ywangu, bhuli ghunguneka?”
MAT 27:47 Amoo bhandu bhaayimite pala paayihwite agho bhakilongela, “Kangunkema Eliya.”
MAT 27:48 Kamu, yumu ywabhe kakibhutuka lubhilo na kuyegha libhoya liihanganganitwe na siki, kakiyibhika muludenge na kakinpegha Yesu ngati kanyweghe.
MAT 27:49 Bhangi bhakilongela, “Munneke, ngati tubhone handa Eliya katahika kunlopoha.”
MAT 27:50 Mbole Yesu kakilila kangi lilobhe likulu, ndo kakihwegha.
MAT 27:51 Lisaa alyo alyo, lipasia lya Nyumba ya Chapanga likibaluka hipalamande hibhili, kutandila kunane mbaka pahi. Nnima ghukilendema na matalabha ghakibaluka.
MAT 27:52 Mandogholo ghakigubutuka na mibhili ya bhandu bha maha yikihyuka.
MAT 27:53 Mbole ya Yesu kuhyuka bhakubhuka mumandogholo na bhakiyingila ku kitami king'anyimo na kubhegha bhandu bha ayoloho.
MAT 27:54 Ndo yula machonda kilongohi na bhala bhaabheghite papamu naywo paakinkingikiha Yesu, paabhonite nnima ghungulendema na ghoha ghaabwitukilite, bhakiyoghopa na bhakilongela, “Kulyaghila ayu kakibhegha Mwana ghwa Chapanga.”
MAT 27:55 Apo pakibhegha na adala paalolekeha kya kutali. Abho bhakintughila Yesu kuhuma Galilaya ngati bhantumikile.
MAT 27:56 Mubhombe bhakibhegha Malia mundu ywa kuhuma ku Magidala, Malia mama ywabhe Yakobu na Yosefu na mama ywabhe bhana bha Sebedayo.
MAT 27:57 Payihikite makimuhi, kakihika mundu yumu yunautopelo ywakakemitwe Yosefu, kuhuma ku Alimataya, na aywo kakibhegha nhundwa ywa Yesu,
MAT 27:58 kakinng'endela Pilato, kughuyupa mmili ghwa Yesu. Pilato kakikwilikiha kapeghwe.
MAT 27:59 Yosefu kakighutola ghula mmili ghwa Yesu, kakighubhilingiha sanda huhu mbulete,
MAT 27:60 kakighubhika mulindogholo lya hyono lyakalihonguliti mwene mulitabhala. Mbole, kakibingiliha libho likulu mu nlyango ghwa lindogholo na kakighenda.
MAT 27:61 Malia ywa ku Magudala na yula Malia yungi bhakitama ugheghela ghwa lindogholo.
MAT 27:62 Kilabho yake, ndo linjubha lya kupumulila, hilongohi bha andundame na Afalisayu bhakinng'endela Pilato,
MAT 27:63 bhakilongela, “Nkulu, tungukulungwa kukita yula nkubhuhi, kukali ya kuhwegha kakilongela, ‘Mbole ya majubha mandatu ndaahyuka.’
MAT 27:64 Basi, ghukwilikihe ngati lindogholo likingikihwe mbaka linjubha lya ndatu. Hela bhubho, ahundwa bhake bhatahotola kughuyibha mmili ghwake na kuaghombela bhandu kukita kahyuka. Ukubhuhi aghwo ghwa uhiko ghwaabhegha nhakata kyanalumu kupitingana ghula ghwa kalongohi.”
MAT 27:65 Pilato kakiaghombela, “Mwenga mmegha na machonda akingikiha. Nng'ende mukalikingikihe lindogholo handa bhula mummanya.”
MAT 27:66 Kya habhu, bhakighenda na machonda ngati bhakalikingikihe lindogholo kwa makakala ghoa, bhakibhika mango mu lila lindogholo na kubhika ukingiki ho.
MAT 28:1 Mbole ya kupita Linjubha lya Kupumulila, na payihikite malabhila putiputi ya lijubha lya ulongohi lya juma, Malia ywa kuhuma ku Magudala na yula Malia yungi bhakighenda kulilolekeha lila lindogholo.
MAT 28:2 Kamu, pakibhegha na lulendemo lukulu lwa lutupi, kiyaha lihoka ywa Bambo kakihuluka kuhuma kunane na kakighenda kulindogholo, kakilibingiliha lila libho na kakilitamila.
MAT 28:3 Kibhungi kyake aywo lihoka ywa Chapanga kiking'alima na mapinda ghake ghakibhegha mahuhu mbuletee.
MAT 28:4 Bhala machonda bha lindogholo bhakiyoghopa muno, bhakiloghoya munu na bhakibhegha handa ahwegha.
MAT 28:5 Yula lihoka ywa Chapanga kakiaghombela bhala adala, “Nkotoke kuyoghopa, kiyaha nungumanya kukita mungunpalaha Yesu ywakabhambitwe mulupingika.
MAT 28:6 Kabhegha ng'obhe apa, kahyuka, handa pakalongilite. Nhike mupalole pala pakaghonjihitwe.
MAT 28:7 Basi, nngende kwa kuyumbatika mukaaghombele ahundwa bhake kukita, ‘Kahyuka, naywo kabhalongolela kughenda ku Galilaya. Akwo ndo mammona, nkotoke kulibhalila aki kinubhaghombela.’ ”
MAT 28:8 Habhu, bhala adala bhakibhuka pala palindogholo, paabhegha na bhwaghalili peni bhakibhegha na uyelelo nkulu, bhakibhutuka lubhilo ngati bhakaaghombele ahundwa bhake mihalo ayo.
MAT 28:9 Paabheghite bhangughenda, pindulu, Yesu kakikongana nabho, na kakilongela, “Mwika.” Bhala adala bhakinheghelela, bhakighakamula maghulu ghake na bhakintundamila.
MAT 28:10 Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nkotoke kuyoghopa. Nng'ende mukaaghombele alongo bhangu aghende ku Galilaya, akwo ndo bhamona.”
MAT 28:11 Bhala adala paabheghite bhangughenda, amoo bha machonda bhaabheghite bhangukingikiha lindogholo, bhakighenda ku kitami na bhakiaghombela hilongohi bha andundame milando hyoha yiibwitukite.
MAT 28:12 Mbole, bhala andundame bhakikongana na hilongohi bha Akaayahudi na mbole ya kughombana, bhakiapegha bhala machonda ngalabha nyoloho
MAT 28:13 bhakiaghombela, “Mwenga mukalongele naha, ‘Ahundwa bhake bhakihika pakilo, bhakihika kuuyibhammili ghwake, twenga patubheghite tungughonja.’
MAT 28:14 Na handa nhalo aghu pakayihwa ntabhala ywa Akaaloma, twenga twaayobhela naywo kataahyata ng'obhe.”
MAT 28:15 Habhu, bhala machonda bhakiyitola yila ngalabha na bhakitenda handa paaghombilitwe na andundame. Nhalo aghu ghukwila kwa Akaayahudi mbaka lelo.
MAT 28:16 Ndo bhala ahundwa kumi na yumu bhakighenda mbaka ku Galilaya ku kila kitumbi kyakaalaghilite na Yesu.
MAT 28:17 Paammonite, bhakintundamila, peni amoo bhabhe bhakibhegha na bhwaghalili.
MAT 28:18 Yesu kakiahikila ugheghela na kakiaghombela, “Ngamuhwa makakala ghoha kunane kwa Chapanga na munnima.
MAT 28:19 Basi, nng'ende mukaatende bhandu bha milima hyoha abheghe ahundwa bhangu, pamuabatisa kwa lihina lya Tate, na lya Mwana na lya Nhuki ywa Chapanga.
MAT 28:20 Na muahunde kuyighungilu milando hyoha yinibhakwilikihite mwenga. Kulyaghila nenga megha papamu na mwenga manjubha ghoha mbaka ku uhiko ghwa nndaluko.”
MAR 1:1 Aghu ndo ulongohi ghwa Nhalo ghwa Maha ghwa Yesu Kilisto, Mwana ghwa Chapanga
MAR 1:2 Ghukiyanda handa payityekwite mukitabho kya mbuye ghwa Chapanga ywakakemitwe Isaya, “Chapanga kakighomba ‘Nannlaghiha ndumitumi ghwangu muulongolo ghwako katayitendekeha njila yako.’
MAR 1:3 Lilobhe lya mundu lingukema kukibhala; ‘Muyitendekhe njila ya Bambo, muyighololehe ndyangilo yake.’ ”
MAR 1:4 Yohana kakibwitukila kukibhala, pakihingula na kubhalandamiha bhandu pakighomba, “Mulipetule kyakya ulemwa ghwenu na muhingulwe na mwene Chapanga kataghulekekeha ulemwa ghwenu.”
MAR 1:5 Bhandu ayoloho kuhuma ku nnima ghwa Yudea na bhoha bha kitami kya Yelusalemu bhakinng'endela na bhakilipetula uhokelo ghwabhe naywo kakiabatisa mulukemba lwa Yoludani.
MAR 1:6 Yohana kakihwala lipinda litendekehitwe kwa mayuni gha nnyama ywakakemitwe ngamia na nkungi ghwa liyula mukibhuno kyake. Hilyo hyaki hikibha mapalala na bhuchi.
MAR 1:7 Naywo kakialandamiha bhandu pakighomba “Ywa apala kuhika mbole ya nenga kabha na makakala makulu kupitingana kwa nenga, yiteghekwa ng'obhe hokame na kulegheha ngoyi gha makobasi hyake.
MAR 1:8 Nenga ndabhabatisa kwa machi, peni ywombe kataabatisa kwa Nhuki ghwa Chapanga.”
MAR 1:9 Mu masiku agho Yesu kakihika kuhuma Nasaleti kitami kya ku Galilaya naywo kakibatiswa na Yohana mulukemba lwa Yoludani.
MAR 1:10 Kamu Yesu pakahumite mumachi, kakibhona luhingu lukiyughuka na Nhuki ghwa Chapanga kakinhulukila unani ghwake handa ngunda.
MAR 1:11 Lilobhe likiyihwanika kuhuma kuluhingu; “Ghwenga ndo! Mwana ghwangu yunughupala nungunoghelwa na ghwenga.”
MAR 1:12 Pala pala! Nhuki ghwa Chapanga kakinlongoha kughenda kukibhala
MAR 1:13 Kakitama akwo masiku mbinda mabhoko ncheche kunu kaking'ehwa na Nchipila akwo kakibha papamu na anyama bha kunhitu, nabho andumitumi ghwa kuluhingu bha Chapanga bhakinlela.
MAR 1:14 Yohana pakabhopwite kukibhopo, Yesu kakighenda ku nnima ghwa Galilaya, kakiyanda kulandamiha Nhalo ghwa Maha ghwa Chapanga,
MAR 1:15 kunu pakaghomba, “Uhiko uhika kala, na Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga ghunguheghelela; Mulipetule na kuhyubhalila Nhalo ghwa Maha ghwa Chapanga.”
MAR 1:16 Yesu pakabheghite mukutyanga mumbwegha ya lihibha lya Galilaya, kakiabhona Simoni na Andelea nnongo ghwake paatagha njaho hyabhe mulihibha; mana akibha aghomeha homba.
MAR 1:17 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Munhikile, na nenga ndabhahunda kunnyeghela bhandu handa aghomeha homba paayegha homba.”
MAR 1:18 Pala pala, bhakiyileka njaho hyabhe na bhakintughila.
MAR 1:19 Pakatyangite kya mandina, kakiabhona Yakobu na Yohana, bhoha bhana bha Zebedayo. Nabho bhubho bhakibha mubhwato, paatandabhuha njaho hyabhe.
MAR 1:20 Pala pala, kakiakema, nabho bhakinleka tate ghwabhe Zebedayo mubhwato papamu na andumitumi bhabhe, bhakighenda na kuntughila Yesu.
MAR 1:21 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakilongohana mbaka ku Kapelinaumu, palihikite Lisiku lya Kupughwa Yesu kakiyingila mu kitutubhi kya kukonganila Akaayahudi, na kakiyanda kuhunda.
MAR 1:22 Bhandu bhakikangacha munu kya mahundo ghake, mana kakibha mukubhahunda handa mundu yuna makakala, kiyaha kakilihwana ng'obhe na ahunda bha malaghilo.
MAR 1:23 Peni apo, pakibhegha mundu yunamandilo mu kitutubhi kya ngonganilo yabhe, naywo kakikyota kyobho
MAR 1:24 “Ghuna niki na twenga Yesu ghwa Nasaleti? Ghuhika kutukanjaghana? Manya kukita ghwenga ndo! Ghani, Nng'anyimo ghwa Chapanga!”
MAR 1:25 Yesu kakinlakalila, pakighomba, “Ghunyamale, Na ghunneke mundu ayu.”
MAR 1:26 Ghala mandilu ghakinnyukayuka kakikyota kyobho na kakinmuka.
MAR 1:27 Bhandu bhoha bhakikangacha na kukonyekehana, “Ayi ndo mihalo ghani? Ndo Mahundo gha hyono? Kangi ghana makakala gha utabhala kanguakwilikiha mandilo nabho bhangu nnyitikila!”
MAR 1:28 Mihalo yake yikikwila kanongola nongola mumilima hyoha ya Galilaya.
MAR 1:29 Bhakibhuka mu kitutubhi kya kukonganila bhakighenda papamu na Jakobu na Yohana mbaka kulubhagha lwa Simoni na Andelea.
MAR 1:30 Na ma ghwa nhumbu ghwa Simoni kakibha na nhehemela tepatepa paulili, bhakinkambukiha Yesu mihalo yake.
MAR 1:31 Ndo Yesu kakinng'endela, na kunkamula kibhoko na kunnyinula. Mbole nhehemela ghukinnekekeha, naywo kakiyanda kuakeyela.
MAR 1:32 Payihikite makimuhi, na luchubha palutipikiti, akinng'eghela Yesu bhandu bhananhehemela na bhaakwelitwe na mandilo.
MAR 1:33 Bhandu bhoha bha kitami kila bhakikwemukila paulongolo ghwa kitutubhi kya Simoni.
MAR 1:34 Yesu kakialamiha atamwa ayoloho na bhana mihehemela nhanganganiko na kakiabhuha mandilo ayoloho, peni kakibhaleka ng'obhe ghala mandilu bhaghombe kiyaha bhakimanya kukita ywombe ndo ghani.
