MAR 1:35 Malabhila putiputi pangeha kukali na lubhindu, Yesu kakibhuka ngati kaghende panga bhandu kakan'tundamile Chapanga.
MAR 1:36 Simoni na ayake bhakighenda kunpalaha,
MAR 1:37 Paammonite, bhakinng'ombela “Bhandu bhoha angughupalaha!”
MAR 1:38 Yesu kakiayanga, “Tughende pamoo pangi pa hitami hya nng'eghela, ngalandamihe na akwo nakwo, kiyaha akyo ndo kinikihikilite.”
MAR 1:39 Kakitindila Galilaya hyoha, kakilandamiha muhitutubhi ya kukonganikila Akaayahudi na kughabhuha mandilo.
MAR 1:40 Mundu yumu ywakabheghite na maloha kakinng'endela Yesu, kakinchutamila mayughwa na kunnyupa, na kung'ombela, “Paghupala, ghwahotola kunghulula!”
MAR 1:41 Yesu kakimmonela luhungu, kakigholoha kibhoko kyake kakinnyabhika kunu pakanng'ombela “Ningupala ghululika!”
MAR 1:42 Kamu maloha ghakinbhuka naywo kakighululika.
MAR 1:43 Mbole ya kunkanikiha, Yesu kakinlekekeha kaghende kunu pakanng'ombela
MAR 1:44 “Ghukotoo kunng'ombela mundu ywoheli yula mihalo ayi peni ghughende ghukalilahe kwa ndundame bha Chapanga na ghukatule matulo kya kughululikwa kwako handa pakakwilikihite Musa yibhe uyimiho kwa bhombe kukita ghulama.”
MAR 1:45 Peni yula mundu kakibhuka kakiyanda kualubhulila bhandu mihalo ya kulamihwa kwa mwene kya nga uhiho. Hinu Yesu kakilepelwa kuyingila kangi mumilima kya nga uhiho, peni kakitama panje ya kitami mbande ya nga bhandu. Hata naha bhandu bhakintughila Yesu kuhuma mumbande hyoha.
MAR 2:1 Mbole ya masiku gha mandina, Yesu kakibhuya ku Kapelinaumu, bhandu bhakiyihwa kukita kakibha ukaya.
MAR 2:2 Hino bhakikwemukana bhandu ayoloho, bhakimema kupitingana kunlyango mbaka paulongolo ghwa kitutubhi. Yesu kakibha pakialandamiha lilagho lyake.
MAR 2:3 Lisaa lilalila bhandu ncheche bhakihika na bhakinng'egha mundu nlelebhaho kwa Yesu.
MAR 2:4 Kiyaha ya lumati lwa bhandu bhakilepelwa kunheghekeha pakabheghite Yesu. Hinu bhakihotola lunyakaha lubheghite unani pakabheghite Yesu, paahotolite kala bhakinhuluha aywo mundu pakaghonjite mulikahe.
MAR 2:5 Yesu pakabhoniti uhyubhalilo ghwabhe kakinng'ombela yula nlelebhaho “Mwana ghwangu, ‘ghulekekehwa ulemwa ghwako.’”
MAR 2:6 Amoo bha ahunda bha malaghilo bhaatamite pautamo aghwo, bhakihwacha mumyoyo yabhe.
MAR 2:7 “Yibha bhuli mundu ayu kangughomba naha? Ayu kangunkundula Chapanga! Kahone mundu ywakulekekeha ulemwa maha nga Chapanga ghweka chake.”
MAR 2:8 Kamu Yesu kakighamanya mahwachilo gha myoyo yabhe, kakiakonya, “Bhuli munguhwacha habhu mumyoyo yenu?
MAR 2:9 Kingiki kya kunoghelwa muno, kunng'ombela mundu nlelebhaho, ‘Ghulekekehwa ulemwa ghwako ebu kunng'ombela ghuyinuke ghutole likahe lyako ghutyange?’
MAR 2:10 Hinu nungupala mmanye kukita Mwana ghwa Mundu kabhegha na makakala gha utabhala ghwa kualekekeha bhandu ulemwa ghwabhe munnima” Ndo Yesu kakinng'ombela yula nlelebhaho.
MAR 2:11 “Ningughughombela ghuyime, ghutole likahe lyako ghughende ukaya kwako.”
MAR 2:12 Kamu, kakiyima na kakitola likahe lyake na kakibhuka. Bhandu bhoha bhakikangacha na kunkwiha Chapanga paakilongela, “Twenga tuyibhona ng'obhe mihalo handa ayi.”
MAR 2:13 Yesu kakighenda kangi mumbwegha bwegha ya lihibha lya Galilaya. Lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukinhikila naywo kakiyanda kuahunda.
MAR 2:14 Pakabheghite mukutyanga kakinmona Lawi mwana ghwa Alufayu kakitama pakitutubhi kya lusumulo sumu, Yesu kakinng'ombela “Ghunndughile” Lawi kakiyimuka na kuntughila.
MAR 2:15 Mbole yake Yesu kakitama mukulyegha hilyo, mulubhagha lwa Lawi, kakibha papamu na bhanakusumula sumu ayoloho na bhana ulemwa bhakibhegha mukulyegha papamu na ahundwa bhake, mana kukibha na bhandu ayoloho bhaantughiliti
MAR 2:16 Amoo ahunda bha malaghilo na Akaafalisayu paammonite pakalyegha papamu na asumula lusumu na bhanaulemwa bhakiakonya ahundwa bhake, “Kiyaha niki Yesu kangulyegha papamu na bhanakusumula sumu na bhana ulemwa?”
MAR 2:17 Yesu pakayihwite kakiaghombela, “Bhandu bha ngautamwa ampala ng'obhe nng'anga, maha atamwa. Hika ng'obhe kubhakema bhandu bha maha, ngati bhana ulemwa.”
MAR 2:18 Hinu, ahundwa bha Yohana na ahundwa bha akaafalisayo bhakulikunga kulyegha. Amoo bhandu bhakinhikila Yesu kunkonyekeha, “Bhuli ahundwa bha Yohana na ahundwa bha Akaafalisayo bhangulikunga kulyegha, peni bhuli ahundwa bhako bhangulikunga kulyegha ng'obhe?”
MAR 2:19 Yesu kakiayanga “Ahenja bha bambo yuna chekwa ya kutolela bhahotola bhuli kulikunga kulyegha pala bambo yuna chekwa ya kutolela paabheghite papamo nabho? Kiyaha yuna chekwa ya kutolela lisiku alyo kabhegha papamu na bhombe kabhone kulikunga kulyegha.
MAR 2:20 Peni lisiku lyahika kwa yuna chekwa ya kutolela kubhuhwa mubhombe; peniapwo ndo bhatahotola kulikunga kulyegha hilyo.”
MAR 2:21 “Bhandu apabhikagha ng'obhe kipabhiko kya hyono mulikama. Handa paatenda naha akyo kipabhiko kya hyono kyalakatukanga likama alyo nalyo lyakanjabhanika munu.
MAR 2:22 Na kabhone mundu yuna kubhika difwai ya hyono mu mihako ihakalite ya mayula handa paatenda naha yila difwai ya hyono yahibalula yila mihako ihakalite gha mayula kangi divai yayitika pahi na nhako ghula ghuhakalite ghwa metukana. Divai ya hyono yingubhikwa mu mihako hya hyono.”
MAR 2:23 Lisiku limu lya Kupughwa, Yesu kakibha mukutyanga mumighunda ya mapemba. Paabheghite mukutyanga ahundwa bhake bhakiyanda kubena mahonjo gha mapemba.
MAR 2:24 Akaafalisayo bhakinkonya Yesu, “Ghulole! Kiyaha niki ahundwa bhako angutenda nhalo ghwanga kunoghelwa lisiku lya kupughwa?”
MAR 2:25 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mukali kusoma ng'obhe yakatendite Daudi na ayake paabheghite na njala?
MAR 2:26 Daudi kakiyingila mukitutubhi kya Chapanga, kakilyegha yila mangate yibheghite yakya Chapanga. Nhalo aghu ghukitendwa paabheghite Abitai ndundame nkulu. Na ndo andundame ghweka chabhe akiyeghekehwa kulyegha mangate ayo ya kya Chapanga. Peni Daudi kakilyegha, kangi kakiapegha ayake”
MAR 2:27 Yesu kakibhaghombela “Lisiku lya kupughwa likitendekwa kwa kya bhandu na ng'obhe bhandu kwa kya Lisiku lya kupughwa.
MAR 2:28 Hila hila Mwana ghwa Mundu ndo Bambo ghwa Lisiku lya Kupughwa.”
MAR 3:1 Yesu kakiyingila kangi mu kitutubhi kya kukonganila Akaayahudi, na akwo pakibha na mundu yumo yunaulelebhaho ghwa kibhoko.
MAR 3:2 Amwo, amoo bhandu bhangi bhakintyegha kanlamihe mundu ayo lisiku lya kupughwa apati ngupukiho ya kuntakila.
MAR 3:3 Yesu kakinng'ombela mundu yula ywakalelebhukite kibhoko, “Ghuhike apa paulongolo”
MAR 3:4 Mbole kakiakonya bhandu, “Hinu lyoki likunoghelwa kutendwa mu lisiku lya kupughwa, kutenda mihalo ya maha ebu mahakataho, kulopoha ubhumi ebu kukoma?” Peni bhombe akinyamala jii.
MAR 3:5 Yesu kakialolekeha bhoha kwa kiyaghabhu, na kakikukulika kwa hyeta ya myoyo yabhe, na kakinng'ombela yula mundu, “Ghugholohe kibhoko kyako!” Kakikigholoha kibhoko kyake na kikibha kya maha kangi.
MAR 3:6 Kamu Akaafalisayo bhakighenda panji kutenda ngokeho pamoo na bhandu bha kimati kya Helode bhakipalaha njila ya kunkanjaghana Yesu.
MAR 3:7 Yesu kakibhuka papamu na ahundwa bhake kakighenda kumbwegha ya lihibha Galilaya na bhandu ayoloho kuhuma kunnima ghwa Galilaya,
MAR 3:8 ku Idumea kumwambo ya lukemba Yoludani, kiyaha bhakiyihwa mihalo miyoloho yakatendite,
MAR 3:9 Kiyaha ya kya lumati lukulu lwa bhandu Yesu kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, bhanyeghele bhwato atame amwo ngati lumati lwa bhandu lukotoke kunnyuka.
MAR 3:10 Kiyaha Kakialamiha atamwa bha mahele, ndo bhala bhana utamwa bhakiyukana ngati anbyale.
MAR 3:11 Bhandu bha abheghite na mandilo paanmonite Yesu bhakilitagha pahi pa ulongolo ghwa maghulu ghake na bhakikyota kyobho, “Ghwenga ndo Mwana ghwa Chapanga.”
MAR 3:12 Peni Yesu kakiakwilikiha ghala mandilu kwa lilakali bhakotoke kummanyiha kwa bhandu.
MAR 3:13 Yesu kakihubhuka kukitumbi, kakiakema bhala abhahaghulite nabho bhakighenda naywo.
MAR 3:14 Kakiahaghula mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili ndo abha akiakema Andumitumi, ngati abheghe papamu na ywombe, kakaalaghihe kulandamiha
MAR 3:15 kangi abheghe na makakala gha kughabhinga bhinga mandilu.
MAR 3:16 Abha ndo bhala mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili akabhahaghuliti, Simoni ywene Yesu kakinpegha lihina lya Petili,
MAR 3:17 Yakobu na Yohani bhana bha Zebedayu, bhombe kakibhapegha lihina Boanelege, mana yake ndo bhana bha lulundumo,
MAR 3:18 Andelea na Filipi na Batolomayo na Matayo na Tomasi na Yakobu mwana ghwa Alufayo na Tadayo na Simoni Nkananayu na
MAR 3:19 Yuda Isikaliyoti, ywene ywakankilukite Yesu.
MAR 3:20 Mbole Yesu kakibhuya ukaya, lumati lwa bhandu lukikwemuka kangi, mbaka mwene na ahundwa bhake bhakilepelwa kulyegha hilyo.
MAR 3:21 Paayihwite alongo bhake mihalo ayi bhakighenda kuntola, mana bhandu bhakighomba, “Kayingilwa na nng'uluka.”
MAR 3:22 Ahunda bha malaghilo bhakihika kuhuma ku Yelusalemu, bhakighomba, “Ayu kana Belisebuli! Kangi kangubhabhinga bhinga mandilo kwa makakala gha nkulu ghwa mandilo.”
MAR 3:23 Hinu Yesu kakibhakema bhombe na kubhaghombela kwa mihwanu, “Nchipila katahotola bhuli kunbhinga bhinga Nchipila nnyake?
MAR 3:24 Handa ghubhutwa ghumo ghumegheka mulumati hinakupingikana, ghubhutwa agwo ghwalama ng'obhe.
MAR 3:25 Na handa lubhagha lumo lutamegheka mulumati lumati lunakupingikana, lubhagha alwo lutatengeleheka ng'obhe.
MAR 3:26 Na handa ghubhutwa ghwa nchipila ghutapwilinganika mu himati hichoko hichoko kabhone kuhotola na uhiko ghwake ghuhika.”
MAR 3:27 “Kabhone mundu ywohele yula ywakahotola kuyingila kukitutubhi kya mundu yuna makakala na kunpoka utopelo ghwake, mbaka kakantute na kammope mundu aywo, ndo katahotola kunpoka utopelo ghwake.”
MAR 3:28 “Kulyaghila nungubhaghombela gha hoto bhandu bhatalekekehwa ulemwa ghwabhe ghwoha na ngundulo hyabhe hyoha kwa Chapanga.
MAR 3:29 Peni yunakunkundula Nhuki ghwa Chapanga kabhone kulekekehwa, kana nongwa ya ulemwa ghwa masiku ghoha.”
MAR 3:30 Yesu kakighomba habhu kiyaha bhombe bhakighomba, “Kana lindilo.”
MAR 3:31 Ma ghwake Yesu na alongo bhake bhakihika papamu na bhakiyima panji, bhakinlaghila mundu kankeme.
MAR 3:32 Lumati lwa bhandu lukibha palukintindila. Ndo, bhandu bhakinng'ombela, “Ma ghwako na alongo bhako bhabhegha panji, bhangukukema.”
MAR 3:33 Yesu kakiayanga, “Ma ghwangu na alongo bhangu ndo a ghani?”
MAR 3:34 Apa kakialolekeha bhala bhandu bhaantindilite, na kakighomba, “Abha ndo ma ghwangu na ndo alongo bhangu.
MAR 3:35 Mundu ywohele ywakatenda ghakaghapala Chapanga, aywo ndo nlongo ghwangu na nhacha ghwangu na ndo ma ghwangu.”
MAR 4:1 Yesu kakiyanda kangi kuhunda mumbwegha ya lihibha lya Galilaya. Lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukinkwemukila mbaka ywombe kakilamula kuhubhuka mubhwato ghuubheghite mulihibha na kakitama amo, lumati lwoha lukibhegha kuuyumu ya mbwegha ya lihibha.
MAR 4:2 Kakihunda mihalo miyoloho kwa ndambulo, mumahundo ghake kakilongela,
MAR 4:3 “Nnyihwani! Pakibhegha nkweta mbeyu yumo kakighenda kukweta mbeyu hyaki.
MAR 4:4 Pakabheghite mukukweta mbeyu, yingi yikiponeka munjila, hiyuni akihika kuihonyola.
MAR 4:5 Yingi yikiponeka mumaganga pa nga lutupi nnyoloho, yikimela kwa kulopokeha, kiyaha lutupi lukibha luchoko.
MAR 4:6 Luchubha paluyakiti yikiyuma mana ngigha hyake hikibha hupitaho hikinyaluka.
MAR 4:7 Yingi yikiponeka pamikongo yina mihomi, nayo yikikula na yikiyipepechula, nahyo hikipapa ng'obhe mapambika.
MAR 4:8 Yimoo yingi yikiponeka mulutupi lwa maha, yikimela, yikikula na yikipapa mapambika, yimu mbinda mabhoko ndatu, yimu mbinda mabhoko sita, na yimu mbinda mabhoko kumi.”
MAR 4:9 Mbole kakiaghombela, “Ywakabhegite na makutu kakayihwe.”
MAR 4:10 Yesu pakabheghite pa ghweka chake, amoo bhangi bhaannyihwanilite bhakinng'endela papamo na bhala ahundwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili, bhakinkonya kumanyika kya mandambulo ghala.
MAR 4:11 Yesu kakibhaghombela, “Mwenga mulekekehwa kumanya mbwepo ya ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga, peni bhala bha abheghite panji bhataghombelwa kilibhi kyohele kwa mandambulo.
MAR 4:12 Ngati, ‘Kulola bhaayolola hoto, peni kahone kuyibhona. Kuyihwa baayihwanila, peni kahobhe kumanya. Hela bhumbho bhangankilibhukiliti Chapanga, naywo nge kabhalekekehite.’ ”
MAR 4:13 Mbole Yesu kakibhakonya, “Muyimanya ng'obhe ndambulo ayi? Mutaghamanya bhuli mandambulo mamoo ghangi?
MAR 4:14 Nkweta mbeyu aywo kakikweta lilagho lya Chapanga.
MAR 4:15 Bhandu bhangi ndo handa mbeyu yiponikite munjila; Kamu paaliyihwa lilagho, Nchipila kahika na kulibhuha lilagho lila liikwetitwe mumyoyo yabhe.
MAR 4:16 Bhandu bhangi ndo handa mbeyu yila yiponikite mumaganga. Kamu paayihwa lilagho alyo bhangulipokela kwa uyelelo.
MAR 4:17 Peni lingubhayingila ng'obhe na kubhegha na ngigha mumyoyo yabhe. Bhahyatilagha behi ng'o, mbole ya mapungwo na luhuyu kya lilagho alyo, kamu bhangulileka lila lilagho.
MAR 4:18 Bhandu bhangi ndo handa hila mbeyu hiponikite mumikongo yina mihomi. Abha ndo nhwano ghwa bhala bhaaliyihwanila alyo lilagho,
MAR 4:19 Peni bhwaghalili ghwa nnima aghu, tama ya utopelo na tama ya hyoheli hila payihika na kuliyuka lila lilagho na kulitenda likotoke kupapa.
MAR 4:20 Peni amo bhangi abhegha handa mbeyu hikwetwite mulutupi lwa maha. Ndo bhandu bhayihwanilite lilagho alyo, na kulikingama na kupapa mapambika gha maha na bhangi mbinda ndatu bhangi mbinda mabhoko sita na bhangi mbinda mabhoko kumi.”
MAR 4:21 Kakiaghombela “Bhuli hino limbamba lyakwatwa na kugubikwa pahi mulijamanda ebu pahi palihungu lya ulili? Ng'obhe, lyakwatwa na kubhikwa kunane mwa kinyuta kyake.
MAR 4:22 Kiyaha kahobhe kilibhi kyoheli kila kinakuhihwa kya nga kuhwimulighwa, ebu nhalo ghwoheli ghwa lupwepo ghwangayeghwa pakindandabhanji.
MAR 4:23 Mundu yuna makutu gha kuyihwa, kayihwe.”
MAR 4:24 Kakiaghombela kangi, “Mmanye maha ghamuliyihwa, malaghilo ghala gha mumubhatosa bhangi, Chapanga kataatosa mwenga kangi na kupitingana.
MAR 4:25 Kiyaha yuna kilibhi katayonjokehwa kingi, naywo ywa nga kilibhi kangi, katapokwa hata kilibhi kichoko kyakabheghite nakyo.”
MAR 4:26 Yesu kakiaghombela “Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga ghulihwana na mundu ywakakwetite mbeyu munng'unda,
MAR 4:27 Mbole ya kukweta, pakabheghite mukughonja ebhu pakabheghite meho, mbeyu yikumela na kukula kya nga kumanya payikula.
MAR 4:28 Mana lutupi lunguyitenda mbeyu imele yibhe nmela; mbole lukibha lihonjo mbole mbunje mulihonjo.
MAR 4:29 Peni mbeyu pa iyelite, kamu, nkweta mbeyu aywo katayingila mung'unda na kikwakwa kya kubenela mabeno.”
MAR 4:30 Yesu kakighomba kangi, “Tughulandanihe na niki Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga? Ebu tughukambuhe na nhwanu ghani?
MAR 4:31 Gubhegha handa mbunje ya nhaladali, yene ndo njoko njoko munu kupitingana na mbeyu hyoha yinakukwetwa mulutupi.
MAR 4:32 Peni payikwetwa kala, yingumela na ghubhegha nkongo nkulu kupitingana na mikongo hyoha ya mumighunda. Matambalilo ghake ghangubhegha makulu na hiyuni anguchenga hiyumba hyabhe mumatambaliho agho.”
MAR 4:33 Kwa mandambulo ghangi mayoloho, Yesu kakighomba nabho lilagho lyake handa pabhahotolite kuyihwa na kumanya.
MAR 4:34 Kakighomba ngo'bhe kyanga ndambulo, Peni pakabheghite na ahundwa bhake kakiahotolela hoto ya hilibhi hyoha ya ndambulo yila.
MAR 4:35 Lisiku alyo makimuhi, Yesu kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Tuyomboke tughende kumwambo ya lihibha.”
MAR 4:36 Bhakiluleka lula lumati lwa bhandu, bhakibhuka naywo mumbwato ghwakabheghite. Kangi yikibhegha na mibhwato miyoloho yikintughila.
MAR 4:37 Kamu likibhegha liyegha likulu lukiyanda kupula, na liyuka lya machi likilututa bhwato ghula mbaka machi ghakiyanda kumema mubhwato.
MAR 4:38 Yesu kakibhegha kunyuma ya libhwato pakighonja munhaghamilo, ahundwa bhake bhakinnyumuha mung'ono na aking'ombela, “Nhunda, ghungubhona ng'obhe hamba tungupala kuhwegha?”
MAR 4:39 Yesu kakiyumuka na kakililakalila lila liyegha na kakilikwilikiha liyuka lya machi mulihibha “Ghuyime, ghutengeleke,” kamu kamu liyuka likiyima tuli na kukibha tuli maha muno.
MAR 4:40 Mbole Yesu kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Kiyaha niki mukuyoghopa? Nkali na uhyubhalilo ng'obhe?”
MAR 4:41 Nabho bhakiyoghopa muno, bhakikonyekeana, “Ayu ndo ghani? Mwene likusi na mayuka gha machi ghangunnyihwa!”
MAR 5:1 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakiyomboka kumwambo ya lihibha Galilaya na bhakihika kunnima ghwa Akaagelasi.
MAR 5:2 Yesu pakahulukite mubhwato kamu kakikongana na mundu yuna lindilu pakahuma kumandogholo.
MAR 5:3 Mundu ayo masiku ghoha kakitama akwo kumandogholo, kahone mundu ywakahotolite kunkanikiha ebhu kunmopa kwa nnyololo
MAR 5:4 Pipipi bhakimmopa nnyololo mumabhoko na kingongolo maghulu peni kakimetulanga akyo kingongolo mumaghulu ghake na kahone mundu yuna makakala gha kunkanikiha.
MAR 5:5 Pakilo na pamuhi kakibhegha kumandogholo na kuhitumbi pakakyota kyobho na kulikachanga kwa maganga.
MAR 5:6 Pakanmonite Yesu kya kutali, kakintughila na kakinchutamila mayughwa pakibhungi kyake.
MAR 5:7 Kakikyota kyobho kwa makakala na pakighomba, “Ghuna niki na nenga, Yesu, Mwana ghwa Chapanga abheghite kunani muno? Nungukuyupa kwa Lihina lya Chapanga ghukotoke kumbamanda.”
MAR 5:8 Kakilongela naha kiyaha Yesu kakibha pakinng'ombela “Ghumbhuke ayo mundu ghwenga lindilu!”
MAR 5:9 Yesu kakinkonya “Lihina lyako ghani?” Mwene kakinnyanga “Lihina lyangu machonda, kiyaha tubhegha ayoloho”
MAR 5:10 Kakinnyupa muno Yesu kakotoke kubhatagha kutali na nnima ghula.
MAR 5:11 Ugheghela na pala pauhelelo ghwa kitumbi bhakibhegha maghulubhe ayoloho bhakihakilwa.
MAR 5:12 Ghala mandilu bhakinnyupa paaghomba, “Ghutuyeghe kwa bhala maghulubhe, ghutulekekehe tubhayingile.”
MAR 5:13 Yesu kakibhalekekeha. Ndo ghala mandilu ghakinbhuka yula mundu na kubhayingila bhala maghulubhe. Lula lumati lukibhegha na maghulubhe elufu ibhili, ndo lukihelela kungende na bhakidibala mu lihibha.
MAR 5:14 Bhala bhandu bhaabheghite mukuhakila bhala maghulubhe, bhakitughila kukitami na kuhijiji hyoha kulubhulila nnando agho. Bhandu bhakighenda kulola ghaghabwitukilite.
MAR 5:15 Bhakihika kwa Yesu na bhakinmona yula mundu ywakabheghite na lumati lwa mandilu, kakihwala lipinda, na luhala lwake lukimmuyila, bhandu bhoha kiyoghopa.
MAR 5:16 Bhala bha bhakabhonite nlando aghwo bhakiaghombela na bhandu amo bhangi, ghaabwitukilite kwa yula mundu ywakabheghite na mandilu na ghaghabwitukilite kwa lula lumati lwa maghulubhe.
MAR 5:17 Hinu, bhandu bhakiyanda kunyupa Yesu kabhuke munnima ghwabhe.
MAR 5:18 Yesu pakabheghite mukuyingila mubhwato, yula mundu ywakabheghite na mandilu kakinnyupa Yesu kaghende papamu naywo.
MAR 5:19 Yesu kakinkanikiha, ndo kakinng'ombela “Ghughende ukaya kwa aghanja bhako ghukaaghombele milandu mikulu yakakutendilite Bambo, na pakakubhonelite luhungu.”
MAR 5:20 Yula mundu kakighenda na kakiyanda kulandamiha ako ku Dekapoli, mana yake nnima ghuna hitami mbinda mabhoko yimo, ghala ghakatendelitwe na Yesu, na bhandu bhoha bhakikangacha.
MAR 5:21 Yesu pakayombokite kangi kwa bhwato kughenda kumwambo ya lihibha Galilaya. Bhandu ayoloho akikwemukala na mwene kakibhegha umbwegha ya lihibha.
MAR 5:22 Ndo kilongohi yumo ywa kitutubhi kyakukonganila Akaayahudi ywakakemitwe Jailu, kakinhikila pala, na pakanmonite Yesu kakichutamila mayughwa pakibhungi kyake,
MAR 5:23 kannpembeleha pakalongela, “Nhinja ghwangu nndokwa kangutamwa tepatepa paulili, Ningughuyupa ghuhike na ghunnyabhike kibhoko kyako ngati kalame kabhe bha maha.”
MAR 5:24 Ndo Yesu kakighenda papamu naywo, bhandu ayoloho bhakinntughila na akinnyuka mbande hyoha.
MAR 5:25 Apwo pakibhegha ndala yumu yuna liholobhela mungungwa mbinda libhoko yimo na hibhili.
MAR 5:26 Ndala aywo kakipungwa muno kwa kughenda kwa aghanga ayoloho. Na kakiyomola hilibhi hyoha hyakabheghite naywo, peni mbole ya kulama ndo utamwa ghukintopela muno.
MAR 5:27 Naywo kakibhegha pakayihwite mihalo ya Yesu na kakinhikila Yesu kya kuhyetu ya lumati lwa bhandu na kakilibyala lipinda lyake,
MAR 5:28 kiyaha kakighomba mumwoyo ghwake, “Handa nda hotola kulibyala lipinda lyake, kulyaghila ndalama.”
MAR 5:29 Kamu, liholobhela lyake likiketuka, naywo kakighubhona mmili ghwake ghulama.
MAR 5:30 Kamu, Yesu kakimanya kukita makakala ghake ghakinlamiha mundu. Kakilupilukila lula lumati na kakilukonyekeha, “Ndo ghani aywo ywakabyalite lipinda lyangu?”
MAR 5:31 Ahundwa bhake bhakinnyanga, “Ghumwene ghungubhona lumati lwa bhandu palighuyuka, hinu yibhegha bhuli ghungukonyekeha, ndo ghani aywo ywakakuyabyalite?”
MAR 5:32 Peni Yesu kakilolekeha mbande hyoha ngati kammone aywo ywakanbyalite.
MAR 5:33 Yula nndala kakimanya kila kinbwitukllite kakinyingilwa lyogha, kakiloghoya na kakighwila mumaghulu ghake na kakinlubhulila hyoha hyakanbwitukilite.
MAR 5:34 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Nhinja, uhyubhalilo ghwako ghukulopoha. Ghughende kwa uhihimilo, na ghulame kulukulu utamwa ghwako.”
MAR 5:35 Pakabheghite mukughomba, Bhandu bhakihika kuhuma kulubhagha lwa yula kilongohi ghwa kitutubhi kya kukonganika Akaayahudi bhakinng'ombela, “Nhinja ghwako kahwegha kala, kiyaha niki kunng'aha nhunda?”
MAR 5:36 Pakayihwite agho Yesu kakinng'ombela aywo nkulu ghwa kitutubhi kya kukonganikila Akaayahudi, “Ghukotoke kuyoghopa ghwenga ghuhyubhalile tu”
MAR 5:37 Kakinlekekeha ng'obhe mundu yumooyungi ywa kulongohana naywo maha nga Petili na Yakobu na Yohana nnongo ghwake Yakobu.
MAR 5:38 Pakahikite mulubhagha lwa yula kilongohi ghwa kitutubhi kya kukonganila Akaayahudi, Yesu kakibhona bhulwa, bhandu kwa bhakilila ngukuliko na kwa lilobhe likulu.
MAR 5:39 Pakayingilite munyumba kati, kakiaghombela, “Kiyaha niki mungutenda bhulwa na kulila? Nhinja kahwegha ng'obhe, ngati kaghonja hela.”
MAR 5:40 Bhala bhandu bhakinheka kwa uyuyuho. Peni mwene kakiabhuha bhoa panje, kakibhatola tate na ma ghwa yula nhinja papamu na bhala ahundwa bhake andatu. Kakiyingila munyumbakati mbaka pala pakabheghite yula nhinja
MAR 5:41 Kakinkamula kibhoko yula nhinja na kaking'ombela, “Talita komu!” Mana hyaki “Nhinja nungughughombela yumuka.”
MAR 5:42 Kamu yula nhinja kakiyima, na kakiyanda kutyanga, aywo nhinja kakibhegha na ngungwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na hibhili. Bhandu paaghabhonite agha bhakikangacha muno
MAR 5:43 Yesu kakialaghila kwa lilakali bhakotoke kung'ombela mundu nhalo ghula, na kakiaghombela bhanpeghe yula nhinja hilyo.
MAR 6:1 Yesu kakibhuka akwo na kakighenda kukitami kyabhe, na ahundwa bhake bhakintughila.
MAR 6:2 Palihikite lisiku lya kupughwa, kakiyanda kuhunda mu kitutubhi kya kukonganila Akaayahudi, na bhandu ayoloho paayihwite bhakikangacha. Bhakikonya, “Mundu ayu kayihopola kwoki mihalu ayi hyoha? Nnole ndo mahala gha bhuli ghakabheghite nagho? Nnole ndendelo ya mihabho ghakayitenda.
MAR 6:3 Aywo ndo yula nhongola hilibhi hya mikongo ng'obhe? Mwana ghwa Malia? Alongo bhake ndo Yakobu na Yosefu, Yuda na Simoni ng'obhe? Ahacha bhake ndo abha ng'obhe tubhegha nabho papamu?” Nabho bhakiyaghabhihwa munu kwa kya ywombe bhakinhyula
MAR 6:4 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mbuyi ghwa Chapanga kanguhokamilwa kwoha, ngati ng'obhe mukitami kyake na mu aghanja bhake na alongo bhake.”
MAR 6:5 Ndo kakitenda ng'obhe nhabho ghwoheli ghula, peni kakiayabhikila mabhoko atamwa bha mandina na kakialamiha.
MAR 6:6 Na Yesu kakikangacha Muno kiyaha bhakihyubhalila ng'obhe? Mbole Yesu kakihityangila hijiji hya ugheghela pakiahunda bhandu.
MAR 6:7 Kakiakema bhala ahundwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili, na kakialaghiha abhili abhili na kakiapegha makakala gha kughabhuha mandilu.
MAR 6:8 Kakialaghiha pakighomba, “Nkotoke kutola kyoheli mumwanja maha ntole lukongocho weka chake. Nkotoke kutola lingate, ebu nhako ghwa mapinda, ebhu ngalabha.
MAR 6:9 Nhwale tabhalanda, peni nkotoke kuhwala lipinda lingi.”
MAR 6:10 Kangi kakiaghombela, “Kitutubhi kyoheli kila kya abhakingama ntame apwo nkotoke kubhuka bhuka, mbaka lisiku lila lya kubhuka mukitami akyo.
MAR 6:11 Handa poheli pala paabhalema kubhakingama ebu kubhayihwa, npumunde lihu mumaghulu ghenu ngati yibhe uyimiho kwa bhombe.”
MAR 6:12 Ndo bhakibhuka na kughenda kulandamiha bhandu ngati bhalipetule na kuleka ulemwa ghwabhe.
MAR 6:13 Bhakiabhinga bhinga mandilu mayoloho, na bhakiatyeka mahuta gha nzeituni atamwa ayoloho na kualamiha.
MAR 6:14 Hinu mutwa Herode kakiyihwa mihalu ayi, kiyaha mihalu ya Yesu yikimanyikwa poheli. Bhandu bhangi bhakighomba, “Yohana yunakubatisa kakihyuka kuhuma kumambi ndo mana makakala ghake ghakutenda mihabho mu mwene!”
MAR 6:15 Bhandu bhangi bhakighomba, “Mundu ayu ndo! Eliya” na amoo bhandu bhakighomba, “Mundu ayu ndo mbuyi, handa mmoo yumo ghwa mambuye bha makachu.”
MAR 6:16 Peni Helode pakayihitwe nhalu aghu, kakighomba, “Aywo ndo Yohana yunakubatisa, yununndumulite mutwe, hinu kahyuka!”
MAR 6:17 Kiyaha Helode kakikwilikiha Yohana yunakubatisa kakamulwe na kabhikwe mukibhopo. Kakitenda naha kiyaha kakintola Helodia nndala ghwa Filipo nnongo ghwake mwene Helode.
MAR 6:18 Yohana kakinng'ombela Helode, “Yinoghela ng'obhe kwa ghwenga kuntola nndala ghwa nnongo ghwako.”
MAR 6:19 Ndo Helodia kakibha na kihyongololo na Yohana kakipala kunkoma. Peni kakihotola ng'obhe.
MAR 6:20 Kiyaha Helode kakinnyoghopa Yohana kakimanya kukita ndi mundu ghwa maha na nng'anyimo, kakinpingikiha. Herode kakinoghelwa kunnyihwanila Yohana peni kakihyononeka muno pakayomolite kunnyihwa.
MAR 6:21 Lisiku limu Helodia kakipata ling'ebu muchekwa hwachilo ya lisiku lya kubhelekwa kwa Herode. Helode kakialalika aghohi bha libalasa lyake, alongohi ghwa machonda ghwa mikoha, na alongohi ghwa ako ku Galilaya.
MAR 6:22 Ndo nhinja ghwake Helodia kakiyingila kukina, na Helode kakiyelelwa papamu na bhandu bha abheghite mu hilyo. Mutwa Helode kaking'ombela yuna nhinja, “Ghunyupe kyoheli kighukipala na nenga ndaghupegha.”
MAR 6:23 Kangi kakinlapila yula nnhinja “Ndaghupegha lyoheli lila lyakapala kuyupa, hata ngabhee lihinda lya ghubhutwa ghwangu.”
MAR 6:24 Yula nhinja kakighenda panji kunkonya ma ghwake, “Nyupe niki?” Maghwake kakinyanga, “Ghuyupe mutwe ghwa Yohana Yunakubatisa.”
MAR 6:25 Kamu yula nhinja kakibhuya kanongola kaking'ombela mutwa, “Mbala ghumbeghe hinu apa mutwe ghwa Yohana Yunakubatisa mukipalo.”
MAR 6:26 Mutwa kakihyononeka muno, peni kiyaha kakilapila muulongolo ghwa ahenja kakilepelwa kunkanila.
MAR 6:27 Kamu mutwa kakinlaghila yumoo ywa machonda na kakinkwilikiha kakangheghele mutwe ghwa Yohana. Kakighenda kukibhopo na kakinndumula mutwe ghwa Yohana Yunakubatisa.
MAR 6:28 Mbole yula lichonda kakiyegha mutwe mukipalo na kakinpegha yula nhinja, na yula nhinja kakinpegha ma ghwake.
MAR 6:29 Ahundwa bha Yohana paayihwite nhalo ghula, bhakighenda kughutola ntumba ghwake, bhakinkulila.
MAR 6:30 Bhala andumitumi bha Yesu bhakibhuya na bhakinng'ombela mihalu hyoha yaatendite na kuhunda.
MAR 6:31 Pakibhegha bhandu ayoloho muno bhaghenditeghe na kubhuka kwa Yesu mbaka Yesu na andumitumi bhake mbaka bhakilepelwa kulyegha, kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Tughende pa nga bhandu, ngati makapughwe”
MAR 6:32 Ndo bhakibhuka ghweka chabhe mu mbhwato bhakighenda kutama pa nga bhandu.
MAR 6:33 Peni bhandu ayoloho bhakiabhona paaghenda, na bhakipamanya paaghendite, nabho bhakighenda kwa maghulu kuhuma mu kila hitami, nabho bhakilongola kuhika.
MAR 6:34 Yesu pakahikite ku nnima nnyumu na kulubhona lula lumati lwa bhandu, kakiabhonela luhungu kiyaha bhakibhegha handa mene bha nga nhakila. Hino kakiyanda kubhahunda mihalo miyoloho.
MAR 6:35 Makimuhi paghaheleliti, ahundwa bhake bhakinng'endela na bhakinng'ombela, “Apa patutamite ndo pakibhala na hinu lubhindu lunguyanda kuyingila.
MAR 6:36 Hino ghualaghe bhandu aghende mumighunda na mu hijiji hya kubhwegha bhakahemele hilyo.”
MAR 6:37 Peni Yesu kakiayanga “Mubhapeghe mwenga hilyo.” Bhakinnkonya, “Nhunda ghungubhona ng'obhe kukita yingutupala tubheghe na ngalabha nyoloho ndo twahotola kubhahemelela bhandu abha hilyo?”
MAR 6:38 Yesu kakiakonyekeha, “Ng'ende mukalolekehe yibhegha mangate milingi?” Bhakighenda na paabhuyite bhakinng'ombela, “Yibhegha mangate nhano na homba abhili.”
MAR 6:39 Ndo Yesu kakiakwilikiha bhaatamihe bhandu mu himati himati mumanyahi mabhihi.
MAR 6:40 Nabho bhakitama muhimati hya bhandu mbinda mabhoko kumi na bhangi mbinda mabhoko nhano.
MAR 6:41 Mbole Yesu kakiyitola yila mangate nhano na bhala homba abhili kakilolekeha kuluhingu, kakinnumba Chapanga, kakiyimetula yila mangate, na kakiapegha ahundwa bhake bhabhapeghe bhandu bhoha. Hila hila bhakiapegha bhandu bhoha bhala homba abhili.
MAR 6:42 Bhandu bhoha bhakilyegha na bhakiyukuta.
MAR 6:43 Ahundwa bhake bhakihiyola mahighalo gha hipalamande hya mangate na homba, na bhakimemekeha hikapu mbinda mabhoko yimo na hibhili.
MAR 6:44 Mbalango ya bhandu alumi bha alyeghite bhakibhegha elfu nhano.
MAR 6:45 Kamu, Yesu kakiakwilikia ahundwa bhake ayingile mu mbhwato bhalongole kughenda ku Betisaida kumwambo ya lihibha, mwene pakabheghite mukualagha lumati lula lwa bhandu.
MAR 6:46 Mbole ya kualagha bhandu, mwene kakighenda kukitumbi kunntundamila Chapanga.
MAR 6:47 Payihikite makimuhi ghula bhwato ghukibhegha pakati ya lihibha, na Yesu kakibhegha ghweka chake munnima nnyumu.
MAR 6:48 Kakiabhona ahundwa bhake mu bhwato akighayaghaya pa bhakibhyatula kwa makakala, kiyaha likibhegha liyegha likiapingika. Ugheghela na kuchegha Yesu kakiaghendela ahundwa bhake pakityanga unani mwa machi. Ywombe hamba kakapaliteghe kubhayomboka.
MAR 6:49 Peni paanmonite pakityanga unani mwa machi bhakihwacha kakibha lihoka, bhakitula kyobho.
MAR 6:50 Kiyaha bhoha paanmonite bhakiyoghopa muno. Mbole Yesu kakighomba nabho, “Nkotoke kuyoghopa! Ndo nenga!”
MAR 6:51 Kakihubhuka mubhwato ghwa abheghite na lila liyegha likiyima! Bhala ahundwa bhakikangacha muno.
MAR 6:52 Kiyaha bhakimanya ng'obhe nhalo ghwa yila mangate abhalyeghitehe bhandu elfu n'hano, ndo mahala ghabhe ghakighubhanikwa.
MAR 6:53 Paayombokiti lihibha, bhakihika nnima ghwa Genesaleti, bhakipaghika bhwato ghwabhe
MAR 6:54 Pabhahulukite kuhuma mu bhwato ghula, bhandu bhakinmanya Yesu,
MAR 6:55 Bhakighenda mu nnima ghwoha kanongola nongola, bhakiayegha atamwa mumikahe yabhe na bhakiayegha kwoheli paayihwite kukita Yesu kakibhegha.
MAR 6:56 Na kwoheli kula pakaghendite Yesu, yibhe muhijiji na muhitami ebu mumighunda bhandu bhakiabhika atamwa bhabhe pa hindangabhanji na bhakinpembeleha kabhategheke bhabyale lipinda lyake na bhoha bhaanbyalite lipinda lyake bhakilama.
MAR 7:1 Akaafalisayo na amoo bha Ahunda bha malaghilo bhaahumite ku Yelusalemu bhakikwemukila kuulongolo ghwa Yesu.
MAR 7:2 Bhakiabhona amoo bha ahundwa bha Yesu bhakilyegha hilyo kwa mabhoko ghabhe kya nga kukuha handa mughapalite malaghilo gha Akaayahudi.
MAR 7:3 Akaafalisayo na Akaayahudi bhoha kahone kulyegha hilyo mbaka akuhe mabhoko ghabhe mbaka ku kingogho kiyaha angukamulila hitohe hya aghohi bhabhe.
MAR 7:4 Paahuma ku hindandabhanji kahone kulyegha mbaka akuhe. Kangi yibhegha hitohe hingi hiyoloho hya ahalite handa bhula kughulula ndebho, hibhigha na hilibhi hya mahabha.
MAR 7:5 Hino bhala ahunda bha malaghilo na Akaafalisayu bhakinkonya Yesu, “Yibha bhuli ahundwa bhako bhangutughila ng'obhe mihumu ya aghohi bhetu mbole yake angulyegha kwa mabhoko ghana kinyakali?”
MAR 7:6 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mbuye Isaya kakilondola hoto ya kya mwenga, mwenga maafyangu, handa pakatyekite, Chapanga kangulongela, ‘Bhandu abha bhangunyikitila kwa milomo yabhe, peni miyoyo yabhe yibhegha kutali na nenga.
MAR 7:7 Bhangundundamila yaghi, paakihunda hitohe hya anabhandu paakighomba agho ndo malaghilo gha Chapanga.’
MAR 7:8 Mwenga muyileka malaghilo gha Chapanga na kuyikamula mihumu ya anabhandu.”
MAR 7:9 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mwenga mmegha na njenjelo ya kuyilema ngwilikiho ya Chapanga ngati muyikamule mihumu yenu!
MAR 7:10 Kwa nhwano, Musa kakighomba, ‘Ghubhayikitile tate na ma ghwako’ na ‘ywoheli ywakanligha tate ghwake ebu ma ghwake kakomwe’
MAR 7:11 Peni mwenga mungughomba, mundu ywakanng'ombiliti tate ghwake ebu ma ghwake kukita, ‘Kila kya kukutanga ghwenga ndo Kolibani’ kukita kibhibhegha lilumbo lya kya Chapanga,
MAR 7:12 Mbole ya agha kangukwilika ng'obhe kuntanga tate ebu ma ghwake.
MAR 7:13 Kwa njenjelo ayi mwenga munguyuyuha lilagho lya Chapanga kwa mihumu yenu yimulibhikilite. Mwenga mukutenda mihalu miyoloho yakya njenjelo ayo.”
MAR 7:14 Yesu kakilukema kangi lula lumati lwa bhandu na kakiaghombela, “Nnyihwanile, bhoha na mmanye nlando aghu.
MAR 7:15 Kahone kilibhi kina kunyingiha mundu kakatende ulemwa kwa kya Chapanga, peni kina kummuka ndo kina kunbhika mundu kakatende ulemwa kwa kya Chapanga.
MAR 7:16 Handa mundu ywoheli yuna makutu gha kuyihwa, na kayihwe.”
MAR 7:17 Pakalulekiti lula lumati lwa bhandu na kuyingila munyumba kati, ahundwa bhake bhakinkonya mana ya ndambulo yila.
MAR 7:18 Kakiayanga, “Na mwenga mmanya ng'obhe? Mmanya ng'obhe kukita kilibhi kinakunnnyingila kahone kunbhika mundu kakatende ulemwa kwa kya Chapanga?
MAR 7:19 Kiyaha mundu pakalyegha kilibhi kingunnyingila ng'obhe mu mwoyo maha mulutumbo, mbole kingummuka panji ya mmili bhake.” Kya kulongela naha Yesu kakihiteghekeha hilyo hyoha kukita hya maha kwa kulyeghwa.
MAR 7:20 Kakighendelela kughomba, “Kila kinakummuka mundu ndo kingunbhika kabhe na ulemwa kwa Chapanga.
MAR 7:21 Kiyaha kuhuma mumwoyo ghwa mundu kungubhuka, hwachilo ya mahakataho na utyahe na bhwihi na kukoma na
MAR 7:22 lumatamata na tama ya uhakata na ukiluko na uhwangi na tama ya utopelo na malili na maligho na lukilu na ubhughabhugha.
MAR 7:23 Mihalu ayi hyoha yinguhuma mu mwoyo ghwa mundu naywo na ndo yina kunbhika mundu kabhe nhokela.”
MAR 7:24 Ndo Yesu kakibhuka akwo na kakighenda ku nnima ghubheghite ugheghela na Tilo. Kakiyingila mu kitutubhi kimo, na mwene kakipala ng'obhe bhandu amanye kukita kabhegha amo. Peni kakihotola ng'obhe kulihiha.
MAR 7:25 Peni nndala yumo ywakabheghite na nhinja nndokwa naywo kakibhegha na mandilu kakiyihwa mihalu ya Yesu na kakinhikila na kakichutamila mayughwa muulongolo ghwa Yesu.
MAR 7:26 Hinu aywo nndala kakibhegha ng'obhe Nnyahudi, nkolannima ghwa ku Foinike ya akwo Silia. Kakinnyupa Yesu kakaghabhuhe mandilu kwa nhinja ghwake.
MAR 7:27 Yesu kaking'ombela, “Ghubhaleke bhana ayukute huti, yibhegha maha ng'obhe kutola hilyo ya bhana na kuataghila kabhwa.”
MAR 7:28 Peni yula nndala kakinnyanga, “Bambo, na akabhwa abheghite pahi pakindangabhala alyeghagha mahighalo gha hilyo hya bhana.”
MAR 7:29 Ndo Yesu kakinnyanga, “Kiyaha ya kya liyango alyo, ghughende kulubhagha lwako na yula lindilu kammuka kala nhinja ghwako.”
MAR 7:30 Kakibhuya kulubhagha lwake na kakinmona nhinja ghwake kakighonja paulili, na lila lindilu likimmuka kala.
MAR 7:31 Mbole Yesu kakibhuka ako ugheghela na Tilo, kakipitila Sidoni mbaka Dekapoli nnima ghuna hitami mbinda mabhoko yimo mbaka kakihika kulihibha Galilaya.
MAR 7:32 Akwo bhandu bhakinnyeghela mundu yumu ywa nga kuyihwa na kana kimama, bhakinnyupa kakannyabhikile kibhoko kyake ngati kakannlamihe.
MAR 7:33 Mbole Yesu kakinnyegha yula ywa nga kuyihwa kutali na bhandu, Yesu kakinnyingiha hikonji hyake mu makutu ghake, kakihuna mata muhikonji hyaki na kakilubyala lulimi lwa yula mundu.
MAR 7:34 Mbole kakilolekeha kunani kuluhingo kakitweta kwa makakala kakinng'ombela, “Efata!” Mana yake “Hughuka.”
MAR 7:35 Kamu, makutu ghake ghakihughuka na lulimi lwake lukilekekehwa kakiyanda kulongela maha.
MAR 7:36 Yesu kakibhakwilikiha bhakotoo kunnongela mundu ywohele mihalo aywo. Peni paabhakanikihite ndo bhakiyonjokeha kulandamiha munu mihalu aywo.
MAR 7:37 Bhandu bhoha bhakikangacha munu, bhakilongela “Katenda mihalo hyoha yinakunoghela munu, kabhatangatila bha nga kuyihwa, kuyihwa, na bhana kimama bhalongele.”
MAR 8:1 Mumasiku agho, lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukikwemuka kangi, na bhakibhegha ng'obhe na hilyo. Hino Yesu kakiakema ahundwa bhake na kakiaghombela,
MAR 8:2 “Nungulubhonela luhungu lumati alu lwa bhandu, kiyaha hino bhabhegha na nenga kwa masiku mandatu na kibhahone kya kulyegha.
MAR 8:3 Handa panialagha aghende ukaya kwabhe kya nga kulyegha, bha hima kwa njala munjila, mana amoo bhangi ahumila kutali.”
MAR 8:4 Ahundwa bhake bhakinkonya, “Apa pakibhala twahumbula kwoki mangati gha kukwila kulyegha lumati lwoha alu?”
MAR 8:5 Yesu kakiakonya, “Mubha na mangate milingi?” Ahundwa bhake akinnyanga, “Tubhegha na mangate saba.”
MAR 8:6 Kakiakwilikiha bhandu bhoha atami pahi. Ndo kakiyitola yila mangate saba, kakinnumba Chapanga kakiyimetulanga yila mangate, kakiapegha ahundwa bhake abhaghabhanikihe bhandu, nabho bhakiaghabhanikiha bhandu.
MAR 8:7 Hilahila bhombe bhakibhegha na hihomba hya mandina, Yesu kakinnumba Chapanga kwa kya bhala homba na kakiakwilikiha ahundwa bhake abhapeghe bhandu ubwabhu abhu.
MAR 8:8 Bhandu bhala bhakilyegha na kuyukuta na mbole yake ahundwa bhakikungana hipalamande hihighalite na bhakimemekeha hikapu nhano na ibhili.
MAR 8:9 Bhandu bha alyeghite akibhegha elfu ncheche. Ndo Yesu kakialagha.
MAR 8:10 Kamu kakihubhuka mubhwato papamo na ahundwa bhake na kakighenda ku kitami kya Dalumanuta.
MAR 8:11 Amoo bha Akaafalisayo bhakinhikila Yesu, na bhakiyanda kughombana naywo kwa kunng'eha na bhakinpala katende nhabho ghwa kunmanyiha kwa bhene kukita makakala ghake ghakuhuma kwa Chapanga.
MAR 8:12 Peni Yesu kakikukulika mumwoyo na kakiaghombela, “Kiyaha niki kibheleko aki kingupala nhabho? Kulyaghila, nungubhaghombela, kya kamuhwa ng'obhe nhabho ghwoheli.”
MAR 8:13 Mbole kakibhaleka, kakihubhuka ku bhwato, na kakiyomboka kumwambo yingi ya lihibha.
MAR 8:14 Ahundwa bhake bhakilibhalila kuyegha mangate ya kukwila, na bhakibhegha na lingate limo mubhwato.
MAR 8:15 Yesu kakiatakilila, “Nhingukihe, na linjakamu lya Akaafalisayo na linjakamu lya Helode.”
MAR 8:16 Bhakiyanda kughombana bhene kwa bhene, bhakighomba, “Kangulongela naha kiyaha tuyegha ng'obhe mangate.”
MAR 8:17 Yesu kakighamanya maghombano ghabhe, na kakiakonya, “Kiyaha niki mungughombana nhalo ghwa nga kuyegha mangate? Nkali kundambula ebu kumanya ng'obhe? Yibha bhuli mioyo yenu yibha na unonopo naha?
MAR 8:18 Bhuli mmegha na meho peni mungulepelwa kubhona! Bhuli mmegha na makutu peni mungulepelwa kuyihwa? Bhuli nde mungundambula ng'obhe?
MAR 8:19 Pala pametulite mangate nhano na kubhalyegheha bhandu Elfu nhano, mukikungana mahighalo gha hikapu hilingi?” Ahundwa akinnyanga, “Mbinda mabhoko yimo na hibhili.”
MAR 8:20 “Na pametulite yila mangate nhano na ibhili na kualyegheha bhandu elfu ncheche, mukikungana mahighalo gha mangate, hikapu hilingi himemekihitwe?” Akinnyanga “Nhano na ibhili.”
MAR 8:21 Ndo kakiakonya “Nde nkali kumanya?”
MAR 8:22 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakihika ku Betisaida, amoo bhandu bhakinnyegha mundu ywa nga kubhona, bhakinnyupa kakan'yabhike.
MAR 8:23 Yesu kakinkamula kibhoko ywa nga kubhona aywo, kakinnyegha panji ya kijiji. Kakinhunila mata mu meho ghake yula ywa nga kubhona na kunmikila mabhoko mu meho, kakinkonya “Ghungubhona kilibhi kyoheli?”
MAR 8:24 Yula ywa nga kubhona kakilola, kakilongela, “Ningubhona bhandu angubhonekana handa mikongo yinakutyanga.”
MAR 8:25 Yesu kakinmikila kangi mabhoko ghake mumeho yula ghwa nga kulola. Naywo kakihulutula meho, kubhona kwake hinu kukimmuyila, kakilola hilibhi hyoha telatela.
MAR 8:26 Yesu kakinlagha kabhuye ukaya kwake na kakinkwilikiha, “Ghukotoo kuyingila kukijiji.”
MAR 8:27 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakibhuka na kughenda nng'eghela mwa hijiji hya Kaisaliya Filipi. Paabheghite munjila, Yesu kakiakonya, “Bhandu angulongela nenga ndo ghani?”
MAR 8:28 Bhakinnyanga, “Amoo bhandu angulongela ghwenga ndo Yohana yunakubatisa, bhangi angulongela ghwenga ndo Eliya na bhangi angulongela ghwenga ndo yumoo yumo ywa mambuye ghwa Chapanga.”
MAR 8:29 Yesu kakiakonya, “Mwenga mungulongela nenga ndo ghani?” Petili kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ndo Kilisto ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga.”
MAR 8:30 Mbole Yesu kakiakanikiha, “Akotoo kunlongelela mundu ywohele mihalo ya nenga.”
MAR 8:31 Hino Yesu kakiyanda kuhunda ahundwa bhake, “Mwana ghwa Mundu katambamandwa na katalemwa na aghohi, na mandundame akulu na ahunda bha malaghilo. Kukita katakomwa, na mbole ya masiku mandatu katahyuka.”
MAR 8:32 Yesu kakilongela habhu kya nga uhiho. Ndo Petili kakinkemela pambwegha na kakiyanda kunlakalila.
MAR 8:33 Peni Yesu kakikilibhuka na kualolekeha ahundwa bhake, kakinlakalila Petili na kakilongela. “Ghubhuke kughulongolo ghwangu Nchipila! Ghwenga ghwangahwacha gha Chapanga ngati gha anabhandu.”
MAR 8:34 Mbole kakilukema lula lumati lwa bhandu na ahundwa bhake, kakiaghombela, “Mundu ywohele ywakapala kundughila, mbaka kalileme mwene, kalutole lupingika lwake, kandughile nenga.
MAR 8:35 Mana mundu ywohele ywakapala kuulopoha ubhumii ghwake katauhobheha, peni mundu ywaka uhobheha ubhumi ghwake kwa kya nenga na kwa kya Mihalo ya Maha kataulopoha.
MAR 8:36 Mundu katamota niki handa kataghukamula nnima ghwoha na kuuhobheha ubhumi ghwake? Kabhone kumota kyoheli.
MAR 8:37 Ebu mundu katabhika kilibhi ghani kihegheke ubhumi ghwake?
MAR 8:38 Mundu ywoheli ywakanmonela honi nenga na mahundo ghangu mukibheleko kya utyahe na kya uhokelo. Mwana ghwa Mundu katammonela honi pakalonda kubhuya muukulu ghwa Tate ghwake papamu na Andumitumi ghwa kuluhingu ghwa Chapanga.”
MAR 9:1 Yesu kakighendelela kubhaghombela, “Kulyaghila nungubhaghombela, amoo bhandu bhaayimite apa bhatahwegha ng'obhe mbaka paalonda kughubhona Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga paghuhika kwa makakala.”
MAR 9:2 Mbole ya nhano na yimo, Yesu kakighenda papamu na Petili na Yakobu na Yohana mbaka kukitumbi kitandamaho kwa nga bhandu, kakighalambuka kibhungi mu ulongolo ghwabhe.
MAR 9:3 Mapinda ghake ghaking'anyima ng'anyi, kahone mundu ywoheli ywa kahotola kung'anyihya handa bhula, pannima apa,
MAR 9:4 bhakibwitukila Eliya na Musa, bhakibha pa ayobhela na Yesu
MAR 9:5 Petili kakinng'ombela Yesu. “Nhunda, inoghela twenga tutame apa, tuchenge higubi hindatu, kimo kya ghwenga na kimo kingi kya Musa na kingi kangi kya Eliya.”
MAR 9:6 Petili na ayake bhakimanya ng'obhe kya kughomba kiyaha bhakiyoghopa muno.
MAR 9:7 Ndo likibwitukila lihundi likibhagubika na lilobhe likiyihwanika kuhuma mu lila lihundi palighomba, “Ayu ndo Mwana ghwangu yununpala munnyihwanile ywombe.”
MAR 9:8 Kamu paalyungite mehu kunu na kunu bhakimmona ng'obhe mundu ywoheli papamu naywo; ngati nga Yesu ghweka chake.
MAR 9:9 Paabheghite mukuhelela kuhuma kukitumbi, Yesu kakiakwilikiha, “Nkotoo kunng'ombela mundu ywohele mihalu muyibhonite mbaka Mwana ghwa Mundu pakalonda kuhyuka.”
MAR 9:10 Bhakilikamula lilaghilo alyo na bhakighombana, “Akwo kuhyuka mana yake ndo niki?”
MAR 9:11 Bhakinkonya, “Bhuli ahunda bha malaghilo angulongela, Eliya kahiki huti?”
MAR 9:12 Yesu kakiayanga “Tela, Eliya katalongola huti kutengeleha mihalu hyoha. Bhuli hino yityekwa kukita Mwana ghwa Mundu inogha kambamandike muno na kuyuyuhwa?
MAR 9:13 Peni nungunng'ombela, Eliya kahika kala nabho antendela bhaghapalite handa muyityekitwe ya kya ywombe.”
MAR 9:14 Pabhaahikiliti bhala ahundwa bhangi, bhakiabhona bhatindilwa na lumati lukulu lwa bhandu. Na amoo ahunda bha malaghilo bhakighombana na bhombe.
MAR 9:15 Kamu bhandu bhala paammonite Yesu bhakikangacha munu, bhakintughila annamuhe
MAR 9:16 Yesu kakiakonya ahundwa bhake, “Mungughombana nabho niki?”
MAR 9:17 Mundu yumo ywa mulumati kakinnyanga, “Nhunda nunnyegha kwa ghwenga mwana ghwangu kana lindilo lyakantendite kabhe ywa nga kulongela.
MAR 9:18 Pipipi aywo lindilo pakankwehagha mwana ghwangu, kannghwihagha pahi na kuntenda kahumwe na lihuluhulu munnomo na kuhyagha meno, mbole mmili ghwake ghungukakama. Nikibhayupa ahundwa bhako bhammuhe aywo lindilu peni bhakilepelwa.”
MAR 9:19 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mwenga kibheleko kya nga uhyubhalilo nda tama na mwenga mbaka pakiki? Ndabhalimbilila mbaka pakiki? Munnyeghe aywo nhongolo kwa nenga.”
MAR 9:20 Bhombe bhakinnghegha yula nhongolo Yesu. Kamu lila lindilu pakammonite Yesu kakinkweha kihilika naywo nhongolo kakighwegha pahi kakibingilika na kuhumiha lihuluhulu pa ngulu.
MAR 9:21 Yesu kakinkonya tate ghwa yula nhongolo “Nnando aghu ghuntandila pakiki?” Naywo kakinnyanga, “Kutandila pa ukakombo ghwake.
MAR 9:22 Pipipi lindilu aywo likinnghwiha mumwoto na mumachi ngati kankanjaghane yomo, hinu handa ghwa hotola chonde ghutubhonele luhungu ghututange.”
MAR 9:23 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ena handa ghwa hyubhalila, mihalo hyoha yahotoleka kwa mundu yunakuhyubhalila.”
MAR 9:24 Kamu, tate ghwa yula nhongolo kakinlilila Yesu, “Ninguhyubhalila, peni uhyubhalilo ghwangu ukwila ng'obhe, ghundange.”
MAR 9:25 Yesu pakabhonite lumati lwa bhandu lukinkwemukila papamu kanongola, kakinkwlikiha yula lindilu, kakinng'ombela, “Ghwenga lindilu ghwanga kughomba na kuyihwa, nungughukwilikiha, ghummuke nhongolo ayu na ukotoo kunnyingila kangi.”
MAR 9:26 Yula lindilu kakikyota kyobho, kakinnghwiha, kakinloghoheya kwa makakala na kakimmuka. Yula nhongolo kakibhegha handa ntumba bhandu bhakilongela “Kahwegha!”
MAR 9:27 Peni Yesu kakinkamula kibhoko yula kakombo, kakinnyinula naywo kakiyima.
MAR 9:28 Mbole, Yesu kakiyingila munyumba kati, ahundwa bhake bhakinkonyekeha mwa bhabheghite pa ghweka chabhe, “Bhuli twenga tukihotola ng'obhe kunmuha yula lindilu?”
MAR 9:29 Yesu kakiayanga, “Ndendo ya kya naha kahone kubhuka maha kwa kunnyupa Chapanga na kulikunga.”
MAR 9:30 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakibhuka akwo bhakipitila ku Galilaya. Yesu kakilema mundu ywohele kamanye kwa kabheghite.
MAR 9:31 Kiyaha kakibha mu kuahunda ahundwa bhake. Kakiaghombela, “Mwana ghwa Mundu katakilukwa na kukamuhwa kwa bhandu nabho bhatankoma mbole ya lisiku lya ndatu katahyuka.”
MAR 9:32 Peni, ahundwa bhake bhakimanya ng'obhe kila kyakaahundite, nabho bhakihyoghopa kunkonya.
MAR 9:33 Hinu bhakihika ku Kapelinaumu mbole ya kuyingila mu kitutubhi Yesu kakiakonya ahundwa bhake, “Mukighombana kingiki munjila?”
MAR 9:34 Peni bhene bhakinnyamala, kiyaha panjila pala bhakighombana ya kya ghani ndo nkulu mubhombe.
MAR 9:35 Yesu kakitama pahi na kakibhakema bhala ahundwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili na kakiaghombela, “Handa mundu ywoheli ywakapala kubhegha kilongohi inogha kabheghe ghwa kundahe dokwa na kabhe ndumitumi ghwa bhoha.”
MAR 9:36 Mbole kakintola mwana nndokwa kakinnyimiha pakati yabhe, kakinpakata na kakiaghombela,
MAR 9:37 “Mundu hyowele ywakankemela yumoo, ywa abha bhana adokwa kwa lihina lyangu, kangungemela nenga. Naywo ywaka ngemela nenga kangunkema yula ywakanaghilite.”
MAR 9:38 Yohana kaking'ombela “Nhunda, tunmona mundu kangubhua mandilo kwa lihina lyako, twenga tukinkanikiha kiyaha ywombe kabha mukimati kyetu ng'obhe.”
MAR 9:39 Yesu kakighomba, “Mangankanila, kahone ywohele ywakatenda mihabho kwa lihina lyangu mbole kahotole kukambuka lya uhakata kwa nenga.
MAR 9:40 Kiyaha ywakabhegha tela na twenga kabha mu mbande yatu.
MAR 9:41 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, ywohele ywakanpegha mwenga nteko ghwa machi gha kunywegha kiyaha mwenga ndo bhandu bha Kilisto kulyaghila kahone kuhobha lilumbo lyake.”
MAR 9:42 “Mundu ywohele ywakannyegheleha yumoo ywa adokwa abha bhatenda ulemwa, yingunnoghela mundu aywo kabhopelwe liganga likulu lya kuhyagila muntandala ghwake na kuchumbukihwa mulihibha.
MAR 9:43 Kibhoko kyakyo pakighunyegheleha ghutende ulemwa ghukilumuhe. Mbaha ghuyingile mu ubhumi kya nga kibhoko kimo chepa kuyingila na mabhoko mabhili na kuchumbukihwa mumwoto ghwa masiku ghoha ghwa nga kuhimika.
MAR 9:44 Amwo, mahinje ghake anguhwegha ng'obhe na mwoto ghwake ghwa nga kuhimika.
MAR 9:45 Na kighulu kyako pakighunnyegheleha kutenda ulemwa, ghukilumule, mbaha ghuyingile muulami kya nga kighulu kimo, chepa kuyingihwa na maghulu ghako ghoha mabhili na ghutaghwe mumwoto ghwa masiku ghoha ghwa nga kuhimika.
MAR 9:46 Amwo, mahinye ghake kahone kuhwegha na mwoto ghwake ghwa nga kuhimika masiku ghoha.
MAR 9:47 Na liho lyako palighunyegheleha ghutende ulemwa, ghulitupule, mbaha ghuyingile mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga na liho limo ndu chepa kubhegha na meho ghoha mabhili na ghutaghwe mu mwoto ghwa masiku ghoha ghwa nga kuhimika.
MAR 9:48 Amwo, ‘Mahinye ghake kahone kuhwegha na mwoto ghwake ghwa nga kuhimika.’ ”
MAR 9:49 “Mana mundu ywohele kaalungwa mwinyo kwa mwoto.”
MAR 9:50 “Mwinyo ntema ghwa maha peni handa payiluluka, ghwalungihwa na niki?” “Mmeghe na mwinyo mu mwenga, na ntame kwa uhihimilo nkati yenu.”
MAR 10:1 Yesu kakiyomboka lukemba lwa Yoludani na kakighenda ku nnma ghwa Yudea. Lumati lwa bhandu lukintughila, naywo kakibhahunda handa kitohe kyake.
MAR 10:2 Hino Akaafalisayo bhakinng'endela kunng'eha na bhakinkonya, “Bhuli, malaghilo ghanguyegheka mundu nnume kunleka nndala ghwake?”
MAR 10:3 Yesu kakiayanga, “Musa kakiakwilikiha niki?”
MAR 10:4 Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Musa kakitegheka kukita mundu katantyekela lihamba lya kunleka nndala ghwake na kunleka.”
MAR 10:5 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Musa kakityeka laghilo alyo lya kya unonopo ghwa myoyo yenu
MAR 10:6 Peni kutandila ubhumbilo ghwa nnima, ‘Chapanga kakiabhumba mundu nnume na mundu nndala.’
MAR 10:7 ‘Ndo nnume katanleka tate ghwake na ma ghwake naywo katalungana na nndala ghwake.
MAR 10:8 Abha abhili bhatabhegha mmmili ghumo.’ Hinu abho abhili ng'obhe ngati mmili ghumo.
MAR 10:9 Hinu, kyakakilungite Chapanga, anamundu kakotoo kupwilinganiha.”
MAR 10:10 Pakayingilite munyumba kati, ahundwa bhake bhakinkonya ya kya nhalo ghula.
MAR 10:11 Mwene kakiaghombela, “Ywakanleka nndala ghwake na kutola yungi, kangutenda utyahe.
MAR 10:12 Na nndala ywakanleka nnume ghwake na kakatolelwa na nnume yungi, kangutenda utyahe.”
MAR 10:13 Bhandu bhakinnyeghela Yesu bhana adokwa ngati kabhayabhike mabhoko ghake unani mwabhe, ahundwa bhake bhakialakalila.
MAR 10:14 Yesu pakabhonite naha kakikalala na kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Mubhategheke bhana ahike kwa nenga, nkotoke kuakanikiha, kiyaha Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga ndo ghwa bhandu bha abheghite handa abha.”
MAR 10:15 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, mundu ywoheli ywa nga kukingama Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga handa bhana adokwa kahone kuyingila amwo.
MAR 10:16 Ndo kakiatola bhala bhana mu mabhoko ghake kakiapakata, kakiayabhika mabhoko ngati abhanonele.
MAR 10:17 Yesu pakabheghite mu kubhuka, mundu yumo kakintughila, kakitundamila mayughwa mu ulongolo ghwake na kakinkonya, “Nhunda ghwa maha, ndende niki nighuhale ubhumi ghwa masiku ghoha ghwa nga uhiko?”
MAR 10:18 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Kiyaha niki ghungungema ghwa maha? Kahone mundu ghwa maha, ngati nga Chapanga ghweka chake.
MAR 10:19 Ghungughamanya malaghilo, ‘Kukoma kata, utyahe kata, kuyibha kata, unyimiho ghwa uhwangi kata, ukubhuhi kata, ghubhayikitile tate ghwako na ma ghwako.’”
MAR 10:20 Mwene kakinnyanga, “Nhunda, malaghilo agha hyoha nikighakamula tangu pa meghite nhongolo.”
MAR 10:21 Yesu kakinlolekeha na kakinpala, ndo kakinng'ombela “Ghupelelwa na kilibhi kimo ghughende ghukahemengane hyoha hiubheghite nahyo na ghubhapeghe ngalabha ahyo bhandu kapukwa, ghwabhegha na utopelo nnyoloho ku luhingu, mbole ghundughile.”
MAR 10:22 Yula mundu pakayihwite agho, kakukulika muno na kakibhuka kunu pakahyononeka, kiyaha kakibha na utopelo nnyoloho.
MAR 10:23 Yesu kakilolekeha mbande hyoha, kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Kya bhuli yabhegha unonopo kwa bhana utopelo kuyingila mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga!”
MAR 10:24 Ahundwa bhake bhakikangacha muno kwa malagho agho, Yesu kakiaghombela kangi, “Bhana bhangu, kya bhuli yabhegha unonopo mundu yuna kuhyubhalila utopelo kuyingila mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.
MAR 10:25 Yabhegha unonopo kwa yunautopelo kuyingiha mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga mbaha ya nnyama ngamiha kuhotola kuyingila mu lilanga lya sasia.”
MAR 10:26 Ahundwa bhake bhakikangacha muno bhakikonyana, “Ndo ghani aywo ywakahotola kulopoka?”
MAR 10:27 Yesu kakiahulutulila meho na kakiayanga, “Kwa anamundu ali kahone, peni kwa Chapanga ng'obhe; hyoha kwa Chapanga yahotolwa.”
MAR 10:28 Petili kunng'ombela, “Twenga tuhileka hyoha na kughutughila ghwenga!”
MAR 10:29 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela mundu ywohele ywakalekite lubhagha lwake ebu nnongo ghwake ebu nhacha ebu maghwake ebu tate ghwake ebu bhana bhake ebu mighunda kwa kya nenga na kwa kya Nhalo ghwa Maha,
MAR 10:30 mwene katakamuhwa mala mbinda mabhoko kumi mu masiku agha, kitutubhi na nnongo ghwake na nhacha ghwake na Ma ghwake na tate ghwake na bhana bhake na mighunda papamo na himbamanda, mbole ndo ubhumi ghwa nga kupela munnima ghwalonda kuhika.
MAR 10:31 Peni bhandu ayoloho bhabheghite kuulongolo bhaabhegha ghwa kundahe na bha kundahe bhaabhegha bha ulongolo.”
MAR 10:32 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakibhegha munjila kughenda ku Yelusalemu na Yesu kakialongolela. Ahundwa bhakibha na bhwaghalihi, na bhandu bhaatughilite bhakimememwa bhakiyoghopa. Yesu kakiatola kangi bhala ahundwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili kya ghweka na lula lumati na kakiaghombela ghala ghaalonda kunhikila.
MAR 10:33 Kakighomba, “Nnyihwe tunguhubhuka kughenda ku Yelusalemu, na akwo Mwana ghwa Mundu katakilukwa na katakamuhwa kwa hilongohi bha andundame na ahunda bha malaghilo. Bhene bhatantosa kiho, na kunkamuha kwa bhandu abheghite ng'obhe Akaayahudi.
MAR 10:34 Bhene bhatanhyula, bhatanhunila mata, bhatantuta minjupuchupu na kunkoma. Peni lisiku lya ndatu kaahyuka.”
MAR 10:35 Ndo, Yakobu na Yohana, bhana bha Zebedayo, bhaking'endela Yesu na bhakinng'ombela, “Nhunda, tungupala ghututendele lyoheli lila litupala kukuyupa.”
MAR 10:36 Naywo Kakibhaghombela, “Hinu, mungupala nibhatendele nhalo ghani?”
MAR 10:37 Bhakinng'ombela, “paghutama mu kitebho kyako kya ukulu kya Ghubhutwa ghwako tungupala ghututamihe yumu mbande yako ya nnilo na yungi mu mbande ya nngiya.”
MAR 10:38 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mungumanya ng'obhe kimukiyupa. Kulyaghila mahotola kulimbilia kimbamanda kya kya nenga na mabhegha kala kwa kiho kya nonda kuhwegha nenga.”
MAR 10:39 Bhakinnyanga “Twahotola” Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nteko ghwa nlonda kuywegha nenga manywela na ubatiso ghwa kya nenga mabatisighwa,
MAR 10:40 Peni kutama mbande yangu ya nnilo ebu ya ngiya, aghu ndo nnando ghwa nenga ng'obhe kuapegha ngati aghu ndo ya bhala bhaabhikilitwe kala na Chapanga.”
MAR 10:41 Bhala ahundwa bhangi mbinda mabhoko yimo paayihwite nhalo agho bhakiyanda kubhayaghabhalila Yakobu na Yohana.
MAR 10:42 Yesu kakiakema ahundwa bhake papamu na kakiaghombela, “Mungumanya kukita atabhala bha bhandu bha milima yingi bhangubhatabhala bhandu kwa makakala, nabho akulu bhanguangwiliha bhandu bhabhe.
MAR 10:43 Peni kwa mwenga kata. Mbole yake ywoheli ywakapala kubhegha nkulu mumabhene ndo yinguntama kabheghe nndumitumi ghwenu.
MAR 10:44 Na mundu ywoheli ywakapala kubhegha kilongohi, yinguntama kakaatumikile bhangi.
MAR 10:45 Kiyaha hata Mwana ghwa Mundu kakihika kutendelwa lihengo ng'obhe, ngati kakihika kutenda lihengo na kuubhuha ubhumi ghwake ghubheghe ukombohi kwa bhandu ayoloho.”
MAR 10:46 Ndo bhakihika Yeliko, pala Yesu pakabhukite mukitami na ahundwa bhake papamu na lumati lukulu lwa bhandu, ywangakubhona lihina lyake Balitimayu, mwana ghwa Timayu, kakitama mumbhwegha ya njila pakiyupa utangwo.
MAR 10:47 Balitimayu pakayihwite kukita ndo Yesu ghwa ku Nasaleti ywakabheghite mukupita, kakiyanda kukweha lilobhe pakaghomba, “Yesu, Mwana ghwa Daudi, ghumonele luhungu!”
MAR 10:48 Bhandu ayoloho bhakinlakalila na kung'ombela kanyamale, peni mwene kakighendelela kukweha lilobhe pakighomba, “Mwana ghwa Daudi ghunmonele luhungu!”
MAR 10:49 Yesu kakiyima na kulongela, “Munkeme” Ndo bhakinkema yula ywanga kubhona bhaking'ombela, “Ghulikunge mwoyo, ghuyime, kangughukema.”
MAR 10:50 Kakilitagha lipinda lyake, na kakihumba na kung'endela Yesu.
MAR 10:51 Yesu kakinkonya, “Ghungupala nukutendele niki?” Yula ywanga kubhona kakinnyanga, “Nhunda ghwangu mbala kubhona.”
MAR 10:52 Yesu kaking'ombela, “Ghughende, hyubhalilo yako yikulamiha.” Kamu yula ywanga kubhona kakilola, naywo kakintughila Yesu na kakighenda naywo papamu.
MAR 11:1 Pabhaheghelelite ku Yelusalem bhakihika ku hitami hya Betifage na ku Betania ugheghela na kitumbi kya Miseituni, Yesu kakibhalaghila abhili mu ahundwa bhake,
MAR 11:2 kakiaghombela, “Nng'ende mbaka kukitami kya kuulongolo ghwenu na kamu pannyingila pakitami akyo matammona mwanakaputa kabhopelelwa lughoyi, kakali na kutendelwa lihengo. Mummopole mung'eghele apa.
MAR 11:3 Handa mundu ywohele pakabhakonya, bhuli mungunmopola? Munnyange, ‘Bambo kangunpala na hamba katammuyila.’ ”
MAR 11:4 Bhakighenda na bhakimmona mwanakaputa kabhopolelwa mumbwegha ya njila, ugheghela ghwa nlyango ghwa kitutubhi.
MAR 11:5 Pabhabheghite mukummopola bhandu bhaayimiti paugheghela bhakiakonya, “Yibha bhuli mungummopola mwanakaputa?”
MAR 11:6 Bhakiayanga handa bhula pakabhalaghiliti Yesu, nabho bhandu bhala bhakibhategheka.
MAR 11:7 Bhakinnyeghela Yesu yula mwanakaputa, bhakiyalila nghubho hyabhe pang'ongo ghwake naywo Yesu kakihubhuka.
MAR 11:8 Bhandu bha ayoloho bhakiyalila ngubho hyabhe munjila na amoo bhangi bhakiyalila hiputila hya mikongo bhayadumulite mumighunda ya kya kunhokamila.
MAR 11:9 Mbole bhala bhaalongolite kuulongolo na bhala bhaabheghite kukihongo unyuma bhakiyimba malobhe paaghombite, “Lilumbo! Kanonelwe mwene aywo ywakahika kwa lihina lya Bambo!
MAR 11:10 Ghunoneleghwa Ghubhutwa ghuupala kuhika ghwa tate ghwetu Daudi!” “Lilumbo kwa mwene ywakabheghite kunani kunani muno!”
MAR 11:11 Yesu kakighenda ku Yelusalemu na kakiyingila Kitutubhi kya Chapanga. Kakilolekeha hilibhi hyoha hiibheghite, peni kiyaha yikiyingila makimuhi, kakighenda ku Betania papamu na bhala mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili.
MAR 11:12 Kilabho yake pabhabheghite mukubhuka ku Betania Yesu yikinbhina njala.
MAR 11:13 Pakaghubhoniti nkongo ghwa ntini kya kutali ghubheghite na mahamba manyelemba, kakighughendela kakaghulole kukita ghukipambika, pakaghuhikiliti kakighabhona ngamahamba ghweka kiyaha yikibha kihuku kya nga kupambika.
MAR 11:14 Yesu kakighughombela ghula nkongo ghwa ntini, “Kuyandila lelo mbaka masiku ghoha ghapala kuhika mundu ywohele katalyegha ng'obhe mapambiko kuhuma kwa ghwenga” Ahundwa bhake bhakiyihwa paakighomba agha.
MAR 11:15 Pakahikite ku Yelusalemu Yesu kakiyingila mu Kitutubhi kya Chapanga kakiyanda kubhabhinga bhinga bhala bhaabheghite mukuhemela na kuhemengana hilibhi munyumba kati ya Kitutubhi kya Chapanga. Kakihipalangula hindambi hya bhala bhaabheghite mukuhemengana ngalabha na hitebho hya bhanakuhemela ngunda.
MAR 11:16 Hangi kakintegheka ng'obhe mundu ywohele kutola kilibhi kyoheli kupitila lubhigho lwa Kitutubhi kya Chapanga.
MAR 11:17 Mbole kakibhahunda, “Yityekwa, ‘Kitutubhi kyangu kyaabhegha Kitutubhi kya kutundamila bhandu bha milima hyoha, peni mwenga mukitenda yibhe mbaku ya kuahiha apoka!’”
MAR 11:18 Akulu bha mandundame na ahunda bha malaghilo pakayihwite mihalo ayi bhakiyanda kunpalahila luhila lwa kunkoma, peni bhakinnyoghopa, kiyaha bhandu bhohabhakikangacha kwa mahundo ghake.
MAR 11:19 Payihikite makimuhi, Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakibhuka mu kitami.
MAR 11:20 Malabhila ghake, paabheghite mukutyanga mu njila, bhakighubhona ghula ntini ghunyaluka kala kuhumila kunani mbaka pa kitepo.
MAR 11:21 Petili kakighuhwachila na kaking'ombela Yesu, “Nhunda, ghulole ghula ntini ghu ghukotolite ghunyaluka!”
MAR 11:22 Yesu kakiayanga, “Munhyubhalile Chapanga.”
MAR 11:23 Kulyaghila ningubhaghombela mundu ywohele ywakalonda kukighombela kitumbi aki, ghutupuke ghukataghwe kulihibha, na kakotoo kubhona bhwaghalihi mumwoyo ghwake ngati kahyubhalile kukita ghatatendekwa, katatendeghwa nnando aghwo.
MAR 11:24 Ngati hino ningubhaghombela kyoheli kimukiyupa na kutundamila, nhyubhalile kukita maakingama nakyo kyabhegha kyenu.
MAR 11:25 Pammegha mukutundamila, munnekekehe mundu ywohele ywakabhatenditi uhokelo ghwoheli, ngati Tate ghwenu ywakabheghite kuluhingu kabhalekekehe ulemwa ghwenu.
MAR 11:26 Peni pamubhalekekeha ng'obhe bhangi, hata Tate ghwenu ywakabheghite kuluhingu katabhalekekeha ng'obhe ulemwa ghwenu.
MAR 11:27 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakihika kangi ku Yelusalemu, pakabheghite mukutyanga ku Kitutubhi kya Chapanga, Akulu bha mandundame na ahunda bha malaghilo na aghoghi bhakinng'endela,
MAR 11:28 Bhakinkonya, “Ghukitenda mihalo ayi kwa ngwiliho ya ghani? Na ywakakukamuhite makakala agha ndi ghani?”
MAR 11:29 Yesu kakiayanga, “Ndabhakonya ngonyo yimo, na nenga nda bhakambuha kukita ndi kwa makakala gha ghani ningutenda mihalo ayi.
MAR 11:30 Mung'ombele, makakala gha Yohana yunakubatisa ghukihuma kuluhingo kwa Chapanga, ebu kwa anabhandu?”
MAR 11:31 Bhakighombana, pabhakighomba, “Handa patulongela, ghukihuma kuluhingu kwa Chapanga, katatukonya, mona mukighuhyubhalila ng'obhe?
MAR 11:32 Peni patughomba, ‘ghukihuma kwa anabhandu.’” Bhakihyoghopa bhandu, mana bhandu bhoha bhakihyubhalila kukita Yohana kakibha ndo mbuye ghwa Chapanga.
MAR 11:33 Ngati hino, bhakinnyanga Yesu, bhakighomba, kukita “Tungumanya ng'obhe.” Yesu kakibhayanga “Hata nenga ndabhaghombela ng'obhe kukita nungughatenda agha kwa gwiliho ya ghani.”
MAR 12:1 Yesu kakiyanda kughomba nabho kwa mandambulo, pakibhaghombela, “Mundu yumo kakikanda nng'unda ghwa mizabibu, kakichenga lubhigho kughutindila ghula ng'unda, na kakitendekeha pa kukama difwai, hilahila kakichenga kilingo na kakiapegha bhandu bhanpeghe sumu, ywombe kakibhuka kughenda kunnima ghungi.
MAR 12:2 Mumasiku gha mabeno kakinlaghila nndumitumi ghwake kwa bhala akanda kanda bhake kakatole lusumulo lwake.
MAR 12:3 Bhala akandakanda bhakinkamula yula nndumitumi, bhakintuta na bhakinbhuyiha mabhoko gha yaghi kya nga kilibhi.
MAR 12:4 Kangi yula nkola nngunda kakinlaghila nndumitumi yungi kwa bhombe, bhala akandakanda bhakintuta mumutwe na kuntendela mihalo ya honi.
MAR 12:5 Kangi yula nkola nng'unda kakinlaghila nndumitumi yungi, aywo bhakinkoma. Kakialaghila andumitumi bhangi ayoloho, bhala akandakanda bhakiatuta bhala andumitumi na amoo bhangi bhakiakoma.
MAR 12:6 Nkolang'unda kakihighala na mundu yumo ndundundu ghwa kunlaghiha, aywo ndo mwana ywakanpaliti. Muuhiko kakinlaghila pakaghomba, ‘Bhatanhokamila mwana ghwangu.’
MAR 12:7 Peni bhala akandakanda bhakighombana, paakighomba, ‘Aywo ndo yunakuhala, nhiki tunkome, na lipala lyake lya bhegha lyetu.’
MAR 12:8 Ndo bhakinkamula, bhakinkoma na kuntagha panje ya ghula ng'unda ghwa mizabibu.”
MAR 12:9 Yesu kakiakonya “Munguhwacha yula nkolang'unda katatenda niki? Katahika na kubhakoma bhala akandakanda, mbole katabhapegha akandakanda bhangi ghula ng'unda ghwa mizabibu.
MAR 12:10 Mukisoma ng'obhe malembo agha, ‘Liganga bhalilemite bhana utendehi ghwa kuchenga hinu libhegha liganga likulu lya pambwegha;
MAR 12:11 Bambo kaghutenda nhalu aghu nayo ndo ngangahyo mumehu ghetu!’ ”
MAR 12:12 Akulu bha mandundame, ahunda bha malaghilo na aghoyi pabhamanyite kukita kakighomba ndambulo yila kwa kya bhombe bhakipala kunkamula, peni bhakiluyoghopa lula lumati lwa bhandu. Bhakinneka na bhakibhuka.
MAR 12:13 Mbole, bhakialaghila Akaafalisayo na kimati kya Helode ngati bhanhikile Yesu bhantyeghe kwa mihalo yake.
MAR 12:14 Bhaking'endela Yesu bhakinng'ombela, “Nhunda, tungumanya kukita ghwenga ghu mundu ghwa kuyubhalilwa ghunakulongela hoto. Ghunguayoghopa ng'obhe ukulu ghwa bhene, peni ghwenga ghunguhunda hoto ya Chapanga telatela. Hinu yinguteghekwa kunpegha mutwa nkulu ghwa Akaaloma kodi ebu ng'obhe? Hinu tunpeghe ebu tukotoo kunpegha?”
MAR 12:15 Peni Yesu kakimanya ufyangu ghwa bhombe na kakiakonya, “Bhuli mukupala kuntyegha? Munyeghele ayo ngalabha niyilole.”
MAR 12:16 Bhakinnyeghela ngalabha na mwene kakiakonya, “Kibhungi aki na lihina lityekitwe ali lya ghani?” Bhene akinnyanga “Ndi lya Mutwa nkulu ghwa Akaaloma.”
MAR 12:17 Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Munmpeghe Mutwa nkulu ghwa Akaaloma hya kya mwene na Chapanga hya kya Chapanga.” Na bhene bhakibhughanikwa muno naywo.
MAR 12:18 Mbole, Akaasadukayu, bhala bhanakughomba kahone uhyuko bhakinhikila Yesu na bhakinkonya,
MAR 12:19 “Nhunda, Musa kakitutyekela kukita handa mundu pakahwegha na kunleka nndala kya nga mwana, ndo nlongo ghwake katantolela yula nndala nnekwa ngati kakanpapile nnongo ghwake bhana.
MAR 12:20 Ndo bhakibhegha alongo nhano na abhili. Yula ghwa ulongohi kakitolela nndala na kakihwegha kya nga mwana ywohele.
MAR 12:21 Ghwa ubhili kakinhala yula nnekwa peni naywo kakihwegha kya nga kunneka mwana ywoheli, yikibhegha ubhwabhu abhu kwa yula ghwa ndatu.
MAR 12:22 Ndo bhoha nhano na abhili muulongo ghula bhakighwegha kya nga kunneka mwana na muuhiko ghwa hyoha na yula nndala kakihwegha.
MAR 12:23 Ngati hino, palisiku lya bhandu kuhyuka, nndala yula katabhegha ghwa ghani kiyaha kakitolelwa na alongo bhoha nhano na abhili?”
MAR 12:24 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mwenga munguhokela kiyaha mungumanya ng'obhe Matyeko Mang'anyimo ebu ngwiliho ya Chapanga.
MAR 12:25 Bhaahweghite paalonda kuhyuka, kahone kutolela ebu kutolelwa kiyaha bhatabhegha handa andumitumi bha kuluhingu bha Chapanga.
MAR 12:26 Na kwa mihalo ya kya uhyuko ghwa bha aghweghite, nde nsoma ng'obhe mu kitabho kya Musa akwo Chapanga pakalongilite na Musa kuhuma mukiputila kiyakiteghe mwoto pakaghomba, ‘Nenga ndo Chapanga ghwa Ablahamu, na Chapanga ghwa Isaka na Chapanga ghwa Yakobu.’
MAR 12:27 Hinu, mwene ndo Chapanga ghwa aghweghite ng'obhe ngati ndo Chapanga ghwa bhanakukeka. Mwenga nhokela muno!”
MAR 12:28 Nhunda yumu ghwa malaghilo kakihika na kakiyihwa paaghombaniti. Kakibhona kukita Yesu kakiayanga tela bhala Akaasadukayo, naywo kakinkonya, “Mungwilikiho hyoha yibheghite ngulu ndo yoki?”
MAR 12:29 Yesu kakinnyanga. “Nnyihwanile mwenga bhandu bha Isilaeli, ngwiliho ngulu ndo ayi, Bambo Chapanga ghwetu, ndo Bambo yumo.
MAR 12:30 Ghunpale Bambo Chapanga ghwako kwa mwoyo ghwako ghwoha na kwa nhuki ghwako ghwoha na kwa mahala ghako ghoha na kwa makakala ghako ghoha.
MAR 12:31 Na ya kabhili ndi ayi, ghunpale nng'eghela ghwako handa mughulipala ghumwene, kahone ngwilikiho yingi ngulu kupitingana kwa ahi.”
MAR 12:32 Yula nhunda ghwa malaghilo kaking'ombela Yesu, “Kulyaghila nhunda ghuyanga maha kukita Chapanga ndo yumu kahone yungi ngati nga ywombe.
MAR 12:33 Kunpala Chapanga kwa mwoyo ghwoha na kwa mahala ghoha na makakala ghoha na kunpala nng'eghela ghwako handa mughulipala ghumwene ndi tela kya na lumu kulandana ng'obhe na kuyambika nyambi ya kuyocholela na matulo.”
MAR 12:34 Naywo Yesu pakabhonite kukita kakiyanga kwa mahala, kaking'ombela, “Ghwenga ghubhegha kutali ng'obhe na Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.” Kuyandila pala kahone mundu ywakayighite kunkonya Yesu nkonyo kangi.
MAR 12:35 Yesu pakabheghite mukuhunda akwo ku Kitutubhi kya Chapanga kakikonya, “Yibha bhuli ahunda bha malaghilo angulongela kukita Kilisto ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga ndo Mwana ghwa Daudi?
MAR 12:36 Mana Daudi mwene kakikambuka pakalonguhitwe na Nhuki ghwa Chapanga pakighomba. ‘Bambo kaking'ombela Bambo ghwangu, ghutame mu kibhoko kyangu kya nnilo, mbaka panonda kubhabhika amyanja bhako pahi ya ngwiliho yako.’
MAR 12:37 Daudi mwene kangunkema Kilisto ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga, ‘Bambo’ yabhegha bhuli hino ywombe kabhe mwana ghwake?” Lula lumati lwoha lwa nbhandu bhakinnyihwa kwa uyelelo
MAR 12:38 Yesu pakabheghiteghe mu kuahunda, kakilongela, “Mulindakile na ahunda bha malaghilo. Bhombe apalagha kutyanga paahwala mapinda matandamaho na kulamuhwa kwa kuhokamilwa mu hindandabhanji,
MAR 12:39 na kutama muhitebho hya kuulongolo mu Kitutbhi kya kukonganila Akaayahudi na muhitebho hya ulongolo mu chekwa.
MAR 12:40 Anguapugha ahumbu alekwa kunu bhangulikupukiha kulandulila malandulo matandamaho lisiku lya uhiko kyabhabhona kimbamanda kikulu!”
MAR 12:41 Mbole Yesu kakitama ugheghela na kipalamande kya abhikiteghe matulo, kakilulolekeha lumati lwa bhandu pa abheghite mukubhika ngalabha mulijamanda lya kitutubhi kya Chapanga. Na bhana utopelo ayoloho bhakiyingiha ngalabha nyoloho.
MAR 12:42 Peni nndala nlekwa yumo kapukwa, kakihika na kakibhika ngalabha ibhili njoko hya lihabha.
MAR 12:43 Yesu kakiakema ahundwa bhake kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela nndala nlekwa ayu kapukwa kabhika ngalabha nyoloho mulijamanda lya nyambi kupitingana kwa bhangi bhoha bhabhikiti.
MAR 12:44 Kiyaha bhangi bhoha bhakibhika uyonjokeho ghwa mota hyabhe, peni ayu nhumbu nlekwa mu ukapukwa ghwake kakitola hyoha hyakabheghite nahyo hata kila kyakakipalite nde kya kulama.”
MAR 13:1 Yesu pakabheghite mu kuhuma ku Kitutubhi kya Chapanga, yumoo ywa ahundwa bhake kakinng'ombela, “Nhunda, ghulole huti maganga agha mughabheghiti makulu na hitutubhi ahi muhinnyelembekite.”
MAR 13:2 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghuhibhona hitutubhi ahi muhibheghite ngulu? Kahone hata liganga limo lya kulonda kuhighala unani mwa liganga lingi, ghoha ghatahangulighwa.”
MAR 13:3 Yesu pakatamite ku Kitumbi kya Mizeituni paakilola Kitutubhi kya Chapanga Petili na Yakobu na Yohana na Andelea bhakinkonya mu lupwepo,
MAR 13:4 “Chonde, ghutughombele mihalu ayi yabhegha pakiki, na naho yake yabhegha bhuli payiheghelela kubwitukila?”
MAR 13:5 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mulindakile, mundu ywoheli kakotoke kuakuluha.
MAR 13:6 Kiyaha ayoloho bhaahika kukambuka kwa lihina lyangu, paalongela, ‘Nenga ndo Kilisto’ nabho bhataahokeha bhandu ayoloho.
MAR 13:7 Pannyihwa kyobho ya mikoha paugheghela ebu mihalo ya mikoha kya kutali, nkotoo kubhegha na bhwagalili. Mihalu ayi mbaka yihumbuke peni uhiko ghwake ukali hela.
MAR 13:8 Mana bhandu bha nnima ghumo ghwatutana na bhandu bha nnima ghungi; na ghubhutwa ghwatutana na ghubhutwa ghungi. Kwabhegha na migwangwaliko mbande nhanganganiko lung'ahi lwa njala. Mihalu aywo yingulihwana na lihingila lya ulongohi.”
MAR 13:9 “Peni mwenga mulindakile, mana bhatabhakokela mu njengakaya, na kuatuta mu Hitutubhi ya kukonganila Akaayahudi; bhatabhayegha hilongohi na akaabhutwa kwa mihalo ya nenga ngati mubhaghombele Nhalo ghwa Maha.
MAR 13:10 Peni mbaka Mihalo ya Maha yilandamihwe huti kwa bhandu bha milima hyoha kukali na kuhika ghula uhiko.
MAR 13:11 Nabho paabhakamula na kubhakokela mu njengakaya, nkotoo kubhegha na bhwaghalili ya kya kulongela; Uhiko pauhika, nnongele kyohele kya kya mukamuhitwe ngati mwenga ng'obhe munpala kulongela ngati Nhuki ghwa Chapanga.
MAR 13:12 Nnongo katankiluka nnongo ghwake ngati kakakomwe, na tate katankiluka mwana ghwake. Bhana bhataakiluka tate na ma ghwabhe na kuakoma.
MAR 13:13 Bhandu bhoha bhataakalalila mwenga kwa kya nenga. Peni yunakulimbilila kunhyubhalila mbaka kuuhiko katalopoka.”
MAR 13:14 “Pamulibhona ‘Kilibhi kinakunnyaghabhiha Chapanga’ kiyima pautamiho ghwake ng'obhe, yunakusoma kamanyeghe nhalo aghu, hino bhala bhaabheghite ku Yudea bhatughile ku hitumbi.
MAR 13:15 Ywakabheghite kulinyakaha ya kitutubhi kakotoho kuhuluka kuyingila munyumba kati mwaki kakatole kilibhi.
MAR 13:16 Naywo ywakabheghite kunng'unda kakotoo kubhuya ukaya kutola kyoheli.
MAR 13:17 Peni kibhabhone bhombe bhana ndumbo na bhanakuyongeha bhana masiku agho!
MAR 13:18 Nnyupe kwa Chapanga ngati mihalo ayi yikotoo kubwitukila pakipepo.
MAR 13:19 Mana mumasiku agho lutabhegha lung'ahe lukulu lwa nga kubhonekana, tangu ulongohi pala Chapanga pakabhumbite nnima mbaka lelo. Na kubhegha kangi ng'obhe mumasiku gha pala kuhika.
MAR 13:20 Handa Bambo kangahupitahiti ng'obhe masiku agho, Kahone kulopoka mundu ywohele. Peni kwa kya bhandu ahaghulwa, bhakabhahaghulite, kaghahupia masiku agho.”
MAR 13:21 “Hinu mundu ywohele pakaaghombela, ‘Nnole, Kilisto ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga kabhegha apa!’ Ebu, ‘Kabhegha kula’ mangahyubhalila.
MAR 13:22 Mana bha bwitukila akina kilisto bhanga kuhaghulwa na Chapanga na mambuye bha uhwangi. Nabho bhatatenda naho na mihabho ngati bhabhahokehe ahaghulwa bha Chapanga.
MAR 13:23 Peni mwenga mulindakile, nenga niabhaghombela ghoha ghakali na kubwitukila.”
MAR 13:24 “Peni mumasiku agho, mbole ya lung'ahe alwo, luchubha lwayingihwa lubhindo, na lubhalamwehi kabhone kumulika,
MAR 13:25 ndondwa hyaponeka kuhuma kunani na makakala gha kunani pamahundi ghatayukana.
MAR 13:26 Ndo bhandu bhatammona Mwana ghwa Mundu pakihika mumahundi kwa makakala mayoloho na ukulu.
MAR 13:27 Mbole katabhalaghiha andumitumi ghwake ghwa kuluhingu abhakwemukihe bhandu ahaghulwa bhake kuhuma mumbande hyoha ya nnima kuyandila kuuhiko ghwa n'nima mbaka kuuhiko ghwa luhingu.”
MAR 13:28 “Mughulole nkongo ghwa ntini na mulihunde ndambulo ayi; kamu pa mubhabhona mapanyo ghake paghatomola mahamba mmanye kukita pamabeno paheghela
MAR 13:29 Ubhwabhu abhu, pamuyibhona mihalu ayi payitendeka, mmanye kukita Kilisto ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga kabha ugheghela mwa nlyango!
MAR 13:30 Kulyaghila nungubhaghombela, kibheleko aki kyapitingana ng'obhe mbaka mihalu ayi hyoha yibwituke.
MAR 13:31 Luhingu na nnima hyapitingana, peni malagho ghangu kahone kupita kata.”
MAR 13:32 “Peni kwa mihalo ya lisiku lila na lisaa kahone ywa kumanya, hata andumitumi ghwa kuluhingu ghwa Chapanga, ebu Mwana, maha nga Tate ghweka chake ndo yunakumanya.
MAR 13:33 Mulindakile, mmeghe kala, kiyaha mmanya ng'obhe lisaa alyo lya hika pakiki.
MAR 13:34 Yabhegha handa mundu ywakabheghite mumwanja ywakabhalekiti andumitumi bhalulolekehe maha alwo lubhagha lwake kila mundu na lihengo lyake, naywo kakinkwilikiha lichonda ghwa ku nlyango ‘Ghukotoo kughonja.’
MAR 13:35 Hinu mbheghe kala mana, mmanya ng'obhe mabhuyo gha nkola lubhagha, kukita makimuhi, ebu pakilu pa pakati, ebu pangeha ya kubhika njogolo, ebu malabhila pakuchegha.
MAR 13:36 Handa pakabhuya kwa kinunu kabhayitukite nng'onja.
MAR 13:37 Na ali linibhaghombela mwenga, nungubhaghombela bhoha, mmbheghe kala!”
MAR 14:1 Yikibha masiku mabhili yikali na kuyingiha chekwa ya Pasaka na ya mangate ya nga kuyingihwa linjacha. Akaandundame akulu na ahunda bha malaghilo bhakipalaha njila ya kunkamula Yesu kwa njenjelo ngati bhankome.
MAR 14:2 Mana bhakighomba, “Tukotoo kunkamula lisiku lya chekwa ya Pasaka, kiyaha bhandu bhaatenda bhulwa.”
MAR 14:3 Yesu pakabheghite akwo ku Betania kulubhagha lwa Simoni ywakabheghite na maloha, pakabheghite mukindangabhala pakalyegha hilyo kakihika nndala yumo ywakabheghite na kyupa kya liganga lya alabasita kina mahuta ghanakunungila munu gha ngalabha ngulu, kakakimetula kila kyupa na kakinpopohela Yesu mumutwe ghwake
MAR 14:4 Bhandu amoo bhangi bhaabheghite pala bhakighombana bhene kwa mabhene, “Kiyaha niki mahuta aghangalabha ngulu ghangunyanyanganwa hela?
MAR 14:5 Mahuta agha ghangahemelitwe kwa ngalabha ngulu na ngalabha ahyo bhangabhapeghite kapukwa.” Bhakinlakalila munu yula nndala.
MAR 14:6 Peni Yesu kakiaghombela, “Bhuli mungunng'aha? Munneke, kiyaha kanndendela nnando ghunakuhalala.
MAR 14:7 Makapukwa mmegha nabho masiku ghoha na mahotola kubhatanga masiku ghoheli ghamughapalite. Peni nenga kahone kubhegha papamu masiku ghoha.
MAR 14:8 Nndala ayu kandendela kila kakahotolite, kalongolela kuntyelemeka mahuta mmili ghwangu kyakummika kala kya kungulila.
MAR 14:9 Kulyaghila nenga nungubhaghombela pohele pala pannima payilandamihwa Nhalo ghwa Maha, nnando aghu ghwakatendite nndala ayu ghwakambukwa kwa uhwacho ghwake.”
MAR 14:10 Ndo Yuda Isikaliyote yumoo ywa bhala ahundwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili kakighenda kwa andundame akulu ngati kakankiluke Yesu.
MAR 14:11 Mandundame akulu pakayihwite nhalo aghwo bhakiyelelwa munu, bhakinnagha kunpegha ngalabha. Hinu Yuda kakiyanda kupalaha ling'ebu lya kunkiluka Yesu.
MAR 14:12 Lisiku lya ulongohi lya chekwa ya mangate ya nga kuyingihwa linjacha, lisiku paanhinjite mwana mene ahundwa bhake bhakinkonya Yesu, “Ghungupala tughutendekehele kwoki pakulyegha Pasaka?”
MAR 14:13 Hinu Yesu kakialaghila abhili muahundwa bhake, kakiaghombela, “Nng'ende kukitami, na akwo ma mmona nnume yumo yunakuyegha kibhigha kya machi ndo muntughile,
MAR 14:14 mbaka ku lubhagha lwakayingila munng'ombele yula nkola kaya pakayingiliti yula yuna kibhigha ‘Nhunda kangukonya, kyumba kati kyake kibhegha kwoki kya agheni kyene kikapala kulyegha Pasaka papamu na ahundwa bhangu?’
MAR 14:15 Naywo katabhalaha chumba kati kikulu muligholofa lyake na maabhona hilibhi hyoha hibhegha kala kwa kya twenga.”
MAR 14:16 Bhala ahundwa bhakibhuka, bhakighenda kukitami, na bhakibhona hilibhi hyoha tela tela handa Yesu pakaaghombilite na bhakitendekeha hilyo hya Pasaka amwo.
MAR 14:17 Payihikite makimuhi, Yesu kakihika papamu na ahundwa bhake mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili.
MAR 14:18 Paabheghite mukulyegha hilyo Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nungubhaghombela yumoo ywenu yunakulyegha papamu na nenga katangiluka.”
MAR 14:19 Apa ahundwa bhake bhakiyanda kuhyononeka, bhakinkonya yumu mbole ya yumu “Ngati nenga ng'obhe?”
MAR 14:20 Yesu kakiayanga, “Ndi yumoo ywenu mwenga mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili, yuna kuchwika lingate papamu na nenga mukipumbulu.
MAR 14:21 Kiyaha Mwana ghwa Mundu katakomwa handa yityekitwe. Peni kimmone Mundu yula ywakankiluka mwana ghwa Mundu mbaha mundu aywo kangalepelitwe kubhelekwa!”
MAR 14:22 Paabheghite mukulyegha Yesu kakitola lingate, kakilumba, kakilimetula na kuapegha ahundwa bhake pakighomba. “Mughutole nlyeghe aghu ndo mmili ghwangu.”
MAR 14:23 Mbole kakitola nteko ghwa difwai, Kakinnumba Chapanga na kakibhapegha bhoha bhakinyweghela nteko aghwo.
MAR 14:24 Kakiaghombela, “Aghu ndo mwahi ghwangu ghwa Ninganilo, ghuuchecheka kwa kya bhandu bha ayaloho.
MAR 14:25 Kulyaghila ningubhaghombela, nda nywegha kangi ng'obhe difwai ya lisabibu mbaka lisiku lila linonda kunywegha ya hyono mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.”
MAR 14:26 Paayimbite kala nhambo, bhakibhuka bhakighenda kukitumbi kya Miseituni.
MAR 14:27 Yesu kakibhaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Mabhoha mwenga mataneka, Mana matyeko ghaghomba, ‘Ndantuta yunakuhakila, na mene nabho bhatapwilinganika.’
MAR 14:28 Peni mbole ya kuhyuka, ndabhalongolela kula ku Galilaya.”
MAR 14:29 Petili kakighombela Yesu, “Hata handa bhoha bhataghuleka, nenga ndaghuleka ng'obhe.”
MAR 14:30 Yesu kakinng'ombela Petili, “Kulyaghila ningughughombela uhiku aghu ghwanganila pandatu, ukakali na kubhika njogholo pabhili.”
MAR 14:31 Peni Petili kakighendelela kughomba, “Hata payinoghela kuhwegha papamu na ghwenga, ndaghuleka ng'obhe.” Nabho ahundwa bhangi bhoha bhakighomba bhu bhwabhu abho.
MAR 14:32 Bhakihika mukitogholo kya Getisemani, Yesu kakibhaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Ntame apa, nenga pang'enda kuyupa.
MAR 14:33 Mbole kakibhatola Petili na Yakobu na Yohana. Naywo Yesu kakiyanda kuhyononeka na kughayaghaya.”
MAR 14:34 Kakibhaghombela, “Mwoyo ghwangu ghubha na luhyononeko ugheghela na kuhwegha. Ntami apa na nkilukihe.”
MAR 14:35 Kakighenda ulongolo pamandina, kakighwegha pahi makukama, kakiyupa kukita, handa yahotoleka kuyingila lisaa alyo lya kimbamanda linhyetuke.
MAR 14:36 Kakighomba, “Tate ghwangu, kwa ghwenga mihalo hyoha yinguhotoleka. Ghumuhile nteko aghu peni yikotoke kubhegha kimbala nenga ngati kila ghukipalite ghwenga.”
MAR 14:37 Kakibhuya kwa ahundwa bhake bhala andatu kakibhabhona akighonja, kakinkonya Petili, “Simoni, ghukighonja? Ghulepelwa kukiluha hata lisaa limu?
MAR 14:38 Nkiluhe na kuyupa mangayingila mumayigho. Nhuki ghungupala peni mmili ghubhegha nnelebhu.”
MAR 14:39 Kakighenda kangi kuyupa pakighomba malagho ghaghalaghala.
MAR 14:40 Mbole kakibhuya kwa ahundwa bhake, kakibhabhona akighonja kangi kiyaha mehu ghabhe ghakitopelwa na ng'ono nabho bhakimanya ng'obhe kya kunng'ombela.
MAR 14:41 Kakibhabhuyila pandatu, na kakiakonya, “Nkali makaghonja na kupumulila? Hinu muyimuke, Lisaa lihika kala Mwana ghwa Mundu kangukamuhwa mumabhoko gha bhandu bhana ulemwa.
MAR 14:42 Nnyumuke tughende! Nnole, yula ywakunngiluka kaheghelela.”
MAR 14:43 Yesu pakabheghite akali mukughomba, Yuda, yumoo ywa bhala ahundwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili, kakihika papamu na lumati lwa bhandu bhaabheghite na mikechelo na hinduku. Bhandu abho bhakilaghilwa na andundame akulu ahunda bha malaghilo na aghohi.
MAR 14:44 Yuda Isikaliyote nkiluka kakibhapegha naho bhala bhandu kukita, “Yula yunonda kunhyubhatila, ndo mwene, munkamule na munng'eghe kindakila.”
MAR 14:45 Hino Yuda pakahikite, kakinng'endela Yesu na kaking'ombela “Nhunda!” Mbole kakinhyubhatila.
MAR 14:46 Bhala bhandu bhakinkamula Yesu, na bhakinbhika kindakila.
MAR 14:47 Ndo yumoo ywa bhala bhaayimite apo papamu na Yesu kakihomola kikechelo kyake kakintuta ndumitumi ghwa Ndundame Nkulu na kakinkechula likutu.
MAR 14:48 Yesu kakiakonya, “Nhika na mikechelo na hinduku handa kukita nenga ndi npoka?
MAR 14:49 Masiku ghoha nikibhegha papamu na mwenga panibhahunda mu Kitutubhi kya Chapanga, kya nga kungamula. Peni hino Matyeko ghanakung'anyima mbaka ghakamale.”
MAR 14:50 Ndo ahundwa bhake bhoha bhakinneka na kutukumbuka lubhilo.
MAR 14:51 Kakibha na nhongolo yumu ywakabheghite kanguntughila Yesu kakihwala nng'ololi nhuhu, nabho bhakiyigha kunkamula.
MAR 14:52 Peni mwene kakityelembuka kakighuleka ghula nnghololi kakitugha kyanga lipinda.
MAR 14:53 Bhakinnyegha Yesu kwa Ndundame Nkulu nabho andundame akulu, aghohi na ahunda bha malaghilo bhakikongongana papamu.
MAR 14:54 Petili kakintughila Yesu kya kutalii, mbaka kulubhigho lwa Ndundame Nkulu. Akwo kakitama papamu na amachonda bha kupingikiha paakiyota mwoto.
MAR 14:55 Mandundame akulu na bhandu bhoha bha libalasa likulu bhakipalaha uyimiho ghwa kunkokeha Yesu ngati ankome, peni bhakilepelwa.
MAR 14:56 Bhandu ayoloho bhakighomba uyimiho ghwa uhwangi kwa kya Yesu, peni uyimiho ghwabhe ghukiponingana.
MAR 14:57 Ndo bhangi bhakiyima bhakilongela uyimiho ghwa uhwangi kwa kya ywombe pakilongela,
