LUK 21:29 Mbole Yesu kakiaghombela ndambulo ayi, “Mughulolekehe nkongo ghwa tini, na mikongo mitangalo hyoha.
LUK 21:30 Payitomolite mahamba, mungumanya kukita ndaluko ghwa mabeno yikiheghela.
LUK 21:31 Ubhwabhu abhu, pa mmona mihalu aywo yingubwituka, ndo maamanye kukita Ghubhutwa gwa Chapanga ghuheghelela.”
LUK 21:32 “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, bhandu bha kibheleko aki kyaakinda ng'obhe mbaka agha ghoha ghabwituke.
LUK 21:33 Kunani kwa Chapanga na nnima ghwaakinda, peni malagho ghangu kukinda kata.”
LUK 21:34 “Mulindakile, myoyo yenu yikotoke kutopelwa kwa uhukilo, ulobhi, na milando ya ubhumi aghu. Hela bhubho linjubha lila lyahika kwa kuyumbatika.
LUK 21:35 Kiyaha handa bhula ntyegho paghukamula, ndo ubhwabhu abhu linjubha lila lyahika kwa bhandu bhoha bha alamite mu kibhungi kya nnima aghu ghwoha.
LUK 21:36 Hinu nkilukihe pamunnyupa Chapanga, ngati nlopoke na ghala ghoha ghaabwituka na kuyima mu ulongolo ghwa Mwana ghwa Mundu.”
LUK 21:37 Manjubha ghoha pamuhi Yesu kakibhegha pakiahunda bhandu Mukitutubhi kya Chapanga, peni mumakimuhi kakighenda kukitumbi kya mikongo hya Miseituni na kakitamaha akwo kilu kilu nda!
LUK 21:38 Na bhandu bhoha bhakihika ku Kitutubhi kya Chapanga putiputi ngati apati annyihwa Yesu.
LUK 22:1 Pakiheghelelite kikubhukubhu kya mangate yanga kubhikwa linjacha, yiikemiteghwe Pasaka.
LUK 22:2 Andundame akulu na ahunda bha malaghilo bhakibha bhangupalaha kihokonyo kya kunkoma Yesu, peni bhakibhayoghopa bhandu.
LUK 22:3 Hino, Nchipila kakinnyingila Yuda, ywaankemiteghe Isikaliyote, yumoo ywa bhala ahundwa kumi na mbili.
LUK 22:4 Yuda kakighenda kwa andundame akulu na kwa mahofisa bha machonda bha kupingikiha Kitutubhi kya Chapanga, kakighombana nabho kwa kya bhuli bhangankamula Yesu.
LUK 22:5 Nabho bhakiyelelwa na bhakilingana kunpegha ngalabha.
LUK 22:6 Naywo Yuda kakiyitikila, na kakiyanda kupalaha ng'ebhu ya maha ya kunkamuha Yesu kwa bhene, kya nga lwa bhandu kumanya.
LUK 22:7 Hinu likihika linjubha lya mangate yangabhikwa linjacha, alyo ndo linjubha lya kuliyambika lyana mene lya Pasaka.
LUK 22:8 Habhu Yesu kakialaghila Petili na Yohane pakilongela, “Nng'ende mukabhike kala hilyo hya Pasaka ngati tulyeghe.”
LUK 22:9 Bhene bhakinkonya, “Ghungupala tuyitendekehe kwoki?”
LUK 22:10 Yesu kakiayanga, “Munnyihwe! Pammegha mukuyingila kukitami, maakongana na nnume yumu kaghegha kibhigha kya machi, muntughile mbaka ku lubhagha lwakapala kuyingila,
LUK 22:11 Munng'ombele nkola lubhagha, ‘Nhunda kangukonya, kibhegha kwoki kyumba kya ahenja, kyene nenga na ahundwa bhangu twaalyegha kikubhukubhu kya Pasaka?’
LUK 22:12 Kataalangiha kyumba kikulu kuligholofa, kiibhikitwe maha kala. Ntendekehe amwo.”
LUK 22:13 Bhakighenda na bhakibhona kila kilibhi kibhegha tela handa paaghombilitwe Yesu. Kya habhu bhakitendekeha mulyo ghwa Pasaka.
LUK 22:14 Palihikite lisaa, Yesu kakitama pakulyegha hilyo papamu na andumitumi bhake.
LUK 22:15 Mbole kakiaghombela, “Nikinoghelwa muno kuilyegha Pasaka ayi papamu na mwenga kukali na kumbamandwa kwa nenga.
LUK 22:16 Hinu nunguaghombela, ndaalyegha kangi ng'obhe Pasaka mbaka payitulukila Mughubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.”
LUK 22:17 Mbole Yesu kakitola nnobho, kakinnumba Chapanga pakilongela, “Ntole nnobho aghu nkingulani mabhoha.
LUK 22:18 Kiyaha nunguaghombela, kutandila hinu ndanywegha kangi ng'obhe difwai yiihuma munkongo ghwa nsabibu mbaka paghupalakuhika Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.”
LUK 22:19 Mbole kakilitola lingate, kakinnumba Chapanga, kakilimetula na kakiapegha andumitumi bhake pakilongela, “Aghu ndo mmili ghwangu ghuubhuhwa kwakya mwenga, ntende naha kya kungulungwa nenga.”
LUK 22:20 Ubhwabhuabhu mbole ya kulyegha, kakighutola ghula nnobho ghwa difwai pakilongela, “Nnobho aghu ndo Ninganilo lya hyono liibhonihitwe kukita lya hoto kwa mwahi ghwangu, ghuuyitika kwakya mwenga.”
LUK 22:21 “Peni nnole, yula ywakapalakungiluka kabhegha bahapa apa pakulyeghela papamu na nenga.
LUK 22:22 Kulyaghila Mwana ghwa Mundu kangughenda kukomwa handa muyipanganitwe na Chapanga, peni ghwaabhegha npinguhi ghwakyabhuli kwa yula yunakunkiluka.”
LUK 22:23 Andumitumi bhake bhakiyanda kukonyana bhene kwa bhene, ghani mu bhombe ywangahotolite katatenda nnhalo ghula.
LUK 22:24 Mbole ghakibwituka maghombano mu bhala ahundwa kukita ghani kanguhwachilwa kabhe nkulu kupitingana bhangi?
LUK 22:25 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Abhatwa bha bhandu bhaabheghite ng'obhe Ayahudi bhanguatabhala bhandu bhabhe kwa makakala, nabho bha abheghite na makakala angulikema aghanja bha bhandu bha abhatabhala.
LUK 22:26 Peni mwenga nkotoke kulandana na bhombe, ngati yula ywaabhegha nkulu mumwenga, yingunkwiliha kabhe nndokwa kupitingana bhoha, na kilongohi mbaka kabhe kuakeyela ayake.
LUK 22:27 Hino ndo ywoki ywaabheghite nkulu, yula ywakutama pakulyeghela hilyo, ebu yula ywakahikeyela hilyo? Kulyaghila ndo yula ywakatama pakulyeghela hilyo! Hata naha nenga megha apa mumwenga handa nndumindumi.”
LUK 22:28 “Mwenga mmegha papamu na nenga mu mayighilo ghangu ghoha.
LUK 22:29 Na handa bhula Tate ghwangu pakangamuhite ghubhutwa, ubhwabhu abhu na nenga nunguakamuha mwenga ghubhutwa.
LUK 22:30 Mwenga maalyegha na kunywegha pakulyegheha pangu muutabhala ghwangu, na maatama muhiteho hya ghubhutwa pamubhatosa bhandu bha makabila kumi na mbili gha Isilaeli.”
LUK 22:31 Yesu kakilongela, “Simoni, Simoni ghuyihwe, ghumanye kukita Nchipila kalekekehwa na Chapanga ngati abhapalangule handa mundu paayebheha mbunje hya ngano.
LUK 22:32 Peni nenga nughuyupila kwa Chapanga ghwenga Simoni, ngati kuhyubhalila kwako kukotoke kulepelwa, na paghumuyila ghuatengelehe alongo bhako.”
LUK 22:33 Petili kakinnyanga, “Bambo, nenga megha kala kughenda papamu naghwenga kukibhopo na kuhwegha.”
LUK 22:34 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ningukughombela Petili, yikali na mbichi lelo pakilo, ghwangana paundatu kukita ghungunmanya ng'obhe.”
LUK 22:35 Mbole Yesu kakiakonya ahundwa bhake, “Panubhaalaghilite kyanga lilobota ebu nhako ghwa mbiya ebu makobasi, mkipelelwa kilibhi kyohele?” Bhakinnyanga, “Aka kaa, tukipelelwa ng'obhe na kilibhi kyohele.”
LUK 22:36 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Peni hinu, ywakabheghite na lilobota kakalitole na ywakabheghite na nhako ghwake ghwa mbiya ubhwabhu abhu. Na ywanga lukechelo, kakahemengane lighwanda lyake ngati kakahemele lukechelo.
LUK 22:37 Kiyaha yityekwa mu matyeko gha Chapanga, ‘Kakibhalangilwa papamu na alemwa.’ Mihalo ayi yikityekwa kwa kya nenga, nunguaghombela kukita mihalo ayi mbaka ndendelwe.”
LUK 22:38 Ahundwa bhake bhakinng'ombela, “Bambo, ghulole, apa tubhegha na makechelo mabhili.” Kakiayanga, “Hinu yikwila.”
LUK 22:39 Yesu kakibhuka na kakighenda ku kitumbi kya mikongo hya Miseituni handa payibheghite hitohe hyaki, na ahundwa bhake bhakintughila.
LUK 22:40 Pakahikite akwo, kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Nnyupe ngati nkotoke kuyingila mumang'eho.”
LUK 22:41 Mwene kakilibhaghula nabho kya ng'ebhu ya utali ghwa kutagha liganga, kakichutama mayughwa pakiyupa Chapanga,
LUK 22:42 pakilongela, “Tate handa ghupala ghuubhuhe nnobho aghu ghwa kimbamanda, peni yibhe ng'obhe handa mumbalite nenga, ngati lila lighulipatite ndo lihotolwe.”
LUK 22:43 Nndumitumi ghwa kunani ghwa Chapanga kakinbwitukila ngati kannyonjokehe makakala.
LUK 22:44 Naywo pakabheghite mu lihingili likulu, kakiyupa kya kukangamala munu, na lihuki lyake likibha handa mandondogholo gha mwahi ghaaponekite mu lutupi.
LUK 22:45 Mbole ya kuyupa, kakiabhuyila ahundwa bhake, kakiabhona paakighonja, bhakibha bhakitotokela kubhukana na kuhyongoloka.
LUK 22:46 Naywo kakiakonya, “Kiyaha niki mungughonja? Nnyumuke nnyupe, ngati nkotoke kuyingila mu mang'eho.”
LUK 22:47 Yesu pakabheghite mukulongela, lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukinhikila, pa lukilongohwa na Yuda ywakabheghite yumoo ywa bhala ahundwa mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili. Naywo Yuda kakinheghelela Yesu ngati kakannjambuhe kwa kunhumbatila.
LUK 22:48 Peni Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Bhuli Yuda, ghungunkiluka Mwana ghwa Mundu kwa kunhumbatila?”
LUK 22:49 Ahundwa bha Yesu paabhonite ghaabhwitukilite bhakinng'ombela, “Bambo, tubhakechule kechule kwa makechelo ghetu?”
LUK 22:50 Yumoo ywa andumitumi ghwa Yesu, kakinkechula nndumindumi ghwa Ndundame Nkulu kwa lukechelo na kakilikechula likutu lyake lya mbande ya nnilo.
LUK 22:51 Peni Yesu kakilongela, “Nneke!” Kakiliyabhika lila likutu lya yula Mundu na kakinlamiha.
LUK 22:52 Mbole yesu kakiaghombela andundame akulu, na hilongohi bha amachonda bha Kitutubhi kya Chapanga na hilongohi bhangi bha Akaaisilaeli bha anhikilite ngati ankamule, “Kiyaha niki, munhikila na makechelo na hindonga, npoka?
LUK 22:53 Pameghite papamu na mwenga mumanjubha ghoha Pakitutubhi kya Chapanga mukingamula ng'obhe. Peni ali ndo lisaa lyenu, lisaa lya makakala gha lubhindu.”
LUK 22:54 Mbole bhakinkamula Yesu, bhakintola na bhakighenda naywo mbaka ku lubhagha Ndundame Nkulu. Peni Petili kakiatughila kya kutali.
LUK 22:55 Bhandu bhala pabhahikite kala, bhakikwata mwoto pakati ya lubhigho lwa lubhagha lwa Ndundame Nkulu na kutama papamu na kuyota mwoto, naywo Petili kakitama papamu nabho.
LUK 22:56 Nndumitumi yumo nndala, pakammonite Petili pakitama pambhwegha ya mwoto, kakinhulutulila mehu pakilongela, “Mundu ayu naywo kakibhegha papamu na Yesu!”
LUK 22:57 Peni Petili kakilema pakilongela, “Ndala! Nenga nungunmanya ng'obhe mundu aywo!”
LUK 22:58 Mbole kya mandina, mundu yungi kakimmona Petili na kakilongela, “Ghwenga ndo yumoo ywabhe.” Peni Petili kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga mundu ghwee! Nenga ng'obhe.”
LUK 22:59 Mbole ya lisaa limu, mundu yungi kakiyanda kakibhinilila, “Kulyaghila ayi ndo hoto mundu ayu naywo kakibhegha papamu na Yesu, kiyaha ywombe naywo ndi Nngalilaya.”
LUK 22:60 Petili kakiyanga, “Ghwenga mundu ghwee! Nenga nungumanya ng'obhe kighukilongela!” Bahala pala, pakabhegha akali mukulongela mbichi yikibhika.
LUK 22:61 Naywo Bambo kakikilibhuka na kunlolekeha Petili. Petili kakighakulungwa ghala malagho gha Yesu ghakanng'ombilite, “Lelo yikali na mbichi ghwaangiluka pandatu.”
LUK 22:62 Mbole Petili kakighenda panje na kakilila muno.
LUK 22:63 Bhala bhandu bha abheghite mu kunpingikiha Yesu bhakiyanda kunnyuyuha na kuntuta.
LUK 22:64 Bhakinmopa lipinda mumeho na bhakinkonya, “Ghulondole! Ndo ghani aywo ywakakututite?”
LUK 22:65 Na bhakighendelela kuntendela ufyangu kwa maligho matangalo.
LUK 22:66 Paghucheghite, njenga kaya ya aghohi hilongohi bha Isilaeli yikitama, na andundame akulu na ahunda bha malaghilo nabho bhakibhegha. Yesu kakigheghwa mulibalasa alyo.
LUK 22:67 Bhakinng'ombela, “Handa ghwenga ndo Kilisito ghutughombele.” Yesu kakiayanga, “Handa panubhaghombela maahyubhalila ng'obhe.
LUK 22:68 Na handa panubhayupa kunnyanga ngonyo, mannyanga ng'obhe.
LUK 22:69 Peni kutandila hinu Mwana ghwa Mundu katatama mumbande ya nnilo ya Chapanga Yunamakalama.”
LUK 22:70 Bhoha bhakikonya, “Hinu ghwenga ndo Mwana ghwa Chapanga?” Mwene kakiayanga, “Mwenga nnongela kukita nenga ndo ywene.”
LUK 22:71 Mbole bhakilongela, “Bhuli! Tungupala uyimiho ghwoki kangi? Twabhene tuyihwa pakilongela kwa nlomo ghwake mwene.”
LUK 23:1 Mbole lumati lwoha lwa bhandu lukiyima na kunnyegha Yesu kwa Pilato.
LUK 23:2 Nabho bhakiyanda kunkokela paakilongela, “Tukimmona mundu ayu kanguapotongana bhandu bha nnima ghwetu, kanguakanikiha bhandu akotoke kunpegha sumu Mutwa nkulu ghwa Akaaloma na kangulikema mwene ndo Kilisito, Mutwa.”
LUK 23:3 Ndo Pilato kakinkonya Yesu, “Ghwenga ndo mutwa ghwa Akaayahudi?” Yesu kakinmyanga, “Gwenga ghulongela.”
LUK 23:4 Ndo Pilato kakiaghombela andundame akulu na lumati lwa bhandu, “Nighubhona ng'obhe uhokelo ghwohele ghula kwa mundu ayu!”
LUK 23:5 Peni bhene bhakikamala kulongela, “Kanguakolekeha bhandu kwa mahundo ghake mu nnima ghwoha ghwa Yudea. Kakiyanda ako Galilaya na hinu kahika aku.”
LUK 23:6 Pilato pakayihwite agha kakikonya, “Mundu ayu nkolannima ghwa ku Galilaya?”
LUK 23:7 Pakamanyite kukita Yesu kakihuma kunnima ghuubheghite mumakakala gha mutwa Helode, kakinyegha kwa Helode, ywene mumanjubha agho kakibhegha akwo ku Yelusalemu.
LUK 23:8 Helode kakiyelelwa muno pakammonite Yesu, kiyaha kwa manjubha matangalo kakiyihwa mihalo miyoloho yakya Yesu kakidumbila kummona. Kangi kakipala kummona pakitenda naho.
LUK 23:9 Helode kakinkonya Yesu makonyo matangalo, peni Yesu kakinnyanga ng'obhe kyohele.
LUK 23:10 Akaandundame akulu na ahunda bha malaghilo bhakihika kuulongolo, bhakinkokela Yesu kwa ukalipo munu.
LUK 23:11 Helode na amachonda bhake bhakinkinila Yesu na kunbhikila ubhichi. Bhakinhwaliha lipinda lya kibhutwa na bhakinbhuyila kwa Pilato.
LUK 23:12 Kalongohi, Helode na Pilato bhakibha amyanja, peni kutandila linjubha alyo akibhegha aghanja.
LUK 23:13 Hinu Pilato kakiakema akaandundame akulu, na hilongohi bha Akaayahudi na bhandu bhangi,
LUK 23:14 kakiaghombela, “Mwenga mungunnyegha mundu ayu kwa nenga pamunlongela kukita kanguakolekeha bhandu bhaghukiluke utabhala. Hinu nnyihwe! Mbole ya kuhingukiha nhalo agho paulongolo ghwenu nikighubhona ng'obhe uhokelo mungokelo yenu kwa mwene.
LUK 23:15 Ebhu Helode kakimmona ng'obhe na uhokelo ghwohele ndo mana kakimmuyila kwa nenga. Kulyaghila mundu ayu katenda ng'obhe kyohele kya kuntenda kahweghe.
LUK 23:16 Hinu ningukwilikiha katutwe hindomondo na ndanlekekeha.”
LUK 23:17 Mu kila kikubhukubhu kya Pakasa yikibha hitohe ya Palato kubhahughulila bhandu nbhopwa yumu.
LUK 23:18 Ndo bhandu bhoha bhakituta kyobho kwa papamu, “Ghunkome mundu aywo! Ghutuhughulile Balaba!”
LUK 23:19 Balaba kakibhopwa mu kibhopo kiyaha kakilongoha bhulwa ngulu mu kitami na kya kukoma.
LUK 23:20 Pilato kakipala kunlekekeha Yesu, ndo kakilongela nabho kangi.
LUK 23:21 Peni bhene bhakiyendelela kututa kyobho pakilongela, “Ghunmangalile mulupingika! Ghunbhambe mulupingika!”
LUK 23:22 Kya pa ndatu Pilato kakiaghombela, “Katenda uhekelo ghani? Nenga ningughubhona ng'obhe uhokelo ghwohele kwa ywombe lya kuntenda kakomwe, hinu nda nntuta hindomondo mbole ndanlekekeha.”
LUK 23:23 Peni bhene bhakiyendelela kututa kyobho kwa makakala muno, kukita yingunnogha kakamangalilwe. Mu uhiko malobhe ghabhe ghakikingamwa.
LUK 23:24 Hinu Pilato kakilamula kukita kila bhaakipala bhandu kitendeke.
LUK 23:25 Kakimmopolela yula mundu bhaanpalite, ywakabheghite mu kibhopo, ywene ywakatendite bhulwa ngulu kwa utabhala na kukoma bhandu. Na kakinkamuha Yesu mu mabhoko ghabhe, ngati bhantendele handa mwaapalite.
LUK 23:26 Amachonda pa abheghite mu kunnyegha ku Goligota, bhakikongana na mundu yumu ankemite Simoni ghwa Kulene, ywakabheghite mu kubhuya kuhuma panji ya kitami. Hinu bhakinkamula na bhakinpapiha lula lupingika kaluyeghe kuhyetu kwa Yesu.
LUK 23:27 Lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukimmutukila, pakibhegha adala bhaabheghite mu kunlilila na kunhyononekela.
LUK 23:28 Yesu kakiaghalambukila, na kakiaghombela, “Mwenga makaadala ghwa Yelusalemu, nkotoke kunilila nenga ngati mulilile mabhene na bhana bhenu
LUK 23:29 Kiyaha kulyaghila manjubha ghatahika apo bhatalongela, ‘Bhanonelwa bhala adala bhangalela, ebu mabhele ghangayongeha.’
LUK 23:30 Kiyaha mu manjubha agho bhandu bhatayanda kuhighombela hitumbi, ‘Mutughweghele!’ Na hitumbi hichoko hichoko, ‘Mutugubike’
LUK 23:31 Kiyaha handa bhandu bhaghutendelaa bhabhu nkongo nmihi, kwa njilo yabhegha bhuli?”
LUK 23:32 Machonda bhakintola Yesu papamu na ahakata abhili, ngati bhakabhambwe mulupingika.
LUK 23:33 Paahikite pala apakemite Lihuhu lya Mutwe, apa ndo bhakinmangalila Yesu mulupingika, na bhala ahakata abhili bhakiabhamba kila yumo mulupingika lwake yumo mu mbande hyaki ya nnilo ya Yesu na yumo mumbande hyaki ya kungiya.
LUK 23:34 Yesu kakilongela, “Tate ghubhalekekehe kiyaha bhangumanya ng'obhe kila kyabhaatenda!” Mbole bhakigabhana mapinda ghake kwa kutenda simbi.
LUK 23:35 Bhandu bhakiyima apwo pa akinlolekeha, na hilongohi ghwa Akaayahudi bhakinbhicha Yesu pa akilongela. “Kakialopoha bhangi! Hinu kalilopohe mwene, handa mwene ndo Kilisito ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga!”
LUK 23:36 Amachonda nabho bhakihika, na bhakintendela ubhichi na kunkinila, bhakinyeghela kilobhi ili kakanyweghe.
LUK 23:37 Nabho bhakinng'ombela, “Handa ghwenga ndo Mutwa ghwa Akaayahudi, ghulilopohe ghumwene.”
LUK 23:38 Hilahila unani mwa lupingika lwake bhakilubhika lupapi luutyekitwe malembo agha, “AYU NDO MUTWA GHWA AKAAYAHUDI.”
LUK 23:39 Yumoo ghwa bhala ahokelo bhaamangalilitwe papamu naywo kakintendela ufyangu pakalongele, “Ghwenga ndo Kilisito ng'obhe? Ghulilopohe ghumwene na ghutulopohe na twenga.”
LUK 23:40 Yula nhokelo yungi kakinlakalila nnyake, pakilongela, “Ghwenga, bhuli ghungunnyoghopa ng'obhe Chapanga na ghubhegha mutoso ahyo ahyo?
LUK 23:41 Twenga tutoswa kwa shaliya kiyaha tungunoghwa toso ya ndendelo yetu. Peni mundu ayu kakitenda ng'obhe kyohele kihakata.”
LUK 23:42 Mbole kakilongela, “Bambo Yesu, ghuhwachile nenga paghuyingila mu Ubhutwa ghwako.”
LUK 23:43 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Kulyaghila, nungughughombela hoto, lelo ghwabhegha papamu na nenga ku Paladiso.”
LUK 23:44 Yikibhegha handa saa sita, kukibhegha na lubhindu mu nnima ghwoha mbaka saa tisa, kiyaha luchubha lukileka kubhuha bhwelo.
LUK 23:45 Na lipasia liighabhanite pabhili Kitutubhi kya Chapanga likibaluka hipalamande hibhili.
LUK 23:46 Yesu kakilila kwa lilobhe likulu, “Tate, mu mabhoko ghako ningughubhika nhuki ghwangu.” Mbole ya kughalongela agha kakihwegha.
LUK 23:47 Yula machonda kilongohi pakabhonite agha, kakintika Chapanga pakilongela, “Kulyaghila mundu ayu kakighatughilagha ghala ghakaghapala Chapanga!”
LUK 23:48 Bhandu bhoha bhaaghendite kwakya nhalo agho, paabhonote agho ghaabwitukilite bhakibhuya ukaya kwabhe kunu bhaakilituta tuta mu hifubha hyabhe kubhoneha kukita bhakibhegha na hyononeko munu.
LUK 23:49 Peni aghanja, alongo na bhoha bhaanmanyite Yesu, papamu na bhala adala bhantughilite kuhuma ku Galilaya, bhakiyima kya kutali paakilolekea nnando aghwo.
LUK 23:50 Hinu, kukibha na mundu yumu ywa maha lihina lyake likibha Yosefu, ywakabheghite nkolannima ghwa Kualimataya akwo Yudea, kakibhegha mundu ywakaghatughila ghghapalite Chapanga na ywa kuhokamilwa.
LUK 23:51 Alimatayu kakibhegha mukughulimbilila Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga. Mwene kakibhegha yumoo ywa bhandu bha munjengakaya ya Akaayahudi, peni mwene kakililunga nabho ng'ohe mutoso na ndendelo ya alongohi ayake, naywo kakibhegha mukughulindila Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga kwa upalo nkulu.
LUK 23:52 Yosefu kakighenda kwa Pilato kuyupa kakakamuhwe mmili ghwa Yesu.
LUK 23:53 Kakighuhuluha kuhuma kulupingika, kakighubhulungilila sanda na kughubhika mulindogholo lihongolitwe mulitalabha, mualyo lindogholo kakibhikwa ng'obhe mundu ywohele.
LUK 23:54 Linjubha alyo, likibhegha linjubha lya utendekeho, na Linjubha la Kupumulila, likibhegha ugheghela kuyanda.
LUK 23:55 Bhala adala bhaahikite papamu na Yesu kuhuma ku Galilaya, bhakintughila Yosefu, bhakilibhona lila lindogholo na bhuli bhuli Yosefu kakighughonjeha mmili ghwa Yesu.
LUK 23:56 Mbole bhakibhuya ukaya na bhakitendekeha luhumba lwa kunungila na mahuta ghaanungila gha kughutyeka mmili ghwake. Peni bhakipumulila Linjubha lya Kupumulila handa muyibheghite malaghilo gha Musa.
LUK 24:1 Mulinjubha lya ulongohi lya juma, malabhila putiputi, adala bhala akilutola luhumba lwa kunungila bhaalubhikite kala na bhakighenda kulindogholo.
LUK 24:2 Bhakilibhona lila liganga likulu liigubikite lindogholo libhilingihwa kala kuhuma mu lindogholo,
LUK 24:3 Peni paayingilite mu lindogholo bhakighubhona ng'obhe mmili ghwa Bambo Yesu.
LUK 24:4 Paabheghite mu kukangacha nhalo aghwo, kamu bhandu abhili bha ahwalite mapinda ghang'anyimite muno handa limuli lwa njahe, bhakiyima ugheghela nabho.
LUK 24:5 Bhala adala bhakiyingilwa lyogha munu na bhakihokama mbaka palutupi. Peni bhala bhandu bhakiaghombela, “Kiyaha niki mungunpalaha yunaubhumi paatama bhaahweghite?
LUK 24:6 Kabhegha ng'obhe apa kahyuka kala! Mughakulungwe ghala ghakaaghombilite pakabheghite na mwenga akwo Galilaya,
LUK 24:7 kukita, ‘Yikibhegha mbaka Mwana ghwa Mundu kakamuhwe mumabhoko gha bhandu bhanaulemwa, na ahakata, kabamangalilwe na linjubha lya ndatu kahyuke.’ ”
LUK 24:8 Kamu ndo bhakighakulungwa malagho ghabhaghombilitwe na Yesu.
LUK 24:9 Paabhuyite kuhuma akwo kulindogholo, bhakiaghombela bhala ahundwa kumi na moja na bhangi mihalo aywo hyoha.
LUK 24:10 Andumitumi bhaayeghite mihalu aywo akibhegha, Malia Magadalena, Yoana na Malia maghwake Yakobu papamu na bhangi bhaalongoanite nabho.
LUK 24:11 Peni bhala bhaayihwite bhakihyubhalila ng'obhe, kiyaha malagho ghabhe ghakibhegha handa bhana uhila mahala.
LUK 24:12 Hata naha Petili kakiyinuka na kughenda kula kulindogholo. Pakahokamite ngati kalolekehe mula mulindogholo, kakiyibhona sanda ghweka. Naywo kakibhuya ukaya kunu pakikangacha ghala ghabwitukilite.
LUK 24:13 Mulinjubha alyo alyo, ahundwa abhili bha Yesu bhakibhegha mumwanja kughenda kukijiji kiikemwa lihina lyake Emau, yikibha Maili saba kuhuma Kuyelusalemu.
LUK 24:14 Bhakibha bhangughombana bhene kwa bhene kya ghala ghabwitukilite.
LUK 24:15 Pabhabheghite mukuyobhela, mwene Yesu kakiahikila na pakityanga papamu nabho.
LUK 24:16 Bhombe bhakimmona kwa meho ghabhe peni bhakimmanya chepa.
LUK 24:17 Yesu kakiakonya, “Ndo mihalo ghani ayi yimuyiyobhela kunu pamutyanga?” Bhombe bhakiyima, na bhakihyononeka muno.
LUK 24:18 Yumo ywabhe ywaankemite lihina lyake Kileopa, kakinkonya, “Yingubhonekana ghwenga ndo nhenja ghwa ghweka chako ghwanga kumanya ghala ghabwitukilite Yelusalemu mumanjubha agha?”
LUK 24:19 Yesu kakiakonya, “Mihalu yoki?” Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Milando ya Yesu ghwa Kunasaleti. Mwene kakibha Mbuye ghwa Chapanga, na kakibhegha na makakala makulu mu malagho yake na ndendelo yake mu ulongolo ghwa Chapanga na anabhandu bhoha.
LUK 24:20 Andundame akulu na hilongohi bhetu bhakinbhuha na bhakinntosa kuhwegha, nabho bhakimmangalila mulupingika.
LUK 24:21 Twenga tukidumbila kukita mwene ndo nkombola ghwa Isilaeli. Peni hinu linjubha lya ndatu kuhuma paghabwitukilite agho.
LUK 24:22 Kangi, amoo bha adala bha kimati kyetu bhakitulilimuha munu. Bhakighenda kulindogholo lelo putiputi,
LUK 24:23 peni bhakighubhona ng'obhe mbhili ghwake. Na paabhuyite bhakilongela kukita bhakiabhona mahoka abhili bha Chapanga na abho bhakiaghombela kukita aywo Yesu kangutama.
LUK 24:24 Mbole amoo bha twenga bhakighenda kulindogholo na bhakibhona bhula bhula handa bhaalongilite bhala adala, Peni bhakimmona ng'obhe aywo Yesu.”
LUK 24:25 Mbole Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mwenga muna uhila mahala ghwa bhuli, na atopo ghwa myoyo ya kuhyubhalila ghala ghaalongilitwe na ambuye bha Chapanga!
LUK 24:26 Bhuli, yikinkwiliha ng'obhe Kilisito ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga kumbamandwa kwakya naha na mbole kakayingile mu ukulu ghwake?”
LUK 24:27 Kakifwambulila mihalu hyoha yakya mwene mu Malembo ghanakung'anyima kutandila mu hitabho ya Musa na mbaka mambuye bha Chapanga bhoha.
LUK 24:28 Nabho pabhabheghite ugheghela na kijiji kya aghendite, Yesu kakibhegha handa kangupala kughendelela mumwanja ghwake.
LUK 24:29 Peni bhombe bhakinpembeleha muno katame papamu nabho, pakilongela, “Ghutame apa na twenga kiyaha ndo makimuhi na lubhindu linguyingila” Ndo kakiyingila mu kitutubhi na kakitama nabho.
LUK 24:30 Pakatamite kulyegha hilyo papamu nabho, kakitola lingate, kakilinonela, na kakilimetula na kakiapegha.
LUK 24:31 Kamu mehu ghabhe ghakihughulighwa, na bhakinmanya kukita ndo Yesu, peni mwene kamu kakibhuka mu bhene. Na bhakimmona kangi ng'obhe.
LUK 24:32 Bhakikonyana bhene kwa bhene, “Bhuli, mioyo yetu yikiyaka ng'obhe kwa uyelelo pala pakabheghite mu kulongela na twenga mu njila na kutuhunda malembo?”
LUK 24:33 Kamu bhakibhuka na bhakibhuya ku Yelusalemu. Bhakihika kwa bhala ahundwa kumi na moja na bhala bhabheghite papamu nabho, bhakikunganika
LUK 24:34 bhakiaghombela bhala ahundwa abhili, “Kulyaghila Bambo kahyuka, naywo kakinbwitukila Simoni.”
LUK 24:35 Mbole bhala ahundwa abhili nabho bhakiaghombela ghala ghabhabwitukilite mu njila na kyabhuli bhakinmanya Yesu pakalimetulite lingate.
LUK 24:36 Pabhabheghite mukubhaghombela agho, mwene Yesu kakiyima pakati yabhe na kakiaghombela, “Ntame kya uhihimilo.”
LUK 24:37 Bhakililimuka na bhakiyoghopa na bhakihwacha kukita bhakighubhona nhuki.
LUK 24:38 Peni Yesu kakiakonya, “Kiyaha niki munguyoghopa? Kiyaha niki mmegha na bhwaghalili mumyoyo yenu?
LUK 24:39 Mughalole mabhoko na maghulu ghangu ndo mmanye kukita ndo nenga. Mughubyale mmili ghwangu kiyaha nhuki ghubhegha ng'obhe na mmili ebu kihupa handa pamumumona.”
LUK 24:40 Pakaghaghombite agha, kakiabhoneha mabhoko na maghulu ghake.
LUK 24:41 Bhakiyelelwa munu, kunu paakangacha mbaka bhakinhyubhalila ng'obhe kukita ghala ghaabhabhonite ndo hoto, ndo Yesu kakiakonya, “Mmegha na hilyo hyohele apa?”
LUK 24:42 Bhakinpegha kipalamande kya homba ghwa kubanika,
LUK 24:43 naywo kakikitola na kakilyegha mu ulongolo ghwabhe.
LUK 24:44 Mbole kakiaghombela, “Ayi ndo fwambulo ya ghala ghanibhaghombilite pangali na mwenga, kukita ghoha ghatyekitwe yakya nenga Mumalaghilo gha Musa, na ambuye bha Chapanga na Saburi mbaka ghatulukile.”
LUK 24:45 Ndo kakighahughula malango ghabhe ngati bhabheghe na makakala gha kughamanya malembo gha Chapanga.
LUK 24:46 Kakiaghombela, “Agha ndo ghaatyekitwe, Kilisito ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga katabamandwa na linjubha lya ndatu katahyuka kuhuma kubhaahweghite.”
LUK 24:47 Kangi kwa lihina lya Yesu bhandu bha milima hyoha kutandila Yelusalemu bhaalandamihwa kukita bhalipetule ulemwa ghwabhe ngati Chapanga kabhalekekehe ulemwa ghwabhe.
LUK 24:48 Na mwenga ndo ayimiho bha mihalo ayi na yinguakwiliha kulandamiha ghoha ghamughabhonite.
LUK 24:49 “Nnole nenga ndanlaghila Nhuki ghwa Chapanga, ywene Tate kakilaghite kukita kataapegha. Peni nlindile apa pakitami mbaka pankingama lila likalama kuhuma kunani.”
LUK 24:50 Mbole ya kualongoha ahundwa bhake panje ya kitami mbaka ku Betania, kakiyinula mabhoko ghake kunani na kubhanonela.
LUK 24:51 Pakabheghite mu kuanonela kakialeka, kakitolwa kughenda kunani kwa Chapanga.
LUK 24:52 Mbole bhakichutamila mayughwa na kuntundamila na bhakibhuya Yelusalemu paakibhegha na uyelelo nkulu.
LUK 24:53 Bhakitama masaa ghoha Mukitutubhi kya Chapanga kunu paakintika Chapanga. Ayi mwika.
JOH 1:1 Paulongohi yikali ya kubhumbwa nnima pakibhegha lilagho, aywo lilagho kakibhegha kwa Chapanga, naywo lilagho kakibhegha Chapanga.
JOH 1:2 Kutandila kalongohi aywo Lilagho kakibhegha papamu na Chapanga.
JOH 1:3 Hilibhi hyoha hikibhumbwa kupitila ywombe, hangi kya nga ywombe kahone kilibhi kyoheli kiibhumbwite.
JOH 1:4 Mu ywombe ndo muubheghiti ubhumi na ubhumi aghwo ghukiyegha lung'ali lwa bhandu.
JOH 1:5 Na lung'ali alwo lung'anyima palubhindo, nalwo lubhindo lukiluhotola ng'obhe alwo lung'ali.
JOH 1:6 Kakibhegha mundu yumu ywakalaghilitwe na Chapanga, mundu aywo kakikemwa Yohane.
JOH 1:7 Yohane kakihika kuaghombela bhandu kulinga alwo lung'ali, ili bhandu bhoha bhaliyihwe lilagho lyake na bhahyubhalile.
JOH 1:8 Aywo Yohane kakibhegha ng'obhe alwo lung'ali, ngati kakihika kuaghombela bhandu yakya alwo lung'ali.
JOH 1:9 Alu ndo lung'ali menyu, lung'ali luuhika pannima, kubhang'alikiha bhandu bhoha.
JOH 1:10 Hino, Lilagho kakibhegha paunnima na payibhele bhandu bha pannima bhakibhumbwa na ywombe, peni bhandu bhakinng'amula ng'obhe.
JOH 1:11 Kakihika kwa bhandu bhake, peni bhombe bhakinkingama ng'obhe.
JOH 1:12 Peni bhala bhaankingamite na kunnhyubhalila, kakiatenda kubhegha bhana bha Chapanga.
JOH 1:13 Abha ndo bhala bhaabhelekitwe chepa kwa mabhumbo bhandu muabhelekwa, ebu kiyaha bhandu bhangupala kubhegha na bhana, ngati abhelekwa na Chapanga mwene.
JOH 1:14 Naywo kakitendekwa mundu, kakitama na twenga, na twenga tukighubhona ukulu ghwake, ukulu handa ghwa Mwana ywa kighweka ywakahuma kwa Tate, kamemwa luhungu na uhoto.
JOH 1:15 Yohane kakiaghombela bhandu mihalo yake. Kakikweha lilobhe, “Ayu ndo yunubhaghombilite kukita, ‘Ywombe ndo yunakuhika mbole ya nenga ndo nkulu kupitingana nenga, kiyaha kakibhegha yikali na nenga kubhelekwa.’”
JOH 1:16 Kubhukana na utangalo gha umaha ghwake katupegha unonelo ntangalo ngenju.
JOH 1:17 Kiyaha Malaghilo ghakikamuhwa kupitila kwa Musa, umaha ghwa Chapanga na uhoto ghuhika kukindila kwa Yesu Kilisito.
JOH 1:18 Kahone mundu ywakammonite Chapanga nndaluko ghwohele, maha nga Mwana ywa Chapanga ywa kighweka, kabhegha papamu na Tate, ndo ywakankambuhite kwa twenga.
JOH 1:19 Hilongohi bha Ayahudi bha akwo Yelusalemu, bhakialaghila amoo Akaandundame na Akaalawi kwa Yohane kunkonya, “Ghwenga ndo ghani?”
JOH 1:20 Yohane kakialongela hoto, “Nenga chepa Kilisito, Nkombohi ywkahaghulitwe na Chapanga.”
JOH 1:21 Bhakinkonya kangi, “Hinu ghwenga ndo ghani?” Ghutughombele, ghwenga ghu Eliya? Yohane kakiyanga, “Aka kaa, nenga ng'obhe.” “Ebu ghwenga ndo yula Mbuye?” Kakiyanga, “Ng'obhe.”
JOH 1:22 Ndo bhakinng'ombela, “Hinu ghutughombele ghwenga ghu ghani tuabhuyihile luyango bhala bhaatulaghihite. Ghwenga ghungulongela bhuli yakya ghumwene?”
JOH 1:23 Yohane kakiayanga kwa malagho gha Mbuye Isaya, pakalongela, “Nenga ndo mundu yumu ywakakweha lilobhe kuhuma kukibhala. Muyigholelehe njila ya Bambo!”
JOH 1:24 Hino, bhala bhandu bhakilaghilwa na Afalisayu,
JOH 1:25 bhombe bhakinkonya paalongela, “Handa ghwenga ndo kilisto ng'obhe, ebu Eliya ng'obhe na kukita yula mbuye ng'obhe, kya bhuli ghungubatisa?”
JOH 1:26 Yohane kakiayanga, “Nenga nungubatisa kwa machi, peni munkati yenu kabhegha mundu yumu ywangakummanya.
JOH 1:27 Mbole yamanjubha ghaapala kuhika, kaahika ywombe, nunguhotola ng'obhe kubhopola ngoyi hya makubasi ghake.”
JOH 1:28 Milando ayi yikitendekwa akwo Betania kumwambo ya lukemba lwa Yoludani, kwene Yohane kwakabheghite kangubatisa.
JOH 1:29 Kilabhu yake, Yohane kakimmona Yesu pakinhikila, na kakilongela, “Nnole, Mwanamene ywa Chapanga ywakatola ulemwa ghwa bhandu!
JOH 1:30 Ayu ndo yula yunubhaghombilite kukita ‘Kanguhika mundu mbole ya nenga, ywene ndo nkulu kwa nenga, kiyaha kakibhegha yikali ya kubhelekwa nenga.’
JOH 1:31 Nenga numwene nikinmanya ng'obhe, peni nenga hika kubatisa kwa machi, ngati Akaaisilaeli ammanye.”
JOH 1:32 Mbole Yohane kakilongela, “Nikimmona Nhuki pakihuluka kuhuma Kunani kwa Chapanga handa ngunda, naywo kakitama unani mwaki.
JOH 1:33 Nenga nikimmanya ng'obhe, peni ywombe ywakanaghilite batise bhandu kwa machi kaking'ombela, ‘Yula mundu yughupala kummona, Nhuki pakanhulukila na kutama unani mwake, aywo ndo ywakapala kubatisa kwa Nhuki ywangu nenga Chapanga.’ ”
JOH 1:34 Yohana kakighendelela kulongela, “Nenga numwene mona nnando aghu na nungulongela kukita ywombe ndo Mwana ywa Chapanga.”
JOH 1:35 Kilabhu yake, Yohane kakibhegha kangi akwo papamu na ahundwa bhake abhili.
JOH 1:36 Pakammonite Yesu pakapita. Kakilongela “Ayu ndo Mwanamene ywa Chapanga!”
JOH 1:37 Bhala ahundwa bhake abhili paannyihwite Yohane pakilongela agha, bhakintughila Yesu.
JOH 1:38 Yesu kakikilibhuka, kakiabhona bhala ahundwa paantughila na kakiakonya, “Mungupalaha niki?” Bhakinnyanga “Ghungutama kwoki, Labi?” Mu Kihebulania fwambulo ya lilagho Labi ndo “Nhunda.”
JOH 1:39 Yesu kakiayanga, “Nhike na mupabhone,” Hino bhakighenda na kupabhona pala pakatamiteghe, bhakitama naywo linjubha lila kiyaha yikibhegha saa kumi makimuhi.
JOH 1:40 Yumoo ywa bhala abhili bhaannyihwite Yohane pakalongila, na bhakintughila Yesu kakibhegha Andelea nnongo ywake Simoni.
JOH 1:41 Kamu Andelea kakighenda kumpalaha Simoni nnongo ywake na kunng'ombela kukita, “Tummona Masiya” Fwambulo yake, “Kilisito”
JOH 1:42 Naywo kakinnyegha Simoni kwa Yesu. Yesu kakinnolekeha Simoni na kakinng'ombela, “Ghwenga ndo Simoni mwana ywa Yohane. Peni ghwaakemwa Kefa” kwa Kigiliki Petili fwambulo yake ndo “Litalabha.”
JOH 1:43 Kilabhu yake Yesu kakilamula kughenda ku Galilaya. Kakimmona Filipi na kakinng'ombela, “Ghundughile.”
JOH 1:44 Naywo Filipi kakibhegha nkolannima ywa ku Betasaida, kitami kyaatamiteghe Andelea na Petili.
JOH 1:45 Filipi naywo kakimmona Natanaeli na kakinng'ombela kukita, “Tummona ywombe ywene Musa kakityeka mihalo yake mu kitabho kya Malaghilo, naywo bhubho mambuye bhakityeka ya kya ywombe, naywo ndo Yesu ywa kitami kya Nasaleti Mwana ghwa Yosefu.”
JOH 1:46 Natanaeli kakinkonya Filipi, “Bhuli, kilibhi kya maha kyaahotola kubwitukila ku Nasaleti?” Filipi kakinnyanga. “Ghuhike na ghulole.”
JOH 1:47 Yesu pakammonite Natanaeli kanguntughila, kakilongela yakya ywombe, “Kulyaghila ayu ndo Nmundu ywa ku Isilaeli menyu, kahone ukubhuhi mu mwoyo ghwake!”
JOH 1:48 Natanaeli kakinkonya, “Ghumanya bhuli?” Yesu kakinnyanga, “Nikighubhona paghubheghiteghe pahi ya nkongo ghwa tini ikali Filipi kughukema.”
JOH 1:49 Natanaeli kakinng'ombela! “Nhunda, Ghwenga ndo Mwana ghwa Chapanga! Ghwenga ndo Mutwa ghwa Isilaeli!”
JOH 1:50 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghunguhyubhalila kiyaha nikighughombela nikighubhona paghubhegheteghe pahi ya nkongo ghwa tini? Hino ghwabhona milando mikulu kyanalumu kupitingana alyo”
JOH 1:51 Ndo! Kakinng'ombela, “Kulyaghila ningubhaghombela, mwenga maabhona kunani kwa Chapanga paghuyughuka na mahoka bha Chapanga paakwela na kuhuluka unani mwa Mwana ywa Mundu.”
JOH 2:1 Linjubha lya ndatu kukibhegha Chekwa ya kutolana mukitami kya Kana, ku nkoa ghwa Galilaya, naywo mama ywake Yesu kakibhegha akwo.
JOH 2:2 Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakilalikwa bhubho kuchekwa ayo ya kutolana.
JOH 2:3 Difwai payipelite mama ywake Yesu kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Bhapelelwa difwai.”
JOH 2:4 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Mama megha na niki na ghwenga? Lisaa lyangu likali kuhika.”
JOH 2:5 Mama ywake Yesu kakiaghombela bhala andumitumi, “Lyoheli lyakapala kubhaghombela mukitende.”
JOH 2:6 Hino, hikibhegha hibhigha sita hya kubhikila machi, hiitendekehitwe kwa malibho kwakya kuliyogha kwa hitohe hya Akaayahudi, kila kibhigha kikikwila hijoba hibhili ebu hindatu.
JOH 2:7 Yesu kakiaghombela bhala andumindumi bhake, “Muhimemekehe machi hibhigha ahi.” Bhombe bhakihimemekeha ng'enang'ena.
JOH 2:8 Mbole kakiaghombela, “Hinu nteke machi agha ghamandina, mukampeghe nkola chekwa.” Bhala andumindumi bhakitenda habhu.
JOH 2:9 Yula nkola chekwa kakighapaha ghala machi ghaaghalambukite kubhegha difwai, kakimanya ng'obhe kuyihumite difwai yila. Peni bhala andumitumi bhaatekite machi, bhombe bhakimanya. Kakinkemela bambo ghwa chekwa pambwegha
JOH 2:10 na kakinng'ombela, “Bhandu bhoha apangagha huti difwai ya maha, mbole bhandu paanywegha muno na kukwila, bhangupanga difwai ya bhwakabhwaka, peni ghwenga ghuyibhika difwai ya maha mbaka hinu!”
JOH 2:11 Aghu ndo yikibhegha naho ya kandahi ya Yesu ghakayitendite akwo Kukana ya Kugalilaya. Naha Yesu kakiyimiha ukulu ghwake na ahundwa bhake bhakinhyubhalila.
JOH 2:12 Mbole ya agha, Yesu papamu na mama ywake na alongo bhake na ahundwa bhake, bhakighenda ku Kapelinaumu na bhakitama akwo kwa manjubha gha mandina.
JOH 2:13 Payiheghelelite kikubhukubhu kya Pasaka yila ya Akaayahudi, Yesu kakighenda ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 2:14 Hino, akwo kulubhigho lwa Kitutubhi kya Chapanga kakiabhona bhandu paahemela makambako gha senga na mene na ngunda, na bhangi bhakitama mu hindangabhala paahemengana ngalabha.
JOH 2:15 Kakitendekeha kighwechulo kya lughoyi, kakiabhingabhinga bhoha kubhuka panji ya lubhigho lwa Kitutubhi kya Chapanga, papamu na makambako gha senga na mene, kakighwiha hindangabhala hya bhala bhanakuhemengana ngalabha na kuhiyita ngalabha hyabhe,
JOH 2:16 kakiaghombela bhala bhanguchuusa ngunda, “Muhibhuhe ahi apa! Nkotoke kuyitenda Kitutubhi kya Chapanga Tate ghwangu kukita ndo ligulio!”
JOH 2:17 Bhala ahundwa bha Yesu bhakikulungwa kukita Malembo gha Chapanga ghatyekwa, “Upalo ghwangu kwa Kitutubhi kyako Chapanga ghwanyocha handa mwoto nkati yangu, ghwenga Chapanga ywangu.”
JOH 2:18 Ndo Akaayahudi bhakinkonya, “Gwaahotola kutubhoneha naho yoki kutulaha kukita ghani kaghulaghila kughutenda nnando aghu?”
JOH 2:19 Yesu kakiayanga, “Nboghoyole kitutubhi aki kya Chapanga, na nenga ndayichenga kangi kwa manjubha mandatu.”
JOH 2:20 Bhala Akaayahudi bhakilongela, “Kitutubhi aki kya Chapanga kichengwa kwa ngungwa kumi ncheche na sita! Ghwenga ghwahotola bhuli kuyichenga kwa manjubha mandatu?”
JOH 2:21 Peni Yesu pakalongelite milando ya Kitutubhi kya Chapanga kakibhegha kangulubhulila ya kya mmili ghwake.
JOH 2:22 Mbole ya Yesu kuhyuka, ahundwa bhake bhakikulungwa ghala ghakalongelite, ndo bhakihyubhalila Malembo na ghala malagho ghakalongelite Yesu.
JOH 2:23 Yikibhegha pala Yesu pakabheghite ku Yelusalemu kukikubhukubhu kya Akaayahudi lihina lyake Pasaka, bhandu atangalo bhakinhyubhalila pabhabhonite naho na mihabho yakayitendite.
JOH 2:24 Peni Yesu kakiahyubhalila ng'obhe, kiyaha ywombe kakiyimanya mahwacho gha mumyoyo yabhe.
JOH 2:25 Yesu kakipalaha ng'obhe mundu ili kakanyimihe bhula paabheghite bhandu. Mwene kakimanya kala kila kiibheghite munkati ya kila mundu.
JOH 3:1 Hino pakibhegha mundu yumu Nfalisayu, lihina lyake kakikemwa Nikodemu, kilongohi ghwa Akaayahudi.
JOH 3:2 Aywo kakinng'endele Yesu pakilo na kunng'ombela, “Labi, tungumanya kukita ghwenga ghu nhunda ywakalaghilitwe na Chapanga, kiyaha kahone mundu yunakuhotola kutenda mihabho ayi yighuyitenda ghwenga, handa Chapanga kabhegha ng'obhe papamu na ywombe.”
JOH 3:3 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Kulyagila nenga ningughughombela, mundu ywohele ywangabhelekwa paubhili kaahotola ng'obhe kuyingila mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.”
JOH 3:4 Nikodemu kakinkonya, “Mundu kaahotola bhuli kubhelekwa paubhili? Mundu nahota kaahotola ng'obhe kuyingila mu lutumbo lwa mama ywake pabhili na mbole kabhelekwe kangi!”
JOH 3:5 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Kulyaghila nenga ningughughombela, kahone mundu ywohele ywakahotola kuyingila mu Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga mbaka kabhelekwe kwa machi na Nhuki ywa Chapanga.
JOH 3:6 Bhandu bhangubhelekwa kuhuma kwa abhele bhake, peni bhandu bhangughalambulwa kubhegha bhana bha Chapanga na Nhuki ywa Chapanga.
JOH 3:7 Hino, ghukotoke kukangacha panughughombela ghungunoghwa ghubhelekwe kangi.
JOH 3:8 Liyegha lingupula kughenda kwohele kuulipala, ghwayihwa lupulo lwake, peni kahone kulimanya kulihuma ebu kulighenda. Yibha ubhwabhu kwa mundu ywohele ywakabhelekwite kwa Nhuki.”
JOH 3:9 Nikodemu kakinkonya, “Milando ayi yaahotoleka bhuli?”
JOH 3:10 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ghu nhunda nhwadali ywa Isilaeli, na ghwenga ghungumanya ng'obhe milando ayi?
JOH 3:11 Kulyaghila nenga ningughughombela, twenga tungukambuka ghatughamanya na kubhoneha lila litulibhona, peni mwenga mungulikana Lilagho lyetu.
JOH 3:12 Ningubhaghombela milando yiitendeka pannima, na mwenga mungunhyubhalila ng'obhe, manyubhalila bhuli panuaghombela milando ya kunani kwa Chapanga?
JOH 3:13 Kahone mundu ywohele ywakaghendite kunani kwa Chapanga maha nga ywombe ywakahulukite kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga, ywene ndo Mwana ywa Mundu.”
JOH 3:14 Handa bhula Musa pakannyinulite yula liyoka ywa lihabha kula kukibhala, ubhwabhu abhu Mwana ywa Mundu kangukangunoghwa kuyinulighwa kunani,
JOH 3:15 ili mundu ywohele ywakanhyubhalila kabheghe na ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha ghwanga kupela.
JOH 3:16 “Kiyaha Chapanga kakighupala nnima mbaka kakimmuha Mwana ghwake ghwa kighweka, ngati kila mundu ywakanhyubhalila kakotoke kuhobha, ngati kabheghe na ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha ghanga pela!”
JOH 3:17 Kiyaha Chapanga kakinnaghila ng'obhe Mwana ghwake ngati kaghutose nnima, maha kaghulopohe nnima.
JOH 3:18 Mundu ywohele ywakanhyubhalila Mwana kaatoswa ng'obhe, peni mundu ywohele ywanga kunhyubhalila Mwana kaatoswa kala, kiyaha kakinhyubhalila ng'obhe Mwana ywa kighweka ywa Chapanga.
JOH 3:19 Na toso yene ndo ayi, kukita lung'ali luhika pannima, peni bhandu bhalupala lubhindo bhaghulema lung'ali, kwa ndendelo yabhe ya uhokelo.
JOH 3:20 Kila mundu ywakatenda uhokelo kangulukalalila lung'ali, kangi kanguhika ng'obhe palung'ali ngati mandendelo ghake gha uhokelo ghakotoke kung'alighwa.
JOH 3:21 Peni bhala bhanakughungila gha hoto bhanguhika palung'ali, ili mandendelo ghabhe ghabhonekane paubhwelo kukita ghatendeka handa paapala Chapanga.
JOH 3:22 Mbole ya agho, Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakighenda ku nnima ghwa Yudea, nabho bhakitama akwo manjubha gha mandina na bhakiabatisa bhandu.
JOH 3:23 Yohane naywo kakibhegha kangubatisa akwo ku Ainoni ugheghela na kijiji kya Salimu kiyaha akwo kukibhegha na machi ngenju. Bhandu bhakinng'endela akwo ngati bhabatiswe.
JOH 3:24 Ayi yikibhegha yikali na Yohane kubhopwa kukibhopo.
JOH 3:25 Linjubhalimu ghakihwimbuka malimbano muamoo bha ahundwa bha Yohane yunakubatisa na Nnyahudi yumu yakya luhumu lwa kitohe kya kukuha yikali ya kutundamila.
JOH 3:26 Bhala ahundwa bhakinng'endela Yohane na bhakinng'ombela, “Nhunda, yula mundu ywakabheghite na ghwenga kumwambo ya lukemba lwa Yoludani, ywene ghwenga ghukitughombela mihalo yake, hinu kangubatisa na bhandu atangalo bhangunng'endela.”
JOH 3:27 Yohane kakiayanga, “Kahone mundu ywakahotola kumokola kilibhi kyohele, ngati mbaka kapeghwe na Chapanga.
JOH 3:28 Na mwenga ndo ayimiho bha nenga kukita nikilongela, ‘Nenga nu Kilisto ng'obhe ywakahaghulitwe na Chapanga, ngati naghilwa ninnongolele ywombe.’
JOH 3:29 Nndala yunakutolelwa ndo ywake bambo yunakutolela, peni ghanja ywake bambo yunakutola, kanguyelelwa munu pakaliyihwa lilobhe lya bambo yunakutolela. Hinu nunguyelelwa kyanalumu.
JOH 3:30 Ywombe yingunnogha kabheghe nkulu munu na nenga yingunnogha meghe nndoko.”
JOH 3:31 Ywombe ywakahika kuhuma kunani kabhegha kunani kwa bhandu bhoha. Na ywombe ywakabheghite pannima ndo ywa pannima naywo kanguyobhela milando ya pannima, ngati ywombe ywakahikite kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga kabhegha nnkulu kwa bhandu bhoha.
JOH 3:32 Ywombe kanguaghombela bhandu ghala ghakaghabhonite na kughayihwa, peni kahone mundu ywakauyitikila uyimiho ghwake.
JOH 3:33 Peni mundu ywohele ywakauyikitila uyimiho aghwo kanguyimiha kukita ghakalongela Chapanga ndo hoto.
JOH 3:34 Ywombe ywakalagihitwe na Chapanga kangulongela malagho gha Chapanga, kiyaha Chapanga kangunpegha Nhuki ywake ili kannongohe mundu aywo kwa milando hyoha.
JOH 3:35 Tate kangunpala Mwana, naywo kampegha hilibhi hyoha ili kahitabhale.
JOH 3:36 Mundu ywohele ywakanhyubhalila Mwana ywa Chapanga kangubhegha na ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha, peni mundu ywanga kunhyubhalila Mwana kataghubhona ng'obhe ubhumi, ngati kiyaghabhu kya Chapanga kyabhegha unani mwake kyanga uhiko.
JOH 4:1 Afalisayo bhakiyihwa kukita Yesu kakibhegha kangumokola na kuabatisa ahundwa atangalo kupitingana Yohane.
JOH 4:2 Peni Yesu mwene kakibatisa ng'obhe, ngati ahundwa bhake ndo bhakibatisa.
JOH 4:3 Yesu pakayihwite nhalo aghu, kakibhuka ku Yudea na kakibhuya kangi mbaka ku Galilaya,
JOH 4:4 mu mwanja aghwo yikinnogha kapitile pakati ya Samalia.
JOH 4:5 Hino, kakihika kukitami kimu kya Samalia kiikemiteghwe Sikali, ugheghela na nng'unda ghula ghwene Yakobu kakinpegha mwana ywake Yosefu.
JOH 4:6 Pahala apo pakibhegha na kilibha kya Yakobu, kubhukana na kutotokela na mwanja, Yesu kakitama pambwegha ya kilibha. Yikibhegha handa saa lya luchubha lwa londondohi.
JOH 4:7 Hino, nndala yumu Nsamalia kakihika kuteka machi, na Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghumbeghe machi nyweghe.”
JOH 4:8 Peneapo ahundwa bha Yesu bhakighenda ku mbwani kuhemela hilyo.
JOH 4:9 Hino, yula nndala kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ghu Nnyahudi na nenga nu nndala Nsamalia, ghunghotola bhuli ghunyupe machi?” Akaayahudi bhakibhegha bhangulihanga ng'obhe na Akaasamalia na kutenda kyohele papamu.
JOH 4:10 Yesu kakinnyanga yula nndala, “Handa ghungamanyite kilibhi kyene Chapanga kanguhotola kughupegha, na ywoki ywakakughombela ghumbeghe machi nyweghe, ghwenga ghungannyupite kaghupeghe machi ghaabheghite na ubhumi.”
JOH 4:11 Yula nndala kakinkonya, “Bambo, ghwenga ghubhegha ng'obhe na nteko ghwa kutekela machi, na kilibha aki kitandamahu. Agha machi ghaabheghite na ubhumi ghwaghapiha kwoki?
JOH 4:12 Bhuli, ghwenga ghu unkulu kupitingana tate ywetu Yakobu ywene, ywakatupeghite kilibha aki. Kyene ywombe papamu na bhana bhake na anyama bhake bhakikitumila?”
JOH 4:13 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Mundu ywokele ywakanywegha machi agha katabona nyota kangi.
JOH 4:14 Peni ywohele ywakaywegha machi gha nonda kunpegha nenga, kaabhona ng'obhe nyota manjubha ghoha. Machi gha nonda kunpegha ghaabhegha nkati mwaki na luhemuku lwa machi palupopoheka ubhumi ghwangapela ghwa manjubha ghoha.”
JOH 4:15 Yula nndala kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Bambo, chonde ghumbeghe machi agho ngotoke kubhegha na nyota kangi, hangi ngotoke kuhika kangi apa kuteka machi.”
JOH 4:16 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghughende ghukankeme nngwana ywako, ghuhike naywo apa.”
JOH 4:17 Yula n'dala kakiyanga, “Nenga nanga nngwana.” Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghulongela hoto kukita ghwanga nngwana.
JOH 4:18 Mana ghubhegha kala na angwana nhano, na nngwana yughubheghite naywo hinu chepa nngwana ywako. Apa ghulongela hoto.”
JOH 4:19 Yula nndala kakilongela, “Bambo, nungubhona kukita ghwenga ghu mbuye.
JOH 4:20 Akaatate bhetu Asamalia bhakitundamila pakitumbi aki, peni mwenga Makaayahudi mungulongela yingunoghwa tukatundamile akwo Yelusalemu.”
JOH 4:21 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Nndala, ghunyubhalile, linjubha lyahika lyena maantundamila ng'obhe Tate pa kitumbi aki, ebu akwo Yelusalemu.
JOH 4:22 Mwenga Makaasamalia mungutundamila kyanga kukimanya, peni twenga Twakaayahudi tungutundamila kitukimanya, kiyaha ulopohi ghunguhuma kwa Akaayahudi.
JOH 4:23 Peni lisaa linguhika na libhegha kala, lyene bhandu bhanakutundamila kya uhoto bhatantundamila Tate mu nhuki na hoto, kiyaha Tate kanguapalaha bhandu bhaantundama kya habhu.
JOH 4:24 Chapanga ndo nhuki, na bhoha bhanakuntundamila yibhanogha bhantundamile kwa nhuki na hoto.”
JOH 4:25 Yula nndala kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Ningumanya kukita Kilisto Nkombohi pakapala kuhika, katatufwambulila milando hyoha.”
JOH 4:26 Yesu kakinng'ombela yula nndala, “Nenga yunuyobhela na ghwenga, ndo Kilisto.”
JOH 4:27 Kamu ahundwa bha Yesu bhakibhuya, bhakikangacha paammonite pakayobhela na nndala. Peni kahone mundu ywakankonyite Yesu, “Ghungupala niki kwa ywombe?” Ebu “Yibheghaki ghunguyobhela na nndala ayu?”
JOH 4:28 Yula nndala kakikileka kila kijoba kyake pala, kakibhuya kumbwani, na kualubhulila bhandu,
JOH 4:29 “Tughende mukanmone mundu ywakanubhulilite milando hyoha yiindendite. Pangi mani ndo Masihi Kilisto Nkombohi?”
JOH 4:30 Hino bhandu bhakikwemuka kuhuma kumbwani na bhakinng'endela Yesu.
JOH 4:31 Peniapo ahundwa bhake Yesu bhakibhegha bhangunpembeleha, “Nhunda ghulyeghe huti hilyo!”
JOH 4:32 Peni Yesu kakiayanga, “Nenga megha na hilyo hyanga kuhimanya mwenga.”
JOH 4:33 Hino ahundwa bhake bhakiyanda kukonyekehana, “Bhuli, kabhegha mundu ywakannyeghelite hilyo?”
JOH 4:34 Peni Yesu kakiayanga, “Hilyo hyangu ndo kutenda ghakapala ywakanaghihite.
JOH 4:35 Mwenga mungulongela, ‘Yihighala mwehi ncheche kwaabhegha na mabeno’ Peni nenga nunguaghombela, nnyinule meho ghenu muyilolekehe mighunda, mapambiko ghabhegha kala kubenwa!
JOH 4:36 Na yunakubena kapokela kala lifungu lyake naywo kangukungangana mbunje yakya ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko, ngati ywombe yunakukweta na ywombe yunakubena bhaayelelwa papamu.
JOH 4:37 Habhu kula kulongela, ‘Yumu kangupanda, na yungi kangubena yibhegha hoto.’
JOH 4:38 Nikialaghila mukabene mabeno mu mighunda manga kuyitendela mahengo, bhangi bhakitenda mahengo manonopo, peni mwenga mukibena motelo mu mapungwo ghabhe.”
JOH 4:39 Akaasamalia ayoloho kuhuma ku kitami kila bhakinhyubhalila Yesu kubhukana na ghala ghakalongelite yula nndala ywakaaghombilite kukita, “Kang'ombela milando hyoha yiniyitendite.”
JOH 4:40 Hino, bhala Akaasamalia paanhikilite Yesu, bhakinpembeleleha katami kwa bhombe. Naywo Yesu kakitama akwo manjubha mabhili.
JOH 4:41 Na kubhukana na malagho ghake, bhandu bhakinhyubhalila.
JOH 4:42 Bhala bhandu bhakinng'ombela yula nndala, “Hinu tunguhyubhalila, chepa kiyaha ghwenga ghukitughombela malagho ghako, ngati kiyaha tunnyihwa twabheni twenga, na tungumanya hoto kukita ayu ndo Kilisto Nkombohi ghwa nnima.”
JOH 4:43 Mbole ya manjubha ghala mabhili, Yesu kakibhuka na kughenda ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:44 Kiyaha Yesu mwene kakilongela kukita mbuye kahokamilaghwa ng'obhe pannimama ghwake mwene.
JOH 4:45 Yesu pakahikite ku Galilaya, Akaagalilaya atangalo bhakinkingama kiyaha bhakibhona ghala ghakatendite akwo ku Yelusalemu mu kikubhukubhu ya Pasaka. Mana bhombe bhubho bhakibhegha mu kikubhukubhu akyo.
JOH 4:46 Habhu Yesu kakihika kangi mbaka ku kitami kya Kana ya Galilaya, pala pakaghalambulite machi ghabheghe difwai. Akwo kukibhegha mundu yumu kilongohi, ywene mwana ywake kakibhegha ntamwa akwo ku Kapelinaumu.
JOH 4:47 Aywo hofisa pakayihwite kukita Yesu kakihika ku Galilaya kuhumila ku Yudea, kakinng'endela Yesu na kunnyupa ngati kaghende kunnamiha mwana ywake, ywakabheghite tepatepa paulili.
JOH 4:48 Yesu kakinng'ombela yula kilongohi, “Mwenga bhandu kyanga kubhona naho na mihabho mahyubhalila ng'obhe.”
JOH 4:49 Yula hofisa ghwa ghubhutwa kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Chonde Bambo, tughende ukaya kwangu yikali na mwana ghwangu kuuleka ulili.”
JOH 4:50 Yesu kakinng'ombela yula kilongohi, “Ghughende ukaya kwako, mwana ywako kangukeka!” Yula kilongohi kakihyubhalila ghala malagho ghakaghombelitwe na Yesu, kakibhuka na kakighenda ukaya kwake.
JOH 4:51 Pakabheghite kakali kunjila kakibhonana na andumindumi bhake na bhakinng'ombela kukita, “Mwana ywako yughunng'endela kalama!”
JOH 4:52 Kakiakonya bhala andumitumi bhake lisaa kyakapatite upughwo mwana ywake, nabho bhakinnyanga, “Yikibha licho pamuhi lichubha lwa londondohi, utamwa ghukinneka.”
JOH 4:53 Ndo tate ywa yula mwana kakikulungwa kukita likibhegha ndo lisaa lilalila lyeni Yesu pakankambukilite, “Mwana ywako kalama.” Hino, ywombe na bhandu bhoha bha lubhagha lwake bhakinhyubhalila Yesu ndo Kilisto Nkombohi.
JOH 4:54 Ayi ndo yikibhegha naho ya ubhili yeni Yesu yakatenditi pakabhuyite Galilaya kuhumila ku Yudea.
JOH 5:1 Mbole ya agha, kukibhegha na kikubhukubhu kya Akaayahudi, naywo Yesu kakighenda akwo Yelusalemu.
JOH 5:2 Akwo Yelusalemu, pakibhegha litanda limo ugheghela na nlyango gwa mene, kwa likabila lya Akaaebulania likikemwa Betisata, lyene likitindilwa na mabanda nhano.
JOH 5:3 Mu mabanda agho pakibhegha na atamwa ayoloho, bhangabhona na angwabhengwabhe na bhana ulelebhaho paalindila machi ghabwangulighwe.
JOH 5:4 Kiyaha maghenda maghenda lihoka ywa Chapanga kakihuluka na kughabwangula machi gha litanda alyo, na yula ntamwa ywakabheghite ywa ulongohi kuyingila nkati mwa machi mbole ya kubwangulighwa, kakilama utamwa ghwake ghwoha ghwakabheghite naghwo.
JOH 5:5 Hino, mundu yumu kakibhegha akwo ywene kakilwala kwa ngungwa salasini na nane.
JOH 5:6 Yesu pakammonite ntamwa aywo kaghonja, naywo kakimanya kukita katama apwo kwa manjubha matangalo, ndo kakinkonya, “Ghungupala kulamihwa?”
JOH 5:7 Yula ntamwa kakinnyanga, “Bambo, nenga nanga mundu ghwa kunyegha mulitanda pala machi paghabwangulighwa, pambala kuchumbukila mu litanda, kali nenga na kuyingila mundu yungi kangulopokela.”
JOH 5:8 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghuyime, ghutole likahe lyako na ghughende.”
JOH 5:9 Kamu, yula mundu kakilama, kakitola likahe lyake na kakiyanda kutyanga. Nnando aghu ghukitendekwa linjubha lya Kupumulila,
JOH 5:10 kya habhu, hilongohi bha Akaayahudi bhakinng'ombela yula ywakalamihitwe, “Lelo ndo linjubha lya kupumulila, ghwenga ghungupapa likahe lyako, ghungukiluka mihilo ya linjubha lya kupumulila.”
JOH 5:11 Yula mundu ywakalamihitwe kakiayanga, “Yula mundu ywakanamihite kaking'ombela ghutole likahi lyako na ghutyange.”
JOH 5:12 Hino, Akaayahudi bhakinkonya, “Ndo mundu ywoki aywo ywakakughombilite ghuutole likahe lyako na ghutyange?”
JOH 5:13 Peni yula ywakalamihitwe kakimmanya ng'obhe ndo ywoki ywakannamihite, kiyaha Yesu kakibhuka, kiyaha apo kukibhegha na lumati lukulu lwa bhandu.
JOH 5:14 Mbole ya agho, Yesu kakikongana na yula mundu ywakanlamihite mu Nyumba ya Chapanga na kakinng'ombela, “Ghuyihwe, hinu ghulama, ghukotoke kutenda ulemwa hela bhubho lyakutula lihakataho kyanalumu.”
JOH 5:15 Ndo yula ywakalamihitwe kakighenda kuaghombela hilongohi bha Akaayahudi kukita ndo Yesu ywakannamihite.
JOH 5:16 Kya habhu Akaayahudi bhakiyanda kunng'aha Yesu, kiyaha kakibhegha kangutenda milando ayo mulinjubha lya kupumulila.
JOH 5:17 Peni Yesu kakiayanga, “Tate ywangu kangutenda lihengo manjubha ghoha, na nenga nungunoghwa kutenda lihengo kangapumulila.”
JOH 5:18 Malagho agho ghakiayaghabhiha munu hilongohi bha Akaayahudi bhakiyigha kutenda kila njila yakya kunkoma Yesu mana kakimetula malaghilo gha linjubha lya kupumulila na kakinkema Chapanga Tate, habhu kakililinganiha ywombe tela na Chapanga.
JOH 5:19 Hino Yesu kakiaghombela. “Kulyaghila nenga ninguaghombela, Mwana kanguhotola ng'bhe kutenda nnando ghwohele mwene, ngati nnando ghula ghwakammona Tate ywake kangutenda, ndo na Mwana kangutenda ubhuabhu abhu.
JOH 5:20 Kiyaha Tate kangumpala Mwana, naywo kangummoneha ghoha ghakaghatenda mwene. Kangi kantammoneha milando mikulu kyanalumu kupitingana agha, katammoneha ili mwenga npate kukangacha.
JOH 5:21 Kulyaghila handa bhula Tate pakabhahyuha bhaahweghite na kuapegha ubhumi, ubhwabhu abhu na Mwana kanguapegha ubhumi bhala bhakaapala.
JOH 5:22 Ebu Tate kanguntosa ng'obhe mundu ywohele, peni lihengo lyoha lya kutosa bhandu kampegha Mwana,
JOH 5:23 ili bhandu bhoha bhanhokamile Mwana handa bhula pabhanhokamila Tate. Hino, mundu ywohele ywanga kunhokamila Mwana kangunhokamila ng'obhe Tate ywakannaghilite.”
JOH 5:24 “Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela hoto, mundu ywohele ywakaghayihwa malagho ghangu na kunhyubhalila ywombe ywakanaghihite, kabhegha naghwo ubhumi ghwanga pela ghwa manjubha ghoha, katatoswa ng'obhe, ngati katayomboka kala kuhuma kiho na kuyingila muubhumi ghwangapela.
JOH 5:25 Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela kangi, lisaa linguhika, nalyo lisaa lihika kala, pala bhaabheghite kutali na Chapanga paayihwa lilobhe lya Mwana ywa Chapanga, nabho bhaalonda kuyihwa bhaabhegha na ubhumi.
JOH 5:26 Handa bhula ubhumi ghunguhuma kwa Tate, bhubho Tate katenda ubhumi ghuhume kwa Mwana.
JOH 5:27 Naywo Chapanga kampegha Mwana ghwake makakala gha kutosa, kangi ywombe ndo Mwana ywa Mundu.
JOH 5:28 Nkotoke kukangacha pannyihwa nnando aghu, mana lisaa linguhika pala bhala bhaabheghite mumandogholo paayihwa lilobhe lyake.
JOH 5:29 Nabho bhahwimukila panje ya mandogholo ghabhe, na bhala bhaatendite gha maha bhaahyuka bhamokole kutama, na bhala bhaatendite ulemwa bhaahyuka atoswe.”
JOH 5:30 Yesu kakighendelela kuaghombela “Nenga ndahotola ng'obhe kutenda kilibhi kyohele kwa likalama lyangu nimwene, nungutosa bhula panyihwa kuhuma kwa Chapanga, na toso yangu yibhegha ya maha, kiyaha nungupalaha ng'obhe ghanighapala nenga, ngati ghala ghakaghapalite ywakanaghihite.”
JOH 5:31 “Handa nunguaghombela mwenga milando ya numwene, ghala ghaniaghombela ghangabheghite ng'obhe hoto.
JOH 5:32 Peni kabhegha mundu yungi kanguaghombela mwenga milando yangu na nenga ningumanya kukita ghakaaghombela kwakya nenga ndo hoto.
JOH 5:33 Mukialaghila bhandu aghende kwa Yohane yunakubatisa, naywo kakiaghombela abho bhandu ndo hoto.
JOH 5:34 Nenga nunguyitikila ng'obhe lyaalongela bhandu yakya nenga, peni nunglongela agha ngati mwenga bhandu npate kulopoleghwa.
JOH 5:35 Yohane kakibhegha handa limbamba, liiyaka na kulangaha lung'ali, na mwenga mukibhegha kala kulumbalila lung'ali lwake kya mandina.
JOH 5:36 Peni ghubhegha nnando nkulu liilangiha nenga kupitingana ghala ghakalongelite Yohana yunakubatisa. Nnando ghwene ndo ghala mahengo ghakambeghite Tate nighatende. Agha ghoha ghangulangiha kukita nenga ndo ghani, na ghangulangiha kukita Chapanga ndo kanaghila ndende mahengo ghake.
JOH 5:37 Naywo Tate, ywakanaghilite kunongelela kukita nenga ndo ghani. Peni mwenga munayihwa ng'obhe lilobhe lyake ebu kummona ywombe mwakabheghite,
JOH 5:38 na lilagho lyake lingutama ng'obhe nkati yenu, kiyaha mukinhyubhalila ng'obhe ywombe ywakannaghilite.
JOH 5:39 Mwenga munguhingukiha muno Malembo gha Chapanga panhwachila kukita nkati mwaki maamokola ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha, na Malembo agho ndo ghangunongelela nenga.
JOH 5:40 Peni mungulema kuhika kwa nenga ili mmokole ubhumi.”
JOH 5:41 “Ningo yangu nenga nungulema kutikwa na bhandu.
JOH 5:42 Peni ninguamanya mwenga, nungumanya kukita mmegha ng'obhe na upalo ghwa Chapanga mumyoyo yenu.
JOH 5:43 Nenga hika kwa ngwiliho ya Tate ghwangu, peni mungungingama ng'obhe, peni yungi pakahika kwa ngwiliho yake mwene, mankingama.
JOH 5:44 Mwenga mungupala kutikilana mabhene, peni mungupala ng'obhe kumokola tiko kuhuma kwa Chapanga mwene, hinu, maahotola bhuli kunyubhalila nenga?
JOH 5:45 Nkotoke kuhwacha kukita nenga ndabhakokela kwa Tate. Aywo musa yumundumbila ndo ywakapala kuakokela mwenga.
JOH 5:46 Handa munganhyubhalilite hoto Musa, hino munganyubhalilite na nenga, kiyaha Musa kakityeka mihalo yakya nenga.
JOH 5:47 Peni handa mungughahyubhalila ng'obhe ghala ghakatyekite Musa, maahyubhalila bhuli malagho ghangu ghanighalongela?”
JOH 6:1 Mbole ya agha, Yesu kakighenda kumwambo ya lihibha Galilaya, lyene bhubho bhandu bhngulikema lihibha Tibelia.
JOH 6:2 Na lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukighendelela kuntughila, kiyaha bhakibhona mihabho mitangalo yakatendite kwa kualamiha atamwa.
JOH 6:3 Mbole Yesu kakikwela ku kitumbi na kakitama papamu na ahundwa bhake.
JOH 6:4 Na kikubhukubhu kya Akaayahudi kiikemwa Pasaka kikiheghelela kuhika.
JOH 6:5 Yesu pakakalolikihite kakilubhona lumati lukulu lwa bhandu paluntughila, kakinkonya Filipi, “Twahemela kwoki mulyo ghwa kuakwila bhandu bhoha abha ili alyeghe?”
JOH 6:6 Yesu kakikonya habhu kwa kuntegha Filipi, kiyaha kakimanya kya kukitenda.
JOH 6:7 Filipi kakinnyanga, “Ngalabha hya kutenda mahengo kwa myehi mitangali, hyangakwilite ng'obhe kuhemela hilyo hya kukwila hata kwa kila mundu kamokole kulyegha kyamandina.”
JOH 6:8 Yumu ywa ahundwa bhake, ywakakemitwe Andelea, aywo kakibhegha nnongo ywake Simoni Petili, kakinng'ombela Yesu,
JOH 6:9 “Apa kabhegha nhongolo yumu kabhegha na mangate nhano na hihomba hichoko hibhili. Peni ahi hyakwila niki kwa lumati alu lwoha?”
JOH 6:10 Yesu kakilongela, “Muaghombele bhandu atame pahi,” Na penipala pakibhegha na manyahi gha lukomba. Hino, bhandu bhoha bhakitama pahi, na pakibhegha na handa bhandu alume elufu nhano.
JOH 6:11 Ndo Yesu kakighatola ghala mangate, kakinnumba Chapanga, na kakiaghabhila bhandu bhaatamite. Kakitenda ubhwabhu kwa bhala homba, na kila mundu kakimokola na kulyegha handa bhula pakapalite kulyegha.
JOH 6:12 Bhandu bhoha paayomolite kulyegha na kuyukuta, Yesu kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Nkugane mahighalo ghoha gha hipalamande, kikotoke kuhobha hata kipalamande kimu.”
JOH 6:13 Hino, bhakikungana hipalamande hyoha na kumemekeha hikapu mbinda mabhoko yimo na ibhili.
JOH 6:14 Bhandu paabhonite nhabho ghula ghwakaghutendite Yesu, bhakiyanda kulongela, “Kulyaghila mundu ayu ndo yula mbuye ywakahika munnima!”
JOH 6:15 Yesu kakimanya kukita bhandu bhangupala kuntenda kabheghe mutwa ywabhe kya lingakamiha, ndo kakibhuka na kughenda kangi ku kitumbi ghweka chake.
JOH 6:16 Payihikite makimuhi, ahundwa bha Yesu bhakihelela kukitumbi na kughenda mbaka ku lihibha.
JOH 6:17 Mbole bhakihubhuka mu bhwato, na bhakiyanda kuyomboka lihibha kughenda ku Kapelinaumu. Peniapo lubhindo lukiyingila kala, na Yesu kakibhegha kakali kuheghelela papamu na bhombe.
JOH 6:18 Lihibha likibyaluka kiyaha kukibhegha na likusi lingubyaluha machi.
JOH 6:19 Bhala ahundwa bhakihola bhwato kya utali ghwa kilomita nhano ebu sita, bhakinmona Yesu pakatyanga unani mwa machi, kanguheghelela ku bhwato, ndo bhakiyoghopa munu.
JOH 6:20 Peni Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nkotoke kuyoghopa, ndo Nenga!”
JOH 6:21 Ndo ahundwa bhakipala kuntekula Yesu mubhwato, kamu bhwato ghukihika paluhingo kula kwaabheghite bhangughenda.
JOH 6:22 Kilabho yake lula lumati lwa bhandu bhala bhaabheghite kula kumwambo ya lihibha bhaking'amula kukita, kukibhegha na bhwato ghumu ghweka. Na bhakimanya kukita Yesu kakiyingila ng'obhe mula mubhwato ghwaabhukite nabho papamu na ahundwa bhake, ngati ahundwa bhake bhakighenda ghweka chabhe.
JOH 6:23 Peni yikihika mibhwato yingi kuhuma ku Tibelia, ugheghela na pala paalyeghite mangate mbole ya Bambo Yesu kunnumba Chapanga.
JOH 6:24 Hino, lula lumati lwa bhandu lukimanya kukita Yesu kakibhegha ng'obhe pala, ebu ahundwa bhake nabho, ndo bhakihubhuka mu yila mibhwato, na bhakighenda akwo Kapelinaumu ngati bhakanpalahe Yesu.
JOH 6:25 Bhala bhandu paammonite Yesu kumwambo ya lihibha bhakinkonya, “Nhunda, ghuhika pakiki apa?”
JOH 6:26 Yesu kakiayanga, “Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela, mwenga mungumbalaha ng'obhe nenga kiyaha mukibhona mihabho yila, ngati mungumbalaha kiyaha mukilyegha yila mangate na mukiyukuta.
JOH 6:27 Nkotoke kutenda mahengo kwakya kumokola hilyo hinakupyokoka, ngati mmeghe mungutenda mahengo kwakya kumokola hilyo hiihighala mbaka muubhumi ghwangapela ghwa manjubha ghoha. Hilyo ahyo hyabhapegha ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha kuhuma kwa Chapanga. Mwana ywa Mundu ndo ywakapala kuapegha hilyo ahyo, kiyaha Tate Chapanga kampegha likalama lya kutenda habhu.”
JOH 6:28 Hino bhakinkonya Yesu, “Tutende niki twenga ngati tumokole kughatenda mahengo gha Chapanga?”
JOH 6:29 Yesu kakiayanga bhala bhandu, “Nnando ghwene Chapanga kangupala mughutende, munyubhalile nenga yunaghilitwe na ywombe.”
JOH 6:30 Habhu bhandu bhakinkonya, “Ghwatenda naho yoki ya nhabho ili tuyibhone na tughuhyubhalile? Ghwatenda nnando ghani?
JOH 6:31 Atate bhetu bhakilyegha hilyo hiikemwa mana kula kukibhala, handa muyityekitwe mu Malembo, ‘Kakiapegha mangate kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga ngati alyeghe.’ ”
JOH 6:32 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela, Musa kakiapegha ng'obhe hilyo hya mangate kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga, ngati Tate ywangu ndo ywakaapegha mwenga hilyo hya lingate lya hoto liihuma kunani.
JOH 6:33 Kiyaha hilyo hya Chapanga ndo yula yunakuhuluka pahi kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga ili kaapeghe bhandu bha nnima aghu ubhumi.”
JOH 6:34 Hino bhakinng'ombela Yesu, “Bambo, kutandila hinu ghutupeghe lingate alyo manjubha ghoha.”
JOH 6:35 Hino, Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nenga ndo lingate liabhapegha ubhumi, ywombe ywakahika kwa nenga na kunyubhalila katabhona ng'obhe njala hangi nyota.
JOH 6:36 Hino, handa panuaghombilite kukita payibhele mumona peni mungunyubhalila ng'obhe.
JOH 6:37 Bhala bhandu bhoha bhakambegha Tate bhahika kwa nenga. Na mundu ywohele ywakahika kwa nenga ndantanga ng'obhe panje,
JOH 6:38 Kiyaha nenga huluka kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga ili ngotoke kutenda ghambalite nenga, ngati ndende ghala ghakapalite Tate ywakanaghilite.
JOH 6:39 Tate ywakanaghilite kangupala habhu, ngotoke kunhobheha hata mundu yumu ywa bhala ghwakambeghite, ngati niahyuhe bhoha mulila linjubha lya uhiko.
JOH 6:40 Kiyaha kyakakipala Tate ghwangu ndo aki kukita kila ywakammona Mwana na kunyubhalila kabheghe na ubhumi ghwangapela ghwa manjubha ghoha. Na nenga ndabhahyuha linjubha lya uhiko.”
JOH 6:41 Hino, Akaayahudi bhakiyanda kunkuhyongolekela Yesu kiyaha kakilongela, “Nenga ndo lingate kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga.”
JOH 6:42 Bhakilongela, “Mundu ayu chepa Yesu mwana ywa Yosefu? Tunguamanya tate na mama ywake. Yibha bhuli, hinu kanguyigha kulongela kukita kahuluka kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga?”
JOH 6:43 Habhu Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nneke kuhyongoloka mabhene.
JOH 6:44 Kahone mundu ywakahotola kuhika kwa nenga handa kannongoha ng'obhe na Tate ywakanaghilite, na nenga ndanhyuha linjubha lya uhiko.
JOH 6:45 Mukitabho kya Chapanga mbuye yumu kakityeka, ‘Bhandu bhoha bhatahundwa na Chapanga.’ Na mundu ywohele ywakannyihwa Tate na kulihunda kuhuma kwa ywombe, aywo katahika kwa nenga.
JOH 6:46 Kahone mundu ywohele ywakammonite Tate, ngati ywombe ywakahumite kwa Chapanga, ywombe ndo ghweka chake ywakammonite Tate.
JOH 6:47 Kulyaghila nenga nungunng'ombela, mundu ywakanyubhalila kabhegha naghwo ubhumi ghwangapela ghwa manjubha ghoha.
JOH 6:48 Nenga ndo lingate lya ubhumi.
JOH 6:49 Atate bhenu bhakilyegha mana kula kukibhala, peni bhoha bhakihwegha.
JOH 6:50 Peni apa kubhegha lingate liihulukite pannima kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga ngati mundu ywohele ywakapala kulyegha kakotoke kuhwegha.
JOH 6:51 Nenga ndo lingate lya ubhumi, ghulala hihulukite kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga. Mundu ywohele pakalyegha lingate alyo, katalama manjubha ghoha. Lingate ali ndo mmili ghwangu, ghwene ghumbala kubhapegha kwakya ubhumi ghwa unnima.”
JOH 6:52 Ndo Akaayahudi bhakiyanda kughombana bhene paalongela. “Ayu katahotola bhuli kutupegha mmili ghwake tuulyeghe?”
JOH 6:53 Habhu Yesu kakiaghombela Akaayahudi, “Kulyaghila nenga nungunng'ombela, pankotoka kulyegha mmili ghwa Mwana ywa Mundu na kuunywegha mwahi ghwake, maabhegha ng'obhe na ubhumi ghwangapela nkati yenu.
JOH 6:54 Mundu ywohele ywakalyegha mmili ghwangu na kuuywegha mwahi ghwangu katabhegha na ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha, na nenga ndanhyuha linjubha lya uhiko.
JOH 6:55 Kiyaha mmili ghwangu ndo mulyo ghwa hoto na mwahi ghwangu ndo kiywegho kya hoto.
JOH 6:56 Mundu ywohele yunakulyegha mmili ghwangu na kunywegha mwahi ghwangu katatama nkati yangu, na nenga ndatama nkati yake.
JOH 6:57 Handa bhula Tate ywakanaghilite mwakabheghite na ubhumi. Na nenga ningulama kupitila kwa Tate, habhu ywakalyegha mmili ghwa nenga katalama kupitila nenga.
JOH 6:58 Ali ndo lingate liihuluka kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga, libhegha ng'obhe handa mana yaalyeghite akaatate bhenu, mbole bhakihwegha, peni ywohele yunakulyegha lingate ali katalama manjubha ghoha.”
JOH 6:59 Yesu kakilongela malagho agha pakabheghite kanguhunda mu Nyumba ya kukonganikila Akaayahudi akwo Kapelinaumu.
JOH 6:60 Atangalo mu ahundwa bhake paayihwite nnando aghu bhakilongela, “Mahundo agha gghangumanyika ng'obhe yeghuyeghu. Ndo ghani ywakahotola kughakingama?”
JOH 6:61 Yesu kaking'amula mwene kyanga kughombelwa na mundu kukita ahundwa bhake bhakinhyongoleka yakya mahundo ghake, ndo kakiakonya, “Bhuli, nnando aghu ghunguayaghabhiha?
JOH 6:62 Yabhegha bhuli hinu pala pamummona Mwana ywa Mundu pakabhyela kughenda akwo kwakabheghite kandahi?
JOH 6:63 Nhuki ywa Chapanga ndo yunakuapegha bhandu ubhumi, mmili ndo kilibhi ng'obhe. Malagho agha ghaniaghombilite ndo ghanguhuma kwa Nhuki ywa Chapanga na kuapegha ubhumi.
JOH 6:64 Peni amoo bhenu munguhyubhalila ng'obhe.” Kiyaha Yesu kakimanya ghoha kutandila kalongohi ndo aghani bhangunhyubhalila mu nkati yabhe na aghani bhangupala kunkiluka.
JOH 6:65 Mbole Kakilongela kangi, “Ndo mana nikiaghombela kukita kahone mundu ywohele ywakapala kuhotola kunhikila kyangalongohwa na Tate ywangu.”
JOH 6:66 Kubhukana na nnando ghula kutandila pala, amoo ahundwa bhake bhakibhuya kihyengelenyuma bhakileka kulongohana na Yesu.
JOH 6:67 Habhu Yesu kakiakonya bhala andumila bhake mbinda mabhoko yimo na abhili, “Bhuli, na mwenga mungupala kubhuka?”
JOH 6:68 Simoni Petili kakinnyanga, “Bambo, tubhuke tughende kwoki? Ghwenga ghubhegha na malagho gha ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha.
JOH 6:69 Tunguhyubhalila na kumanya kukita ghwenga ndo Ywakahaghulitwe kuhuma kwa Chapanga yunaubhumi.”
JOH 6:70 Ndo Yesu kakiayanga, “Nikiahaghula mwenga mbinda mabhoko yimu na abhili. Peni yumu ywenu kangulongohwa na Nchipila!”
JOH 6:71 Apa Yesu kakilongela agho yakya Yuda, mwana ghwa Simoni Isikaliote, mana aywo ndo ywakapala kunkiluka. Payibhele kakibhegha mu bhala ahundwa mbindamabhoko yimo na abhili.
JOH 7:1 Mbole ya milando ayi, Yesu kakighenda mu hijiji nhangangaiko hya ku Galilaya, kakilema kughenda kukitami kya Yudea kiyaha hilongohi bha Akaayahudi bhakipala kunkoma.
JOH 7:2 Peniapo kikubhukubhu kya Akaayahudi kiikemitwe kikubhukubhu kya hibanda, kikiheghelela,
JOH 7:3 Hino, alongo bhake Yesu bhakinng'ombela, “Ghubhuke apa, ghughende ku Yudea ili ahundwa bhako bhakabhone mihabho yighuyitenda.
JOH 7:4 Mundu ywakapala kumanyikwa na bhandu kangutenda ng'obhe milando yake kwa kihiho. Handa kiyaha ghungutenda milando ayi, hino, ghulibhonehe kwa bhoha ili bhandu bhakumanye!”
JOH 7:5 Hata alongo bhake mwene bhakinhyubhalila ng'obhe.
JOH 7:6 Yesu kakiaghombela bhombe, kukita “Nndaluko ghwa nenga kughenda akwo ghukali kuhika. Peni kwa mwenga kila nndaluko ghungunoghwa.
JOH 7:7 Bhandu bha nnima bhanguhotola ng'obhe kubhakalalila mwenga, peni bhangungalalila nenga kiyaha nunguaghombela kukita, mandendelo ghabhe ghoha ghabhegha mahakataho.
JOH 7:8 Mwenga nng'ende ku kikubhukubhu, peni nenga ndaaghenda ng'obhe ku kikubhukubhu aki, kiyaha nndaluko ghwangu ghunahika ng'obhe.”
JOH 7:9 Yesu pakayomolite kulongela agho, kakihighala akwo ku nnima ghwa Galilaya.
JOH 7:10 Alongo bhake paabhukite kughenda ku kikubhukubhu, na mbole Yesu kakighenda bhubho kwa kihiho.
JOH 7:11 Akwo ku kikubhukubhu hilongohi bha Akaayahudi bhakibhegha bhangumpalaha na kuakonya bhandu. “Kabhegha kwoki aywo Yesu?”
JOH 7:12 Kukibhegha na mbwepwe ndangalo yakya Yesu mu lumati lwa bhandu paalongela. Amoo bhandu bhakilongela “Mundu aywo ywa maha,” Na bhangi bhakilongela. “Akakaa! Ywombe kanguapotoha bhandu.”
JOH 7:13 Peni kahone mundu ywohele ywakayighite kulongela mihalo ya Yesu pakindandabhanji, kiyaha bhakiayoghopa hilongohi bha Akaayahudi.
JOH 7:14 Payihikite pakati ya kikubhukubhu, Yesu kakighenda ku Nyumba ya Chapanga na kuahunda bhandu.
JOH 7:15 Ayahudi bhakikangahwa na mahundo ghake na bhakilongela, “Mundu ayu kahotola bhuli kumanya milando ayi kyangali kuhundwa?”
JOH 7:16 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mahundo ghanuahunda chepa gha numwene, ngati ghanguhuma kwa ywombe ywakanaghihite.
JOH 7:17 Mundu ywohele ywakapala kutenda ghakaghapala Chapanga, katamanya kukita mahundo ghangu ghanguhuma kwa Chapanga, ebu nungulongela gha nenga numwene.
JOH 7:18 Mundu ywakalongela malagho ghake mwene, kangupalaha kutikilwa mwene, kangutenda habhu kwa kupalaha ukulu ghwake. Peni yula ywakapalaha ukulu ghwa yula ywakannaghihite ndo ywa hoto, hangi kahone uhwangi nkati mwaki.
JOH 7:19 Bhuli, Musa kakiapegha ng'obhe Malaghilo? Peni kahone hata mundu yumu mu mwenga ywakaghayitikila malaghilo. Kiyaha niki, mungupala kungoma?”
JOH 7:20 Lula lumati lwa bhandu lukinnyanga, “Ghwenga ghubhegha na lindilo! Ndo ghani ywakapala kughukoma?”
JOH 7:21 Yesu kakiayanga, “Nikighutenda nhabho ghumu na mabhoha mukibhughanikwa.
JOH 7:22 Peni kiyaha Musa kakiakwilikiha kudumula unyagho, aki kitohe kikihuma ng'obhe kwa Musa, ngati kwa ahukulu bhenu, peni mwenga munguadumula unyagho bhana bhenu hata linjubha lya kupumulila.
JOH 7:23 Handa bhana munguadumula unyagho linjubha lya kupumulila ili kuyitikila malaghilo gha Musa, bhuli, mungungalalila kya kunnamiha mundu mmili ghwake linjubha lya kupumulila?
JOH 7:24 Nneke kutosa milando ya bhandu kyabhula muyibhonekana ghweka, maha ntose muyinoghwa.”
JOH 7:25 Amoo bhandu bha ku Yelusalemu bhakilongela, “Bhuli ayu chepa yula ywakapalahitwe na hilongohi bhetu ili bhankome?
JOH 7:26 Nnole, hinu kanguyobhela pakindandabhanji na kahone kilongohi ywakanng'ombela hata lilagho, pangi hilongohi bhamanya kala uhoto kukita ayu ndo Kilisito.
JOH 7:27 Pakahika Kilisito Nkombohi, kahone mundu ywakapala kumanya kwakahumite, peni twenga tungumanya kwakahuma mundu ayu.”
JOH 7:28 Ndo Yesu kakikweha lilobhe pakahunda ku Nyumba ya Chapanga pakalongela, “Bhuli, mwenga mungumanya nenga na mungumanya kunukuhuma? Nenga hika ng'obhe kwa utabhala ghwangu. Ywombe ywakanaghilite ndo ywa kuhyubhalika na mwenga mungummanya ng'obhe.
JOH 7:29 Peni nenga nungummanya, kiyaha huma kwa ywombe naywo ndo ywakanaghihite.”
JOH 7:30 Hino, bhandu bhakipalaha kunkamula, peni kahone mundu ywohele ywakayighite kunkamula kiyaha lisaa lyake likibhegha likali kuhika.
JOH 7:31 Na bhandu ayoloho bha mula mulumati bhakinnyubhalila na bhakilongela, “Bhuli, kilisto pakahika katatenda mihabho mikulu kyanalumu kupitingana yakayitenda ayu?”
JOH 7:32 Afalisayu bhakiayihwa bhandu paapwepa yakya mihalo ya Yesu, ndo bhombe na hilongohi bha Mandundame bhakialaghila machonda bha Nyumba ya Chapanga bhakankamule Yesu.
JOH 7:33 Yesu kakilongela, “Nenga ndabhegha na mwenga kwa nndaluko ghwa mandina, mbole ndabhuya kwa ywombe ywakanaghilite.
JOH 7:34 Mambalaha peni mutamona ng'obhe, na kumbala kubhegha mwenga mahotola ng'obhe kuhika.”
JOH 7:35 Akaayahudi bhakikonyana bhene, “Ayu kangupala kughenda kwoki kweni twenga kutuhotola ng'obhe kuhika? Ebu kangupala kughenda ku hitami hya Akaayahudi kakaahunde Akaagiliki bhaapwilinganite, na kuahunda Akaagiliki?
JOH 7:36 Pakalongela malagho agha fwambulo yake niki, mambalaha peni mamona ng'obhe na akwo kumbala kughenda mwenga mahotola ng'obhe kuhika?”
JOH 7:37 Linjubha lya uhiko lya kikubhukubhu, linjubha lya kindimba, Yesu kakiyima na kakilongela kya kukweha lilobhe, “Mundu ywohele yukabheghite na nyota kahike kwa nenga kanyweghe machi,
JOH 7:38 handa Malembo paghatyekitwe, ywohele ywakanyubhalila nenga, ‘Ngemba hya machi gha ubhumi ghaabhilibhita mu mwoyo ghwake.’ ”
JOH 7:39 Yesu kakilongela lilagho lila kwa mihalo ya Nhuki ywa Chapanga, ywene kwa bhala bhaanhyubhalilite bhangankingamite. Kiyaha Nhuki kakibhegha kakali kuhika kiyaha Yesu kakibhegha kakali kukwehwa mu Ukulu.
JOH 7:40 Amoo bhandu mulumati lula paayihwite malagho agho, bhakilongela, “Kulyaghila mundu ayu ndo yula Mbuye yutunnindila!”
JOH 7:41 Bhandu bhangi bhakilongela, “Ayu ndo Kilisto Nkombohi!” Bhangi bhakilongela, “Bhuli, Kilisto Nkombohi katahumila ku Galilaya?
JOH 7:42 Bhuli, Malembo gha Chapanga ghatyekwa ng'obhe kukita Kilisto kaahika kuhuma mulukolo lwa Daudi na kubhelekwa ku Betilehemu, ku kitami kyakatamite Mutwa Daudi ng'obhe?”
JOH 7:43 Kya habhu bhandu bhakighabhanika kwakya malagho gha Yesu.
JOH 7:44 Amoo bhandu bhakipala kuyigha kunkamula, peni kahone mundu yumu ywakayighite kunkamula.
JOH 7:45 Mbole bhala machonda bhakibhuya kwa mandundame akulu na Afalisayo, na bhombe bhakiakonya, “Kyabhuli munankamula ng'obhe na kunnyegha?”
JOH 7:46 Bhala machonda bhakiayanga, “Kanabhonekana ng'obhe mundu munnima aghu kangulongela milando mikulu handa pakalongela mundu ayu!”
JOH 7:47 Afalisayo bhakiakonya bhala machonda, “Bhuli na mwenga, nkuluhwa?”
JOH 7:48 Bhuli, “Kabhegha kilongohi ywohele yumummanyite ebu Afalisayo bhaannyubhalila?
JOH 7:49 Peni lumati lwa bhandu lwangamanya Malaghilo gha Musa, bhombe bhakotolwa na Chapanga.”
JOH 7:50 Mbole yumu ywa Afalisayo kakibhegha Nikodemu, yula ywakanng'endelite Yesu linjubha limu pakilo. Kakiakonya ayake,
JOH 7:51 “Bhuli, Malaghilo ghetu ghangututegheka twenga kuntosa mundu ywohele pakali kunnyihwa na kumanya kyoki kyakatendite?”
JOH 7:52 Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Bbhuli, na ghwenga bhubho ghuhuma ku Galilaya? Ghulihunde Malembo gha Chapanga na ghwenga ghwabhona kukita kahone mbuye ywakahumite ku Galilaya.”
JOH 7:53 Mbole bhakibhuka, kila mundu kakibhuya ukaya kwake.
JOH 8:1 Peni Yesu kakighenda ku Kitumbi kya Miseituni.
JOH 8:2 Kilabho yake malabhila Yesu kakibhuya ku Nyumba ya Chapanga. Bhandu bhoha bhakikwemuka, ywombe kakitama pahi kakiyanda kuhunda.
JOH 8:3 Ahunda bha Malaghilo na Afalisayo bhakinnyegha nndala yumu ywakakamulitwe mu kutyala, bhakinnyimika pakati ya lumati lwa bhandu bhoha.
JOH 8:4 Mbole bhakinng'ombela Yesu, “Nhunda, nndala ayu tunkamula pakatenda utyahe.
JOH 8:5 Mu malaghilo gha Musa kakitukwiliha kuaguma malibho mbaka kahwghe adala handa abha. Ghwenga ghungulongela bhuli?”
JOH 8:6 Bheni akinkonya naha kya kuntegha Yesu, ngati apate kihokonyo kya kunkokela. Peni Yesu kakihokamila pahi kakiyanda kutyeka mu lutupi kwa kikonji kyake.
JOH 8:7 Paachwehite kunkonyakonya makonyo, kakiyinuka na kakiaghombela, “Handa kabhegha mundu mu nkati yenu ywene ywangaulemwa kabhe ghwa ulongohi kuntaghila libho.”
JOH 8:8 Mbole kakihokama kangi na kakighendelela kutyeka mulutupi kwa kikonji kyake.
JOH 8:9 Bhene paayihwite malagho agha, bhakiyanda kubhuka, yumu mbole ya yumu, aghohi ndo bhakibhegha bha kandahi kubhuka. Kuuhiko kakihighala Yesu ghweka chake, na yula nndala kayima ku ulongolo gwa Yesu.
JOH 8:10 Yesu kakiyinuka kakinkonya yula nndala, “Abhegha kwoki bhala bhandu? Bhuli kahone mundu ywakakutosite?”
JOH 8:11 Yula nndala kakinnyanga, “Kahone nga yumu Bambo.” Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Nenga ndaghutosa ng'obhe. Ghughende, na ghukotoke kutenda ulemwa kangi.”
JOH 8:12 Mbole Yesu kakiyobhela nabho kangi pakalongela, “Nenga ndo lung'ali lwa pannima. Mundu ywohele ywakandughila nenga katabhegha na lung'ali luunlongoha mu ubhumi nayo kaatyanga mu lubhindo ndwee.”
JOH 8:13 Afalisayo bhakinng'ombela Yesu, “Ghwenga ghungulongela kwakya ghumwene, habho agho ghughughalongela ghwabhegha bhuli ghwa hoto?”
JOH 8:14 Yesu kakiayanga, “Hata handa nungulongela kwakya numwene, ghala ghanughalongela ndo gha hoto, kiyaha nungukumanya kunhumite na kunng'enda. Peni mwenga mungukumanya ng'obhe kunhumite nenga ebu kunng'enda.
JOH 8:15 Mwenga mungundosa nenga kubhukana na milando yiibhonekana, peni nenga nunguntosa ng'obhe mundu.
JOH 8:16 Peni hata handa pandosa, tosa yangu yibhegha ya telatela, kiyaha nungutosa ng'obhe ghweka, ngati nenga papamu na Tate ywakanaghihite.
JOH 8:17 Yityekwa mu Malaghilo ghenu kukita, bhandu abhili pabhalubhulila ghughula ghula, hino, nnando aghwo ndo ghwa telatela.
JOH 8:18 Nenga nungulongela kwakya numwene, naywo Tate ywakanaghilite kangulongela bhubhula handa panulilongelela numwene.”
JOH 8:19 Ndo bhakinkonya Yesu, “Tate ghwako kabhegha kwoki?” Yesu kakiayanga, “Mwenga mungumanya ng'obhe nenga hangi Tate ghwangu mungunmanya ng'obhe, handa mungamanyite nenga, mungammanyite na Tate ghwangu.”
JOH 8:20 Yesu kakilongela malagho agha pakabheghite mu kuhunda ku Kitutubhi kya Chapanga ku kyumba kya luhanja. Peni kahone mundu ywakankamulite kiyaha lisaa lyake likibhegha likali kuhika.
JOH 8:21 Yesu kakiaghombela kangi, “Nenga nungughenda, peni mwenga mambalaha nenga na maahwegha mu ulemwa ghwenu. Na kumbala kughenda nenga mwenga mahotola ng'obhe kuhika.”
JOH 8:22 Bhala hilongohi bha Ayahudi kulikonya mabhene, “Bhuli kangupala kulikoma? Kiyaha niki kangulongela kung'enda nenga mwenga mahotola ng'obhe kuhika?”
JOH 8:23 Yesu kakiayanga, “Mwenga muhuma pahi bahapa apa palutupi, peni nenga huma kunani. Mwenga muhuma munnima aghu, peni nenga ndo ywa nnima aghu ng'obhe.
JOH 8:24 Ndo mana nikibhaghombela kukita mahwegha mu ulemwa ghwenu, pannema kunyubhalila kukita ‘NENGA NDO MWENE.’ ”
JOH 8:25 Bhombe bhakinkonya Yesu, “Ghwenga ndo ghani?” Naywo Yesu kakiayanga, “Nenga ndo yula ywene yunuaghombelite kutandila kalongohi.
JOH 8:26 Megha na mihalo mitangalo ya kulongela yakya mwenga na ya kuatosa. Peni ywombe ywakanaghihite ndo hoto, nungualongela bhandu bhoha ghala ghanughayihwite kuhuma kwa ywombe.”
JOH 8:27 Bhombe bhakimanya ng'obhe kukita Yesu kanguakambukila yakya Tate ghwa kunani.
JOH 8:28 Mbole Yesu kakiaghombela, “Pamunnyinula kala Mwana ghwa Mundu, ndo mamanya kukita ‘Nenga ndo mwene’ na mamanya kukita nenga ndo nunongilite kukita nungutenda ng'obhe nnando ghweka changu, maha ghala ghakanhundite Tate.
JOH 8:29 Ywombe Tate ywakanaghite kabhegha papamu na nenga, kananeka nenga ghweka changu, kiyaha nenga nungutenda ghala ghaaghapala ywombe manjubha ghoha.”
JOH 8:30 Bhandu atangalo bhaannyihwite Yesu pakalongela malagho agha bhakinhyubhalila.
JOH 8:31 Hino, Yesu kakiaghombela bhala Akaayahudi bhaanhyubhalilite, “Mwenga handa panng'ungila mahundo ghangu, maabhegha ahundwa bhangu bha hoto,
JOH 8:32 Ndo maghumanya uhoto, hino kwa njila ya aghwo uhoto Chapanga katabhalekekeha kuhuma mu ubhandwa.”
JOH 8:33 Bhombe bhakinkonya, “Twenga ndo kibheleko kya Abulahamu, tunabhegha ng'obhe abhandwa bha mundu ywohele. Kyabhuli, ghungulongela ‘twaalekekehwa kuhuma mu ubhandwa?’ ”
JOH 8:34 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela, Mundu ywohele ywakatenda ulemwa kabhegha mmandwa ywa ulemwa.
JOH 8:35 Mmandwa katamagha ng'obhe pakaya manjubha ghoha, Peni mwana katamagha ukaya manjubha ghoha.
JOH 8:36 Habhu, handa Mwana pakaalekekeha kuhuma mu ubhandwa ghwa ulemwa, ndo maabhegha uhulu kya hoto.
JOH 8:37 Nungumanya kukita mwenga ndo kibheleko kya Abulahamu. Peni mungupala kungoma nenga, kiyaha mungughayitikila ng'obhe mahundo ghangu.
JOH 8:38 Nenga nungughalongela ghala ghanighabhonite kwa Tate ghwangu, peni mwenga mungughatenda ghala ghanng'ombelitwe na tate ywenu.”
JOH 8:39 Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Tate ywetu ndo Abulahamu.” Yesu kakiaghombela, “Handa mungabheghite bhana bha Abulahamu mungatendite mihalo yila yakatendite Abulahamu.
JOH 8:40 Nenga nubhaghombela uhoto ghunuuyihwite kuhuma kwa Chapanga, peni hata habhu mwenga mungupala kungoma. Abulahamu kakitenda ng'obhe habhu!
JOH 8:41 Mwenga mungutenda milando yilayila yakayitendite tate ywenu.” Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Twenga ndo bhana bha hoto bha Chapanga, na tubhegha Tate yumu ghweka naywo ndo Chapanga.”
JOH 8:42 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Handa Chapanga kangabheghite Tate ywenu, mungambalite, kiyaha nenga huma kwa Chapanga na hino mbegha apa. Hika ng'obhe kughatenda ghala ghanugha numwene, maha kwakya ywombe ywakanaghihite.
JOH 8:43 Mungumanya ng'obhe milando yinuyilongela, kiyaha mwenga mungulema kughayitikila mahundo ghangu.
JOH 8:44 Mwenga ndo bhana bha tate ywenu, ywene ndo Nchipila, na mungupala kutenda ghakaghapala Tate ghwenu.
