Ywombe kakibhegha nkoma bhandu kuyandila makachu bhubho kakilingana ng'obhe na uhoto mana kahone uhoto nkati mwake. Pakalongela gha uhwangi kiyaha aghwo ndo malema ghake, ywombe ndo nhwangi na tate ghwa aghwo uhwangi.
JOH 8:45 Peni kiyaha ninguaghombela uhoto ndo mana mungunyubhalila ng'obhe.
JOH 8:46 Ghani nkati yenu ywakahotola kung'ombela kukita nenga mbegha na ulemwa? Handa nungulongela hoto, yibheghabhuli mwenga mungunhyubhalila ng'obhe?
JOH 8:47 Ywombe ywakabheghite ywa Chapanga kangughayihwa malagho gha Chapanga. Peni mwenga mungunyihwa ng'obhe kiyaha mwenga chepa bhandu bha Chapanga.”
JOH 8:48 Akaayahudi bhakinnyanga Yesu, “Bhuli, tubhegha ng'obhe tela mutulongela kukita ghwenga ghu Nsamalia kangi ghubhegha na lindilu?”
JOH 8:49 Yesu kakiayanga, “Nenga megha ng'obhe na lindilu, ngati ningunhokamila Tate ywangu, peni mwenga munguhokamila ng'obhe nenga.
JOH 8:50 Nenga mbala ng'obhe bhandu bhandike, peni kabhegha yumu yuapala bhandu bhandike. Na aywo ndo ywaalamula kukita nungutenda ghanakunogha.
JOH 8:51 Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela. Ywoheli ywakaghungila mahundo ghangu katahwegha ng'obhe.”
JOH 8:52 Ndo Akaayahudi bhakinng'ombela Yesu, “Hinu tuhumbula hoto kukita ghwenga ghubhegha na lindilu! Abulahamu kakihwegha, na mambuye bhakihwegha bhubho, ghwenga ghungulongela kukita ywakaghaghungila mahundo ghako katahwegha ng'obhe.
JOH 8:53 Bhuli, ghungulitenda ghu nkulu kuchweha kwa tate ghwetu Abulahamu ywene kakihwegha? Hata na mambuye bhakihwegha bhubho. Ghungulitenda ghwenga ndo ghani?”
JOH 8:54 Yesu kakiayanga, “Handa panulitika numwene, kulitika kunulutika ndo kilibhi ng'obhe. Kabhegha yumu ywakandika aywo ndo Tate ywangu, aywo ndo mwenga mungulongela ndo Chapanga ywenu.
JOH 8:55 Mwenga mungunmanya ng'obhe, peni nenga nungunmanya. Panongela nungunmanya ng'obhe, ndabhegha nhwangi handa mwenga. Peni nenga nungunmanya na nunguyitikila lilagho lyake.
JOH 8:56 Tate ghwenu Abulahamu kakilumbalila kukita kalibhone linjubha lyangu, naywo kakilibhona na kakiyelelwa.”
JOH 8:57 Hino, Akaayahudi bhakinng'ombela Yesu, “Ghwenga ghuhika ng'obhe ngungwa mbinda mabhoko nhano, yibha bhuli ghungulongela ghummona Abulahamu?”
JOH 8:58 Yesu kakiaghombela Ayahudi, “Kulyaghila nenga nunguaghombela, kukali na kubhelekwa Abulahamu, ‘NENGA NIKIBHEGHA.’ ”
JOH 8:59 Bhombe ndo bhakilokota malibho ngati bhatute, peni Yesu kakilihiha na kakibhuka ku Kitutubhi kya Chapanga.
JOH 9:1 Yesu pakabhegite kangutyanga, kakimmona mundu yumu ywangalola kutandila kubhelekwa.
JOH 9:2 Hino, ahundwa bhake bhakinkonya Yesu, “Nhunda, ghani ywakatendite ulemwa, mundu ayu, ebu abhele bhake, mbaka kabhelekwe ywangalola?”
JOH 9:3 Yesu kakiayanga, “Nnando aghu likibhwatuka ng'obhe kubhukana na ulemwa ghwa mundu ayu ebu ghwa abhele bhake, ngati kakibhelekwa ywangalola ngati makakala gha Chapanga ghayimihwe mu ubhumi ghwake.
JOH 9:4 Yingungwiliha kughatenda mahengo ghake ywombe ywakanaghilite pakali pamuhi, uhiku ghunguhika, na kahone mundu ywakahotola kutenda lihengo.
JOH 9:5 Pammegha ngali munnima, nenga ndo lung'ali lwa nnima.”
JOH 9:6 Mbole ya kuyomola kulonngela agho, Yesu kakihuna mata pahi kakitendekeha lindikali kakintyelemeka mumeho yula ywangalola,
JOH 9:7 mbole kakinng'ombela, “Ghughende ghukakuhe ku litanda lya Siloamu.” Fwambulo ya lihina ali ndo ywakalaghilitwe. Apa yula ywangalola kakighenda, kakikuha kibhungi kyake, mbole kakibhuya kunu pakalola.
JOH 9:8 Hino, andamani bhake, na bhandu bhaammanyite kukita kakibhegha kapukwa yuna luyupayupa, bhakilikonya, “Bhuli, ayu ndo yula ng'obhe, ywakabheghite kangutama na kuyupayupa?”
JOH 9:9 Amoo bhabhe bhakilongela, “Ayu ndo ywombe,” Amoo bhangi bhakilongela, “Ayu chepa ywombe, ngati kalihwana naywo.” Peni ywombe ywakabhelekitwe ywangalola kakilongela, “Nenga ndo mwene.”
JOH 9:10 Hino, bhakinkonya, “Meho ghako ghahughulwa bhuli?”
JOH 9:11 Ywombe kakiayanga, “Yula mundu ywakakemwa Yesu kakitendekeha lindika, kakindyelemeka mu meho ghangu, na kaking'ombela ng'ende ku litanda lya Siloamu na nikakuhe kibhungi kyangu. Ndo nenga nikighenda na nikilikuha, na nikihotola kubhona.”
JOH 9:12 Bhombe bhakinkonya, “Ywombe kabhegha kwoki?” Ywombe kakiayanga, “Nenga manya ng'obhe.”
JOH 9:13 Mbole bhakinnyegha yula mundu ywakabheghite ywangalola kwa Afalisayo.
JOH 9:14 Linjubha alyo Yesu lyakatendekehite lindika na kunhughula meho mundu aywo, likibhegha Linjubha lya Kupumulila.
JOH 9:15 Hino, Afalisayo, nabho, bhakinkonya kangi yula mundu, kakilamihwa bhuli. Naywo kakiayanga, “Kakindyelemeka lindika mu meho ghangu, nikilikuha kibhungi kyangu, na hinu ningubhona.”
JOH 9:16 Amoo bha Afalisayo bhakilongela, “Mundu ayu kahuma ng'obhe kwa Chapanga, kiyaha kangughayitikila ng'obhe Malaghilo gha Linjubha lya Kupumulila.” Bhangi bhakilongela, “Mundu yuna ulemwa kaahotola bhuli kutenda mihabho handa ayi?” Kukibhegha ng'abhano nkati yabhe.
JOH 9:17 Afalisayo bhakinkonya kangi yula mundu ywakabheghite ywangalola, “Ghungulongela bhuli kunninga ywombe, kiyaha ghwenga ndo ghuhughulitwe meho?” Mwene kakiayanga, “Ywombe ndo mbuye ywa Chapanga.”
JOH 9:18 Hilongohi bha Akaayahudi bhakinnyubhalila ng'obhe, kukita mundu aywo kakibhegha ywangalola apo makachu na hino kangubhona, mbaka paabhakemite abhele bhake,
JOH 9:19 na bhakiakonya, “Ayu ndo mwana ywene mwenga mukilongela kakibhelekwa ywangalola? Yibhegha bhuli hino kangubhona?”
JOH 9:20 Abhele bhake bhakiyanga, “Tungumanya kukita ayu ndo mwana ywetu, kangi kakibhelekwa ywangalola.
JOH 9:21 Peni twenga tungumanya ng'obhe kahotola bhuli kubhona, hangi tungummanya ng'obhe ywene ywakanhughulite meho. Munkonye mwene, kiyaha ywombe ndo nahota, na kaahotola kulilubhulila mwene!”
JOH 9:22 Abhele bhake bhakilongela naha kiyaha bhakiayoghopa hilongohi bha Akaayahudi, kiyaha bhakipangana kukita mundu ywohele ywakapala kulongela kukita Yesu ndo Kilisito Nkombohi, kaabhingwabhingwa kubhuka mu kitutubhi kya kukonganila Akaayahudi.
JOH 9:23 Ndo mana abhele bhake bhakilongela, “Ywombe ndo nahota, munkonye mwene!”
JOH 9:24 Afalisayo bhakinkema kangi yula ywakabhelekitwe ywangalola, na kunng'ombela, “Ghulongele hoto kwa Chapanga! Twenga tungumanya kukita mundu ayu ywakakulamihite ndi yunaulemwa.”
JOH 9:25 Ywombe kakiayanga, “Nenga ningumanya ng'obhe kukita kabhegha na ulemwa ebu chepa. Nughumanya nnando ghumu ghweka. Nikibhegha ywangalola, na hino nungubhona.”
JOH 9:26 Hino bhakinkonya, “kakighutendela niki? Kakikufumbula bhuli meho ghako?”
JOH 9:27 Ywombe kakiayanga, “Nukibhalubhulila kala, hangi mukiyihwa ng'obhe. Kiyaha niki munupala kuyihwa kangi? Bhuli, na mwenga mungupala kubhegha ahundwa bhake?”
JOH 9:28 Peni hilongohi bha Ayahudi bhakinnigha maligho na kunng'ombela, “Ghwenga ndo nhundwa ywake, ngati twenga twaahundwa bha Musa.
JOH 9:29 Twenga tungumanya kukita Chapanga kakiyobhela na Musa, peni mundu ayu tungumanya ng'obhe kahumila kwoki!”
JOH 9:30 Yula mundu kakiayanga, “Aghu ndo nnando ghwa kukangahya! Mwenga mungumanya ng'obhe kwakahumite, peni nenga kaghafumbula meho ghangu!
JOH 9:31 Tungumanya kukita Chapanga kanguayihwa ng'obhe bhandu bhanaulemwa, ngati kanguayihwa bhoha bhaantundamila na kunnyitikila.
JOH 9:32 Kutandila ulongohi ghwa nnima tuyihwa ng'obhe kukita mundu kalamiha meho gha mundu ywakabhelekitwe ywangalola.
JOH 9:33 Handa mundu ayu kanahumila kwa Chapanga, kangahotolite ng'obhe kutenda agha ghoha.”
JOH 9:34 Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ghubhelekwa na kukulila muulemwa, ghwaahotola bhuli kutuhunda twenga?” Bhakinpiha panji ya kitutubhi kya kukonganila Ayahudi.
JOH 9:35 Yesu pakayihwite kukita yula mundu ywangalola bhakinpiha panji, pakanmonite kakinkonya, “Bhuli ghwenga ghungunyubhalila Mwana ywa Mundu?”
JOH 9:36 Yula mundu kakinnyanga Yesu, “Bambo ghung'ombele, ywombe ndo ghani, ngati mokole kunhyubhalila!”
JOH 9:37 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghummona kala, naywo ndo yughuyobhela naywo hinu.”
JOH 9:38 Apo yula mundu kakilongela, “Nunguhyubhalila Bambo!” Naywo kakinchutamila mayughwa Yesu na kakintundamila.
JOH 9:39 Yesu kakilongela, “Nenga hika pannima apa kwakya kutosa, ili bhala bhangalola bhamokole kubhona, na bhala bhanakuhwacha bhombe bhangubhona abheghe bhangalola.”
JOH 9:40 Amoo bha Afalisayo bhaabheghiti papamu naywo bhakiyihwa malagho agho bhakinkonya, “Bhuli, na twenga twangalola hilahila?”
JOH 9:41 Yesu kakiayanga, “Handa mungabheghite mangalola, mungabheghite ng'obhe na ulemwa, peni hinu mungulongela mungubhona, hino mmegha na uhokelo.”
JOH 10:1 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, ywohele ywakayingila ng'obhe mulubhigho lwa mene kwa kupitila palitatilo, peni pakayingila kwa kupitila pamoo pangi, aywo mwihi na mpoki.
JOH 10:2 Peni mundu ywakayingilila kupitila palitatilo aywo ndo nhakila ywa mene.
JOH 10:3 Nkingikiha ywa litatilo kangunhughulila litatilo nhakila aywo, na mene bhanguyihwa lilobhe lyake, naywo kanguakema kila yumu na lihina lyake, na kuapiha panji ya lubhigho.
JOH 10:4 Pakaapiha panji, kangulongola kuulongolo ghwabhe nabho mene bhanguntughila, kiyaha bhangulimanya lilobhe lyake.
JOH 10:5 Peni Mene bhatantughila ng'obhe nhenja, ngati bhatantugha kiyaha bhangulimanya ng'obhe lilobhe lyake.”
JOH 10:6 Yesu kakiaghombela nhwano aghwo, peni bhombe bhakighumanya ng'obhe kila kyakakipalite kuaghombela.
JOH 10:7 Hino, Yesu kakiaghombela kangi, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, nenga ndo litatilo lya mene.
JOH 10:8 Bhala bhangi bhoha bhaahikite pakali ya nenga ndo abhwihi na apoka, na mene bhakiayihwa ng'obhe.
JOH 10:9 Nenga ndo hando litatilo. Ywoheli ywakayingila kupitila kwa nenga katalopoka, kaayingila na kupita panji na katamokola kyohele kyakakipala.
JOH 10:10 Mwihi kanguhika kwa likaho lya kuyibha, kukoma na kuhanyanga. Nenga hika ngati mmeghe na ubhumi mbole mmeghe naghwo ngenyu.”
JOH 10:11 “Nenga ndo nhakila ywa maha, Nhakila ywa maha kabhegha kala kuhwegha kwakya mene bhake.
JOH 10:12 Mundu ywakatenda lihengo lya kuhakila mene ili kahombwe ngalabha, ywene mene chepa bha ywombe, pakammona kabhwa bha kunhitu kanguhika katatugha, na kataaleka mene na kupwilinganika ku mbande hyoha.
JOH 10:13 Ywombe kangutugha kiyaha ndo mundu ywa kuhombwa ngalabha ghweka, hangi milando ya mene kwa ywombe ndo kilibhi ng'obhe.
JOH 10:14 Nenga ndo nhakila ywa maha, nunguamanya mene bhangu na mene bhangu bhangumanya nenga.
JOH 10:15 Handa bhula Tate pakamanya nenga na nenga mununmanya Tate. Na mmegha kala kuhwegha ili mene bhakotoke kuhobha.
JOH 10:16 Kangi megha na mene bhangi bhene chepa bha lubhigho alu. Yingunogha nubhayeghe bhubho, nabho bhatayihwa lilobhe lyangu, mbole kwabhegha lumati lumu na nhakila yumu.”
JOH 10:17 “Tate ghwangu kangumbala kiyaha mmegha kala kuhwegha ili mbole hotole kubhegha na ubhumi kangi.
JOH 10:18 Kahone mundu ywa kumuhila ubhumi ghwangu, peni nenga mbala numwene kughubhuha ubhumi ghwangu. Nenga megha na makakala gha kuubhuha ubhumi ghwangu, kangi megha na makakala gha kuubhuyiha kangi. Ngwiliho ayi kambegha Tate ywangu niyitende.”
JOH 10:19 Paayihwite malagho agha Akaayahudi bhakighabhanika kangi.
JOH 10:20 Ayoloho mu bhombe bhakilongela, “Ayu Kabhegha na lindilo! Kangi kabhegha na nng'uluka! Kiyaha niki mungunnyihwa?”
JOH 10:21 Bhangi bhakilongela, “Agha chepa malagho gha mundu ywakabhegha na lindilo, yuna lindilo kaahotola kuahughula bhangalola?”
JOH 10:22 Akwo ku Yelusalemu kukibhegha na Kikubhukubhu kya kukulungwa kuyohwa Nyumba ya Chapanga, manjubha aghwo ghukibhegha nndaluko ghwa malili.
JOH 10:23 Naywo Yesu kakibhegha kangutyanga ku nyumba ya Chapanga mu ludamu lwa Sulemani.
JOH 10:24 Akaayahudi bhakintindila na kunkonya, “Ghungutuleka mu bhwaghalihi mbaka pakiki? Handa ghwenga ndo Kilisito Nkombohi, ghutughombele tumanye?”
JOH 10:25 Yesu kakiayanga, “Nikibhaghombela, peni mwenga mukinyubhalila ng'obhe. Mahengo ghanughatenda kwa likalama lya lihina lya Tate ywangu ghangubhoneha kukita nenga ndo ghani,
JOH 10:26 peni mwenga mungunyubhalila ng'obhe kiyaha mwenga ndo bhakimati kyangu ng'obhe kya mene.
JOH 10:27 Mene bhangu bhanguyihwa lilobhe lyangu, nunguamanya, na bhombe bhangundughila.
JOH 10:28 Nenga nunguapegha ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha, nabho bhahobha ng'obhe. Kahone mundu ywa kubhabhuha mumabhoko ghangu.
JOH 10:29 Tate ywangu ywakambeghite mene abha ndo nkulu kupitingana kwa bhoha, hangi kahone mundu ywakubhabhuha mu mabhoko gha Tate ghwangu.
JOH 10:30 Nenga na Tate ndo kilibhi kimu.”
JOH 10:31 Ndo Akaayahudi bhakilokota malibho ngati bhanng'ume na kunkoma.
JOH 10:32 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nubhalaha mihabho miyoloho mikulu kuhuma kwa Tate ghwangu. Ndo nhabho ghwoki nkaki ya ayo ghunguatenda mungome?”
JOH 10:33 Ayahudi bhakinnyanga, “Tungughughuma ng'obhe malibho kwa mahengo gha maha, ngati kiyaha ghungukundula. Mana ghungulitenda ghwenga Chapanga kunu ghwenga ghu mundu handa bhandu bhangi.”
JOH 10:34 Yesu kakiayanga, “Yityekwa ng'obhe mu malaghilo kukita, Chapanga kakilongela ‘Mwenga ndo machapanga.’
JOH 10:35 Handa Chapanga kakiakema machapanga bhala bhakabhalaghilite lilagho lyake, na twenga tungumanya kukita manjubha ghoha malembo gha Chapanga ghangulongela hoto.
JOH 10:36 Yibheghaki mungulongela kukita yula ywakahaghulitwe na Tate na kunnlaghila munnima kukita kangukundula? Bhuli, kiyaha nenga nikilongela ndo Mwana ywa Chapanga?
JOH 10:37 Handa ningutenda ng'obhe lihengo lya Tate ywangu, hino nkotoke kunyubhalila.
JOH 10:38 Peni handa nungutenda lihengo lya Tate ywangu, hata handa mungunyubhalila ng'obhe, hino mughahyubhalile agho mahengo, ili mmokole kumanya na kung'amula kukita Tate kabhegha nkati ya nenga na nenga megha nkati ya Tate.”
JOH 10:39 Bhakiyigha kangi kunkamula, peni Yesu kakihepetuka mumabhoko ghabhe.
JOH 10:40 Yesu kakighenda kangi kumwambo ya lukemba Yoldani, mbaka pala pakabheghite Yohane kangubatisa apo kandahi, naywo kakitama akwo.
JOH 10:41 Bhandu ayoloho bhakinng'endela na bhakilongela. “Yohane kakitenda ng'obhe nhabho ghwohele, peni milando hyoha yakalongilite Yohane kunninga mundu ayu yibhegha hoto.”
JOH 10:42 Na bhandu ayoloho bhaabheghite kula bhakinnyubhalila Yesu.
JOH 11:1 Mundu yumu lihina lyake Lasalo, ywakatamite ku Betania, kakibhegha ntamwa. Ywombe Lasalo kakibhegha kangutama ku kijiji kyakatamiteghe Malia na Malita ahacha bhake.
JOH 11:2 Malia ndo yula ywakanpopolehite Bambo mahuta gha kunungila na kakinpukuta maghulu kwa hwili hyake, na Lasalo ndo nhacha ywake ywakabheghite ntamwa.
JOH 11:3 Hino, abho ahacha bhake Lasalo bhakilaghila lilagho kwa Yesu. “Bambo nng'anja ghwako kangubhina.”
JOH 11:4 Yesu pakayihwite agho, kakilongela, “Utamwa aghu chepa ghwa kuntenda Lasalo kuuleke ulili, ngati ghwabatenda bhandu bhankwehe Chapanga na kwa njila ayi Mwana ywa Chapanga katakwehwa bhubho.”
JOH 11:5 Yesu kakiapala muno Malita na Malia na nhacha ywabhe Lasalo.
JOH 11:6 Yesu pakayihwite kukita Lasalo kabhegha ntamwa, kakighendelela kukabhalila kwakabheghite kwa manjubha mabhili kyanalumu.
JOH 11:7 Mbole kakiaghombela ahundwa bhake, “Hinu tubhuye kangi ku nnima ghwa Yudea.”
JOH 11:8 Ahundwa bhake bhakinng'ombela, “Nhunda, lichanachana apa Akaayahudi bhakipala bhaghughume kwa malibho, hinu ghwenga ghungupala kubhuya kangi akwo?”
JOH 11:9 Yesu kakiayanga, “Bhuli, masaa gha pamuhi chepa kumi na mabhili mulinjubha? Bhanakutyanga pamuhi batalikubhala ng'obhe kiyaha bhangulubhona lung'ali lwa luchubha.
JOH 11:10 Peni bhala bhanakutyanga pakilo bhatalikubhala kiyaha kahone lung'ali nkati mwa bhombe.”
JOH 11:11 Yesu pakayomolite kulongela malagho agha kakiaghombela, “Nng'anja ywetu Lasalo kaghonja, peni nenga ndaghenda kunnyumuha.”
JOH 11:12 Ahundwa bhake bhakinng'ombela, “Bambo, handa kaghonja ng'ono, katahotola kulama.”
JOH 11:13 Bhombe bhakihwacha mihalo ya kughonja ng'ono, peni Yesu kakibhegha kanguyobhela yakya kuhwegha kwa Lasalo.
JOH 11:14 Ndo Yesu kakiaghombela pekupeku, “Lasalo kauleka ulili,
JOH 11:15 hata habu, nenga nunguyelelwa kiyaha nikibhegha ng'obhe akwo, ili mwenga mmokole kuhyubhalila nenga. Hinu tughende kwa ywombe.”
JOH 11:16 Ndo Tomasi, ywakakemitwe Pacha, kakiaghombela ahundwa ayake, “Tughende na twenga, ili tukahweghe papamu ywombe.”
JOH 11:17 Hino, Yesu pakahikite akwo, kakikolela Lasalo kabhikwa kala ku lindogholo handa manjubha ncheche ghaapitite.
JOH 11:18 Kijiji kya Betania kikibhegha ugheghela na Yelusalemu, utali ghwa handa kilomita ndatu,
JOH 11:19 Na Akaayahudi atangalo bhakihika kuakamula mabhoko Malita na Malia kwakya kibhembo kya nhacha ywabhe.
JOH 11:20 Ndo Malita pakayihwite kukita Yesu kanguhika, kakighenda kunkingama, peni Malia kakihighala ukaya.
JOH 11:21 Malita kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Bambo, handa ghungabheghite apa, nhacha Ywangu kangalekite ng'obhe ulili.
JOH 11:22 Peni hata hinu nungumanya kukita kyohele kighupala kunnyupa Chapanga kataghupegha.”
JOH 11:23 Yesu kakinng'ombela Malita, “Nhacha ywako katahyuka.”
JOH 11:24 Malita kakinnyanga Yesu, “Nungumanya kukita katahyuka nndaluko ghwa uhyuko, mu linjubha lya uhiko.”
JOH 11:25 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Nenga ndo uhyuko, yunubhahyuha bhandu na kuapegha ubhumi. Mundu ywohele ywakanyubhalila nenga katahwegha ng'obhe ngati kaabhegha na ubhumi,
JOH 11:26 na ywohele ywakatama na kuhyubhalila nenga, katahwegha ng'obhe manjubha ghoha. Bhuli, ghungughahyubhalila agha?”
JOH 11:27 Malita kakinng'ombela, “Ena Bambo! Nenga nunguhyubhalila kukita ghwenga ndo Kilisito, Mwana ywa Chapanga, yula ywakahika pannima.”
JOH 11:28 Mbole ya kulongela agha, Malita kakighenda kunkema pambwegha Malia nkulu ywake, “Nhunda kabhegha apa, kangughukema”
JOH 11:29 Naywo Malia pakayihwite habhu, kamu kakiyinuka na kakintughila Yesu kwakabheghite.
JOH 11:30 Yesu kakibhegha kakali kuyingila ku kijiji, ngati kakibhegha kakali palapala pakakonganite na Malita.
JOH 11:31 Hino, bhala Akaayahudi bhaabheghite ukaya bhangunkamula mabhoko Malia, paabhonite bhula pakabhuka kanongola na kughenda panji. Bhakintughila, bhakihwacha kukita kangughenda ku lindogholo kulilila akwo.
JOH 11:32 Malia pakahikite pala pakabheghite Yesu, kakichutama mayughwa mumaghulu gha Yesu na kulongela, “Bambo, handa ghungabheghite apa nhacha ywangu kangahweghite ng'obhe!”
JOH 11:33 Yesu pakammonite Malia kangulila, na bhala Akaayahudi bhaalongohanite naywo bhangulila bhubho, na kakihyononeka mu mwoyo ghwake na kakikukulika muno.
JOH 11:34 “Mbole kakiakonya, Mummika kwoki?” Bhakinng'ombela, “Bambo, ghuhike ghupalole.”
JOH 11:35 Yesu kakilila mahohi.
JOH 11:36 Ndo Akaayahudi bhakilongela, “Nnolekehe bhula pakanpalite Lasalo!”
JOH 11:37 Peni amoo bhabhe bhakilongela, “Bhuli, ayu ndo ywakannamihite meho yula ywangalola ng'obhe? Bhuli, angahotolite ng'obhe kuntenda na ayu kakotoke kuhwegha?”
JOH 11:38 Yesu pakabheghite kakali kanguhyononeka muno, ndo kakighenda ku lindogholo, lindogholo lyene likibhegha mbaku lya litalabha na panlyango likihibhwa na lilibho.
JOH 11:39 Yesu kakilongela, “Mulibhuhe lilibho alyo!” Malita, nhacha ywake yula ywakahweghite, kakinnyanga, “Bambo, kangununga kiyaha kabhegha mulindogholo kwa manjubha ncheche!”
JOH 11:40 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Bhuli, nikighughombela ng'obhe kukita paghuhyubhalila ghwaghubhona ukulu ghwa Chapanga?”
JOH 11:41 Ndo bhakilibhuha lila litalabha. Yesu kakilolekeha kunani na kulongela, “Nungughulumba ghwe Tate kiyaha ghungunyihwa nenga.
JOH 11:42 Nungumanya kukita ghungunyihwa manjubha ghoha, peni nungulongela agha yakya lumati alu luuyimite apa, ngati ahyubhalile kukita ghwenga ndo ghunaghihite.”
JOH 11:43 Mbole ya kulongela agha, Yesu kakikweha lilobhe lyake na kakikema, “Lasalo ghuhike kunu panji!”
JOH 11:44 Yula mundu ywakahweghite kakihika panji kunu kakibhilingilwa sanda mummili ghwake ghwohana kakihwikwa kilemba mumutwe ghwake. Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mummopole na munneke kaghende.”
JOH 11:45 Habhu Akaayahudi ayoloho bhaahikite kunkamula mabhoko Malia, paabhonite ghala ghakatendite Yesu, bhakinnyubhalila.
JOH 11:46 Peni amoo bhabhe bhakighenda kwa Afalisayo kuaghombela ghala ghakatendite Yesu.
JOH 11:47 Hino, mandundame akulu na Afalisayo bhakikema libalasa lya hilongohi bha Akaayahudi na bhakilongela, “Tutende niki? Mundu ayu kangutenda mihabho mitangalo!
JOH 11:48 Patunneka kaghendelele ayu bhandu bhoha bhatannyubhalila, na aka Aloma bhaahika kukihanyanga Kitutubhi kya Chapanga na nnima ghwetu!”
JOH 11:49 Yumoo ywabhe, ywakakemitwe Kayafa, ywene kakibhegha Ndundame Nkulu ngungwa ayo, kakilongela, “Mwenga ma nga kamanya kilibhi kyoheli!
JOH 11:50 Mungumanya ng'obhe kukita mbaha mundu yumu kahweghe, kihyengo kya kahanyangwa bhandu bha nnima ghwetu?”
JOH 11:51 Na lilagho alyo ywombe kakilongela chepa kwa mahwacho ghake, ngati kiyaha kakibhegha ndundame nkulu ngungwa yila, kakilondola kukita Yesu katahwegha kwakya nnima aghwo,
JOH 11:52 hangi chepa kwa Akaayahudi ghweka chabhe, ngati bhubho kwakya bhana bha Chapanga bhaapwilinganite, na kuatenda bhabheghe bhamu.
JOH 11:53 Kutandila linjubha alyo hilongohi bha Ayahudi bhakipalaha njila ya kunkoma Yesu.
JOH 11:54 Kya habhu Yesu kakileka kutyanga pakindandabhanji mu Akaayahudi, kakighenda mbande yiibheghite ugheghela na kibhala, ku kitami kikemitwe Efulaimu, kakitama akwo na ahundwa bhake.
JOH 11:55 Kikubhukubhu kya Akaayahudi ya Pasaka yikiheghelela, bhandu ayoloho bhakighenda ku Yelusalemu kuhumila muhitami hyabhe ngati bhaliyohe kukali Pasaka ayo ili bhayitikilwe na Chapanga.
JOH 11:56 Ndo bhombe bhakibhegha bhangumpalaha Yesu, na paakonganikite ku kitutubhi kya Chapanga, bhakikonyekehana, “Mungubhoana bhuli, Mundu ayu kaahika ng'obhe mukikubhukubhu aki?”
JOH 11:57 Hilongohi bha Andundame na Afalisayo bhakibhika ngwiliho kukita mundu ywohele ywakamanya kwakabheghite Yesu, kabhaghombele ngati amokole kunkamula.
JOH 12:1 Manjubha sita yikali na kikubhukubhu kya Pasaka, Yesu kakighenda ku Betania kwakatamiteghe Lasalo, ywene Yesu kakinhyuha.
JOH 12:2 Akwo bhakintendekehela mulyo ghwa makimuhi, Malita kakibhegha kangunkeyela Yesu, Lasalo kakibhegha yumoo ywa bhala bhaatamite mu mulyo papamu na Yesu.
JOH 12:3 Mbole Malia kakitola kyupa kiibheghite na mahuta gha kunungila gha ngalabha ngulu ghaatendikihitwe kwa mmela ghwa nalido, kakinpopohela Yesu mumaghulu ghake na kakinpukuta kwa hwili hyake. Na kitutubhi kyoha kikinungila luhumba lwa mahuta.
JOH 12:4 Hino, Yuda Simoni Isikaliyote, yumoo ywa ahundwa bhake ywene ywakapala kunkiluka Yesu, ndo kakilongela,
JOH 12:5 “Kya bhuli mahuta agha ghangatupeghite mbiya ngenju ya kunhomba mundu kwa ngungwa yimo, na ngalabha ahyo yangakamuhitwe kapukwa?”
JOH 12:6 Naywo Yuda kakighalongela agha chepa kwa kuabhonela luhungu kapukwa, ngati kiyaha kakibhegha mwihi. Naywo ndo ywakakamulite nhaku ghwa mbiya na kuhitumila ghweka chake.
JOH 12:7 Yesu kakiayanga, “Nkotoke kunghaha nndala ayu! Munneke kiyaha kambopohela mahuta kwakya linjubha lya kukulilwa nenga.
JOH 12:8 Kiyaha kapukwa mmegha nabho manjubha ghoha peni nenga maabhegha ng'obhe papamu na nenga manjubha ghoha.”
JOH 12:9 Akaayahudi ayoloho pabhayihwite kukita Yesu kakibhegha ku Betania, bhakihika chepa kwakya kummona Yesu ghweka chake, ngati na Lasalo ywene Yesu kakinhyuha.
JOH 12:10 Kya habhu hilongohi bha mandundame bhakitendekeha lukila lwa kunkoma Lasalo bhubho,
JOH 12:11 kiyaha kubhukana na mihalo ya kuhyuhwa Lasalo, Akaayahudi ayoloho bhakialema hilongohi bhabhe, bhakintughila Yesu na kunyubhalila.
JOH 12:12 Kilabhu yake lumati lukulu lwa bhandu bhaahikite ku kikubhukubhu bhakiyihwa kukita Yesu kakibhegha munjila kuhika ku Yelusalemu.
JOH 12:13 Hino bhakitola mapanyu gha misalisi bhakibhuka kughenda kunkingama kunu paakweha malobhe bhakilongela, “Tuntike Chapanga! Kanonelwe aywo yunakuhika kwa makakala gha Bambo. Kanonelwe Mutwa ghwa Akaaisilaeli!”
JOH 12:14 Yesu kakimmokola mwana kaputa, na kakihubhuka munng'ongo handa bhula malembo mughalongela.
JOH 12:15 “Nkotoke kuyoghopa, mabhandu bha ku Sayuni! Mulole Mutwa ghwenu kanguhika, kahubhuka mwana kaputa.”
JOH 12:16 Kalongohi ahundwa bhake Yesu bhakimanya ng'obhe milando ayi, peni Yesu pakanyahulitwe kala, ndo bhakikulungwa kukita milando ayi yikityekwa kwakya ywombe, na kukita bhandu bhakintendela ywombe.
JOH 12:17 Lumati lwa bhandu luubheghite papamu na Yesu pala pakankemite Lasalo kuhuma mu lindogholo, na kunhyuha, bhakighendelela kualongela bhangi kila kyakakitendite Yesu.
JOH 12:18 Kya habhu lumati alwo lwa bhandu lukinkingama, kiyaha bhakiyihwa kukita Yesu kakighutenda nhabho aghwo.
JOH 12:19 Habhu Afalisayo bhakighombana bhombe kwa bhombe, “Mungubhona, kukita tunguhotola ng'obhe kutenda kilibhi kyohele kangi! Nnole, bhandu bhoha bhanguntuughila ywombe!”
JOH 12:20 Apo ku Yelusalemu bhakihika bhubho amoo Akaagiliki kutundamila mu Kikubhukubhu kya Pasaka.
JOH 12:21 Abho bhakinng'endela Filipi nkola nnima ghwa Betisaida ya ku Galilaya, bhakinng'ombela, “Bambo tungupala kummona Yesu.”
JOH 12:22 Filipi kakighenda kunng'ombela Andelea, mbole bhoha abhili bhakighenda kunng'ombela Yesu.
JOH 12:23 Yesu kakiayanga, “Lisaa lya kukwehwa nenga Mwana ywa Mundu lihika kala.
JOH 12:24 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela. Lupunje lwa ngano kyanga kuponeka mu lutupi na kuhwegha lwahighala handa lupunje. Peni paluponeka na kuhwegha, lwapambika mbunje nyoloho.
JOH 12:25 Mundu ywohele ywakaghupala ubhumi ghwake kataghuhobheha, naywo ywakaghukalalila ubhumi ghwake mu nnima aghu kataghubhika kwakya ubhumi ghwanga kupela.
JOH 12:26 Mundu ywohele ywakapala kundumikila nenga yingunkwiliha kanndughile, ili kabheghe papamu na nenga pohele pambala kubhegha. Mundu ywohele yakandumikila nenga Tate ghwangu katantetekeha.”
JOH 12:27 “Hino mwoyo ghwangu ghungubhaghaya munu, hino nenga nongele niki? Peni yingunnogha ng'obhe kulongela, ‘Tate, ghunopole mulisaa ali’ Kiyaha kulyaghila nenga hika munnima aghu ili mbamatike.
JOH 12:28 Tate, lihina lyako likwehwe!” Ndo likihika lilobhe kuhuma kunani kwa Chapanga, “Nilikwiha kala, na ndalikweha kangi.”
JOH 12:29 Lula lumati lwa bhandu luubheghite pala lukiyihwa. Nalwo lukilongela, ali lilobhe lya njahe, bhangi bhakilongela, “Ndumitumi ghwa kunani kwa Chapanga kanguyobhela naywo!”
JOH 12:30 Peni Yesu kakiaghombela, “Lilobhe ali liyihwanika kwakya mwenga, na chepa kwakya nenga.
JOH 12:31 Hinu ndo lisaa lya kutoswa nnima aghu, na nkulu ghwa nnima aghu katataghwa panji.
JOH 12:32 Nenga panyinulighwa kunani mwa nnima, ndabhahuta bhandu bhoha kwa nenga.”
JOH 12:33 Yesu kakilongela agha pakilaha kiho kya bhuli kyakalonda kuhwegha.
JOH 12:34 Lula lumati lwa bhandu likinnyanga, “Tuyihwanila kuhuma mu malaghilo kukita Kilisito Nkombohi katalama manjubha ghoha ghangapela. Hinu ghungulongela bhuli ghwenga Mwana ghwa mundu katayinulighwa kunani mwa nnima? Aywo mwana ghwa mundu ndo ghani?”
JOH 12:35 Ndo Yesu kakiayanga, “Lung'ali lukali papamu na mwenga kyamandina, nnyendelele kutyanga nalwo lukali palung'aliha ili lubhindo lukotoke kubhahotola, kiyaha mundu ywakatyanga mu lubhindo kaamanya ng'obhe kwakaghenda.
JOH 12:36 Muluyubhalile lung'ali alwo, pammegha papamu nalwo, ili mmeghe bhana bha mulung'ali.” Mbole ya kulongela agha Yesu kakibhuka, kakilihiha ili akotoke kummona.
JOH 12:37 Hata mbole ya kutenda mihabho hyoha ayi mu ulongolo ghwabhe, bhombe bhakinyubhalila ng'obhe,
JOH 12:38 ayi yikibha ili litwihilike lila lilagho lya mbuye Isaya lyakalongelite. “Bambo, ghani ywakalihyubhalilite nhalo ghuutughulongelite? Kangi Chapanga kammoneha ghani makakla ghake?”
JOH 12:39 Habhu bhakinhyubhalila ng'obhe Yesu, kiyaha mbuye Isaya kakilongela pamoo pangi.
JOH 12:40 “Chapanga kabhapohola meho ghabhe na kabhapughaha mahala ghabhe, ili akotoke kubhona kwa meho ghabhe akotoke kumanya kwa mahala ghabhe, na akotoke kungilimbuka, ili hotole kualamiha, kangulongela Bambo.”
JOH 12:41 Mbuye Isaya kakilongela agha kiyaha kakighubhona ukulu ghwa Yesu na kakilongela mihalo ya ukulu aghwo.
JOH 12:42 Hata naha, ayoloho bha hilongohi bha Akaayahudi bhakinhyubhalila Yesu, Peni bhakilongela ng'obhe pakindandabhanji kukita bhakinhyubhalila, kiyaha bhakiyoghopa Akaafalisayu kuabhinga mu nyumba hya ngonganilo.
JOH 12:43 Hilongohi abho bha Akaayahudi bhakipala kutikilwa na bhandu na chepa kutikilwa na Chapanga.
JOH 12:44 Mbole Yesu kakilongela kwa lilobhe likulu, “Mundu ywohele ywakanhyubhalila nenga, kangunhyubhalila ng'obhe nenga ghweka changu, ngati kangunhyubhalila yula ywakanaghihite bhubho.
JOH 12:45 Ywoheli ywakamona nenga kungummona na yula ywakanaghilite.
JOH 12:46 Nenga hika pa nnima handa lungali, ili mundu ywohele ywakanyubhalila kakotoke kuhighala mulubhindo.
JOH 12:47 Na ywohele ywakaghayihwa malagho ghangu peni kangughakamulila ng'obhe, nenga ndantosa ng'obhe. Kiyaha hika ng'obhe kubhatosa bhandu bha munnima, ngati kubhalopola.
JOH 12:48 Peni bhoha bhaanganite nenga na kulema malagho bhaatoswa mu linjubha lya toso kwa malagho gha hoto ghanighalongelite!
JOH 12:49 Ayi ndo hoto, kiyaha ningulongela ng'obhe kwa kulamula numwene, ngati Tate ywangu ywakanaghihite ndo ywakangwilikihite niki kya kulongela na mumbala kulongela.
JOH 12:50 Na nenga nungumanya kukita ngwiliho yake yingughegha ubhumi ghwangapela ghwa manjubha ghoha. Hino, nenga nungulongela ghala ghweka ghakanaghilite Tate nighalongele.”
JOH 13:1 Likibhegha linjubha limu kali na kikubhukubhu kya Pasaka, Yesu kakimanya kukita lisaa lyake lya kubhuka pannima na kughenda kwa Tate likihika. Yesu kakiapala muno ahundwa bhake na kulyaghila kakiapala muno kyanga uhiko.
JOH 13:2 Hino, Yesu na ahundwa bhake bhakitama kulyegha mulyo ghwa makimuhi. Naywo Nchipila kakinnyingila kala Yuda, mwana ywa Simoni Isikaliote mwoyo ghwa kunkiluka Yesu.
JOH 13:3 Peni Yesu kakimanya kukita Tate kakimpegha makakala ghoha, na kakimanya kukita kakihuma kwa Chapanga na kangubhuya kwa Chapanga.
JOH 13:4 Habhu kakibhuka mu mulyo, kakihula lipinda lyake lya panji lya lihengo, na kakilikunga kitambala mukibhuno.
JOH 13:5 Mbole kakipopoha machi mu nkambo na kuyanda kuaghulula maghulu ahundwa bhake na kuapukuta kwa lila kitambala kyakalikungite handa nkungi.
JOH 13:6 Pakanhikilite Simoni Petili, Petili kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Bambo, bhuli, ghwenga ghwang'ulula maghulu ghangu?”
JOH 13:7 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghungumanya ng'obhe kinukitenda hinu, peni mbole ghwakimanya.”
JOH 13:8 Petili kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Akakaa, ghwenga ghwang'ulula ng'obhe nenga maghulu!” Yesu kakinnyanga, “Handa panughughulula ng'obhe, ghwenga ghwabhegha ng'obhe papamu na nenga kangi.”
JOH 13:9 Simoni Petili kakinnyanga, “Bambo, ghung'ulule kangi chepa maghulu ghweka, ngati papamu na mabhoko ghangu na mutwe bhubho!”
JOH 13:10 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Mundu ywakayoghite kala kangunoghwa kukuha maghulu ghweka, kiyaha mmili ghwake ghoha ghubhegha nyanyi, peni ndo mabhoha ng'obhe.”
JOH 13:11 Yesu kakimmanya yula ywakapala kunkiluka, ndo mana kakilongela, “Mwenga nng'ululika, peni mabhoha ng'obhe.”
JOH 13:12 Yesu pakayomolite kuaghulula maghulu ghabhe, kakihwala kangi lipinda lyake, kakibhuya kutama pakulyegheha na kakiakonya. “Mungumanya agha ghanuatendelite?
JOH 13:13 Mwenga mungungema nenga Nhunda na Bambo, ayi tela, kiyaha ndo numeghite.
JOH 13:14 Hino, handa nenga Bambo na Nhunda ghwenu nubhaghulula maghulu, na mwenga bhubho mungunoghwa kulighulula maghulu mabhene kwa mabhene.
JOH 13:15 Nubhapegha nhwano aghu, ngati na mwenga bhubho ntende handa munuatendela.
JOH 13:16 Kulyaghia nunguaghombela, nndumindumi chepa nkulu kupitingana kwa bambo ghwake, hangi yunakulaghilwa nkulu ng'obhe kupitingana kwa ywakannaghilite.
JOH 13:17 Hino, handa mungughamanya agha, maanonelwa!”
JOH 13:18 “Nungulongela ng'obhe kwa mabhoha, kiyaha nenga nunguamanya bhanibhahaghulite. Peni mbaka ghatwihilike Malembo gha Chapanga ghaalongela, ‘Yula ywakalyeghite mulyo papamu na nenga, kabhegha mmyanja ywangu.’
JOH 13:19 Nenga ningubhaghombela mihalo ayi hinu yikali na kubwitukila, ngati paghabwituka mmokole kuhyubhalila kukita ‘Nenga mwene.’
JOH 13:20 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, ywohele ywakankingama yula yununnaghilite kangungingama nenga, na ywakangingama nenga kangunkingama yula ywakanaghilite.”
JOH 13:21 Pakayomolite kulongela agha, Yesu kakibhaghaya muno mumwoyo ghwake, na kakilongela pekupeku, “Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, yumu ywenu katangiluka.”
JOH 13:22 Ahundwa bhake bhakilolekehana kyangamanya kukita kangunninga ghani.
JOH 13:23 Nhundwa yumu, ywene Yesu kakibhegha kangunpala muno, kakibhegha kangutama ugheghela na Yesu.
JOH 13:24 Hino, Simaoni Petili kakinnahila kibhoko na kakinng'ombela, “Ghunkonye kangunninga ghani?”
JOH 13:25 Habhu nhundwa aywo kakiheghelela ugheghela na Yesu na Kakinkonya, “Bambo, ndo ghani aywo?”
JOH 13:26 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Yula yumbala kunpegha kipalamande kya lingate mbole ya kukichwika mu bakuli, ndo yuywayu.” Habhu kakikitola kipalamande kya lingate, kakikichwika mukiluki na kakinpegha Yuda, mwana ghwa Isikaliote.
JOH 13:27 Yuda pakakingamite kila kipalamande kya lingate, Nchipia kakinnyingila. Hino, Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Kighukipala kukitenda ghukitende kanongola!”
JOH 13:28 Peni kahone hata yumu ywa bhala bhaatamite mu mulyo ywakamanyite kiyaha niki Yesu kakinng'ombela habhu.
JOH 13:29 Kiyaha Yuda kakibhegha mmika ngalabha, amoo bha ahundwa bhakihwacha kukita Yesu kakinng'ombela kakahemela hilibhi hya kikubhukubhu, ebu kakinng'ombela kakaapeghe makapukwa hilibhi hyohele.
JOH 13:30 Hino, Yuda pakakikingamite kala kila kipalamande kya lingate, kakibhuka unyumba kanongola. Nayo yikibhegha lubhindo.
JOH 13:31 Mbole ya Yuda kubhuka unyumba, Yesu kakilongela, “Lisaa lihika kwa ukulu ghwa Mwana ywa Mundu ghwabhonekana pakindandabhanji, naywo Chapanga katakwehwa kwa ywombe.
JOH 13:32 Mwana katabhoneha bhula Chapanga paghubheghite nkulu. Mbole Chapanga katantola Mwana na kubhabhoneha bhandu bhula pakabheghite nkulu, katatenda habhu kwa kulopokela.
JOH 13:33 Bhana bhangu, megha papamu na mwenga kwa nndaluko ghwa mandina hela. Maambalaha, peni hinu nungaaghombela ghala ghanibhaghombilite hilongohi bha Akaayahudi, ‘Kung'enda nenga, mwenga mahotola ng'obhe kughenda.’
JOH 13:34 Nungubhapegha ngwiliho ya hyona, nlipale. Mulipale handa nenga panubhapalite.
JOH 13:35 Panpalana, bhandu bhoha bhaamanya kukita mwenga ndo ahundwa bha nenga.”
JOH 13:36 Simoni Petili kakinkonya Yesu, “Bambo ghungughenda kwoki?” Yesu kakinnyanga Petili, “Kung'enda nenga ghwahotola ng'obhe kundughila hinu, peni ghwandughila mbole yake.”
JOH 13:37 Petili kakinkonya kangi Yesu, “Bambo kya bhuli nenga ndahotola ng'obhe kughutughila hinu? Nenga Megha kala mbaka kuhwegha kwakya ghwenga!”
JOH 13:38 Yesu kakinnyanga Petili, “Bhuli, ghwenga ghwaghubhuha ubhumi ghwako kwakya nenga? Kulyaghila nungughughombela, yikali na mbichi kubhika, ghwangana pandatu kukita ghungumanya ng'obhe.”
JOH 14:1 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nkotoke kubhaghaya mu myoyo yenu Mungunhyubhalila Chapanga munyubhalile na nenga bhubho.
JOH 14:2 Ukaya kwa Tate ghwangu kubhegha na hyumba ndangalo hela bhubho ningabhaghombilite, kiyaha nungughenda kuatendekehela lubhagha.
JOH 14:3 Na mbole ya kughenda na kuatendekehela pahala, ndaabhuya na kuatola, ngati mwenga mmeghe pala pameghite nenga.
JOH 14:4 Munguyimanya njila ya kughenda akwo kung'enda nenga.”
JOH 14:5 Tomasi kakinkonya, “Bambo twenga tungukumanya ng'obhe kughughenda, hinu twayimanya bhuli ayo njila?”
JOH 14:6 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Nenga ndo njila na hoto na ubhumi, kahone mundu ywakahotola kughenda kwa Tate, ngati kupitila nenga.
JOH 14:7 Handa mungamanyite nenga, munganmanyite na Tate ghwangu bhubho, na kuyandila hinu mungunmanya Tate kangi mummona kala.”
JOH 14:8 Filipi kakinng'ombela, “Bambo ghutubhonehe Tate ghwe kando kitukipala.”
JOH 14:9 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ndama na mwenga manjubha ghoha agha, ghwenga Filipi ghungummanya ng'obhe Tate? Ywakamonite nenga kammona na Tate, hino ghungulongela bhuli, ‘Ghutubhonehe Tate?’
JOH 14:10 Bhuli, Filipi ghunguhyubhalila ng'obhe, kukita nenga megha nkati ya Tate na Tate kabhegha nkati yangu? Malagho ghanuaghombela, nunguyobhela ng'obhe handa mumbala mwene, ngati Tate ywakabheghite nkati yangu ndo kangutenda mahengo ghake.
JOH 14:11 Munyubhalile kukita nenga megha nkati ya Tate, naywo Tate kabhegha nkati yangu, handa Chepa, nhyubhalile kubhukana na mahengo ghala ghanughatenda.
JOH 14:12 Kulyaghila nunguaghombela. Ywakanyubhalila nenga katatenda milando yiniyitenda nenga, kulyaghila, kataghatenda makulu kuchweha, kiyaha nenga nungughenda kwa Tate.
JOH 14:13 Na kyoheli kimukiyupa kwa makakala gha lihina lyangu akyo ndakitenda, ili Mwana kannyeghele uhokamo Tate.
JOH 14:14 Handa pamunyupa lilagho lyohele kwa makakala gha lihina lyangu ndabhatendela.”
JOH 14:15 “Handa hoto mungumbala, maayitikila ngwiliho hyangu.
JOH 14:16 Nenga ndannyupa Tate, naywo kataapegha Ntangatila yungi ili katame na mwenga mu manjubha ghoha,
JOH 14:17 Nhuki aywo kataahwimulila bhandu uhoto. Bhandu bhene bhangunnema Chapanga bhahotola ng'obhe kunkingama Nhuki aywo, kiyaha bhangummona ng'obhe, kangi bhangunmanya ng'obhe. Peni mwenga mungummanya Nhuki ywa Chapanga kiyaha kangutama papamu na mwenga, kangi kangubhegha nkati yenu.”
JOH 14:18 “Ndabhaleka ng'obhe mwenga mmeghe ghweka chenu, ngati ndahika kangi kwa mwenga.
JOH 14:19 Mbole ya manjubha gha mandina bhandu bha nnima bhamona kangi ng'obhe, peni mwenga mamona, kiyaha nenga ndabhegha na ubhumi, na mwenga maabhegha na ubhumi bhubho.
JOH 14:20 Linjubha alyo palihika, maamanya kukita nenga megha nkati ya Tate ywangu, na mwenga mmegha nkati ya nengu na nenga megha nkati ya mwenga.”
JOH 14:21 “Ywoheli ywakakingama ngwiliho yangu na kuyitikila, aywo ndo kangumbala nenga. Na Tate ywangu katammpala yula ywakambala nenga, na nenga ndammpala na ndalibhoneha kwa ywombe.”
JOH 14:22 Ndo Yuda, Chepa yula Isikaliote, kakinng'ombela Yesu, “Bambo, yahotoleka bhuli ghwenga kulibhoneha kwa twenga na chepa kwa bhandu bha ghanga kughuhyubhalila ghwenga?”
JOH 14:23 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Mundu pakambala, kaayitikila lilagho lyangu. Naywo Tate ywangu katampala, nenga na Tate twaahika kutama na ywombe.
JOH 14:24 Mundu ywohele ywakambala ng'obhe katayitikila ng'obhe lilagho lyangu, na mahundo ghanubhapeghite chepa gha nenga, ngati gha Tate, ywakanaghilite.”
JOH 14:25 “Nungubhaghombela agha ghoha pameghitie ngali papamu na mwenga.
JOH 14:26 Peni Ntangatila, ndo Nhuki ywa Chapanga, ywene Tate katannaghila kwa makakala gha lihina lyangu, kataahunda milando hyoha, nayo kataatangatila kukulungwa ghoha ghanubhaghombela.”
JOH 14:27 “Nungubhalekela uhihimilo, ndo uhihimilo ghuuhuma kwa nenga numwene. Chepa uhihimilo ghuuhuma kwa bhandu bha nnima. Nkotoke kubhaghaya ku myoyo yenu hangi nkotoke kuyoghopa.
JOH 14:28 Mukinyihwa panongela, ‘Nungughenda, peni ndabhuya kangi kwa mwenga.’ Handa mungambalite mungayelelitwe kiyaha nungughenda kwa Tate, kiyaha ywombe ndo nkulu kupitingana nenga.
JOH 14:29 Nungubhaghombela milando ayi hyoha ikali na kubwitukila, ngati payilonda kubwitukila mmokole kunyubhalila.
JOH 14:30 Ndayobhela ng'obhe na mwenga kangi milando mitangalo, kiyaha ntabhala ywa nnima aghu kanguhika. Peni kabhegha ng'obhe na makakala kwa nenga,
JOH 14:31 peni bhandu bha mu nnima bhangunoghwa bhamanye kukita nungumpala Tate, na handa bhula Tate pakang'ombelite.” “Haya nnyime, tubhuke apa.”
JOH 15:1 Yesu kakighendelela kulongela, “Nenga ndo nsabibu ywa hoto, na Tate ywangu ndo nkulima.
JOH 15:2 Lipanyu lyohele munenga lyangapambika, Tate ywangu kangulidumula, na lipanyu lyohele linakupambika mapambiko kangulipyetulila.
JOH 15:3 Mwenga mmegha kala nyanyi kubhukana na ghula nhalo ghunuaghombilite.
JOH 15:4 Ntame nkati ya nenga, na nenga ndaatama nkati ya mwenga. Handa bhula lipanyu mulihotola ng'obhe kupambika mapambiko kyanga kubhegha mu nsabibu, ubhwabhuabhu na mwenga mahotola ng'obhe kutenda ghala ghakaghapala Chapanga kyanga kutama nkati ya nenga.”
JOH 15:5 Nenga ndo nsabibu, na mwenga ndo mapanyu. Ywakatama nkati ya nenga, na nenga ndaatama nkati yake, aywo kaapambika mapambiko matangalo, kiyaha kyanga nenga mahotola ng'obhe kutenda nnando ghwohele.
JOH 15:6 Mundu ywohele ywangatama nkati ya nenga katataghwa panji handa lipanyu na kuyuma, bhandu bhatalikungana na kulitagha mumwoto, na lyahyoka.
JOH 15:7 Mwenga pantama nkati ya nenga na malagho ghangu paghatama nkati yenu, munnyupe Tate kyoheli kimukipala, na mwenga maapeghwa.
JOH 15:8 Kya habhu bhandu bhaamanya kukita Tate ywangu pakabheghite nkulu, handa mwenga maatenda ghala ghakaghapala Chapanga na mabhegha ahundwa bhangu hoto hoto.
JOH 15:9 “Handa bhula Tate pakambalite nenga, habhu nenga nunguapala mwenga. Hinu ntame mu upalo ghwangu.
JOH 15:10 Pannyitikila ngwiliho hyangu, nenga ndaaghendelela kuapala, handa bhula Tate ywangu pakaghendelela kumbala.”
JOH 15:11 Nubhaghombela milando ayi ili mwenga nngendelele kunyeleha nenga, na nenga nng'endelele kuayelela mwenga.
JOH 15:12 Ayi ndo ngwiliho yangu mulipale handa munuapalite mwenga.
JOH 15:13 Njila ngulu ndo ya kuabhoneha upalo ndo kubhegha kala kuhwegha kwakya bhombe.
JOH 15:14 Mwenga maabhegha ghanja bhangu handa pantenda ghala ghanubhakwilikihite.
JOH 15:15 Nenga nungubhakema kangi ng'obhe mwenga abhandwa, ngati nunguakema aghanja kiyaha abhandwa bhangumanya ng'obhe kyakakitenda bambo ywabhe. Ngati mwenga nungubhakema mwenga ghanja, kiyaha nubhaghombela kala milando hyoha yiniyiyihwite kuhuma kwa Tate ywangu
JOH 15:16 Chepa mwenga mukihaghula nenga, peni nenga ndo yunubhahaghulite mwenga na kubhalagha ngati nng'ende mukabhatende bhandu bhangi bhanyubhalile nenga, na mapambika ghenu ghakamale. Na kukita kyoheli kimukiyupa kwa makakala gha lihina lyangu, Tate ywangu katabhapegha.
JOH 15:17 Hino, ayi ndo ngwiliho yangu, nungaalaghila kila mundu kampale nnyake.
JOH 15:18 “Handa Bhandu bha nnima paabhapala ng'obhe mwenga, nkulungwe kukita bhakimbala ng'obhe nenga ikali na kuapala ng'obhe mwenga.
JOH 15:19 Handa mungabheghite bhandu bha nnima aghu, bhandu bha nnima bhangabhapalite handa bhula paabhapala ayabhe. Peni kya bhula mwenga chepa bhandu bha nnima aghu, ngati nenga nubhahaghula mwenga kuhuma munnima, kya habhu bhandu bha nnima bhanguapala ng'obhe.
JOH 15:20 Nkulungwe lila lilagho linubhaghombilite, ‘Kahone ndumindumi ywakabhegha nkulu kupitingana bambo ywake.’ Handa bhandu bhambamanda nenga, bhataapamanda na mwenga bhubho, na handa bhatalikingama lilagho lyangu, bhatalikingama na lilagho lyenu bhubho.
JOH 15:21 Peni bhatabhatendela mwenga agha ghoha kubhukana na kunyubhalila nenga, kiyaha bhangunmanya ng'obhe ywakanaghilite nenga.
JOH 15:22 Handa ningahikite ng'obhe na kuyobhela nabho, bhangabheghite ng'obhe na uhokelo, peni hino bhaahotola ng'obhe kulikingikiha kukita abhegha ng'obhe na ulemwa.
JOH 15:23 Mundu ywohele ywakambala ng'obhe nenga, kangumpala ng'obhe Tate ywangu bhubho.
JOH 15:24 Niyitenda mihabho yene kabhone ywakatendite yikali ya nenga. Handa bhangamonite ng'obhe panuyitenda mihabho ayo, ndo bhangabheghite ng'obhe na ulemwa. Peni hinu bhamona nenga panuyitenda mihabho ayo na bhakali bhangumbala ng'obhe nenga na Tate ywangu bhubho.
JOH 15:25 Bhangutenda habhu ili litwihilike lila lilagho liityekitwe mu Malaghilo kukita, ‘Bhakimbala ng'obhe nenga yunumeghite ngo'obhe na ghwoheli.’ ”
JOH 15:26 “Ndabhalaghila Nhuki ywa Chapanga ywakahuma kwa Tate, kataabhoneha uhoto, Nhuki aywo kataatangatila na kuaghombela ghaniapala nenga.
JOH 15:27 Na mwenga ubhwabhu mannyimiha nenga, kiyaha mukibegha na nenga kutandila kalongohi.”
JOH 16:1 “Nubhaghombela milando ayi ngati nkotoke kuleka kunyubhalila.
JOH 16:2 Bhandu bhataabhingabhinga mu nyumba hyabhe hya kukonganila, kangi nndaluko ghunguhikaghwene ywohele ywakapala kuakoma katahwacha kukita kangutenda lihehengo lya Chapanga.
JOH 16:3 Nabho bhatabhatendela milando ayi kiyaha bhangummanya ng'obhe Tate hangi bhangumanya ng'obhe nenga.
JOH 16:4 Peni nubhaghombela milando ayi, ili palilonda kuhika lisaa lya kutendeka agho, maakulungwa kukita nikibhaghombela.” “Nikibhaghombela ng'obhe milando ayi kutandila kalongohi, kiyaha nikibhegha papamu na mwenga.
JOH 16:5 Peni hinu nenga nungughenda kwa ywombe Ywakanaghilite, na kahone yumu ywenu ywakangonya nungughenda kwoki
JOH 16:6 Kiyaha nubhaghombela milando ayi, hinu mwenga mungukukulika.
JOH 16:7 Nungubhaghombela gha hoto, Mbaha kwa mwenga, nenga muke, handa kyangabhuka nenga, aywo Nhuki ywa Chapanga katahika ng'obhe kwa mwenga. Peni pang'enda, ndo ndannaghila kwa mwenga
JOH 16:8 Naywo paahika kala, kataabhoneha bhandu bha nnima kukita bhanguhokela yakya mihalo ya ulemwa na bhanguhokela yakya ghanakunoghela na bhanguhokela yakya toso ya Chapanga.
JOH 16:9 Bhanguhokela kwa mihalo ya ulemwa, kiyaha bhangunhyubhalila ng'obhe nenga,
JOH 16:10 bhanguhokela kwa mihalo ya kunnogheha Chapanga, kya habhu, nungughenda kwa Tate na mwenga mamona ng'obhe kangi,
JOH 16:11 bhanguhokela kwa mihalo ya toso yanganoghela, kiyaha yula nkulu ywa bhandu bha nnima aghu, ywene ndo Nchipila katoswa kala.”
JOH 16:12 “Ngali megha na milando miyoloho ya kualubhulila, peni mahotola ng'obhe kuyimanya hinu.
JOH 16:13 Peni pakapala kuhika aywo Nhuki ywa hoto, kaalongoha ku hoto hyoha ya Chapanga, ywombe kaalongela ng'obhe mihalo yake mwene, ngati katakambuka ghala ghakaghayihwite, na kuaghombela milando yipala kuhika.
JOH 16:14 Ywombe katabhabhoneha nega mumeghite nkulu, kiyaha kaaghatola ghala ghanighalongela na kuaghombela mwenga.
JOH 16:15 Hyoha hyakabheghite nahyo Tate ndo hyangu, ndo mana nongela kukita aywo Nhuki katabhaghombela ghala ghoha ghakaghayihwite kuhuma kwa nenga.”
JOH 16:16 “Ghakali manjubha gha mandina ndabhuka na maamona ng'obhe, na mbole ya manjubha gha mandina maamona kangi.”
JOH 16:17 Apwo amoo ahundwa bhake bhakiyanda kukonyana, “Fwambulo ya agha ghaaghalongela ndo yoki? Kangutughombela kukita yikali manjubha gha mandina maamona ng'obhe, na kangi mbole ya manjubha gha mandina twaammona, kangi kabhegha na mana yoki pakalongela, ‘Kiyaha nugughenda kwa Tate.’
JOH 16:18 Hino, bhakighendelela kukonyana mana yake ndo yoki paalongela, ‘Yikali manjubha gha mandina?’ Tungumanya ng'obhe Kyakalongela!”
JOH 16:19 Yesu kakimanya kukita bhakipala kunkonya yakya nnando aghwo, habhu kakiaghombela, “Bhuli, mungukonyana mabhene ya kya ghala ghanighalongilite? Ghakali manjubha gha mandina matamona ng'obhe, na mbole ya manjubha gha mandina matamona kangi.”
JOH 16:20 Kulyaghila nungaaghombela, mwenga maalila na kukukulika, peni bhandu bha munnima bhatayelelwa, mwenga maabhona machwingo peni uchwingo ghwenu ghwakilibhuka uyelelo.
JOH 16:21 Yabhegha handa bhula nndala pakaheghelela mu manjubha gha kupapa, peni pakabhelekwa kala mwana kangulibhalila mabhino kubhukana na uyelelo ghwa kubhelekwa mwana munnima.
JOH 16:22 Na mwenga hinu mmegha na mabhino, peni mbole yake mamona kangi, ndo maayelelwa, na kabhone mundu ywakapala kuabhuhila uyelelo ghwenu.
JOH 16:23 “Mu linjubha alyo maanyupa ng'obhe kyohele. Kulyaghila nunguaghombela, Tate kataapegha mwenga kyohele kimukiyupa kwa makakala gha lihina lyangu.
JOH 16:24 Mbaka hinu nnyupa ng'obhe nnando ghwoheli kwa makakala ghangu, kangi nnyupe ili nnyelelwe muno.”
JOH 16:25 “Nubhaghombela milando ayi kwa mihwano. Lisaa linguhika lyeni ndaalongela ng'obhe na mwenga kwa mihwano, peni ndabhaghombela hotohoto yakya Tate.
JOH 16:26 Linjubha alyo palihika, maayupa kwa likalama lya lihina lyangu, na ndabhaghombela ng'obhe kukita ndannyupila kwa Tate,
JOH 16:27 kiyaha Tate mwene kanguapala mwenga. Kanguapala mwenga kiyaha mungumbala nenga na munguhyubhalila kukita huma kwa ywombe.
JOH 16:28 Nenga huma kwa Tate, na hika apa pannima, na hinu nungubhuka pannima na nungughenda kwa Tate.”
JOH 16:29 Ndo ahundwa bhake bhakilongela, “Hinu ghungulongela pekupeku kyanga kutumila mihwano.
JOH 16:30 Muuhiko tungumanya kukita ghwenga ghungumanya milando hyoha, na tubhegha ng'obhe na kihokonyo kwa mundu ywohele kaghukonye. Habhu tunguhyubhalila kukita ghuhuma kwa Chapanga.”
JOH 16:31 Yesu kakiayanga, “Bhuli, hinu munguhyubhalila?
JOH 16:32 Lisaa linguhika, na kangi lihika kala, pala mabhoha pampala kupwilinganika, na kila yumu ywenu kataghenda mu njila yake, na kuneka ghweka changu. Peni nenga megha ng'obhe ghweka changu, kiyaha Tate kabhegha na nenga.
JOH 16:33 Nubhaghombela milando ayi ngati mmokole kubhegha na uhihimilo mu kulilunga na nenga. Munnima bhandu bhatabhatenda npamandike, peni muliyonyokehe mwoyo, nenga nughuhotola kala nnima!”
JOH 17:1 Mbole ya Yesu kulongela agha, kakilolekeha kunani kakilongela, “Tate, lisaa lihika kala. Ghunkwehe Mwana ywako ngati mwana ywako naywo kaghukwehe ghwenga.
JOH 17:2 Mana ghumpegha likalama mu bhandu bhoha, ngati kabhapeghe ulami ghwa manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko, bhoha bhaghumbeghite.
JOH 17:3 Na ulami ghwa manjubha ghoha ndo aghu, Bhaghumanye ghwenga ghuubheghite ghweka chako Chapanga ghwa hoto, na Yesu Kilisto yughunnaghilite.
JOH 17:4 Nenga nubhabhoneha bhandu ukulu ghwako, kupitila lihengo lila lighumbeghite nilitende.
JOH 17:5 Hinu Tate! Ghubhabhonehe bhandu ukulu ghwako, kwa ghula ukulu ghumeghite naghwo pakali ya kubhumbwa nnima.”
JOH 17:6 “Nughutenda ghumanyike kwa bhoha bhaghumbeghite kuhuma pannima. Bhombe bhakibhegha ghwenga chabhe, na ghukimbegha nenga, nabho bhaliyitikila lilagho lyako,
JOH 17:7 hinu bhangumanya kukita hilibhi hyoha highumbegite hihuma kwa ghwenga.
JOH 17:8 Nenga nubhapegha nhalo ghua ghuumbeghite, na bhombe bhaghukingama, bhangumanya kukita hoto huma kwa ghwenga, na bhanguhyubhalila kukita ghwenga ndo ghunaghilite.”
JOH 17:9 Nunguayupila bhombe. Nunguyupa ng'obhe kwakya bhandu bha nnima, kangi bhandu bhoha bhaabheghite bha nenga, ndo bha ghwenga.
JOH 17:10 Hyoha hiimeghite nahyo ndo hya ghwenga, na hyoha ghuubheghite nahyo ndo hya nenga, na ukulu ghwangu ghubhonekana kukindila bhombe.
JOH 17:11 Na hinu nunguhika kwa ghwenga, megha ng'obhe kangi pannima, peni bhombe abhegha mu nnima. Tate Chapanga! Kwa likalama lya lihina lyako lighumbeghite, ketekete ghubhabhike maha kwa makakala gha lihina lyako lighumbeghite, ngati abheghe kilibhi kimu, handa nenga na ghwenga mutubheghite bhamo.
JOH 17:12 Pameghite papamu na bhombe, nikibhabhika maha kwa likalama lya lihina lighumbeghite. Nenga nibhakingikiha, kahone yumu ywabhe ywakahobhite, maha nga yula mwana nhobheho, ngati Malembo ghabhonekane hoto.
JOH 17:13 Hinu nunguhika kwa ghwenga, na nongela nhalo aghu ngali pamegha mu nnima ili ayelelwe muno.
JOH 17:14 Nubhapegha nhalo ghwako, nabho bhandu bha mu nnima bhabhapala ng'obhe, kiyaha bhombe bhaakuhhyabhalilite ndo chepa bhandu bha nnima aghu, handa bhula nenga mumebheghite ng'obhe ywa nnima aghu.
JOH 17:15 Nunguyupa ng'obhe kukita ghuabhuhe mu nnima, ngati nunguyupa ghubhakingikihe na yula Nhokelo.
JOH 17:16 Bhombe chepa bhandu bha nnima aghu handa nenga munubheeghite ng'obhe ywa nnima aghu.
JOH 17:17 Kulyaghila Tate, nungukuyupa ghubhatetnde abheghe bhandu bhako menyu, mu uhoto ghwako, kiyaha nhalo ghwako ndo hoto.
JOH 17:18 Handa bhula paghunaghilite nenga mu nnima, na nenga bhubho nungubhalaghila bhombe mu nnima.
JOH 17:19 Nilibhuha numwene kwakya Chapanga, ili bhombe amokole kuyitikilwa mu kughutumikila ghwenga.
JOH 17:20 “Nunguayupila ng'obhe abha ghweka chabhe, peni nunguayupila na bhala bhoha bhaapala kunhyubhalila kupitila lilagho lyabhe.
JOH 17:21 Bhoha abheghe na ughumo. Tate, nunguyupa ngati bhombe abheghe nkati yetu, handa bhula ghwenga paghubheghite nkati yangu na nenga nkati yako. Nunguyupa abheghe bhamo ili bhandu bha mu nnima bhahyubhalile kukita ghwenga ndo ghunaghilite.
JOH 17:22 Ukulu ghula ghuumbeghite nenga nibhapegha bhombe, ngati bhabheghe na ughumo handa twenga mutubheghite na ughumo.
JOH 17:23 Nenga megha nkati yabhe na ghwenga ghubhegha nkati yangu, ili abheghe atwihiliko muughumo na unnima ghumanye kukita ndo ghwenga ghunaghilite, na nenga nunguapala handa paghumbalite nenga.”
JOH 17:24 “Tate! Ghwenga ndo ghuumbeghite bhandu abha, na nenga nungupala abha bhaghumbeghite abheghe papamu na nenga pala pambala kubhegha, ngati bhaghubhone ukulu ghwangu ghuumbeghite, kiyaha ghumbala ikali na kubhumbwa nnima.
JOH 17:25 Tate nkola umaha! Bhandu bha mu nnima bhangukumanya ng'obhe, peni nenga nungukumanya, na abha bhangumanya kukita ghunaghila.
JOH 17:26 Nenga nughutenda ghumanyike kwa bhombe na ndaghendelela kutenda habhu, ili upalo ghumbalite naghwo kwa nenga ghubheghe nkati yabhe, na nenga meghe nkati yabhe.”
JOH 18:1 Yesu pakayomolite kuyupa, kakibhuka papamu na ahundwa bhake bhakiyomboka kumwambo ya lukemba Kediloni. Akwo kukibhegha kitogholo, ndo Yesu kakiyingila amwo papamu na ahundwa bhake.
JOH 18:2 Naywo Yuda, yula nkiluka kakipamanya pala, kiyaha Yesu kakibhegha kangughenda na ahundwa bhake akwo maghenda maghenda.
JOH 18:3 Habhu Yuda kakighenda ku kitogholo, pakilongoha kimati kya machonda bha Akaaloma na amoo bha mahofisa bhaahumite kwa hilongohi bha andundami na Afalisayu, pabhabhegha na mambamba na mikoha.
JOH 18:4 Yesu kakimanya ghala ghoha ghaapala kuntulukila, kakilibwitukiha mu ulongolo ghwabhe na kakiakonya, “Mungunpalaha ghani?”
JOH 18:5 Bhombe bhakinnyanga “Yesu ywa ku Nasaleti.” Yesu kakiaghombela, “Ndo nenga.” Naywo Yuda ywakankilukite Yesu kayima papamu nabho.
JOH 18:6 Yesu pakaaghombilite, “Ndo nenga.” Bhombe bhakibhuya kihengele nyuma na kughwegha pahi.
JOH 18:7 Yesu kakiakonya kangi, “Mungumpalaha ghani?” Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Yesu ywa ku Nasaleti.”
JOH 18:8 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nenga nubhaghombela kala kukita ndo nenga, kya habhu handa mungumbalaha nenga mubhaleke abha bhandu bhaghende.”
JOH 18:9 Yesu kakilongela habhu ili ghabhonekane ghala ghakalongelite, “Bhala bhaghumbeghite nunhobheha ng'obhe hata yumu.”
JOH 18:10 Hino, Simoni Petili kakibhegha na lukechelo, kakiluhomola na kakinndumula lichikilo lya kunnilo ndumindumi ywa Ndundame Nkulu, na nndumidumi aywo kakikemwa lihina lyake Maliko.
JOH 18:11 Yesu kakinng'ombela Petili. “Ghulubhuyile lijambia lyako munchako ghwake! Bhuli, nnobho ghwakambeghite Tate, nenga ngotoke kughunyweghela?”
JOH 18:12 Hino, bhala machonda bha Akaaloma na kilongohi ywabhe na akingikiha bha Akaayahudi bhakinkamula Yesu, bhakimmopa,
JOH 18:13 kalongohi bhakinnyegha kwa Anasi. Aywo Anasi kakibhegha nkohano ywake Kayafa, ywene ywakabheghite Ndundame Nkulu ywa manjubha ghala.
JOH 18:14 Kayafa ndo yula ywakaapeghite unyeghelehi Akaayahudi kukita yinnogha mundu yumu kahweghe kwakya bhandu.
JOH 18:15 Simoni Petili papamu na nhundwa yungi bhakintughila Yesu. Aywo nhundwa yungi kakibhegha kangumanyikwa kwa Ndundame Nkulu, habhu kakiyingila papamu na Yesu mbaka mu ludamu lwa Ndundame Nkulu.
JOH 18:16 Peni Petili kakiyima panje ugheghela na nlyango. Hino aywo nhundwa yungi kakibhuya kuyobhela na ndumindumi nhinja ywakalindila kuhughula nlyango kantegheke Petili kayingile unyumba.
JOH 18:17 Yula nhinja ywakalindila kuhughula nlyango kakinkonya Petili, “Na ghwenga ndo chepa yumu ywa ahundwa bhake mundu ayu?” Petili kakiyanga, “Chepa nenga.”
JOH 18:18 Limjubha alyo kukibhegha na malili, andumindumi na akingikiha bhakiyaha mwoto na bhakiyima na kuyotela mwoto. Naywo Petili kakiyima papamo na bhombe kanguyotela mwoto.
JOH 18:19 Hino, Ndundame Nkulu kakinkonya Yesu kulinga mihalo ya ahundwa bhake na mahundo ghake.
JOH 18:20 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Nikibhegha panyobhela manjubha ghoha na bhandu bhoha pakindandabhanji maghenda maghenda, na nikihunda nyumba hya kukonganila Ayahudi na ku Nyumba ya Chapanga, kwene kwaakonganite Akaayahudi bhoha. Hangi nikilongela ng'obhe nhalo ghwohele kwa kihiho.
JOH 18:21 Kya bhuli ghungungonya nenga? Ghubhakonye bhala bahaanyihwite ghala ghaniaghombilite, bhombe bhangumanya ghaniaghombilite.”
JOH 18:22 Pakayomolite kulongela agha, yumu ywa machonda ywakayimite ugheghela naywo kakimbhakula mbande Yesu mu kibhungi, na kakilongela, “Ghungunnyanga Ndundame nkulu?”
JOH 18:23 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Handa nongela nnando nhakato, ghulongele aghwo uhakata ghunongelite. Peni handa nongela ghaghabheghite hoto, bhuli ghumakula nenga?”
JOH 18:24 Hino, Anasi kakinnyegha Yesu kwa Ndundame Nkulu Kayafa, kakibhegha kakali kabhopwa.
JOH 18:25 Lisaa alyo Simoni Petili kakiyima apo kanguyotela mwoto. Amu ywa bhala bhaayimite pala kakinkonya, “Bhuli, na ghwenga chepa yumu ywa ahundwa bhake?” Ywombe kaking'aka na kulongela, “Aka kaa, nenga chepa”
JOH 18:26 Yumu ywa andumindumi bha Ndundame Nkulu, nnongo ywake yula mundu ywene Petili kakinkechula lichikilo, kakinkonya, “Ghwenga nikighubhona ng'obhe kula ku kitogholo papamu na Yesu?”
JOH 18:27 Petili kaking'aka kangi pa ubhili, kamu mbichi kakibhika.
JOH 18:28 Mbole Akaayahudi bhakintola Yesu kuhuma kwa Kayafa mbaka ku nyumba kya ntabhala ywa Akaalumi, nayo yikibha malabhila putiputi, peni bhombe bhakiyingila ng'obhe munyumba ayo, bhakiyoghopa kiyaha bhalemwe kuyitikilwa kkuntundamila Chapanga na kulyegha kikubhukubhu kya Pasaka.
JOH 18:29 Kya habhu Pilato kakiaghendela panji na kakiakonya, “Katenda uhokelo ghani mundu ayu mbaka nhike kunkokela kwa nenga?”
JOH 18:30 Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “handa mundu ayu kakabheghite ng'obhe na uhokelo, twenga tungannyeghite ng'obhe kwa ghwenga.”
JOH 18:31 Hino, Pilato kakiaghombela, “Hino muntole mwenga, mukantose kubhukana na Malaghilo ghenu.” Bhombe Akaayahudi bhakinnyanga, “Twenga Malaghilo ghetu ghangutukanikiha kuntosa mundu ywohele kuhwegha.”
JOH 18:32 Akaayahudi bhakilongela habhu ili ghala malagho ghakalongilite Yesu kulinga kiho kyakapala kuhwegha ghatwihilike.
JOH 18:33 Pilato kakiyingila kangi unyumba na kakinkema Yesu, na kakinkonya. “Bhuli, ghwenga ndo Mutwa ywa Akaayahudi?”
JOH 18:34 Yesu kakinnyanga Pilato, “Ghwenga ghungukonya naha kwa mahwacho ghako ebu ghubhayihwa bhandu bhangi bhaghughombela mihalo yangu?”
JOH 18:35 Pilato kakiyanga, “Bhuli, nenga nu Nnyahudi? Bhandu bha nnima ghwako ghumwene na hilongohi bha mandundame ndo bhaghuyegha kwa nenga. Ghutenda uhokelo ghani?”
JOH 18:36 Yesu kakilongela, “Ghubhutwa ghwangu chepa ghwa nnima aghu, handa ghubhutwa ghwangu ghungabheghite ghwa nnima aghu, andumitumi bhangu bhangangomanilite, ili ngotoke kuyingihwa mu makakala gha Akaayahudi. Aka kaa, ghubhutwa ghwangu chepa ghwa apa!”
JOH 18:37 Hinu Pilato kakinkonya Yesu, “Kya habhu ghwenga ndo mutwa?” Yesu kakiyanga, “Ghwenga ghungulongela kukita nenga ndo mutwa. Nenga nikibhelekwa na kuhika pa nnima kwakya agha, na kwakya agha nikihika pannima ili nuaghombele uhoto bhandu bha nnima. Bhandu bhoha bhaabheghite bha uhoto bhanguyihwa lilobhe lyangu.”
JOH 18:38 Pilato kakinkonya Yesu, “Uhoto ndo niki?” Mbole ya kulongela agha, Pilato kakighenda kangi panji na kakiaghombela bhala hilongohi bha Akaayahudi, “Nughubhona ng'obhe uhokelo kwa mundu ayu.
JOH 18:39 Peni kwa mwenga Makaayahudi mmegha na mahyobhelelo ghenu, kukita mu kikubhukubhu kya Pasaka nubhahughulile mmopwa yumu. Bhuli, mungupala nubhahughulile mutwa ywa Akaayahudi?”
JOH 18:40 Habhu Akaayahudi bhakiyobha kyobho paalongela, “Aka kaa, chepa ayu, tungunpala Balaba!” Naywo Balaba kakibhegha mpoka.
JOH 19:1 Hino, Pilato kakikwiliha kukita Yesu katolwe na katutwe hingwechungwechu kya ndomondo.
JOH 19:2 Nabho machonda bhakipota kilemba kya mihomi, bhakinhwika Yesu mu mutwe na bhakinhwika lijoho litandamaho lya salabati
JOH 19:3 na bhakihika pa ulongolo ghwa Yesu na kunng'ombela, “Mwika Mutwa ywa Akaayahudi!” Bhakinbhakula mbande.
JOH 19:4 Pilato kakipita kangi panji na kakiaghombela bhala bhandu, “Nungunyegha panje mundu ayu, peni npati kumanya kukita nenga nungubhona ng'obhe uhokelo kwa ywombe.”
JOH 19:5 Habhu Yesu kakihuma panji, pakihwala kilemba kya mihomi na lijoho litandamaho lya salabati. Pilato kakiaghombela, “Munnole mundu ayu!”
JOH 19:6 Ndo hilongohi bha mandundame na hilongohi paammonite bhakikweha malobhe, paalongela, “Ghummambe! Ghummambe!” Pilato kakiaghombela, “Muntole mabhene, mukammambe, kiyaha nenga nighubhona ng'obhe uhokelo ghwohele kwa mundu ayu.”
JOH 19:7 Akaayahudi bhakinnyanga Pilato, “Twenga tubhegha na malaghilo na kubhukana na malaghilo agho kangunoghwa kuhwegha, kiyaha ywombe kakilikema Mwana ywa Chapanga.”
JOH 19:8 Hino, pilato pakayihwite malagho agho, kakiyoghopa kyanalumu.
JOH 19:9 Kakiyingila kangi ku nyumba lya ubhutwa na kakinkonya Yesu, “Ghwenga ghuhuma kwoki?” Peni Yesu kakiyanga ng'obhe kyohele.
JOH 19:10 Habhu Pilato kakinng'ombela, “Ghwenga ghungulema kuyobhela na nenga? Ghungumanya ng'obhe kukita nenga megha na makakala gha kughulekekeha na kughubhamba?”
JOH 19:11 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Ghwenga ghungabheghite ng'obhe na makakala kwakya nenga handa ghukamuhwa na Chapanga. Kya habhu, yula ywakanyeghite kwa ghwenga kabhegha na ulemwa nkulu kyanalumu.”
JOH 19:12 Kutandila apwo, Pilato kakipala njila ya kummopola, peni Akaayahudi bhakiyobha kyobho, paalongela, “Paghummopola mundu ayu, ghwenga ndo ghanja ng'obhe ywa Mutwa nkulu ywa Akaaloma! Kiyaha mundu ywohele ywakalitenda mutwa kangunpingikiha Mutwa nkulu ywa Akaaloma, naywo ndo Kaisali!”
JOH 19:13 Hino, Pilato pakayihwite malagho agha, kakinpiha Yesu panji na kakitama mukiteho kya toso, paapakema “Palukilimo lwa malibho.” Na kwa Kibulania pangukemwa “Gabata.”
JOH 19:14 Nayo yikibhegha ugheghela na linjubha lya kutendekeha Pasaka handa saa sita pamuhi naha. Pilato kakiaghombela Akaayahudi, “Munnole ayu ndo Mutwa ywenu!”
JOH 19:15 Akaayahudi bhakikweha malobhe, paalongela, “ Ghunkome! Ghunkome! Ghummambe mulupingika!” Pilato kakiakonya Akaayahudi, “Bhuli, mungupala mummambe Mutwa ywenu?” Bhala hilongohi bha mandundame bhakinnyanga Pilato, “Twenga tubhegha ng'obhe na mutwa yungi ngati nga Mutwa Nkulu ywa Akaaloma!”
JOH 19:16 Kuuhiko Pilato kakiapegha bhombe bhantole Yesu ili kabhambwe mulupingika. Habhu, machonda bhakintola Yesu na bhakighenda naywo.
JOH 19:17 Yesu kakilupapa lupingika lwake, kakibhuka na kughenda paapakemiteghe “lihuhu lya mutwe,” kwa Kibulania, bhangupakema “Goligota.”
JOH 19:18 Apo ndo paammambite Yesu mulupingika, papamu naywo bhakibhambwa bhandu bhangi abhili kila mundu mulupingika lwake, yumu mbande ya nnilo ya Yesu na yungi mbande ya ngiya, na Yesu kakibhegha pakati yabhe.
JOH 19:19 Pilato kakikwilikiha ghatyekwe malembo mulipapi na kubhikwa unani mwa lupingika lwa Yesu. Nalwo lukityekwa naha, “YESU YWA KU NASALETI, MUTWA YWA AKAAYAHUDI.”
JOH 19:20 Akaayahudi atangalo bhakilisoma lula lupapi, kiyaha pala pakabhambitwe Yesu pakibhegha ugheghela na kitami, nagho matyeko ghakityekwa kwa Kiebulania, na nongelo ya Kilatini na ya Kigiliki.
JOH 19:21 Hino, hilongohi bha mandundame bhakinng'ombela Pilato, “Ghukotoke kutyeka, ‘Mutwa ywa Akaayahudi,’ Ngati ghutyeke mundu ayu kakilikema, ‘NENGA NDO MUTWA YWA AKAAYAHUDI.’”
JOH 19:22 Pilato kakiayanga, “Kinikityekite kala nikityeka.”
JOH 19:23 Machonda paammambite kala Yesu mulupingika, bhakighatola mapinda ghake na bhakighaghabha mafungu ncheche, kila machonda na kifungu kyake. Ngati bhakiyitikilana bhakotoke kulikachula lila lijoho lyake kiyaha likitalaswa ng'obhe ngati likikwatalilwa kutandila kunani mbaka pahi.
JOH 19:24 Machonda bhakighombelana bhene, “Tukotoke kulikachula ngati tulitendele usimbi ili kulamula ghani kalitole.” Nnando aghu ghukitendekwa habhu ili ghatwihilike malembo ghaalongela. “Bbhombe bhakighabhana mapinda ghangu na lijoho lyangu bhakilitendela usimbi.” Habhu ndo bhakitenda machonda.
JOH 19:25 Ugheghela na lupingika lwa Yesu bhakiyima Malia mama ywake Yesu, na nnung'una ywa mama ywa Yesu na Malia nhumbu ywa Kilopa na Malia ywa kuhuma ku Magidala.
JOH 19:26 Yesu pakammonite mama ywake na nhundwa ywake ywakanpalite muno bhayima pala, kakinng'ombela mama ywake, “Nhumbu, ayu apa ndo mwana ghwako.”
JOH 19:27 Mbole kakinng'ombela yula nhundwa ywake, “Ghulole, ayu ndo mama ywako.” Kutandila lisaa lila yula nhundwa kakintola mama ywake Yesu na kutama naywo ukaya kwake.
JOH 19:28 Mbole ya agho, Yesu pakimanya kukita kayomola milando yake hyoha, ili malembo ghabheghe gha hoto, kakilongela, “Nyumilwa nyota.”
JOH 19:29 Apo pakibhegha kimbundi kiimemite difwai yiichakamukite, kya habhu bhakichwika libhoya mu kimbundi akyo, bhakibhika munndenge bhakinnyinulila mu nnomo ghwa Yesu.
JOH 19:30 Mbole ya kupaha ayo siki, Yesu kakilongela, “Ghapela!” Mbole kakihokamiha mutwe ghwake na kayomoka.
JOH 19:31 Likibhegha linjubha lya kutendekeha linjubha lya kupumulila, Akaayahudi bhakipala ng'obhe mibhili ihighale mulupingika linjubha lya kupumulila, kiyaha linjubha alyo lingabheghite linjubha likulu kwa Akaayahudi. Bhakinnyupa Pilato kakwilikihe ghatunyulwe maghulu gha bhala bhaabhambitwe mumipingika na mibhili yibhuhwe mumipingika.
JOH 19:32 Kya habhu machonda bhakighenda na kughatunyula maghulu gha yula ywakabhambitwe kalongohi ugheghela na Yesu na yula yungi ywa ubhili.
JOH 19:33 Peni paanheghelelite Yesu, bhakibhona kukita kahwegha kala, kya habhu bhakintunyula ng'obhe maghulu ghake.
JOH 19:34 Machonda yumu kakinhoma mulubhaho kwa nkoha, na kamu ghukipopoheka mwahi na machi.
JOH 19:35 Naywo ywakabhonite nnando ghula kakilongela agha, na ghakaghabhonite ndo hoto, naywo kangumanya kukita kangulongela hoto ngati mwenga mmokole kuhyubhalila.
JOH 19:36 Nnando aghwo ghukitendekwa ngati matyeko gha Chapanga ghatwihilike, “Kahone nhupa ghwake hata ghumu ghuupala kutunyulwa.”
JOH 19:37 Bhubho ghabhegha malembo ghangi ghangulongela, “Bhandu bhatahika bhannolekeha yula ywakanhomite.”
JOH 19:38 Mbole ya agha, Yosefu nkolannima ywa ku Alimataya, kaking'endela kunyupa Pilato kughutola mmili ywa Yesu. Aywo Yosefu kakibhegha nhundwa ghwa Yesu, peni kya kihiho, kiyaha kakiayoghopa hilongohi bha Akaayahudi. Hino, Pilato kakintegheka kaghutole mmili, habhu Yosefu kakighenda, kakighuhuluha mmili ghwa Yesu na kughutola.
JOH 19:39 Naywo Nikodemu ywene apo kalongohi kinng'endela yesu pakilo, kakihika kunu pakibhegha na nhanganganiko ghwa mahuta gha kunungila na ukobha ghwa ubani ghuutopite kilo salasini.
JOH 19:40 Hino, abho bhandu abhili bhakighutola mmili ghwa Yesu, bhakighubhilingiha sanda papamu na lula luhumba, kubhukana na hitobhe hya Akaayahudi hya kukulila.
JOH 19:41 Pala pakabhambitwe Yesu pakibhegha na kitogholo, na mukitogholo akyo likihongolwa lindogholo lya hyono mulitalabho likali kubhikwa mundu unyumba.
JOH 19:42 Hino, kubhukana na kukibhegha matendekeho gha Akaayahudi gha linjubha lya kupumulila na kya bhula lindogholo lila likibha ugheghela, bhakibhika mmili ghwa Yesu mulindogholo alyo.
JOH 20:1 Malabhila putiputi kukali na lubhindo linjubha lya ulongohi lya juma jumapili, Malia ywa kuhuma ku Magidala kakighenda ku lindogholo na kakilibhona lila libho libhingilighwa kala kuhuma mulindogholo.
JOH 20:2 Hino kakighenda lubhilo mbaka kwa Simoni Petili na kwa yula nhundwa yungi, ywene Yesu kakimpala muno, na kakiaghombela, “Bhammuha Bambo kuhuma mulindogholo, na tungumanya ng'obhe kwammikite!”
JOH 20:3 Kamu Petili papamu na yula nhundwa yungi bhakighenda ku lindogholo.
JOH 20:4 Bhakighenda lubhilo bhoha abhili, Peni yula nhundwa yungi kakitugha kanongola kupitingana kwa Petili na kakilongolela kuhika kulindogholo.
JOH 20:5 Kakihokama na kulolekeha nkati kakibhona mapinda gha sanda, peni kakiyingila ng'obhe unyumba.
JOH 20:6 Hino, Simoni Petili naywo kakihika, kakiyingila mu lindogholo. Kakighabhona ghala mapinda gha sanda ghabhegha,
JOH 20:7 na kila kilemba kiibheghite ku mutwe ghwa Yesu, kinyengwa maha patali ghweka chake.
JOH 20:8 Mbole ndo kakiyingila na yula nhundwa yungi ywakalongolite kuhika kulindogholo kakiyingila bhubho mulindogholo, kakibhona na kakihyubhalila.
JOH 20:9 Kiyaha mbaka lisaa alyo bhakibhegha akali kughang'amula ghala malembo kukita Yesu kangannoghitwe kahyuke.
JOH 20:10 Mbole bhala ahundwa bhakibhuya ukaya kwabhe.
JOH 20:11 Peni yula Malia kakiyima panji ya lindogholo. Kakibhegha kakali kangulila, Kakihokama na kulolekeha mulindogholo,
JOH 20:12 naywo kakiabhona mahoka abhili bha Chapanga bhaahwalite mapinda mahuhu gha mbuletee, bhakitama pala paaghughonjite mmili ghwa Yesu, yumu ku mutwe na yungi ku maghulu.
JOH 20:13 Bhombe bhakinkonya, “Nndala, kya bhuli ghungulila?” Ywombe kakiayanga, “Nungulila kiyaha bhantola Bambo ghwangu na nungukumanya ng'obhe kwaammikite!”
JOH 20:14 Mbole ya kulongela agha kakikilibhuka unyuma na kakimmona Yesu kayima apo, peni ywombe kakimanya ng'obhe kukita kakibhegha Yesu.
JOH 20:15 Yesu kakinkonya, “Mama, kya bhuli ghungulila? Ghungumpalaha ghani?” Malia kakihwacha kukita nnolekeha ywa kitogholo, ndo kakinng'ombela, “Bambo, handa ghuntola ghwenga, ghunng'ombele kughummikite, nenga ndaaghenda kuntola.”
JOH 20:16 Yesu kakinkema, “Malia!” Naywo Malia kakinkilibhukila Yesu na kulongela naywo kwa Kibulania, “Laboni” fwambulo yake “Nhundwa.”
JOH 20:17 Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghukotoke kungamula kiyaha ngali kughenda kwa Tate. Peni ghughende kwa alongo bhangu ghukaaghombele nungughenda kwa Tate ywangu naywo ndo Tate ywa mwenga, na Chapanga ywangu naywo ndo Chapanga ywenu.”
JOH 20:18 Kya habhu Malia ywa ku Magidala kakighenda kuaghombela ahundwa bha Yesu kukita nummona Bambo na kukita kang'ombela hila hyabhaghombelitwe.
JOH 20:19 Yikibhegha makimuhi ya linjubha alyo lya ulongohi lya juma, ahundwa bha Yesu bhakikongana papamu munyumba, na nlyango bhakiitata kiyaha bhakiayoghopa Akaayahudi. Ndo Yesu kakiabwitukila na kakiyima pakati yabhe na kakiaghombela, “Uhihimilo ghubheghe na mwenga.”
JOH 20:20 Mbole ya kulongela agha, kakialaha mabhoko ghake na lubhaho lwake. Na ahundwa bhake bhakiyelelwa muno paamonite Bambo.
JOH 20:21 Yesu kakiaghombela kangi, “Uhihimilo ghubheghe na mwenga. Handa bhula Tate pakanaghilite nenga, na nenga bhubho nungualaghila mwenga.”
JOH 20:22 Naywo pakayomolite kulongela agha kakiapulilila uhuki na kuaghombela, “Nkingame Nhuki ywa Chapanga.
JOH 20:23 Pamualekekeha bhandu ulemwa ghwabhe Chapanga naywo katabhalekekeha, na handa pamubhalekekeha ng'obhe, nabho Chapanga kataalekekeha ng'obhe.”
JOH 20:24 Peni Tomasi, ywaankemite Pacha, yumu ywa bhala ahundwa bhake kumi na abhili kakibhegha ng'obhe pakahikiteghe Yesu.
JOH 20:25 Hino bhala ahundwa bhangi bhakinng'ombela, “Tummona Bambo.” Peni Tomasi kakiaghombela, “Nenga ndahyubhalila ng'obhe kukita Yesu kangulama kangi pangi mbaka nummone numwene. Nungupala kubhona mabhanga gha msumali na nyingihe kikonji kyangu mu mabhoko ghake na kikonji kyangu kibheghe nkati ya mmili ghwake, pangi apwo ndo ndahyubhalila.”
JOH 20:26 Mbole ya manjubha manane, ahundwa bha Yesu bhakikongana kangi papamu unyumba, naywo Tomasi kakibhegha papamu nabho. Pindulu Yesu kakihika kakiyima pakati yabhe na milyango yikitatwa na kakilongela, “Uhihimilo ghubhe na mwenga.”
JOH 20:27 Mbole kakinng'ombela Tomasi, “Ghubhike kikonji kyako apa na ghulolekehe mabhoko ghangu, ghugholohe kibhoko kyako na ghukibhike mu lubhaho lwangu, ili ghukotoke kubhegha na bhwaghalili, ngati ghuhyubhalile.”
JOH 20:28 Tomasi kakinng'ombela “Bambo ywangu na Chapanga ywangu!”
JOH 20:29 Yesu kakinng'ombela Tomasi, “Ghunguhyubhalila kiyaha ghumona? Bhanonelwa bhala bhene bhanguhyubhalila kyanga kumona.”
JOH 20:30 Yesu kakitenda mihabho yingi mitangalo muulongolo ghwa ahundwa bhake, yangatyekwa mu kitabho aki.
JOH 20:31 Peni agha ghatyekwa kwa ningo nhotole kuhyubhalila kukita Yesu ndo Kilisto Nkombohi, Mwana ywa Chapanga, na kwa kuhyubhalila mmeghe na ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha ghwanga uhiko.
JOH 21:1 Mbole ya agho, Yesu kakiabwitukila kangi ahundwa bhake mu mbwegha ya lihibha Tibelia. Habhu ndo muyibheghite.
JOH 21:2 Simoni Petili na Tomasi ywakakemitwe Pacha, na Natanaeli nkolannima ghwa kitami kya Kana ya ku Galilaya, na bhana abhili bha Sebedayu na ahundwa bhake abhili bhakibhegha bhoha papamu.
JOH 21:3 Simoni Petili kakiaghombela ayake, “Nenga nungughenda kughomeha homba.” Nabho bhakinng'ombela, “Twaalongohana papamu na ghwenga,” Hino bhakighenda bhakiyingila mu bhwato, peni pakilo bhakimokola ng'obhe kyohele.
JOH 21:4 Malabhila putiputi, Yesu kakiyima mu mbwegha ya lihibha, peni ahundwa bhake bhakimmanya ng'obhe kukita kakibhegha Yesu.
JOH 21:5 Mbole, Yesu kakiakonya, “Maaghanja bhangu ng'omeha ng'obhe hata na homba yumu?” Bhombe bhakinnyanga, “Kahone kilibhi.”
JOH 21:6 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Muyitaghe njaho yenu ku nnilo ghwa bhwato ghwenu na mwenga maaghomeha homba.” Hino bhakitagha njaho peni hino bakihotola ng'obhe kukwakwaha njaho mu bhwato kubhukana na uyoloho ghwa homba.
JOH 21:7 Yula nhundwa ywakapalitwe na Yesu kakinng'ombela Petili, “Ayu ndo Bambo!” Naywo Simoni Petili pakayihwite kukita ndo Bambo, kakihwala lipinda lyake kiyaha kakibhegha uhula, na kakilitagha mumachi.
JOH 21:8 Peni bhala ahundwa bhangi bakihika kwa bhwato kunu paakwakaha njaho yabhe yiimemiteghe homba, bhakibhegha ng'obhe kutali na luhingu ngati bhakibhegha utali ghwa mita hamsini kumi kuhuma ku lukingo.
JOH 21:9 Hino paahikite kuluhingo bhakibhona mwoto ghwa makala ghukolehwa kala na unani mwake pakibhikwa homba na mangate.
JOH 21:10 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Mubhayeghe apa amoo homba bhamubhaghomehite hinu.”
JOH 21:11 Simoni Petili kakiyingila mu bhwato na kakikwakaha yila njaho yiimemite homba mbaka kuluhingo, na mu njaho ahyo bhakibhegha homba mia na hamsini na tatu. Hata payibhele homba bhakimema muno, peni yila njaho yikikakuka ng'obhe.
JOH 21:12 Yesu kakiaghombela, “Nhiki tulyeghe.” Kahone na yumoo yumu ywabhe ywakayighite kunkonya, “Ghu ghani ghwenga?” Kiyaha bhakimanya kukita kakibhegha Bambo.
JOH 21:13 Yesu kakihika kakitola lila lingate, kakiapegha, kakitenda ubhwabhu abhu na kwa bhala homba.
JOH 21:14 Ayi yikibhegha pandatu Yesu kuabwitukila ahundwa bhake mbole ya kuhyuka.
JOH 21:15 Pabhayomolite kulyegha, Yesu kakinkonya Simoni Petili, “Bhuli, Simoni mwana ywa Yohane, ghwenga ghungumbala kupitingana abha?” Naywo kakinnyanga, “Ena Bambo, ghwenga ghungumanya kukita nungughupala.” Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghubhalele mene bhangu.”
JOH 21:16 Yesu kakinkonya kangi paubhili, “Simoni mwana ywa Yohane, bhuli ghungumbala hoto?” Petili kakinnyanga, “Ena Bambo ghwenga ghungumanya kukita nungughupala.” Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghubhalele mene bhangu.”
JOH 21:17 Yesu kakinkonya kangi paundatu, “Simoni mwana ywa Yohane, ghungumbala hoto?” Apa Petili kakibhaghaya kiyaha kakinkonya paundatu, “Bhuli ghungumbala?” Petili kakinng'ombela, “Bambo ghwenga ghungumanya ghoha, ghungumanya kukita nungughupala!” Yesu kakinng'ombela, “Ghubhalele mene bhangu.
JOH 21:18 Kulyaghila nungughughombela, paghubheghite nhongolo ghukihyobhelela kuhwala lukungi na kughenda kwoheli kughukupalite, peni paghubhegha nng'ohi ghwagholoha mabhoko ghako na mundu yungi kataghuhwaliha na kughuyegha kwanga kughupala ghwenga.”
JOH 21:19 Yesu Kakilongela habhu, pakalaha bhula kiho kyoki mukipala kuyegha ukulu ghwa Chapanga. Mbole kakinng'ombela, “Ghundughile!”
JOH 21:20 Petili kakikilibhuka na kakimmona yula nhundwa yungi, ywakapalitwe na Yesu, ndo aywo ywakayeghamite mu kihubha kya Yesu pa mulyo ghwa makimuhi, kakinkonya Yesu, “Bambo ghani ywakapala kughukiluka?”
JOH 21:21 Ndo Petili kakimmona aywo nhundwa, kakinkonya Yesu, “Bambo, bhuli mundu ayu?”
JOH 21:22 Yesu kakinnyanga, “Handa pambala kalame mbaka pambala kubhuya, ayo yabhegha na ningo yoke kwa ghwenga? Gwenga ghundughile nenga!”
JOH 21:23 Hino, nhalo aghu ghukitapakala mu nkati ya alongo kukita nhundwa aywo katahwegha ng'obhe. Peni Yesu kakilongela ng'obhe kukita katahwegha, ngati kakilongela, “Handa pambala kalame mbaka panonda kubhuya, ayi yabhegha na fwambulo yoki kwa ghwenga?”
JOH 21:24 Aywo ndo yula nhundwa ywakalubhulilite agha, na ywakatyekite milando ayi, na tungumanya kukita uyimiho ghwake ndo ghwa hoto.
JOH 21:25 Yibhegha milando yingi mitangalo yakatendite Yesu, ghene handa yingatyekitwe hyoha yimu mbole ya yimu, nunguhwacha kukita nnima ghwoha ghungakwilite ng'obhe pakubhika hitabho hyene hingatyekitwe.
ACT 1:1 Kwa ghwenga ghanja Tofili. Mukitabho kila kinyanditi kutyeka, nikityeka mihalo hyoha ya Yesu yakatenditi na kuhunda kutandila ulongohi ghwa lihengo lyake,
ACT 1:2 mbaka linjubha lila lyakanyahulitwe kunane kwa Chapanga. Pakali na kutolwa kunane kwa Chapanga, kakialaghila kwa Nhuki ghwa Chapanga bhala andumitumi bhakaahaghulite.
ACT 1:3 Mbole ya kiho kyake kakililaha kwa bhombe na kuliyimiha patangalo kwa ahundwa bhake kukita mwene kangulama, kwa manjubha mbinda mabhoko ncheche, bhakinmmona na kakibhaghombela mihalo ya Ghubhutwa ghwa Chapanga.
ACT 1:4 Linjubha limu pakakonganite papamu nabho kakibhakwilikiha habhu, “Nkotoke kubhuka pa Yelusalemu, ngati mulilindile lila lilumbo lyakalaghilite Tati, lyeni mukiyihwa kala panongela mihalo yake.
ACT 1:5 Yohana kakiabatisa kwa machi, peni mbole ya manjubha gha mandina ghaapala kuhika, mwenga maabatiswa kwa Nhuki ghwa Chapanga.”
ACT 1:6 Linjubha limo, andumitumi pabhakonganite papamu, bhakinkonya Yesu, “Bhuli Bambo, hinu ndo manjubha gha kubhabhuyihila ghula ghubhutwa kwa Akaisilaeli?”
ACT 1:7 Yesu kakibhaghombela, “Agha gha mwenga ng'obhe kughamanya manjubha na nndaluko ghwa ngungwa, agha ghabhegha mu utabhala ghwa Tate ghwangu.
ACT 1:8 Peni Nhuki ghwa Chapanga pakabhahikila mwenga, maakingama makakala na maabhegha mayimiho bha nenga mu Yelusalemu, nnima ghwoha ghwa ku Yudea na ghwa ku Samalia, na kuuhiko ghwa milima.”
ACT 1:9 Pakayomolite kulongela agha, bhoha kunu pabhalolekeha kunani kwa Chapanga, Yesu kakitolwa kunane kwa Chapanga na lihundi likin'gubika na kakibhonekana kangi ng'obhe.
ACT 1:10 Paabheghite akali bhanguhulutula meho kulolekeha kunane kubhwelu pakaghenda, kamu bhandu abhili bhaahwalite mapinda ghambuletee bhakiyima pabhwegha yabhe
ACT 1:11 na bhakilongela, “Mwenga ma bhandu bha ku Galilaya, bhuli munguyima apa kunu pan'nolekeha kunane ku bhwelo? Aywo Yesu ywakatolitwe kubhuka kwa mwenga kughenda kunane kwa Chapanga kaabhuya kangi ubhwabhu abhu handa pamumonite pakatolwa kughenda kunane kwa Chapanga.”
ACT 1:12 Mbole andumitumi bhakibhuya ku Yelusalemu kuhuma kukitumbi kya Miseituni kiibheghite utali ghwa kilomita yimo kuhuma ku kitami kya Yelusalemu.
ACT 1:13 Pabhahikite ku mjini Yelusalemu bhakighenda ku kyumba kya kuligholofa kwene bhakibha bhangutama. Nabho bhakibha Petili na Yohana na Yakwobu na Andelea. Filipo na Tomasi na Batolomayo na Matayo mwana ghwa Alufayo na Simoni Zaloti, na Yuda mwana ghwa Yakwobu.
ACT 1:14 Abho bhoha bhakighendelela kukwemukana papamu kuyupa. Papamu nabho bhakibhegha amoo bha adala, na Maliamu ma ghwake Yesu na alongo bhake Yesu.
ACT 1:15 Linjubha limo mu manjubha agho, Petili kakiyima pakati ya bhandu bhaanhyubhalilite Kilisito bhoha bhaakwemukite na mmalango ghwake bhakibha bhandu mbinda mabhoko kumi na mabhili,
ACT 1:16 Petili kakilongela, “Maalongo bhangu, yikibha mbaka matyeko ghanakung'anyima ghatengeleheke. Ghala ghene Nhuki ghwa Chapanga ghakaghalondolite kukindila kwa Daudi kwa kya mihalo ya Yuda pakabhalongohite bhala bhaankamulite Yesu.
ACT 1:17 Yuda kakibha nnyetu, kiyaha mwene kakihaghulighwa na Yesu kalilunge mulihengo lyetu.”
ACT 1:18 Hinu Yuda kakihemela nng'unda kwa ngalabha hyakamokoliti kwa uhakata, kakighwegha pahi makukama akwo ku nng'unda kakibwaluka na matumbu ghake ghakikwepuka panji.
ACT 1:19 Bhandu bhoha bha Ku yelusalemu bhakiyihwa nhalu aghwo, na habhu apwo bhakipakema “Akelidama” fwambulo yake ndo “Nng'unda ghwa Mwahi.”
ACT 1:20 Petili kangi kakilongela, “Handa payityekwitwe mukitabho kya Sabuli; ‘Kukaya kwake pabhe mang'obha, kahone mundu ghwa kutama amwo.’ Kangi yityekwa ‘Mundu yungi kayitole ng'ebhu yake ya utendehi.’ ”
ACT 1:21 “Kya habhu yingutunogha tunhaghule mundu yungi mu nkati ya bhala bhaabheghite papamu na twenga patubheghiti papamu na Bambo Yesu.
ACT 1:22 Aywo yingunkwiliha kabhe mundu ywakabheghite na twenga kutandila Yohana pakabheghite mu kubatisa mbaka linjubha lyakatolitwe Yesu kuhuma kwa twenga kughenda kunani kwa Chapanga. Kiyaha aywo yingunnogha kalilunge na twenga ngati kabhe nnyimiho ghwa uhyuko ghwa Yesu.”
ACT 1:23 Hino, bhakighalinga mahina gha bhandu abhili, Yosefu ywakakemitweghe Balisaba ebu bhubho kakimayikwa Yusito na yungi Matia.
ACT 1:24 Mbole bhakinnyupa Chapanga, “Bambo, ghwenga ghuyimanya myoyo ya bhandu bhoha. Hinu ghutulahe mu abha abhili ywoki ghunhaghulite,
ACT 1:25 ngati kakatole ng'ebhu ya utendehi ghwa undumitumi ghwakaghulekite Yuda ngati kaghende mu ng'ebhu yiyinnoghite.”
ACT 1:26 Mbole bhakiatendela usimbi, na kakihaghulwa Matia, naywo kakiyonjokehwa mu bhala Andumitumi mbinda mabhoko yimo na yumo.
ACT 2:1 Palihikite linjubha lya kikubhukubhu kya Pendekositi, bhaanhyubhalilite Yesu bhoha bhakikwemukana papamu.
ACT 2:2 Pindulu lilobhe likiyuhwanika kuhuma kunane kubhwelo, lilobhe liibheghite handa lya liyegha lya likusi, lukiikwiniha mula mu nyumba hyoha yabhatamite.
ACT 2:3 Mbole hikiabwitukila hilibhi handa ndetelehe ya mwoto na hikipwilinganika na kutula unane mwa kila mundu.
ACT 2:4 Bhoha bhakimemekehwa Nhuki ghwa Chapanga na bhakiyanda kuyobhela mu nongelo nhanganganiko handa Nhuki ghwa Chapanga pakabhahotolite.
ACT 2:5 Na akwo ku Yelusalemu bhakibha Akaayahudi bhandu bhaantundamilite na kunnyitikila Chapanga, bhahumite kumilima hyoha ya munnima.
ACT 2:6 Pabhayuhwite lilobhe alyo, lumati lukulu lwa bhandu lukikwemukana papamu. Bhandu bhoha bhakibhughanikwa kiyaha kila yumo ywabhe kakiayuhwa pabhalongela mu nongelo yake yakabhelekitwi nayo.
