2TI 1:4 Nungughakulungwa mahohi ghako, na nungupala muno kughubhona ngati memekwe na uyelelo.
2TI 1:5 Nunguyikulungwa hyubhalilo yako yanga ufyangu, hyubhalilo ahyo kakibhegha naywo mbuyu ghwako Loisi, na kangi kakibhegha nahyo mama ghwako Eunike. Kulyaghila nungumanya kukita na ghwenga ghubhegha nahyo.
2TI 1:6 Kya habhu nungughuyupa ghukulungwe kughendelela kuyitumila kila kipala kyakakukamuhite Chapanga pala panughuyabhikilite mabhoko.
2TI 1:7 Kiyaha Chapanga kakitupegha ng'obhe Nhuki ghwa kututenda tuyoghope, ngati ndo nhuki ghwa kututenda tubhegha na makakala, na upalo, na uyukuto.
2TI 1:8 Hinu, ghukotoke kubhona honi kunnyimiha Bambo ghwetu, hangi ghukotoke kumonela honi nenga nuumeghite mmopwa kwa kya ywombe, hangi ghulilunge na nenga mu himbamanda ya Nhalo ghwa Maha, handa Chapanga pakaghukamuhite makakala gha kuhotola.
2TI 1:9 Mwene kakitulopoha na kakitukema tubheghe bhandu tuubhaghulitwe kwa kya Chapanga, kakitenda agha chepa kwa kya ghala ghatughatendite, peni kwa likaho na umaha ghwake. Umaha aghwo tukamuhwa mu Kilisito Yesu kukali na kuyanda midaluko,
2TI 1:10 peni hinu umaha aghwo ghuhwimulighwa kwa twenga kwa kuhika Nnopohi ghwetu Kilisito Yesu. Mwene kaghahotola yomo makakala gha kiho, na kya kukindila Nhalo ghwa maha kahwimula ubhumi ghwa nga kupela.
2TI 1:11 Kya habhu, Chapanga kakinninga meghe nnandamiha na nndumila na nhunda ghwa Nhalo ghwa Maha,
2TI 1:12 na ndo kwa kya agho nenga nungupamandika, peni ngali nungubhona honi ng'obhe, kiyaha nungummanya yula yununhyubhalila, kangi ninguhyubhalila kukita kila kyakakibhikite nkati ya nenga katakikingikiha, mbaka mu linjubha lila.
2TI 1:13 Ghughakamule muno mahundo gha hoto ghanughuhundite. Na ghuhighale mu akwo kuhyubhalila na upalo mu kulilunga na Kilisito Yesu.
2TI 1:14 Nnando ghula ghwa maha ghuukamuhitwe ghuukingikihe kwa makakala gha Nhuki ghwa Chapanga ywaatama nkati yetu.
2TI 1:15 Handa paghumanya kukita bhandu bhoha bha nnima ghwa Asia bhangiluka, mu bhombe ab hegha Filego na Helimogene.
2TI 1:16 Peni nunguyupa kukita Chapanga kalupeghe umaha lubhagha lwa Onesifolo, kiyaha kakimbughaha hangi kakibhona ng'obhe honi kiyaha nikibhegha mu kibhopo,
2TI 1:17 kihyegho kyaki, kamu pakahikite ku Lumi, mwene kakiyanda kumbalaha mbaka pakammonite.
2TI 1:18 Bambo kannonele ngati kamokole lipyanda lyake mu linjubha lila, na ghwenga ghungumanya ghamaha matangalo ghakandendelite akwo Efeso.
2TI 2:1 Hino, ghwenga mwana ghwangu, ghubheghe nhwadali mu umaha ghuubheghite nkati ya Kilisito Yesu.
2TI 2:2 Na milando yila yighuyihwite panhunda muulongolo ghwa bhandu atangalo, ghuyikamuhe kwa bhandu bhanakuhyubhalika na bhahotola kuahunda bhandu bhangi bhubho.
2TI 2:3 Ghulimbilile mbyupila handa machonda ghwa kuhyubhalika ghwa Kilisito Yesu.
2TI 2:4 Machonda ywoheli ywakatutana mu ngondo kangutenda kangi ng'obhe lihengo lingi, ngati ywombe kangupala kututana ghweka ngati kantende kilongohi ghwake kayelelwe.
2TI 2:5 Bhulabhula, yunakulimbana mu kubhingana kaahotola kata kukamuhwa numbo ya kuhotola handa kaalimbana ng'obhe kulandana na malaghilo gha malimbano.
2TI 2:6 Nkanda lutupi yunakutenda lihengu kwa kukangamala ndo kanoghwa kukamuhwa kipalamande kya mabeno gha ulongolo.
2TI 2:7 Ghughahwache agha ghanighalongela, kiyaha Chapanga kataghutenda ghuyimanye mihalo yoha.
2TI 2:8 Ghunkulungwe Kilisito Yesu, ywakahyuhwitwe kuhuma ku bhaahweghite, ywakabheghite ghwa kibheleko kya Daudi. Handa paghulongela Nhalo ghwa Maha, ghunughulandamiha.
2TI 2:9 Kya aghwo, nungubamandwa mbaka hika kuhwindwa mukibhopo na kukwatalilwa minyololo handa ntenda mahakata. Peni lilagho lya Chapanga lyabhopwa ng'obhe.
2TI 2:10 Kwa habho nungulimbilila mihalo yoha kwa kya bhandu bhaahaghulitwe na Chapanga, kya likaho na bhombe bhakingame ulopoho ghuubheghite mu Kilisito Yesu, nabho bhaakingama ukulu ghwa manjubha ghoha.
2TI 2:11 Ali ndo lilagho lya kuhyubhalika, “Handa tukihwegha papamu naywo, twaatama papamu naywo.
2TI 2:12 Handa twaghendelela kulimbilila, twatabhala papamu naywo, Handa twankiluka, naywo kaatukiluka twenga.
2TI 2:13 Handa twaabhegha bha kuhyubhalika ng'obhe, Ywombe kaahighala kubhegha ghwa nhyubhalilwa, kiyaha kaalikiluka mwene ng'obhe.”
2TI 2:14 Ghughendelele kubhatenda akulungwe milando ayi na paghubhakinya muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, bhakotoke kubhegha na malimbano gha malagho, malimbano agho ghangunogha ng'obhe, ngati ghangughegha uhanjaghano nkulu kwa bhala bhaaghayihwa.
2TI 2:15 Ghukangamale muno kulibhoneha kwa Chapanga kukita kaghuyitikilwa, ntenda lihengo kya nga honi, pakilihyubhalila lilagho lya Chapanga kwa umaha na hoto.
2TI 2:16 Ghughahepetuke malagho gha nga utundamo kiyaha malagho agho ghangubhatenda bhandu bhaghendelele kutama kutali na Chapanga.
2TI 2:17 Mahundo gha kya habhu ndo handa kilonda kya luma. Amoo bhandu bhaahunda agho ndo Humenayo na Fileto.
2TI 2:18 Abha bhahobha kutali na hoto, bhombe paalongela kukita uhyuko ghwa bhaahweghite ghubhegha kala na kuhobheha kunhyubhalila Kilisito kwa amoo bhandu.
2TI 2:19 Peni kitamiko kikimikitwe na Chapanga kibhegha kikangamalo, nakyo kimatikwa matyeko agha, “Bambo kangubhamanya bhandu bhake,” na kangi kityekwa, “Ywohele ywakalikema kukita ywombe ghwa Bambo na kaghuleke uhokelo.”
2TI 2:20 Mu kitutubhi kya yunautopelo kahone kubhegha na hyombo hya sahabu na ebu hya feza ghweka, hingi ndo hyombo hya mikongo na hya lutupi, na hingi hingutumilwa kwa utekulo na hingi hingutumilwa kila lelo.
2TI 2:21 Hinu, handa mundu kaliyoha na kulibhika kutali na uhokelo ghunughulongilite, kaabhegha kyombo kya utekulo, kiinnoghilite Bambo, kitendekehitwe kwa lihengo lyoheli lya maha.
2TI 2:22 Peni ghuyitile tama hakataho ya uhongolo, ghutughile kulama handa paapala Chapanga na kuhyubhalila na upalo na uhihimo na bhandu bhoha bhanakunnyitikila Chapanga kwa mwoyo ghwa nyanyi.
2TI 2:23 Ghulindakile na malimbano gha nga kunnogheha Chapanga na gha ubhughabhugha kiyaha ahyo hingutulumula bhulwa.
2TI 2:24 Kangi nndumitumi ghwa Bambo kakotoke kubhegha ghwa bhulwa hangi yingunnogha kabheghe ghwa maha kwa bhandu bhoha, kahotole kuhunda na nlimbilila.
2TI 2:25 Kangi yingunnogha kubhahunde mbolembole bhala bhaalimbana naywe, kunu paghukilidumbila kukita Chapanga kataatangatila bhalipetule na kuyimanya hoto,
2TI 2:26 ngati mahala ghabhe ghabhabhuyile kangi, nabho bhahyepetuke mu ntambo ghwa Nchipila ywakakamula ngati bhatende ghala ghakaghapala.
2TI 3:1 Ghukulungwe kukita, mumanjubha gha uhiko kwabhegha na midaluko ya mbyupila.
2TI 3:2 Bhandu bhaabhegha bhangulipala bhene na bhaamemwa tama ya mbiya, bhaabhegha na madumbo, na bhanakulibhona na bhanakuligha na bhangaayitikila abhele bhabhe na bhanakulepelwa kunnumba na bhaabhaghulitwe ng'obhe kwa kya Chapanga,
2TI 3:3 kangi bhandu bhangaupalo, na bhangalekekehana, na akolekela, na bhanga uyukuto, na alakali, bhaayilema milando ya maha,
2TI 3:4 bhaabhegha akiluka, na bhaalopokeha kuyaghabhala, na bhanakulidumba, na bhaapala kubejulila kupitingana kunpala Chapanga.
2TI 3:5 Bhandu abho kwa panji bhaabhonekana handa bhandu bhanakuntundamila Chapanga, peni bhaghulema makakala gha hoto ya Chapanga. Bhandu bha kya habhu ghubhahyepetuke.
2TI 3:6 Amoo bhabhe bhangughenda mumibhagha ya bhandu na kuakuluha adala ayoyobhalo mu uhyubhalila, bhaatopelitwe na ulemwa na bhabheghite na tama ya uhakata ghwohele,
2TI 3:7 adala abho bhanguyigha kulihunda manjubha ghoha peni bhahotola ng'obhe kuyimanya hoto.
2TI 3:8 Bhandu abho bhangulema hoto handa bhula Yane na Yambule pabhanpingikite Musa. Abho ndo bhandu bhaapotokite malango na aleka uhyubhalilo.
2TI 3:9 Peni bhahotola ng'obhe kughendelela kyanalumu kiyaha uhila mahala ghwabhe ghwabhonekana pekupeku kwa bhandu bhoha, handa payibhegha kwa Yane na Yambule.
2TI 3:10 Peni ghwenga, ghughayitikila mahundo ghangu, na ng'endelo, na likaho lyangu mu ulami, na kuhyubhalila kwangu, na ulimbililo ghwangu, na upalo ghwangu, na ulindililo ghwangu,
2TI 3:11 na himbamanda na mapungwo. Ghwenga ghuyimanya milando yoha yiniyikindilite akwo Anitiokia na akwo Ikonio na akwo Lisitila, bhula panimbililite himbamanda hyoha hingindilite, peni Bambo kakinopoha mumilando aywo yoha.
2TI 3:12 Mundu ywoheli ywakapala kutama kya kunnogheha Chapanga na kulilunga na Kilisito Yesu yinnogha kapamandwe.
2TI 3:13 Bhandu ahokelo na akuluha bhaaghendelela kubhegha ahakata paabhakuluha bhandu bhangi na bhombe paakilikuluha bhene.
2TI 3:14 Peni ghwenga ghuhighale mu kukamulila hoto yighuhunditwe na ghughahyubhalilite telatela, paghumanya kukita ghukilihunda agho kuhuma kwa akina ghani,
2TI 3:15 na ghukulungwe kukita kutandila paghubheghite mwana ghungughamanya matyeko gha Chapanga ghene ghaahotola kukupegha malango ngati ghumokole kulopoka kwa njila ya kunhyubhalila Kilisito Yesu.
2TI 3:16 Matyeko ghoha gha Chapanga ghatyekwa kwa ulongohi ghwa Chapanga, na ghangunogha kuhundihila hoto, kuakinya bhandu kubhukana na uhokelo ghwabhe, kwa kualongoha na kuahunda mu ulami ghwa kunnogheha Chapanga,
2TI 3:17 ngati mundu ghwa Chapanga katwihilike, na kabhikwa kala kutenda kila lihengo lya maha.
2TI 4:1 Nungukukwilikiha muulongolo ghwa Chapanga na muulongolo ghwa Kilisito Yesu yula ywakapala kubhatosa bhandu bhanaubhumi na bhaahweghite, na kukindila kwa kuhika kwake kiyaha katatabhala handa Mutwa,
2TI 4:2 ghulandamihe lilagho lya Chapanga, ghuulibhike kala mu nndalauko ghuunoghite na ghula ghuunoghite ng'obhe, ghulakalile, ghukinye na ghubhatengelekehe bhandu kwa ulimbililo ghwoha, na kwa mahundo gha maha.
2TI 4:3 Kiyaha manjubha ghaahika na bhandu bhaalema kughakingama mahundo gha hoto, na bhaaghatughila tama yabhe bhene na kulipalahila ahunda atangalo ngati bhaahunde milando yiibhanogheha mu makutu ghabhe.
2TI 4:4 Bhaalema kuyiyitikila hoto, na bhayitughila mihumu ya nga fwambulo.
2TI 4:5 Peni ghwenga ghulindakile mu mihalo yoha, ghulimbilile mapungwo, ghutende lihengo lya kulandamiha Nhalo ghwa Maha, ghuutwihilike telatela undumindumi ghwako.
2TI 4:6 Nungughughombela agha kiyaha lisaa lyangu lihika lya kubhuhwa handa nyambi ya kupopohwa, na manjubha gha kubhuka mu nnima aghu ghahika kala.
2TI 4:7 Ndutana maha mu ngondo, malimbano gha lubhilo nighahotola na nughukingikiha uhyubhalilo.
2TI 4:8 Hinu mikilwa kala kilemba kya kutenda gha maha kwa kya Chapanga, yene Bambo nnamula katammbegha mu linjubha lila, ng'obhe nga nenga ghweka, ngati bhoha bhaalimbililite kwa kilyakalyaka kya kuhika kwake.
2TI 4:9 Ghukangamale kunhikila kya kulopokeha,
2TI 4:10 kiyaha Dema kanyipala milando ya nnima aghu, kanneka na kaghenda ku Sesolonike. Naywo Kilesiki kaghenda ku Galatia na Tito kaghenda ku Dalimatiya.
2TI 4:11 Nga Luka ghweka chake ndo kahighala apa papamu na nenga. Ghunpalahe Maliki na nhike papamu, kiyaha kaahotola kundangatila mulihengo lyangu.
2TI 4:12 Nikinlaghila Tukiko akwo ku Efeso.
2TI 4:13 Handa paghuhika ghunng'eghele lingwamba lyangu linililekite kwa Kalipo akwo ku Toloa, ghung'eghele bhubho hitabho hya kunyengeka hinihipala kyanalumu hila hya mayula.
2TI 4:14 Alekisandalia yula mbhatula mahabha kakindendela uhakata nkulu. Bambo kaammuyihila kulandana na ghala ghakandendelite.
2TI 4:15 Na ghwenga bhubho ghulindakile naywo, kiyaha kakighapingikiha muno malagho ghetu.
2TI 4:16 Panilikingikihite kya kandahi kabhone ywakayimite mu mbande ya nenga, bhoha bhakineka. Nungunnyupa Chapanga kakotoke kuabhalangila uhokelo kwa nnando agho.
2TI 4:17 Peni Bambo kakibha papamu na nenga na kakinyonjokeha makakala na nikihotola kulandamiha lilagho lyoha, ngati kwa kukindila kwa nenga bhandu bhabheghite ng'obhe Ayahudi bhamokole kulikingama lilagho telatela, kangi nikilopohwa kutoswa kiho.
2TI 4:18 Bambo katanopoha mu milando yoha ya uhakata, na kundola maha mbaka hike tela mu ubhutwa ghwake ghwa kunani. Ukulu ghubheghe kwa ywombe manjubha ghoha! Ayi mwika.
2TI 4:19 Ghubhajambuhe Pilisila na Akila na bhoha bha mulubhagha lwa Onesifolu.
2TI 4:20 Elasitu kakihighala ku Kolinto na nikinneka Tilofimo akwo ku Mileto kiyaha kakibha ntamwa.
2TI 4:21 Ghuyumbatike ghuhike kukali na nndaluko ghwa kipepo. Ebulo na Pudesi na Lino na Klaudio papamu na alongo bhangi bhoha bhangukujambuha.
2TI 4:22 Bambo kabheghe papamu na ghwenga. Nungubhayupila mabhoha umaha ghwake.
TIT 1:1 Lihamba ali linguhuma kwa nenga Paulo, nndumila ghwa Chapanga na nhundwa ghwa Yesu Kilisito. Nenga nikihaghulighwa kutengelekeha kuhyubhalila Kilisito kwa bhandu bhaahaghulitwe na Chapanga na kualongoha ngati bhatame ulami ghwa kunnogheha Chapanga,
TIT 1:2 ghwene kitamiko kyake ndo udumbilo ghwa kumokola ulami ghwa manjubha ghoha. Chapanga ywanga kulongela uhwangi kakitulagha ulami aghwo pakali na kubhumbwa kwa nnima,
TIT 1:3 naywo kwa nndaluko ghuunoghite kakighuhwimula mu lilagho lyake. Nenga hyubhalika mu lilagho alyo nililandamihe kulandana na ngwiliho ya Chapanga Nlopohi ghwetu.
TIT 1:4 Nungukutyekela ghwenga Titusi, mwana ghwangu ghwa hoto mu uhyubhalilo ghutulilungite twabhoha. Nungukuyupila umaha na uhihimilo kuhuma kwa Tate Chapanga na kuhuma kwa Kilisito Yesu Nlopohi ghwetu.
TIT 1:5 Hino, nenga nikikuleka kula ku Kilete ngati ghuyitende milando yila yiibheghite yikali kutwihilika, na kuahaghula Aghohi bha ngwemuko ya bhandu bhaabhyubhalilite Kilisito mu kila kigunguli. Ghughakulungwe malaghilo gha nenga,
TIT 1:6 nghohi ghwa ngwemuko ya bhandu bhaabhyubhalilite Kilisito kangunoghwa kabhe mundu ywa nga kubhayilwa, ywakabheghite na nhumbu yumu ghweka, na bhana bhaki anoghelwe bhubho bhabhe bhangunhyubhalila Kilisito, na bhakotoke kumanyikwa mubhulwa ebu ngakatala.
TIT 1:7 Kya bhula kilongohi ghwa ngwemuko ya bhandu bhaabhyubhalila Kilisito ndo nkulu mu lihengo lya Chapanga, kangunoghwa kabheghe mundu ywa nga kubhayilwa. Kakotoke kubheghe mundu yunakulidumba, nnyeyehu ghwa kuyaghabhala, nlobhi, ntenda bhulwa ebu yuna tama ya kumokola mbiya kwa njila ya nga kunoghela.
TIT 1:8 Kanoghwa kabheghe ntekulo na ywakapala milando ya maha. Kanoghwa kabheghe mundu yunakuyukuta, nng'ololeho, ghwa kya Chapanga na yunauhokamo.
TIT 1:9 Kangunnoghwa kakamulile telatela lilagho lya uhyubhalilo handa palihunditwe. Pakahotola kubhayonjokeha myoyo bhangi kwa mahundo ghanakunoghwa na kughahwimula mahokelo gha bhandu bhanakupingikiha mahundo agho.
TIT 1:10 Kiyaha bhabhegha bhandu atangalo bhangayitikila, bhaabheghite na malagho gha ubhughabhugha nalumu ndo bhala bhamukimati kya ulumula unyagho.
TIT 1:11 Yinogha mbaka kuahibha milomo, kiyaha bhanguyitindingana lubhagha lwoha lwa bhandu kwa kuhunda milando yibhanoghite ng'obhe kuhunda. Bhangutenda habhu ngati bhalimokolele ngalabha kwa ukubhuhi.
TIT 1:12 Hata yumoo ywa ambuye ghwabhe, naywo bhubho ndo Nkelete, kakilongela, “Akaakelete ahwangi manjubha ghoha, ndo handa anyama ahakata, alyegha kwapukwapu na atotoho!”
TIT 1:13 Naywo kakilongela hoto, na kya habhu, ghungunoghwa kubhalakalila kwa ulakalo, ngati bhabhe na bhanakunhyubhalila Kilisito ghwa telatela,
TIT 1:14 bhakotoke kughendelela kukamulila nga hitohe ghweka hya Akaayahudi na malaghilo gha bhala bhandu bhaayilemite hoto.
TIT 1:15 Hilibhi hyoha hibhegha nyanyi kwa bhandu bhayitikilitwe muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, peni kahone kilibhi kiiyitikilitwe kwa bhala bhaahwachila uhokelo na bhanga kuhyubhalila, kiyaha hwacho na malango ghabhe ghahokela.
TIT 1:16 Bhandu handa abha bhangulikwina kukita bhangunmanya Chapanga, peni kwa mandendelo ghabhe bhangunkiluka. Ndo bhandu bha kuyaghabhiha muno na bhangayitika, bhangunoghwa ng'obhe kwa nnando ghwohele ghwa maha.
TIT 2:1 Peni kwa nhalo ghwa ghwenga Titusi, yingukunoghwa kuhunda kulandana na mahundo gha hoto.
TIT 2:2 Ghubhaghombele aghohi alume, kukita yinguanogha kubhegha na ntengeleho, na kutenda mihalo yinakuyegha uhokamo, kangi bhangunogha kubhegha bhanakulilongoha bhene, bhanauhyubhalilo ghwa mahundo gha hoto, upalo na alimbilila.
TIT 2:3 Ubhwabhuabhu ghubhaghombele adala aghohi kukita bhangunoghwa abheghe handa bhaahaghultwe kwa kya Chapanga. Akotoke kubhegha akolekeha ebu alobhi, ngati bhahunde ghala ghaabheghite gha maha,
TIT 2:4 ngati abhatengelekehe ahumbu kabhali kuapala angwana bhabhe na bhana bhabhe,
TIT 2:5 bhahotole kulilongoha bhene, bhaayitikilitwe muulongolo ghwa Chapanga, bhalolekehe maha milando ya ukaya kwabhe, bhabheghe na umaha na bhabhayitikile alume bhabhe, ngati mundu ywoheli kakotoke kuliyuyuha lilagho lya Chapanga.
TIT 2:6 Ubhwabhuabhu, ghubhabhinilile ahongolo ahotole kulilongoha bhene.
TIT 2:7 Mu milando yoha ghwenga ghungunoghwa ghubheghe nhwano mung'endelo ya maha. Mu mahundo ghako ghubhonehe kukita ghubhegha na mwoyo nyanyi na nng'ololeho.
TIT 2:8 Ghukambuke malagho ghanogha gha nga kukanilwa ngati amyanja bhako bhabhone honi, na bhakotoke kubhegha na kihakata kyohele kyakulongela kwa kya twenga.
TIT 2:9 Ghubhahunde abhandwa kubhayitikila angwana bhabhe na bhabhayelehe mu milando yoha. Bhakotoke kulimbana nabho,
TIT 2:10 ebu bhakoteke kuayibhila hilibhi hyabhe, kihyengo kyaki bhangunoghwa abhonekane bha maha na ayitikila mu manjubha ghoha, ngati kwa mandendelo ghabhonehe lutiko lwa maha kwa mahundo gha Chapanga.
TIT 2:11 Kiyaha umaha ghwa Chapanga ghuhwimulighwa ngati kualopoha bhandu bhoha.
TIT 2:12 Umaha aghwo ghungutuhunda kulekana na ng'endelo yohele yiinogha ng'obhe Chapanga, na tama ya nnima, ngati tuhotole kulama kwa kulilongoha twabhene, na tutame kwa ghughololelo na ghana kunnogheha Chapanga munnima aghu,
TIT 2:13 patulindila udumbilo ghwa unonelo, pala paghupala kubwitukila ukulu ghwa Chapanga ghwetu Nkulu na Nlopohi ghwetu Yesu Kilisito.
TIT 2:14 Ywombe kakilibhuha mwene kahweghe kwa kya twenga ngati katukombole kubhuka mu uhokelo ghwoha na kutuyoha tubhe nyanyi bhandu bhake mwene Chapanga, kukita tubhe bhandu bhanakutenda lihengo lya maha.
TIT 2:15 Hino ghwenga ghuhunde milando ayi yoha, paghuayonjokeha mwoyo na kubhakinya kwa makakala ghako ghoha. Mundu ywoheli kakotoke kukuyuyuha.
TIT 3:1 Ghubhatende bhandu bhakulungwe kukita bhangunoghwa abhatekule atabhala na bhaabheghiti na makakala, bhabhayitikile na bhabhe kala kutenda milando ya maha yoha.
TIT 3:2 Ghubhaghombele bhakotoke kunligha mundu ywohele, ngati bhakotoke kulimbana, na abheghe nuu, na paakibhoneha utetebhalo kwa bhandu bhoha mumanjubha ghoha.
TIT 3:3 Kiyaha manjubha ghamu twenga tukibhegha abhughabhugha, angakatala na ahokelo. Tukibhegha abhandwa bha tama na kubejula ghweka. Tukitama muubhumi ghwa uhokelo na malili, bhandu bhakitukalila na twenga tukibhakalalila.
TIT 3:4 Peni paghuhwimulitwe umaha na upalo ghwake Chapanga na Nlopohi ghwetu,
TIT 3:5 kakitulopoha, na kakitenda habho chepa kwa nnando ghwohele ghwa maha ghutuutendite ngati kwa luhungu lwake, kwa njila ya Nhuki ghwa Chapanga ywakatunemelite kwa kutuyoha ngati tubhelekwe uhyono na tubheghe na ulami ghwa hyono.
TIT 3:6 Chapanga kakitupegha Nhuki ghwake kwa utekulo kwa kukindila Yesu Kilisito, Nlopohi ghwetu,
TIT 3:7 ngati kwa umaha ghwake tumokole kuyitikilwa na tunoghwe kuhala ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha ghutughuudumbila.
TIT 3:8 Ali ndo lilagho lya kuhyubhalila. Nungupala ghubhahunde kwa kubhinilila milando ayi, ngati bhala bhaanhyubhalila Chapanga bhahotole kubhegha na kilyakalyaka kya kutenda gha maha. Milando ayi ndo ya maha kangi yibhegha na utopelo kwa bhandu bhoha.
TIT 3:9 Peni ghuhepetuke na malimbano ya kihila mahala, maghombano gha kya lukolo, bhulwa na malimbano gha kya malaghilo. Milando ayi yibhegha ng'obhe na fwambulo na yibhegha ng'obhe na utopelo ghwohele.
TIT 3:10 Mundu ywakayambuha nng'abhaniko ghunkinye pakatandila, na ghunkinye paubhili na handa kaayihwa ng'obhe, ghulekani naywo.
TIT 3:11 Kiyaha ghungumanya kukita mundu handa aywo kahobha na ulemwa ghwake ghungubhoneha kukita kalitosa mwene.
TIT 3:12 Kamu panunnaghila Alitema ebu Tikiko kwa ghwenga, ghulopokele kuhika kunnola akwo Nikopoli, kiyaha namula kutama akwo mu manjubha gha nndaluko ghwa kipepo.
TIT 3:13 Ghukakalike kuntangatila nsomi ghwa malaghilo Zenasi na Apolo, ngati ahotole kuyanda mwanja ghwabhe, na ghulyaghile akotoke kupelelwa kubhegha na kilibhi kyoheli kyabhakipalite.
TIT 3:14 Bhandu bhetu nabho bhalihunde kutenda gha maha, ngati bhabhatangatile bhaabheghite na upalo ghwa hilibhi hyaahipala ngati akotoke kutama ubhumi ghwa nga kutangatila.
TIT 3:15 Bhandu bhoha bhaabheghite papamu na nenga bhangughujambuha. Ghubhajambuhe bhala bhoha bhaatupala. Nungubhayupila mabhoha umaha ghwa Chapanga.
PHM 1:1 Lihamba ali linguhuma kwa nenga Paulo, mmopwa kwa kya Kilisito Yesu, na kuhuma kwa Timoti nnongo ghwetu. Tungukutyekela ghwenga npalo Filemoni, nntendalihengo nnyetu,
PHM 1:2 na nhacha ghwetu Afia, na machonda nnyetu mu Kilisito Alikipo, papamu na ngwemuko ya bhandu bhaanhyubhalila Kilisito bhaakongana mu lubhagha lwako.
PHM 1:3 Tunguayupila umaha na uhihimilo, kuhuma kwa Chapanga Tate ghwetu na kwa Bambo Yesu Kilisito.
PHM 1:4 Manjubha ghoha pammegha mu kuyupa, panughukulungwa ghwenga Filimoni nungunnumba Chapanga,
PHM 1:5 kiyaha nunguyihwa mihalo ya kuhyubhalila kwako kwa Bambo Yesu na Upalo ghwako kwa bhandu bhoha bhaabhaghulitwe kwa kya Chapanga.
PHM 1:6 Nunguyupila kukita uhyubhaliolo ghwako ghuulilungite papamu na twenga ghukutange ngati ghubheghe na umanyi ghuukamaliti ghwa nemelo yoha yiitukingamite mu kulilunga kwa twenga nkati ya Kilisito.
PHM 1:7 Nnongo, upalo ghwako ghunyeleha munu na ghuundengeleha munu! Na ghuyihangaluha myoyo ya bhandu bhaabhaghulitwe kwa kya Chapanga.
PHM 1:8 Kwa kya agho hata handa panughukwilikiha mu Kilisito ghutende kila kighukunogha kutenda,
PHM 1:9 peni kwa kya upalo, yingunnogha mbaka nughuyupe. Nungutenda habhu kiyaha nenga Paulo nng'ohi ghwa ngwemuko, na hinu mmopwa kwa kya Kilisito Yesu.
PHM 1:10 Nungughuyupa kwa kya Onesimo mwana ghwangu, aywo ndo mwana ghwangu mu kunhyubhalila Kilisito kiyaha megha tate ghwake pamegha mukibhopo,
PHM 1:11 pamakachu kakikutangatila ng'obhe kilibhi, peni hinu kangughunogha ghwenga na nenga bhubho.
PHM 1:12 Hinu nungunlaghila kangi kwa ghwenga, kiyaha nungumpala kwa mwoyo ghwangu ghwoha.
PHM 1:13 Ningapalite katame na nenga ngati kayikamuhe ng'ebhu yako ya kundangatila mu manjubha agha pamegha mu kibhopo kwa kya Nhalo ghwa Maha,
PHM 1:14 peni nungupala ng'obhe kutenda kyohele kya nga kuteghekwa na ghwenga, ngati yikotoke kubhegha handa ningukukwiliha kundendela gha maha ngati ghutende kwa mwoyo ghwako ghumwene.
PHM 1:15 Pangi kwa mwene kutama kutali na ghwenga kya manjubha machoko ndo nhokonyo ghwa kutama naywo mu manjubha ghoha,
PHM 1:16 chepa handa nbhandwa, ngati ndo ghwa maha kyanalumu ya nbhandwa, na ndo nlongo npalwa mu Kilisito. Mwene ndo npalo ghwangu muno na kangi ghwenga ghwanpala kyanalumu, mwene ndo chepa ghwako ghweka ngati ndo ghwa Chapanga bhubho.
PHM 1:17 Hinu, handa ghungumanya nenga handa ntenda lihengo nnyako mu Kilisito, ghunkingame handa bhula paghunkingama nenga.
PHM 1:18 Handa kakuhokela kyohele ebu handa ghunyahika kyohele, nenga ndakubhuyihila.
PHM 1:19 Nenga Paulo nuutyeka lihamba ali kwa kibhoko kyangu numwene. Ndakubhuyihila. Kangi nungupala ng'obhe kulongela kukita nungukughamba ubhumi ghwako ghumwene.
PHM 1:20 Hinu nnongo ghwangu, ketaketa ghundendele nlando aghwo kwa kya lihina lya Bambo, ngati ghuuyelele mwoyo ghwangu handa nnongo mu Kilisito.
PHM 1:21 Nungukutyekela panhyubhalila kukita ghwanyitikila na kunu pamanya kukita ghwaatenda kupitingana kwa ghala ghanughuyupa.
PHM 1:22 Megha na liyupo limo kyanalumu, ghuntendekehele kyumba kya ahenja, kiyaha nungupala kubhuyihwa kwa mwenga handa luyango lwa mayupo ghenu.
PHM 1:23 Epafula, mmopwa nnyangu kwa kya Kilisito Yesu, kangukujambuha.
PHM 1:24 Bhubho Maliki, na Alisitaliko, na Dema na Lukasi, atenda lihengo ayangu, bhangukujambua.
PHM 1:25 Nungubhayupila mabhoha umaha ghwa Bambo Yesu Kilisito ghubheghe papamu na mwenga.
HEB 1:1 Pamakachu pala Chgapanga kakilongela patangalo na aghohi bhetu mu njila nhanganganiko kukindila kwa ambuye,
HEB 1:2 peni mu manjubha agha gha uhiko, Chgapanga kangulongela na twenga kukindila Mwana ghwake. Chgapanga kwa njila ya ywombe kakighubhumba unnima na kakinpegha hilibhi hyoha kahitabhale.
HEB 1:3 Ywombe ndo ung'anyimo ghwa ukulu ghwa Chgapanga na kangubhoneha bhula Chgapanga pakabheghite. Kanguyambuha hilibhi yoha himamalitane papamu handa payibheghite kwa lilagho lyake liibheghite na makakala. Mbole ya kubhayoha bhandu na kubhabhuhila ulemwa, kakighenda katama kunani mu mbande ya nnilo ya ukulu ghwa Chgapanga.
HEB 1:4 Mwana ghwa Chgapanga kakitendekwa nkulu kupitingana Andumitumi bha kunani kwa Chgapanga, na lihina lyake lyakapeghitwe na Chgapanga ndo likulu muno kupitingana gha abho andumitumi.
HEB 1:5 Kiyaha Chgapanga kakinng'ombela ng'obhe nga nndumitumi ghwake ywohele ghwa kunani kukita, “Ghwenga ndo Mwana ghwangu, nenga lelo megha Tate ghwako!” Kangi kakinng'ombela ng'obhe nga nndumitumi ghwake yumu ghwa kunani kukita, “Nenga ndabhegha Tate ghwake, na ywombe katabhegha Mwana ghwangu.”
HEB 1:6 Peni Chgapanga pakabheghite kangunlaghila mwana ghwake ghwa ulongohi mu nnima ndo kakilongela, “Andumitumi bhoha bha kunani yinguakwiliha kuntundamila.”
HEB 1:7 Peni kya kualinga andumitumi bhake bha kunani kakilongela, “Chgapanga nungubhaghalambula andumitumi bhangu bha kunani abheghe likusi, Na andumila bhake nungubhaghalambula abheghe mibhale ya mwoto.”
HEB 1:8 Peni kwa kya Mwana ghwake, Chgapanga kakilongela, “Ghubhutwa ghwako ghwenga Chgapanga ghwabhegha ghwa manjubha ghoha, ghwenga ghwabhatabhala bhandu bhako muyinoghelwa.
HEB 1:9 Ghungupala kutenda ghanakunoghela na ghungulema uhakata. Ya kya agho Chgapanga, Chgapanga ghwako kakuhaghula ghwenga na kughupopohela mahuta gha maha ngati ghubheghe nkulu na kakupegha ghwenga uhokamo na uyelelo kupitingana ayako bhoha.”
HEB 1:10 Kangi kakilongela, “Ghwenga Bambo, pamakachu ghukighubhumba nnima, na kwa mabhoko ghako ghukitendekeha kunani.
HEB 1:11 Ahyo hyoha hyahobha, peni ghwenga ghwahighala manjubha ghoha, Hyoha hyahakala handa mapinda.
HEB 1:12 Ghwahibhilinga handa likama, na hyaghalambulwa handa maghwanda. Peni ghwenga ghwahighala handa paghubhele, na ubhumi ghwako ghwaapela ng'obhe.”
HEB 1:13 Bhuli Chgapanga kakilongela kwa nndumitumi ghwake ywoki ghwa kunani kukita, “Ghutame apa mu mbande yangu ya nnilo mbaka panubhabhika amyanja bhako pahi yako handa kiteho kya kulibhatila maghulu.”
HEB 1:14 Andumitumi bha kunani kwa Chapanga ndo aghani? Ndo mihuki yiintendela lihengo Chgapanga na bhalaghilwa na ywombe kuatangatila bhoha bhaapala kukingama ulopohi.
HEB 2:1 Habhu tungunoghwa kughaghungila ghala ghatughayihwite ngati ghakotoke kuhobheha.
HEB 2:2 Nhalo ghula ghwapeghitwe aghohi bhetu na andumitumi bha kunani ghukiyimihwa kukita ghwa hoto, na bhoha bhaghulemite kughutughila ebu bhaalemite kughuyitikila bhakihyatwa handa payinoghitwe.
HEB 2:3 Hino, twenga twahepetuka bhuli handa twaghupughana ulopohi nkulu handa aghu? Paulongohi Bambo kakiulandamiha ulopohi aghu, na bhala bhaayihwite bhakitughombela twenga kukita lilagho ali ndo lya hoto.
HEB 2:4 Naywo Chgapanga kakiyimiha pakabhoneha ulopohi aghwo kukita ndo hoto kwa naho, na kwa makangacho na kwa mihabho nhanganganiko, kwa kuapegha lilumbo lya Nhuki ghwake handa pakapalite mwene.
HEB 2:5 Chgapanga kakibhapegha chepa andumitumi bhake bha kunani, makakala gha kutabhala nnima ghuupala kuhika, ghwene ndo nnima ghwatughukambuka mihalo yake.
HEB 2:6 Peni pabhegha pahala pamo Malembo ghatyekwa, “Mundu ndo kilibhi ghani mbaka ghunhwache? Na anamundu ndo kilibhi ghani mbaka ghuntekule?
HEB 2:7 Ghuntenda kabheghe pahi kya mandina ya andumitumi bhako bha kunani, Ghunhwaliha kilemba kya ukulu na uhokamo,
HEB 2:8 Ghubhatenda atabhale hilibhi hyoha.” Chgapanga kahibhika hilibhi hyoha mu utabhala ghwetu na kahone kilibhi kiibheghite ng'obhe mu makakala ghetu. Peni mbaka hinu tungubhona ng'obhe mundu pakatabhala hilibhi hyoha.
HEB 2:9 Peni tungummona Yesu ywene kakitendwa kabheghe ndokwa kupitingana andumitumi bha kunani, ngati kwa luhungu lwa Chgapanga pamandina, yikinkwiliha kuhwegha kwa kya bhandu bhoha. Hinu tungummona kahwalihwa kilemba kya ukulu na uhokamo kubhukana na mapungwo na kuhwegha kwake.
HEB 2:10 Kiyaha yikibhegha telatela kwa Chgapanga, ywakabhumbite na kuhibhika hilibhi hyoha handa payibheghite, kantende Yesu katwihilike kukindila himbamanda, ngati kabhayeghe bhana atangalo mu ukulu ghwake. Kiyaha Yesu ndo ywakaalongoha bhombe mu ulopoho ghwabhe.
HEB 2:11 Ywombe yunakubhayoha bhandu ulemwa ghwabhe, ywombe papamu na bhala bhaayohwitwe, bhoha abhegha na Tate yumu. Ndo kiyaha kangubhona ng'obhe honi kubhakema abho alongo bhake.
HEB 2:12 Handa pakalongelite, “Ndabhalubhulila alongo bhangu kila kighukitendite, Mu ngwemuko lya bhandu bha Chgapanga, ndaghuyimbila luyimbo lwa kukutika.”
HEB 2:13 Kangi kangulongela, “Ndanhyubhalila Chgapanga ghwangu.” Na bhubho kangulongela, “Nenga megha apa papamu na bhana bhakambeghite Chgapanga.”
HEB 2:14 Hino, kiyaha bhana abho ndo bhandu bha mmili na mwahi, ndo Yesu naywo kakihika na mmili handa bhombe. Kakitenda naha ngati kwa njila ya kiho kyake kankanjaghane Nchipila, ywakabheghite na makakala gha kya kiho,
HEB 2:15 ngati kabhalekekehe bhala bhaabheghite mu ubhandwa mu ubhumi ghwabhe ghwoha kwa kubhegha na bhwaghalili ghwa kiho.
HEB 2:16 Kulyaghila ywombe kakihika ng'obhe kubhatangatila andumitumi ghwa kunani kwa Chgapanga, ngati kubhatangatila ubheleko ghwa Abulahamu.
HEB 2:17 Kwa nnando aghu, kakinoghwa kabheghe handa alongo bhake, ngati kabheghe ndundame ghwabhe nkulu ywakuhyubhalika na yunaluhungu, mu kuntendela lihengo Chgapanga, ngati ulemwa ghwa bhandu bhake ghulekekehwe.
HEB 2:18 Kiyaha ywombe kikipamandwa pakang'ehitwe habhu kaahotola kubhatangatila bhala bhaang'ehwa na kupamandwa.
HEB 3:1 Hino, maalongo bhangu muuhaghulitwe na Chgapanga, ngati muulilungite na lukemo lwa kunani kwa Chgapanga, munhwachile muno Yesu, Nndumila na Ndundame Nkulu ghwa uhyubhalilo ghutuukambuka,
HEB 3:2 ywombe kakibhegha nhyubhaliko kwa ywakanhaghulite, handa Musa pakabheghite nhyubhaliko bhandu bha Isilaeli bhene ndo kitutubhi kya Chgapanga.
HEB 3:3 Peni Yesu kangunoghwa uhokamo nkulu kuchweha kwa Musa, kiyaha yunakuchenga kitutubhi pakapeghwa uhokamo kyanalumu kupitingana kwa kitutubhi kyene.
HEB 3:4 Kila kitutubhi kinguchengwa na mundu, peni Chgapanga ndo nchenga ghwa hilibhi hyoha.
HEB 3:5 Musa kakibhegha nndumitumi ghwa kuhyubhalika mu bhandu bha kitutubhi kya Akaaisilaeli bhoha, na kakikambuka milando yene Chgapanga katalongela kuulongolo,
HEB 3:6 peni Kilisito handa Mwana nhyubhaliko ywakaalongoha bhandu bha kitutubhi kya Chgapanga, na twenga ndo bhandu abho mu kitutubhi kya Chgapanga, Handa twaaghendelela kubhegha akangamalo na ahwadali mu milando yila yituyidumbila mbaka ku uhiko.
HEB 3:7 Hinu, handa pakalongela Nhuki ghwa Chgapanga, “Handa lelo pamuliyihwa lilobhe lya Chgapanga,
HEB 3:8 nkotoke kubhegha na ngakatala, handa abhele bhenu paang'ehite, paabheghite bhangung'eha kula kukibhala.
HEB 3:9 Akwo ndo aghohi bhenu bhakibhegha bhangung'eha nenga na kumbima, Chgapanga kangulongela, hata bhula mu ngungwa mbinda mabhoko ncheche bhakighabhona mandendelo ghangu ghandendite.
HEB 3:10 Habhu ndo bhandu bhala bhakindenda nyaghabhale na nikilongela, ‘Abha bhandu ndo ahokelo manjubha ghoha, Na bhangulema kuyitikila kinikilongela.’
HEB 3:11 Nikiyaghabhala na nikilapa, ‘Bhaayingila ng'obhe mu nnima ghwene ndabhapegha apughwe!’”
HEB 3:12 Alongo bhangu, mu mwenga kakotoke kubhegha mundu yuna ngakatala ywangahyubhalila, na ywakalibhaghulite na Chgapanga yunakulama.
HEB 3:13 Peni nnyonjokehane mwoyo mabhene kwa mabhene manjubha ghoha kila linjubha, ngati kakotoke kubhegha nga yumoo ywenu ywakatenditwe nnonopo kwa ukuluho ghwa ulemwa.
HEB 3:14 Twenga twaaghendelela kubhegha mukulilunga na Kilisito, handa twaakamulana na udumbilo ghuutubheghite naghwo kutandila mbaka kuuhiko,
HEB 3:15 handa Malembo paghatyekitwe, “Handa pamuliyihwa lilobhe lya Chgapanga lelo, nkotoke kubhegha na ngakatala handa paatendite aghohi bhenu, Pala paangilukite.”
HEB 3:16 Ndo aghani abho bhaayihwite lilobhe lya Chgapanga na bhakinkiluka? Ndo bhala bhoha bhaalongohitwe na Musa kukibhala kuhuma ku Misili.
HEB 3:17 Chgapanga kakiyaghabhihwa na aghani mu ngungwa mbinda mabhoko ncheche? Kakiayaghabhalila bhala bhaatendite ulemwa, mitumba yabhe yikibhegha pilikichi kula kukibhala.
HEB 3:18 Chgapanga pakalapite “Maayingila ng'obhe pa kupughwa kwa nenga,” kakialapila aghani? Kakibhegha kakilongela kwa kya bhala bha akilukite.
HEB 3:19 Hino, tungubhona kukita bhakiyingila ng'obhe akwo kwa ghwangahyubhalila kwabhe.
HEB 4:1 Hino, kiyaha yila naghilo ya kuyingila pakupughwa yikali yibhegha, ndo tuyoghope ngati ywohele nkati yetu kakotoke kulepelwa kuyingila paupughwo aghwo.
HEB 4:2 Mana ndo hoto, na twenga tulandamihwa Nhalo ghwa Maha ghughula ghula handa bhaalandamihitwe bhombe. Peni lilagho lila lyaliyihwite likianogha ng'obhe, kiyaha likihangangana ng'obhe na kuhyubhalila.
HEB 4:3 Hino, twenga tuhyubhalilite tungumokola upughwo aghwo ghwakatulaghilite Chgapanga. Handa pakalongelite, “Nikiyaghabhala na nikilapa, ‘Bhaayingila ng'obhe paupughwo ghwangu.’” Chgapanga kakighalongela agho hata payibheghite lihengo lyake likiyomoka kala kutandila pakaghubhumbite unnima.
HEB 4:4 Pamoo pamu Malembo ghatyekwa yakya linjubha lya saba, “Chgapanga kakipumulila linjubha lya saba, na kakileka mahengo ghake ghoha.”
HEB 4:5 Kangi bahapa apa patyekwa, “Bhaayingila ng'obhe pakupughwa kwa nenga.”
HEB 4:6 Hino, aghwo naghilo lya kuyingila pakupughwa likali kubhegha, kubhukana na bhala bhaalandamihitwe Nhalo ghwa Maha pala kandahi, bhakilepelwa kuyingila amwo, kiyaha bhakiyitikila ng'obhe.
HEB 4:7 Chgapanga kakilibhika linjubha lingi liikemwa “Lelo.” Mbole ya ngungwa ndangalo kakilongela kangi kwa njila ya Daudi malagho ghakaghakambukite kala, “Handa lelo pamuliyihwa lilobhe lya Chgapanga, ghukotoke kubhegha na ngakatala.”
HEB 4:8 Kiyaha Yoshua kakiapegha bhandu abho upughwo, mbole ya agho Chgapanga kangalongela ng'obhe ya kya linjubha lingi lya kupughwa.
HEB 4:9 Kya habhu, kukali kubhegha na kupughwa kwa bhandu bha Chgapanga mu linjubha lya saba.
HEB 4:10 Mana, kila ywakayingila pa upughwo ghwa Chgapanga, kaapumulila kubhuka mu lihengo lyake, handa bhula Chgapanga pakapughwite pakayomolite lihengo lyake.
HEB 4:11 Hino, tukangamale kuyingila mu upughwo aghwo, ngati kakotoke kubhegha ywohele mu nkati yetu ywakalepelwa kuyitikila handa pabhatendite bhombe ghwangahyubhalila.
HEB 4:12 Kiyaha Lilagho lya Chgapanga libhegha na ubhumi na libhegha, na libhegha na makakala, lingutema kupitingana lukechelo lungutema mbande hyoha. Lungutema mbaka mu ng'ebhu payikongana mwoyo na nhuki, lingutema mbaka mu uloyhwo na mahuta. Lilagho alyo linguhangula hwacho na ulamulo ghwa myoyo ya bhandu.
HEB 4:13 Hangi kahone kibhumbe kyakulihiha muulongolo ghwa Chgapanga, hilibhi hyoha hyahwimulighwa muulongolo ghwake, kwa ywombe ndo yingutunogha kubhuha mmalango ghwa ndendelo yetu.
HEB 4:14 Hino, handa tubhegha na Ndundame Nkulu kupitingana bhoha ywakayingilite kunani kwa Chgapanga, aywo ndo Yesu Mwana ghwa Chgapanga, na tughukamulile muno uhyubhalilo ghwetu.
HEB 4:15 Ndundame ayu Nkulu kangughumanya uyoyobhalo ghwetu, aywo mwene kaking'ehwa handa twenga mu milando yoha peni kakitenda ng'obhe ulemwa.
HEB 4:16 Habhu, tukiheghelele kyanga lyogha kiteho kya utabhala ghwa Chgapanga yuna luhungu, ngati tumokole luhungu na umaha ghwa kututangatila mu mapungwo.
HEB 5:1 Kiyaha ndundame nkulu ywohele ywakahaghulitwe mu anabhandu, aywo kabhikwa kwa kya bhandu mu milando yiibheghite ya Chgapanga, ngati kabhuhe nyambi na bhwengu kwa kya ulemwa.
HEB 5:2 Kya bhula aywo ndundame mwene kabhegha na uyoyobhalo, kaahotola kubhatendela kwa luhungu bhala bhaatenda ulemwa kyanga kumanya na bhanakutenda uhokelo,
HEB 5:3 Kwa kya agho, kangunoghwa kubhuha nyambi kwa kya ulemwa ghweka, ngati kwa kya ulemwa ghwa kya ywombe bhubho.
HEB 5:4 Na kahone mundu yunakulihaghula mwene kubhegha Ndundame, ngati kangukemwa na Chgapanga, handa bhula Aluni.
HEB 5:5 Ubhwabhu abhu Kilisito naywo kakilikweha ng'obhe mwene uhokamo ghwa kubhegha Ndundame Nkulu, peni Chgapanga kakinng'ombela, “Ghwenga ndo Mwana ghwangu, Na lelo menga Tate ghwako.”
HEB 5:6 Handa payityekitwe pamoo pangi mu Malembo, “Ghwaabhegha ndo Ndundame ghwa manjubha ghoha, kwa nnandano ghwa undundame ghwa Melikisedeki.”
HEB 5:7 Yesu pakabheghite na ubhumi pa nnima aghu, kakilila kwa lilobhe likulu na mahohi, kakinhokamila na kunnyupa Chgapanga ywakabheghite na makakala gha kunnopoha mu kiho, naywo Chgapanga kakinnyihwa Yesu kiyaha kakibha yunakutundamila muulongolo ghwake.
HEB 5:8 Hata pakabhele kakibhegha Mwana ghwa Chgapanga, peni kakilihunda kuyitikila mu njila ya himbamanda.
HEB 5:9 Naywo pakatwihilihitwe kala kakibhegha nhokolo ghwa ulopoho ghwa manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko kwa bhandu bhaannyitikila,
HEB 5:10 Mbole Chgapanga kakinninga kubhegha ndundame nkuluhanda pakabheghite Melikisedeki.
HEB 5:11 Tubhegha na malagho matangalo gha kubhaghombela kwa kya undundame ghwa Yesu, peni ndo unonopo kualubhulila kiyaha munakutopa bha kumanya.
HEB 5:12 Kiyaha mu manjubha agha yinguibhanogha kubhegha ahunda, peni nkali mungunoghwa kubhegha na mundu ghwa kuahunda mahundo gha kandahi ya lilagho lya Chgapanga. Mungunoghwa kunywegha mabhele kihyengo kya hilyo hinonopo.
HEB 5:13 Ywohele ywakanoghwa kuyonga mabhele ndo kakali mwana king'enya, mana aywo kangumanya ng'obhe ghamaha na mahakata.
HEB 5:14 Peni bhandu bhaalyegha hilyo hinonopo ndo akamala kala, mana bhaahunditwe kwa mandendelo kufwambula umaha na uhakata.
HEB 6:1 Hino, mbaha tughendelele kuulongolo kyanalumu, mu mahundo ghaakamilite na kuleka kunyuma mahundo gha kandahi ya kya lilagho lya Kilisito. Kangi tukotoke kuhighala mu ghala mahundo gha kandahi yaghalinga kulipetula kubhukana na kutama kwanga kunyeleha Chgapanga na yakya kunhyubhalila Chgapanga,
HEB 6:2 na mahundo gha ubatiso na gha kuayupila bhandu kwa kubhayabhikila mabhoko, na gha uhyuko na toso ya manjubha ghoha.
HEB 6:3 Kwa kutenda habho twaaghendelela kukula na kukamala mu uhyubhalilo pakapala Chgapanga.
HEB 6:4 Kiyaha bhandu bhala bhayimanyite kala hoto ya kya Chgapanga, na kukingama hilibhi hya maha ya kunani kwa njila ya Nhuki ghwa Chgapanga,
HEB 6:5 na kumanya kya maha kukita lilagho lya Chgapanga ndo la maha, na kangi bhangumanya makakala gha utabhala ghwa Chgapanga mu nnima ghuupala kuhika,
HEB 6:6 na mbole bhakikiluka uhyubhalilo, yahotoleka ng'obhe kubhabhuyiha bhalipetule kangi, kiyaha bhangummangalila Mwana ghwa Mundu kya ubhili kwa likaho na kunnyuyuha pekupeku.
HEB 6:7 Kiyaha lutupi luukomelwa hula maghenda maghenda na kumela mimela yinakupapa mapambiko kwa nkandakanda, lutupi alwo lunonelwa na Chgapanga,
HEB 6:8 peni handa yimela mihomi na hitonamamba, kahone lumotelo, na lwaabhegha ugheghela na kukotolwa na Chgapanga na muuhiko lwayochwa mwoto.
HEB 6:9 Ena maapalo ghwangu hata bhula nubhatyekela kwa malagho makalipa, hata habho nenga mmegha na ulyaghilo kukita mungutenda gha maha ghaabhoneha kukita mulopoleghwa.
HEB 6:10 Kiyaha Chgapanga ndo ghwa maha, na ywombe kangukulungwa lihengo limulitendite na upalo ghumuubhonehite kwa kya mwene na lihengo limubhatendela bhandu bhake na kangi mungughendelela kubhatendela.
HEB 6:11 Twenga tungupala kila yumu ywenu, kabhonehe ubhinililo ghula ghula, ngati mmokole kumanya uhoto ghuutwihilikite ghwa ghula udumbilo mbaka kuuhiko.
HEB 6:12 Habhu nkotoke kubhegha atotoho, ngati mmeghe handa bhanakuhyubhalila na bhaabheghite na ulimbililo, na kuuhiko bhaakamuhwa yila naghilo ya Chgapanga.
HEB 6:13 Chgapanga pakanlaghilite Abulahimu, kakilapa kwa lihina lyake mwene, kiyaha kahone ywakabheghite nkulu kupitingana kwa ywombe, ywene kwa aywo kangahotolite kulapa,
HEB 6:14 Chgapanga kakilongela, “Kulyaghila ndaghunonela na ndaghupegha ubheleko ntangalo.”
HEB 6:15 Abulahamu kakilimbilila na habhu kakimokola kila kyakalaghilitwe na Chgapanga.
HEB 6:16 Bhandu paalapa angulapa kwa yumu ywakabheghite nkulu kupitingana bhene, na kilapo kinguyomola malimbano ghoha.
HEB 6:17 Naywo Chgapanga kakiyimiha naghilo yake kwa kilapo, na kwa kya akyo kakiabhoneha peku peku bhala bhaabhalaghilite kukita kahone kupotongana kila kyakalapite,
HEB 6:18 Hinu Chgapanga kakihitenda ahi hilibhi hibhili, naghilo na kilapo, hyene hyahotoleka ng'obhe kugilimbuka na kwa ahyo Chgapanga kahotola ng'obhe kulongela uhwangi. Kakitenda hilibhi ahyo hibhili ngati katuyonjokehe mwoyo twenga tuntughilite ngati tughukamulile udumbilo ghwa milando yiipala kuhika.
HEB 6:19 Tubhegha na lidumbilo alyo handa kipaghiko kya kukamulila meli. Na lidumbilo alyo linguyingiha mbaka pahapa palapabhaghulitwe ya kya Chgapanga ghweka kuhyeto ya lipazia pakunani.
HEB 6:20 Yesu mwene kalongolela kuyingila amwo kwa kya twenga na kabhegha Ndundame Nkulu mu manjubha ghoha kya nga uhiko, handa undundame ghwa Melikisedeki.
HEB 7:1 Melikisedeki kakibhegha mutwa ghwa ku Salemu, na ndundame nkulu ghwa Chgapanga ywa kunani muno. Abulahamu pakabheghite kangubhuya kuhuma ku ngondo kwene kakibhakoma abhatwa ncheche, Melikisedeki kakikongana naywo na kakinnonela,
HEB 7:2 naywo Abulahamu kakinpegha lifungu limu mu kila mafungu mbinda mabhoko yimo gha hilibhi hyahikamokolite. Na fwambulo ya kipalamande kya kandahi kya lihina lyake ndo, “Mutwa ghwa shaliaya” Na bhubho “Mutwa ghwa ku Salemu” fwambulo yake ndo “Mutwa ghwa uhihimilo.”
HEB 7:3 Kahohe ywakanmanyite tate ebu mama ghwake ghwakibhegha aghani ebu ghwa lukolo lwoki. Na kahone ywakamanya kakibhelekwa pakiki ebu kakihwegha pakiki. Melikisedeki ndo handa Mwana ghwa Chgapanga kya bhula manjubha ghoha katabhegha ndundame.
HEB 7:4 Hino, munhwachile kya bhula mundu aywo pakabheghite nkulu, mbaka Abulahamu tate ghwetu nhwadali, kakinpegha lifungu limu lya mbinda mabhoko yimu ya hilibhi hyake hyoha hyakahikokobholite ku ngondo.
HEB 7:5 Kangi tungumanya kukita, kulandana na malaghilo, bhana bha Lawi bhaatendeka kubhegha andundame na bhangulingama lifungu limu lya mbinda mabhoko yimo kuhuma kwa alongo bhabhe kubhukana na malaghilo, hata payibhele alongo bhabhe nabho ndo ubheleko ghwa Abulahamu.
HEB 7:6 Peni aywo Melikisedeki kakibhegha ng'obhe ghwa lukolo lwa Lawi, hata habho kakikingama lifungu lya mbinda mabhoko yimo kuhuma kwa Abulahamu, kangi kakinnemela aywo ywakakamuhitwe naghilo na Chgapanga.
HEB 7:7 Kahone bhwaghalili kukita nndokwa ghunonelwa na ywabhegha nkulu kupitingana kwa ywombe.
HEB 7:8 Kangi, abho andundame bhanakukingama lifungu lya mbinda mabhoko yimu ndo bhandu bhene bhaahwegha, peni apa ywakakingama lifungu lya mbinda mabhoko yimu yinguyimihwa kukita kahwegha ng'obhe na aywo ndo Melikisedeki.
HEB 7:9 Twaahotola kulongela kukita, Lawi ywene kangukingama lifungu limu lya mbinda mabhoko yimo kuhuma kwa alongo bhake, na ywombe kakibhuha alyo lifungu lyake lya mbinda mabhoko yimo kwa Melikisedeki kukindila Abulahamu,
HEB 7:10 Kiyaha Melikisedeki pakakonganite na Abulahamu, Lawi kakibha kakali mu kibhuno kya Abulahamu.
HEB 7:11 Akaaisilaeli bhakipeghwa malaghilo ghakakamuhitwe Musa na Chgapanga, na malaghilo agho ghakibhukana na undundame ghwa Akaalawi. Peni hata habho undundame aghwo ghukitwihilika ng'obhe, habho ghukinoghwa ghuhike undundame ghungi handa ghwa Melikisedeki ghwene ghwanga kulandana na undundame ghwa Aluni.
HEB 7:12 Kiyaha undundame paghugilimbuka, yibha ndo mbaka malaghilo nagho ghagilimbuke.
HEB 7:13 Mihalo yiikambukwa ndo ya Bambo ghwetu kiyaha mwene kakibhegha ghwa likabila lingi, na kahone mundu ghwa likabila lyake ywakatendite lihengo lya undundame mu likuta.
HEB 7:14 Yingumanyika pekupeku kukita ywombe kakibhelekwa mu likabila lya Yuda lyene Musa kakilikambuka ng'obhe kwa milando ya undundame.
HEB 7:15 Kangi agha ghatughalongela ghabhegha peku peku muno handa kahika ndundame yungi ywakabheghite handa Melikisedeki.
HEB 7:16 Ywombe kakitendekwa ng'obhe ndundame kwa ngwiliho na malaghilo gha anabhandu kwa kya undundame, ngati kakibhegha ndundame kwa makakala gha ubhumi ghwake ghwa manjubha ghoha na ghwanga uhiko.
HEB 7:17 Kiyaha yityekwa mu Malaghilo, “Ghwenga ndo Ndundame ghwa manjubha ghoha na ghanga uhiko, handa ndundame Malikisedeki.”
HEB 7:18 Hino, lila lilaghilo lya makachu lya undundame likibhuhwa kiyaha likibhegha liyoyobhalo na yikibhegha ya yayu hela.
HEB 7:19 Kiyaha malaghilo ghangutenda ng'obhe kilibhi kyohele kila kibhe kitwihiliko. Peni hinu tuyeghelwa lidumbilo liibheghite lya maha lyene lingutuyegha ugheghela na Chgapanga.
HEB 7:20 Pala Akaalawi abheghe Andundame pakibhegha ng'obhe na kilapo peni apa paundundame aghu pabhegha na kilapo kya Chgapanga.
HEB 7:21 Peni Yesu kakitendekwa Ndundame kwa kilapo, pala Chgapanga pakang'ombelite, “Bambo kalapa, na kahone kuyighalambula mahwacho ghake ‘Ghwenga ghwabhegha Ndundame ghwa manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko.’”
HEB 7:22 Kwa kilapo aki, Yesu ndo yunakubhoneha uhoto ghwa ninganilo liibheghite lya maha kyanalumu.
HEB 7:23 Kiyaha andundame bhala bhangi akibhegha anamundu ghweka habhu nndaluko ghwabhe ghwa kuhwegha paghuhikite bhakihwegha na bhakilepelwa kughendelela na lihengo lyake na akyo ndo kikibhegha kiyambuho kya abho kubhegha atangalo.
HEB 7:24 Peni Yesu chepa handa bhombe, ywombe kangulama manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko, na undundame ghwake ndo ghwangapela.
HEB 7:25 Kya habhu ywombe kanguhotola kubhalopoha bhala bhanakuntughila Chgapanga kukindila ywombe, kiyaha ywombe kabhegha na ubhumi ghwa manjubha ghoha na ghanga uhiko ngati kabhayupile kwa Chgapanga.
HEB 7:26 Hinu, Yesu ndo aywo ndundame yutunpalaha, ywombe ndo ntwihiliko, ywanga ulemwa ebu uhokelo ghwohele, na Chgapanga kakimmaghula na anaulemwa na kakinkweha kunani.
HEB 7:27 Ywombe kakibhegha kafwauti na andundame bhangi, kakibhuha ng'obhe nyambi kwa kila linjubha, pakitandila kubhuha nyambi kwa kya ulemwa ghwake mwene, na mbole kubhuha nyambi kwa kya ulemwa ghwa bhandu bhangi. Ywombe kakibhuha nyambi payimu ghweka kwa kya bhoha, pakalibhuhite mwene kubhegha nyambi na ayi yikikwila kwa manjubha ghoha.
HEB 7:28 Peni kwakutughila malaghilo gha Musa, bhandu bhakibhikwa kubhegha andundame akulu payibhele akibha alemwa. Peni mbole Chgapanga kakitenda kwa kilapo na kakinhaghula Mwana kabhe Ndundame Nkulu ywakatenditwe ntwihiliko mu manjubha ghoha ghanga uhiko.
HEB 8:1 Hino, nnando ghutughupala kulongela ndo aghu, twenga tubhegha na Ndundame Nkulu ghwa kya habhu, ywene katama mu mbande ya nnilo ya kiteho kya utabhala kya Chgapanga Nkulu kunani.
HEB 8:2 Akwo kunani kangutenda lihengo lya Undundame Nkulu, mu lihema liibheghite Kunani kwa Chgapanga lyene ndo pang'anyimo muno, liichengitwe na Bambo, hangi ng'obhe na anamundu.
HEB 8:3 Ndundame nkulu ywohele kahaghulwa ngati katendekehe nyambi na bhwengu. Ubhwabhu abhu, Nywo ayu Ndundame ghwetu Nkuku kangunoghwakabheghe na kilibhi kya kuyambika.
HEB 8:4 Handa Yesu kangaghendelela kutama mu nnima ndo, kangabheghite ndwee Ndundame Nkulu, kiyaha bhabhegha kala mandundame bhangi bhangutendekeha nyambi kubhukana na malaghilo gha Musa ghakapeghitwe na Chgapanga.
HEB 8:5 Mahengo ghabhe gha undundame ndo nhwano ghwa kihwili ghweka kya ghala ghaabheghite kunani. Kiyaha Musa pakabheghite ugheghela na kuchenga litinga lyakaghombelitwe na Chgapanga, ndo Chgapanga kakinng'ombela, “Ghutendekehe hilibhi hyoha kubhukana na ghula nhwano ghuulangihitwe kula kukitumbi.”
HEB 8:6 Hinu Yesu kakamuhwa lihengo lya undundame lya maha kyanalumu. Handa bhula ninganilo lyakayimihite nkati ya Chgapanga na bhandu ndo lya maha kyanalumu, kiyaha ngimiko yake yibhegha naghilo yiibheghite ya maha kyanalumu.
HEB 8:7 Kiyaha handa lila ninganilo lya kalongohi lyangabheghite ng'obhe litwihiliko, pangabheghite ng'obhe na kupalaha ninganilo lya ubhili.
HEB 8:8 Hino Chgapanga kakibhona kyangatwihilika kwa bhandu bhake, naywo kakilongela, “Manjubha ghanguhika, kalongela Bambo, na nenga ndatenda ninganilo lya hyono na bhandu bha Isilaeli na bhandu bha Yuda.
HEB 8:9 Ninganilo lyangu lyaabhegha ng'obhe handa lila linilitendite na aghohi bhabhe linjubha kubhalongoha maha kuhuma ku Misili Kiyaha bhakighendelela ng'obhe kulihyubhalila ninganilo lyangu, na nenga nikiapughana.
HEB 8:10 Hinu ali ndo ninganilo lyangu liimbala kulitenda na Akaaisilaeli kwa manjubha ghanguhika, kangulongela Bambo. Ndaghabhika malaghilo ghangu mumahala ghabhe, na kuyityeka mu myoyo yabhe. Ndaabhegha Chgapanga ghwabhe, nabho bhaabhegha bhandu bhangu.
HEB 8:11 Kahone mundu ywa kunhunda ghanja ghwake ebu kunng'ombela nndamani ghwake ‘Ghunmanye Chgapanga’ Kiyaha bhoha bhaammanya nenga, kutandila ywakabheghite nndokwa mbaka ywakabheghite nkulu.
HEB 8:12 Ndabhalekekeha kwa uhokelo ghwabhe, na ndaghukulungwa ng'obhe ulemwa ghwabhe.”
HEB 8:13 Kwa kulikema ninganilo ali lya hyono, Chgapanga kangulitenda lila lya kalongohi ndo lya makachu, na kilibhi kyohele kya makachu kingubhegha kihakala na kibhegha ugheghela na kuhobha.
HEB 9:1 Lilagano lya kandahi likibhegha na malaghilo ya kutundamila na pahaghulitwe kwa kya kuntundamila Chgapanga mu nnima.
HEB 9:2 Likitendekehwa lihema, na kyumba kyake kya kalongohi kikikemwa pang'anyimo muno. Amwo pakibhegha na kinyota kya limbamba, kindangabhalo na mangate ghaabhikitwe muulongolo ghwa Chgapanga.
HEB 9:3 Pa unyuma ghwa lipasia lya ubhili, pakibhegha na kyumba kiikemitwe pakighweka pa kya Chgapanga.
HEB 9:4 Apwo pakibhegha na lila lukuta lwa sahabu kwa kya kututumiha luhumba na lijamanda lya ninganilo, liityelemikitwe sahabu mu mbande hyoha, na nkati yake pakibhegha na kibhigha kya sahabu kiibhikitwe hilyo hiikemitwe mana, lukongocho lwa Aluni luuchanukite mahamba, na hila hipalamande hibhili hya maganga ghaatyekitwe malaghulo gha Musa ghakapeghitwe na Chgapanga.
HEB 9:5 Unani mwa lila lijamanda pakibhegha na hibhumbe hibhili hiikemitwe Makelubi hiibheghite na mbabhatila, na mbabhatila hyabhe hikigubika unani mwa kigubiko kya Lijamanda lyene bhubho lingukemwa kiteho kya lipyanda. Peni hinu twaahotola ng'obhe kulubhulila maha bhula paghabhele.
HEB 9:6 Lihema alyo palitwihilikite, mbole yikibha hitohe hya andundame kuyingila kila linjubha mu kyumba kya ulongohi kya litinga na kutenda mahengo ghabhe gha undundame.
HEB 9:7 Peni ndundame nkulu ghweka ndo ywakayingilagha mu nkati ya kila kyumba kya ubhili kya kighweka kya lihema, naywo kangutenda habho mala yimu ghweka kwa ngungwa yoha, na kahone kuyingila kyanga mwahi, ghwakaghubhuhite kwa kya mwene na kwa kya ulemwa ghwa bhandu.
HEB 9:8 Kwa kya habhu, Nhuki ghwa Chgapanga kakibhegha kangulangiha kukita, kiyaha lila lihema lya kandahi likali liyima, peni njila ya kuyingila pang'anyimo muno pakibha pakali panatatwa.
HEB 9:9 Nnando aghwo ndo nhwano ghwa nndaluko ghwa hinu, kubhoneha kukita nyambi na bhwengu yiibhuhitwe yikihotola ng'obhe kuyoha ntima ghwa mundu yunakutundamila,
HEB 9:10 Mana agha ghoha ghangubhukana na hilyo na hyakuywegha, papamo na hitohe hya kukuha kya panje, ghoha aghoa ndo malaghilo gha panjepanje ghweka, na makakala ghake ghangupela pala Chgapanga pakaghabhika maha hilibhi hyoha.
HEB 9:11 Peni Kilisito kahika kala kabheghe Ndundame Nkulu ghwa milando ya maha yiihikite. Ywombe kangutenda mahengo mu lihema lya maha kyanalumu kupitingana lila lya makachu, lihema alyo likichengwa ng'obhe na bhandu, habhu lihema alyo chepa lya nnima aghu.
HEB 9:12 Ywombe kakiyingila pang'nyimo muno mala yimo ghweka, na kakitola ng'obhe mwahi ghwa mbuhi na senga, ngati nga mwahi ghwake mwene, na kutupegha ukombohi ghwa manjubha ghoha.
HEB 9:13 Mana bhandu bhangayitikilwa na Chgapanga, bhakihotolwa kuyoghwa na kubhegha bha nyanyi paamichilwa mwahi ghwa mbuhi na senga papamu na lihu lya mwana senga.
HEB 9:14 Peni kwa mwahi ghwa Kilisito, milando mikulu kyanalumu yingutendeka, kwa makakala gha Nhuki ghwa Chgapanga ghwa manjubha ghoha, Kilisito kakilibhuha mwene handa nyambi yiitwihilikite kwa Chgapanga. Mwahi ghwake ghungutuyogha myoyo yetu kubhukana na ndendelo yinakuyambuha kiho, ngati tumokole kuntumikila Chgapanga yuna ubhumi.
HEB 9:15 Kya habhu Kilisito ndo nninganiha ghwa lilaghano lya hyono mu amwo bhala bhaakemitwe na Chgapanga bhanguhotola kukamuhwa unonelo ghwanga kupela kwa ghwaalingitwe. Kiho kyake kinguakombola bhandu kuhuma kwa ghula uhokelo ghwaaghutendite mu nndaluko ghwa lila lilaghano lya makachu.
HEB 9:16 Kiyaha manjubha ghoha lihamba liityekitwe kwakya ywa kuhala hilibhi hya ywakahweghite, libhegha na makakala pala ywaatyekite kahwegha hoto.
HEB 9:17 Kiyaha lihamba lya kuhala libhegha na makakala pakahwegha mundu, kangi lilaghano alyo lyabhegha lya yaghi hela handa yula ywakalitendite kabhegha kakali kangulama.
HEB 9:18 Ndo mana hata lila lilaghano lya makachu likiyandihwa ng'obhe kyanga mwahi.
HEB 9:19 Kiyaha Musa pakaghakambukite kala malaghilo kwa bhandu bhoha, handa payibheghite mu malaghilo, kakighutola mwahi ghwa mwana senga na ghwa mbuhi, papamu na machi na mayuni makele na mapanyu gha nkongo ghuukemwa hisopo, kakikimichila akyo kitabho na kwa bhandu bhoha.
HEB 9:20 Kakilongela “Aghu ndo mwahi ghwa lilaghano lyakakwilikihite Chgapanga kuliyitikila.”
HEB 9:21 Ubhwabhu abhu Musa kakimichila mwahi lila lihema na hyombo hya kutundamila.
HEB 9:22 Kulyaghila, kubhukana na malaghilo, hyombo hyoha hiiyohitwe kwa mwahi, na kyanga kumichilwa mwahi kahone ulekekeho ghwa ulemwa.
HEB 9:23 Hino, yikibhegha mbaka hilibhi hiihwananihitwe na hya kunani hiyoghwe kwa nyambi ya anyama abho, peni hilibhi hya kukunani kwa Chgapanga yikipala kuyoghwa kwa nyambi yiibheghite ya maha kyanalumu.
HEB 9:24 Mana Kilisito kakuyingila ng'obhe pahala pang'nyimo na pang'anyimo muno kwa mabhoko gha anabhandu, yiibheghite nhwano ghwa hilibhi hyene hya kunani. Mwene kakiyingila kunani ku kwako kwa Chgapanga kwene hinu kanguyima muulongolo ghwa Chgapanga kwa kya twenga.
HEB 9:25 Ndundame Nkulu ghwa Akaayahudi kanguyingila pahala pang'anyimo muno ngungwa mala yimo pakabhegha na mwahi ghwa anyama, peni Kilisito kakiyingila ng'obhe kunani ngati kakalibhuhe mwene pipipi,
HEB 9:26 kiyaha handa yikibhegha habho, Kilisito yingannoghite kupamandwa na kuhwegha mala ndangalo kutandila paghubhumbitwe nnima. Peni hinu, nndaluko aghu paghuheghelela uhiko ghwake, mwene kakibwituka mala yimo ghweka, kubhuha ulemwa kwa kulibhuha nyambi mwene.
HEB 9:27 Hino, handa bhula kila mundu kaahwegha mala yimo ghweka, mbole kaayima mu ulongolo ghwa Chgapanga ngati katoswe.
HEB 9:28 Ubhwabhu abhu, Kilisito naywo pakabhuhitwe nyambi mala yimu ngati kaghutole ulemwa ghwa bhandu atangalo. Paabwituka kya ubhili, ndo chepa kya kulimbana na ulemwa, ngati ndo kwa kubhalopola bhala bha annindila.
HEB 10:1 Hino, kiyaha malaghilo ndo kihwili ghweka kya ghala gha maha ghaapala kuhika, na ndo chepa utwihiliko ghwa milando yila ya telatele, nyambi ndo yiyila yila ya malaghilo yiitendekehwa ngungwa mbaka ngungwa, yaahotoleka ndwee kubhayoha bhandu bhala bhanakutundamila Chgapanga.
HEB 10:2 Handa bhandu abho bhaantundamila Chgapanga bhangayohwite ulemwa ghwabhe hoto, bhangaghendelelite ng'obhe kulibhoa kukita abhegha na ulemwa, na nyambi ahyo hyoha hingalekitwe,
HEB 10:3 peni nyambi ahyo hiitendekwa kila ngungwa ngati kubhakulungwa bhandu ulemwa ghwabhe.
HEB 10:4 Kiyaha mwahi ghwa makambako gha senga na makambako gha mbuhi ghwahotola ng'obhe kubhuha ulemwa.
HEB 10:5 Kubhukana na agha, Kilisito pakabheghite kanguhika pannima, kakinng'ombela Chgapanga, “Ghukipala ng'obhe bhwengu na nyambi, peni ghukimikila kala mmili kwa kya nenga.
HEB 10:6 Ghungunoghelwa ng'obhe na nyambi ya kuyochwa anyama mu likuta ebu matulo gha kuyoha ulemwa.
HEB 10:7 Apo ndo paanongelite, ‘Nenga megha apa, kutenda ghaughapala, Ghwe Chgapanga, handa payityekitwe ya kya nenga mu kitabho kya malaghilo’”
HEB 10:8 Kandahi kakiyanda kulongela, “Ghulema na ghunoghelwa ng'obhe na nyambi ya kuyochwa na ya kuyoha ulemwa.” Kakilongela habhu hata payibhele bhwengu ndo nyambi yikibhegha tela na malaghilo.
HEB 10:9 Mbole kakilongela, “Megha apa, Ghwe Chgapanga hika kughatenda mapalo ghako.” Habhu Chgapanga kakigilimbula nyambi ya makachu na kihyengo kyake kakibhika nyambi yingi yimu.
HEB 10:10 Kiyaha Yesu Kilisito kakitwihilia mapalo gha Chgapanga, twenga tunguyohwa na kutendwa bhaabhaghulitwe kwa kya Chgapanga kwa njila ya nyambi ya mmili ghwa Yesu Kilisito ghuubhuhitwe mala yimo ghweka.
HEB 10:11 Ndundame ywohele Nnyahudi kangutenda lihengo lyake lya kutundamila kila linjubha na kutendekeha nyambi yila yila patangalo, nyambi yene yangahotola kubhua ulemwa.
HEB 10:12 Peni Kilisito kakitenda nyambi yimu kwa kya ulemwa, nyambi yinakutenda lihengo manjubha ghoha, mbole kakitama mbande ya nnilo ya Chgapanga.
HEB 10:13 Kutandila apo kangualindila amyanja bhake mbaka kabhabhike pahi mu utabhala ghwake.
HEB 10:14 Hino, kiyaha Kilisita kakilibhuha nyambi mala yimu, kabhayoha ulemwa ngati mmeghe bhandu bhake manjubha ghoha mu mamjubha ghoha bhala bhoha bhaayohwa ulemwa ghwabhe.
HEB 10:15 Naywo Nhuki ghwa Chgapanga kangutughombea yakya nnando aghu kwa kulongela,
HEB 10:16 “Ali ndo ninganilo liimbala kutenda nabho, manjubha ghaapala kuhika, kangulongela Bambo. Ndabhika malaghilo ghangu mu myoyo yabhe na kughatyeka malaghilo ghangu mu mahala ghabhe.”
HEB 10:17 Mbole kakighendelela kulongela, “Ndaghukulungwa ng'obhe kangi ulemwa hangi uhokelo ghwabhe.”
HEB 10:18 Hino, ulemwa paghubhuhwa, kahone nhokolo ghwa kubhuha nyambi ya kughubhuha ulemwa.
HEB 10:19 Hino, maalongo bhango, kwa mwahi ghwa Yesu tungupeghwa mwoyo ghuukangamalite ghwa kuyingila pang'anyimo munu.
HEB 10:20 Ywombe katuhughulila njila ya hyono, njila ya ubhumi, kukindila lila lipasia ghwene ndo mmili ghwake mwene.
HEB 10:21 Hino, tubhegha na Ndundame nkulu nnolelekeha ghwa nyumba ya Chgapanga.
HEB 10:22 Hino, tunheghelele Chgapanga kwa mwoyo ya nyanyi yene yinakunhyubhalila hoto, patubhegha na myoyo yiiyohitwe kubhukana na hwacho hakataho, na mibhili yiighululitwe kwa machi gha nyanyi.
HEB 10:23 Tughungile lidumbilo lyetu litulihyubhalila na litulikambuka kyanga bhwaghalili, kiyaha Chgapanga ywakatendite naghilo lyake ndo ywa kuhyubhalika.
HEB 10:24 Kangi tungunoghwa kuyonjokehana myoyo ngati tupalane na kutendelana gha maha twenga kwa twenga mu mapalo na mu kughatenda gha maha.
HEB 10:25 Kangi tukotoke kuleka hila hitohe hya kukungana papamu, handa paatenda bhangi paalekite kukongana, kangi yingutunogha kuyonjokehana myoyo handa paatenda bhangi, Linjubha lila lya Chgapanga linguheghelela.
HEB 10:26 Handa patughendelela kutenda ulemwa kwa likaho mbole ya kupeghwa ghula umaha ghwa yila hoto, kahone nyaambi yaahotolekwa kubhuhwa kwa kya kutubhuhila ulemwa.
HEB 10:27 Peni kiihighalite ndo kulindila toso ya Chgapanga kwa lyogha na mwoto nkalipa ghwakubhakanjaghana bhaannema Chgapanga.
HEB 10:28 Mundu ywehele ywakaghalemite malaghilo gha Musa kaakomwagha kyanga luhungu, mbaka pabheghe uyimiho ghwa bhandu abhili ebu andatu.
HEB 10:29 Bhuli, munguhwachila bhuli yikinnogha ng'obhe kihyato kiibheghte kikulu kyanalumu mundu yula ywakanpughana Mwana ghwa Chgapanga, na kubhoa mwahi ghwa ninganilo ghuunnyohite kukita ndo kilibhi kihakata, na kuntendela hyeta Nhuki luhungu?
HEB 10:30 Kiyaha tungummanya kukita Chgapanga kakilongela, “Lihengo lya kubhuyiha kibhuyiho ndo lihengo lyang” Na hila hila Chgapanga kakilongela, “Kataatosa bhandu bhake.”
HEB 10:31 Ndo nnando ghwa kuyoghoha muno, kukukongana na toso ya Chgapanga yuna ubhumi.
HEB 10:32 Mughakulungwe manjubha ghala gha kalongohi, pannyandite kuhyubhalila Kilisito, payibhele mukimokola kimbamanda peni mukilimbilila.
HEB 10:33 Pamoo pangi mukilighwa na kuyuyuhwa mu muu, pamoo pangi mukinoghwa kubhatangatila bhala bhaapamanditwe handa mwenga.
HEB 10:34 Mukiabhonela luhungu bhala bhaabheghite mu hiphopo, mukiyitikila kwa uyelelo kutolelwa utopelo ghwenu kiyaha mukimanya kukita mu myoyo yenu hikibhegha hilibhi hyanga kupela manjubha ghoha.
HEB 10:35 Hino, nkotoke kughuhobheha ukangamalo ghwenu, kiyaha mwaakamuhwa lilumbo likulu kuhuma kwa Chgapanga
HEB 10:36 Yinguanogha mmeghe na ulimbililo ngati mmokole kughatwihiliha mapalo gha Chgapanga na kupeghwa kila kyakanaghihite.
HEB 10:37 Handa paghatyekitwe Malembo, “Kukali midaluko michoko hela, Yula yunakuhika katahika na kaabhalila ng'obhe.
HEB 10:38 Peni yunakutama handa pambala, katalama kwa kunhyubhalila nenga, na handa katanyumanyuma ndabhegha ng'obhe na uyelelo naywo.”
HEB 10:39 Peni twenga tubhegha ng'obhe handa bhandu bhanakuleka kuntughila Chgapanga na kuhobha, ngati tubhegha papamu na bhandu bhaanhyubhalila na kulopoleghwa.
HEB 11:1 Hino, kunhyubhalila Chgapanga ndo kubhegha na ulyaghilo ghwa kukita milando yitulidumbila yaatendekwa. Kangi ndo kudumbila kyanalumu milando yangabhonekana hinu.
HEB 11:2 Kiyaha, kwa njila ya kunhyubhalila Chgapanga, aghohi bhetu bhakinnogheha muno Chgapanga.
HEB 11:3 Kwa kuhyubhalila tungumanya kukita nnima ghukibhumbwa kwa lilagho lya Chgapanga, na hilibhi hyoha hinakubhonekana hikitendekwa ng'obhe kuhuma kwa hilibhi hyangabhonekana.
HEB 11:4 Kwa kuhyubhalila Abeli kakimmuhila Chgapanga nyambi ya maha kupitingana Kaini, na habhu kakiyimihwa kukita kakibhegha ywa maha muulongolo ghwa Chgapanga, na Chgapanga mwene kakiiyitikila nyambi yake, kya habhu hata payibhele Abeli kakihwegha peni kuhyubhalilo kwake kakali kangughendelela kutuhunda mbaka lelo.
HEB 11:5 Kya kunhyubhalila Chgapanga kukintenda Henoki katolwe mu nnima kya nga kuhwegha. Kakibhonekana ng'obhe kiyaha kakitolwa na Chgapanga. Kiyaha malembo ghungulaha kukita kukali na kutolwa kakiyimihwa kukita kakibha ghwa maha muulongolo ghwa Chgapanga.
HEB 11:6 Peni kyanga kunhyubhalia Chgapanga, kiyaha mundu ywakanng'endela Chgapanga mbaka kahyubhalile kukita Chgapanga kabhegha na kukita kanguapegha hilumbo bhala bhanakunpalaha kwa ukangamalo.
HEB 11:7 Kwa kunhyubhalila Chgapanga Nuhu kakinnyitikila Chgapanga pakakinyitwe kwa milando yiibheghite yikali kubhonekana. Ndo kakitendekeha lisafina ngati Chgapanga kabhalopohe ywombhe na bhandu bhaabheghite mu lubhanga lwake na kubhatosa bhandu bha nnima bhanga kunhyulila Chgapanga, kwa kya habhu Nuhu kakiyitikilwa na Chgapanga.
HEB 11:8 Kuhyubhalila kwake Abulahimu kukintenda kannyitile Chgapanga pala pakanng'ombilite kabhuke na kakimanya ng'obhe kula kwakapala kughenda.
HEB 11:9 Kwa kuhyubhalila kakilibhika lihema lyake mu nnima ghwa naghilo kakatame handa nhenja, kakitama mu matinga, handa pabhatendite Isaka na Yakobo, bhaabheghite bubho ahala papamu naywo kwa naghilo yiyila yila.
HEB 11:10 Kiyaha Abulahamu kakibhegha kangulindila kitami kiibheghite na kitamiko kya manjubha ghoha, kitami kyene Chgapanga mwene ndo ntendehi ghwa kukihwacha na kukichenga.
HEB 11:11 Kwa kuhyubhalila kwake Abulahamu, hata payibhele Sala kakihyubhalila kukita Chgapanga kaatwihilikiha naghilo yake, kya habho kakinemelwa kuyima ndumbo hata bhula ngungwa yake yikikinda muno.
HEB 11:12 Kyahabho kuhuma kwa mundu aywo yumu, Abulahamu, ywakabheghite handa kahwegha, bhakibheleka bhandu atangalo bhangabhalangika handa bhula ndondwa ya kunani na nhanga ghwa kumbwani.
HEB 11:13 Bhandu abha bhoha bhakihwegha mu kuhyubhalila Chgapanga, bhakihwegha yikali na kupokela milando yakaalaghilite Chgapanga, peni bhakibhona kya kutali, bhakilumbilila na kukambuka pekupeku kikita bhombe akibhegha ahenja na bhaabheghite mu mwanja mu nnima.
HEB 11:14 Bhandu bhanakulongela milando handa ayi, bhangubhoneha pekupeku kukita bhanguupalaha nnima ghwabhe bhene.
HEB 11:15 Kulyaghila handa bhangabheghite bhanguhwachila nnima ghwaabhukite, bhangamokolite ng'ebu ya kubhuya akwo.
HEB 11:16 Peni hinu bhangughupala nnima ghwa maha kyanalumu, nnima ghwa kunani kwa Chgapanga, habhu ndo Chgapanga kangubhona honi ng'obhe kukemwa ywombe ndo Chgapanga ghwabhe, kiyaha yumwene kabhatendekehela kala kitami.
HEB 11:17 Abulahamu kwa kuhyubhalila kwake Chgapanga, kakitenda kammuhe Isaka mwana ghwake kubhegha nyambi, ywombe ywakakamuhite naghilo ya Chgapanga kakibhegha kala kummuuha mwana ghwake, ywakabheghite mwana ghwa kya kighweka,
HEB 11:18 hata bhula Chgapanga kakinng'ombela, “Ubheleko ghwako ghwaahumila kwa Isaka.”
HEB 11:19 Abulahamu kakihyubhalila kukita Chgapanga kaahotola kuahyuha bhaahweghite. Na pangi kulyaghila twaahwacha hoto kulongela Abulahamu kakimmokola kangi Isaka kuhuma kwa bhaahweghite.
HEB 11:20 Kwa kuhyubhalila kwa Isaka kukiyambuha kabhanonele Yakobo na Esau, amokole unonelo ghuupala kuhika.
HEB 11:21 Kwa kuhyubhalila Yakobo kukintenda kakibhanonela bhana abhili bha Yosefu pabheghite ugheghela na kuhwegha kunu pakakayeghamila mutwe ghwake unani mwa lukongocho lwake.
HEB 11:22 Kwa kuhyubhalila Yosefu pakabheghite ugheghela na kuhwegha, kakilongela ya kya kubhuka kwa Akaaisilaeli mu nnima ghwa Misili, na kangi kakialaghila bhatende niki kwa kya mihupa yake.
HEB 11:23 Kwa kuhyubhalila kwa abhele bha Musa kukiatenda bhanhihe aywo mwana kwa mwehi mindatu mbole ya kubhelekwa. Bhakimmona kukita ndo mwana yuna kuhalala, na bhakiyitila ng'obhe ngwiliho ya mutwa.
HEB 11:24 Kwa kuhyubhalila kwa Musa kukintenda pakabheghite nkulu kakilema kukemwa mwana ghwa biti Falao.
HEB 11:25 Kakibhona yikibha mbaha kupamandwa na bhandu bha Chgapanga kupitingana kuyelelwa ulemwa kwa nndaluko ghwamandina.
HEB 11:26 Kakimanya kukita kupamandika kwa kya Kilisto kubhegha na motelo ngulu kupitingana utopelo ghoha ghwa nnima ghwa Misili, kiyaha kakibhegha pakalindila lilumbo liipala kuhika.
HEB 11:27 Kwa kuhyubhalila kwa Musa kukintenda kabhuke mu nnima ghwa Misili kyanga kuyoghopa kiyaghabhu kya mutwa, na kakibhuya ng'obhe unyuma, kiyaha kakibhegha handa mundu ywakammonite Chgapanga ywangabhonekana.
HEB 11:28 Kwa kuhyubhalila kakitendekeha Pasaka na kutyelemeka mwahi mu hisingiti hya milyango, ngati yula yunakubhakanjaghana abhelekwa bha ulongohi, kakotoke kubhakanjaghana abhelekwa bha Isilaeli.
HEB 11:29 Kwa kuhyubhalila bhandu bha Isilaeli bhakiyomboka lihibha lya Shamu handa nnima nnyumu, peni Akaamisili pabhayighite kuyomboka bhakimilwa na machi.
HEB 11:30 Kwa kuhyubhalila hindupa hya kitami kya Yeliko hikighwegha bhandu bha Isilaeli pabhatindilite hindupa ahyo kwa manjubha saba.
HEB 11:31 Kwa kuhyubhalila kwake kukintenda Lahabu ywakabheghite ntyahe kakotoke kukanjabhanwa papamu na bhala bhaankilukite Chgapanga, kiyaha kakiakingama bhaalaghilitwe kulolekeha bhandu bha nnima aghwo abhegha bhuli.
HEB 11:32 Hino, nongele niki kyanalumu? Masaa ghangundegheka ng'obhe kulubhulila yakya Gidioni na Balaka na Samsoni na Yefta na Daudi na Samueli na akaambuye.
HEB 11:33 Kwa kuhyubhalila abha bhoha bhakitutana ngondo na abhatwa, na bhakihotola. Bhakitenda shaliya, na bhakighakingama ghala ghakalaghihite Chgapanga. Bhakiyitata milomo ya mahimba,
HEB 11:34 bhakihima myoto mikalipa, bhakihyepetuka kukomwa kwa lukechelo, akibhegha ayoyobhalo peni bhakikamuha makakala. Bhakibhegha ahwadali mu ngondo, na bhakikibhahotola amachonda bha kihenja.
HEB 11:35 Kwa kuhyubhalila adala bhakibhuyihila alongo bhabhe bhaabheghite bhahwegha paabhegha ahyuka. Amoo bhabhe bhakilema kuhughulilwa, bhakipamandwa mbaka kuhwegha ngati amokole kuhyuhwa na kuyingila mu ubhumi ghwa maha kyanalumu.
HEB 11:36 Bhangi bhakiyuyuhwa na kututwa hinjupunjupu, na bhangi bakibhopwa minyololo na kutaghwa mu hibhopo.
HEB 11:37 Bhakihwegha kwa kututwa kwa maganga, bhakibalulwa hipalamande hipalamande, na bhakikomwa kwa lukechelo. Bhakitindilatindila kunu paahwalihwa mayula gha mene na mbuhi, bhakibhegha bhandu makapukwa na kutendelwa mahakata.
HEB 11:38 Bhandu bha unnima bhakiapala ng'obhe bhandu abho bha maha, bhakitangatanga mu kibhala na mu hitumbi na kutama mu mabhumba gha mapango mulutupi.
HEB 11:39 Bhandu abho bhoha bhakinnogheha Chgapanga kwa kuhyubhalila kwabhe. Peni kyanga ywakakingamite ghala ghakalaghilite Chgapanga,
HEB 11:40 bhakighakingama ng'obhe agho kiyaha Chgapanga katubhikila milando ya maha kyanalumu ngati, twenga papamu na bhombe tuyelelwe nonelo ahyo.
HEB 12:1 Kwa kya agho, twenga tubhegha na lumati lukulu lwa ayimiho muulongolo ghwetu. Hinu tubhuhe kila kilibhi kiitukingikiha, na ulemwa ghula ghuutukamula kanongola. Tutughe kwa ulimbililo mu malimbano ghaabhikitwe mu ulongolo ghwetu.
HEB 12:2 Hino, na tunlolekehe muno Yesu, ywene ywakayandihite na kutwihiliha uhyubhalilo ghwetu, ywene kwa kya uyelelo ghuubhikitwe mu manjubha ghaapala kuhika kakilimbilila kiho mu lupingika, kyanga honi naywo katama mu mbande ya nnilo ya kiteho kya utabhala ghwa Chgapanga
HEB 12:3 Nhwachile muno yakya milando yinbwitukilite Yesu, bhula pakalimbililite upingiko nkulu kuhuma kwa bhandu alemwa. Hino nkotoke kudunyuka mwoyo, ebu kubhuya kunyuma.
HEB 12:4 Kiyaha mukulimbana kwa twenga na ulemwa, peni yikali mwenga mukitutana ng'obhe mbaka kuyita mwahi ghwenu.
HEB 12:5 Bhuli, mukighalibhalila ghala malagho gha kuyonjokeha myoyo yene Chgapanga kanguakema mwenga bhana bhake? “Mwana ghwangu, ghukotoke kunpughana Chgapanga pakakuhyatula, ebu ghukotoke kudunyuka mwoyo pakakulakalila.
HEB 12:6 Kiyaha Bambo kaammuyihila ywohele ywakanpala, na kaanhyatula ywohele ywakayitikila kubhegha mwana ghwake.”
HEB 12:7 Nnimbilile ihyatulo kwa kya kulihunda. Chgapanga kataatendela mwenga handa bhana bhake, kiyaha ndo mwana ywoki aywo ywangahyatulighwa na abhele bhake?
HEB 12:8 Chgapanga kangubhahyata bhana bhake bho, handa mwenga mmegha bhana mbunjilo.
HEB 12:9 Kangi twenga twabhoha tubhegha na atate bhaatulelite, bhaatuhyatulite na twenga tukiahokamila. Bhuli, yingutunogha ng'obhe kulihuluha kyanalumu kwa Tate ghwa mihuki yetu ngati tulame?
HEB 12:10 Atate bhetu bhakituhyatula kwa manjubha gha mandina handa bhene paabhonite yikibha tela, peni Chgapanga kangutuhyatula kwa kya mahokelo ghetu ngati tutame na tulilunge na ywombe.
HEB 12:11 Kuhyatulwa chepa nnando ghwa kuyeleleha ngati kuhyononeha. Peni kwa bhala bhaahunditwe kwa njila ya kuhyatwa bhangutama kwa uhihimiloa muulongolo ghwa Chgapanga.
HEB 12:12 Hino, nnyinule mabhoko ghenu ghaaleghelekite na kughapegha makakala mayughwa ghenu ghaaloghoya.
HEB 12:13 Nng'endelele kutyanga mu njila yiighololokite, ngati kila kyanga kutyanga kikotoke kuyoyobhala ngati mbaha kilamihwe.
HEB 12:14 Nkangamale kutama kwa uhihimilo na bhandu bhoha. Ntame ubhumi ghwa nga kutenda ulemwa, kiyaha mundu ywohele kummona Chgapanga kyanga kutama handa habhu.
HEB 12:15 Nnolekehe muno, mundu kakotoke ywakapala kulepelwa kukingama umaha ghwa Chgapanga, mmeghe meho ngati mundu ywohe kubhegha lukigha lwa nkongo lunakubhaghaya, na kubhapamanda bhandu kwa lusungu lwake.
HEB 12:16 Mulindakile ngati nkati yenu kakotoke kubhegha mundu yuna nhakata ebu ywanga nntundamila Chgapanga handa Esau, ywakahemenganite shaliya yake ya kubhegha nbhelekwa ghwa kalongohi kwa hilyo ya mala yimo.
HEB 12:17 Mwenga mungumanya hata pakapalite kumokola kangi unonelo ghula ghuubheghite ghwa ywombe, kakilemwa, kiyaha kakimokola kangi ng'obhe ng'ebu ya kulipetula, hata bhula kakiipalaha kwa mahohi.
HEB 12:18 Mwenga muukihikila ng'obhe ku kitumbi kya Sinai kinakuhotolika kukamulika, mukihika ng'obhe mu mwoto ghuuyakite paabheghite mahundi mapili na lubhindo na likusi,
HEB 12:19 kuubheghite na lilobhe lya litalumbeta, ebu lilobhe liikambukite malagho gha kuyoghoha mbaka bhala bhaaghombilitwe bhakiyupa bhakotoke kughombelwa kilibhi kingi,
HEB 12:20 kiyaha bhakihotola ng'obhe kulimbilila lilagho lila lyaakwilikihitwe, “Hata handa nnyama kaakikamula kitumbi aki, kaatutwa kwa maganga mbaka kuhwegha.”
HEB 12:21 Bhakighabhona gha kuyoghoha mbaka Musa kakilongela, “Nunguloghoya muno kwa lyogha.”
HEB 12:22 Peni mwenga nhika mu kitumbi kya Sayuni, Yelusalemu ya kunani kwa Chgapanga, kitami kya Chgapanga yunaubhumi. Nhika mu ngwemuko ngulu ya andumitumi bha kunani kwa Chgapanga elufu elufu bhanga mmalango bhanakulumbalila.
HEB 12:23 Mu ngwemuko lya abhelekwa ghwa ulongohi bha Chgapanga, bhene mahina ghabhe ghatyekwa kunani. Nhika kwa Chgapanga yunakutosa bhandu bhoha, mu mitima ya bhandu bha maha bhene Chgapanga kabhatenda bhayitikilwe muulongolo ghwake bhaatwihilikite.
HEB 12:24 Nhika kwa Yesu yunakualnganiha malobhe bhandu na Chgapanga kwa ninganilo lya hyono, na kwa mwahi ghuumichilitwe, ghula ghuulongilite Mihalo ya Maha kupitingana mwahi ghwa Abeli.
HEB 12:25 Hino, mulindakile nkotoke kunnema ywakalongela na mwenga. Handa bhene bhaahyepetuka ng'obhe kuhyatulwa pabhannemite ywombe ywakaakinyite munnima aghu, Bhuli twenga, twaalopoka bhuli handa twaanyihwa ng'obhe yula ywaatukinya kuhuma kunani?
HEB 12:26 Mu manjubha ghala lilobhe lyake linakungwangwaliha nnima, peni hinu kalongela, “Mu mala yimo ghweka ndaghungwangwaliha maha ng'obhe nga nnima ghweka peni na kunani kwa Chgapanga bhubho”
HEB 12:27 Peni lilagho alyo “kangi” Lingulangiha kukita hilibhi hyoha hiingwangwalikite, ngati ihighale hilibhi ywanga kuhotola kutingihikando hila hibhumbe hiibhumbitwe, kwa likaho hila hilibhi hyanga kuloghoya hiighale.
HEB 12:28 Twenga nino, mana tukamuhwa ghubhutwa ghwanga kungwangwalihwa, ndo mmeghe na umaha ghwa Chgapanga, na kwa agho tummuhile Chgapanga utundamo ghwa maha, papamu na utekulo na umaha,
HEB 12:29 kiyaha Chgapanga ghwetu ndo handa mwoto nkalipa ghunakulaghaliha.
HEB 13:1 Nng'endelele kupalana handa muyinoghwa kwa bhandu bhaanhyubhalila Kilosito.
HEB 13:2 Nkotoke kulibhala kuakingama ahenja mu mabhagha ghenu, kiyaha kwa kutenda habhu, bhandu bhangi bhakiakingama andumitumi bha kunani kwa Chgapanga kyanga kumanya.
HEB 13:3 Mubhakulungwe bhala bhaabheghite mu hibhopo handa bhula mmopwa papamu na bhombe. Mubhakulungwe bhaabheghite mu himbamanda handa bhula mungupamandwa papamu nabho.
HEB 13:4 Kutolana kungupalwa kuhokamilwa na bhandu bhoha, na shaliya yaki yitendekwe kwa kuhyubhalika. Kiyaha Chgapanga kataatosa atyahe na angongola.
HEB 13:5 Nkotoke kubhegha bhandu bha kupala mbiya, nnyukutwe na hilibhi himmeghite naywo. Kiyaha mwene Chgapanga kalongela, “Kulyaghila ndabhaleka ng'obhe kubhatagha”
HEB 13:6 Hino ndo mana tunguhotola kulongela kwa ukangamalo, “Chgapanga ndo ywakundangatila, ndayoghopa ng'obhe. Mundu katandenda niki?”
HEB 13:7 Mubhakulungwe hilongohi bhenu bhaabhahundite lilagho lya Chgapanga. Nhwache bhula paatamite, na nnyighe mu hyubhalilo ghwabhe.
HEB 13:8 Yesu Kilisito ndo yula yula, licho, lelo na manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko.
HEB 13:9 Nkotoke kuyebhehwa kunu na kunu na mahundo gha kihenja. Umaha ghwa Chgapanga ndo ghuuyitenda mihuki yenu ikamale na kata kuyitikila makanikiho gha hilyo, makanikiho agho ghanguntangatila ng'obhe ywohele ywakaghatughilite.
HEB 13:10 Twenga tubhegha na likuta kuntundamila Chgapanga na mandundame bha Akaayahudi bhaatenditeghe mahengo mu pahala pa lihema lya kuntundamila Chgapanga, bhanguteghekwa ng'obhe kulyegha hilibhi hiibhikitwe nkati mwake.
HEB 13:11 Ndundame nkulu kakitola mwahi ghwa anyama na kughuyegha pang'anyimo muno, handa nyambi ya ulemwa, peni mibhili ya abho anyama yikiyochwa panje ya kitami, habhu ndo Yesu kakipamandwa na kukomwa panji ya kitami ngati tumokole kuyohwa bhandu kwa mwahe ghwake mwene.
HEB 13:12 Ubhwabhu abhu Yesu kakibhangaliwa panje ya kitami ngati kaayohe bhandu kwa mwahi ghwake.
HEB 13:13 Kya habhu na tunng'endele panje ya kitami, patukiyitola honi ywakayigheghite.
HEB 13:14 Kiyaha apa pannima tubhegha ng'obhe na kitami kya manjubha ghoha kya nga uhiko, ngati tungukipalaha kila kitami kiipala kuhika.
HEB 13:15 Hino, kwa njila ya Yesu tungughendelela kunbhuhila Chgapanga nyambi na tiko, kiyaha malagho ghetu gha kulitika lihina lyake ndo handa nyambi yetu yitummuhila.
HEB 13:16 Nng'enelele kubhatngatila ayenu kwa hilibhi hiimmeghite nahyo, kwa kutenda habhu kiyaha bhwengu handa aghwo ndo ghungunnyeleha Chgapanga.
HEB 13:17 Mubhayitikile hilongohi bhenu na kukamula ghaabhalaghila. Kiyaha abho bhangulibhuha kwa kya mwenga kya nga kutotokela na bhangunoghwa kulubhulila lihengo lyabhe muulongolo ghwa Chgapanga.
HEB 13:18 Mutuyupile, kiyaha tungulitumba kutenda gha maha kwa bhandu bhoha
HEB 13:19 Ningubhayupa kyanalumu munnyupile kwa Chgapanga ngati mokole kubhuyihwa kwa mwenga kanongola.
HEB 13:20 Hino, Chgapanga kanhyuhite kuhuma kwa bhaahweghite Bambo ghwetu Yesu Kilisito ywene ndo nhakila Nkulu ghwa mene, kwa mwahi ghwa ninganilo lya manjubha ghoha kyanga uhiko,
HEB 13:21 Chgapanga kabhapeghe makakala gha kutenda ghala ghakaghapala kangi katende mu myoyo yenu kwa njila ya Yesu Klisito, ywombe katikwe kwa manjubha ghoha Kya nga uhiko.
HEB 13:22 Maalongo bhangu, mmeghe mungughatughila malagho agha ghakubhayingiha mwoyo kiyaha nubhatyekela malagho ghamandina.
HEB 13:23 Mmanye kukita nnongo ghwetu Timoseo kabhopolelwa kala, handa pakahika kwa nenga kanongola, ndahika papamu naywo kubhabhona.
HEB 13:24 Mubhajambuhe hilongohi bhenu bhoha na bhandu bhayitikilitwe na Chgapanga. Na alongo bhaabheghite ku Italia bhangubhajambuha.
HEB 13:25 Tungubhapalila umaha ghwa Chgapanga ghubheghe na mwenga mabhoha. Ayi mwika.
JAM 1:1 Nenga Yakobo, mmandwa ghwa Chapanga na ghwa Bambo Yesu Kilisito. Nunguatyekela makabila kumi na mabhili gha Akaayahudi ghaapwilinganite munnima. Mwika.
JAM 1:2 Maalongo bhangu mapungwo nhanganganiko paghabhahikila, mwenga mughabhone ndo handa kihokonyo kya kubhegha na kindimba kikulu.
JAM 1:3 Kiyaha mungumanya kukita kuyighwa kwa uhyubhalilo ghwenu kunguayeghela mwenga nnyonjokeheke kulimbililo.
JAM 1:4 Basi nng'endelel kulimbilil mbaka kuuhiko, ngati mmokole kubhegha atwihiliko yomo.
JAM 1:5 Peni handa yumu ywenu pakapelelwa na malango uhyubhalilo ndo yingunkwiliha kunnyupa kwa Chapanga, naywo Chapanga katanpegha kwa utekulo, katakalala ng'obhe, ngati kataapegha bhoha kwa utangalo.
JAM 1:6 Peni kayupe kwa kuhyubhalaila kyanga lyogha lyohele kukita kaamokola ebhu kaamokaola ng'obhe. Mundu ywakabhegha na lyogha ndo handa lidaba lya lihibha linakutakulwa kwa liyegha kuno na akwo.
JAM 1:7 Kiyaha mundu handa ayo kakotoke kuhwacha kukita katakingama kyohele kuhuma kwa Bambo.
JAM 1:8 Mundu ghwa mahwacho mabhili katanyumanyuma mu njila hyake hyoha.
JAM 1:9 Peni kapukwa ywakanhyubhalila Kilisito kangunoghwa kayelelwe, kiyaha Chapanga kangummona ywombe ndo ywa maha,
JAM 1:10 naywo yunautopelo kangunoghwa kayelelwe pala Chapanga pakaatenda abheghe bhanakuhwama. Kiyaha bhombe bhanguhwegha handa malubha gha kumanyahi.
JAM 1:11 Nkenga paghu homoka na mbwipila yake ngalipa yingunyaluha manyahi, nagho malubha ghake ghaanyaluka na umaha ghwake ghungukanjanganika. Ubhwabhu abhu, yunautopelo katakanjaghanwa mumakakaliko ghake.
JAM 1:12 Kanonelwa mundu ywakahighala nhyubhaliko mu mang'eho, handa pakahotola kulimbilila, katapeghwa lilumbo lya ubhumi lyene Chapanga kakialagha bhala bhaampala.
JAM 1:13 Mundu pakang'ehwa kakotoke kulongela, “Nungung'ehwa na Chapanga.” Kiyaha Chapanga kahone kuyighwa kwa uhakata, na mwene kahone kunnyigha mundu ywohele.
JAM 1:14 Peni mundu kangung'ehwa na kukuluhwa na kughomelwa tama hyake pakahutwa.
JAM 1:15 Pala tama ahyo pahikamala hinguntenda mundu katende ulemwa na ulemwa paghukamala ghunguyegha kiho.
JAM 1:16 Maalongo bhangu bhanuapala, nkotoke kukuluhwa!
JAM 1:17 Kyohele kiibhuhwa na kiibhegha kya maha na kinakutwihilika ndo kunguhuma kwa Tate mmumba ghwa mibhwelo yoha ya kunani. Ywombe kingughilimbuka ng'obhe, ebu kabheghang'obhe na mango yohele ya kughalambuka.
JAM 1:18 Kwa mapalo ghake mwene kakitupapa kwa lilagho lyake lya hoto, ili tubheghe handa malimbulo gha ulongohi.
JAM 1:19 Maalongo bhangu bhanuapala, nkulungwe nnando aghu! Mundu ywohele kayumbatike kuyihwa peni chepa kayumbatike mukulongela ebu mukukalala.
JAM 1:20 Kiyaha mundu ywakabhegha na kiyaghabhu kanguhotola ng'obhe ktutegnda ghakaghapala Chapanga.
JAM 1:21 Kya habhu, nnekane na matamilo gha uhakata ghwoha na mandendelo mahakataho, mulibhike pahi ya utabhala ghwa Chapanga na kuyitikila lilagho liipanditwe mu myoyo yenu, alyo ndo lyahotola kubhalopoha.
JAM 1:22 Nkotoke kukuluhana mabhene kwa kuyihwa lilagho lya Chapanga ghweka, ngati ntende handa lilagho mulilongela.
JAM 1:23 Kiyaha mundu pakabhegha kanguyihwa lilagho ghweka kyanga kulitenda, mundu aywo ndo handa mundu yunakulilolekeha mu lindala,
JAM 1:24 kangulibhona mwene na pakabhuka mu lindala, kamu kangulibhalila bhula pakabhegha.
JAM 1:25 Peni mundu ywakalolekeha muno malaghilo matwihiliko ghaabhapegha bhandu uhulu, mundu ywakaghendelela kughahungila, na kakotoke kuyihwa ghweka na mbole kughalibhalila, maha ndo kangutenda handa paghapala agho malaghilo, mundu aywo ndo katanonelwa mu kila kilibhi kyaapala kukitenda.
JAM 1:26 Handa mundu katalibhona kanguntughila Chapanga kwa njila yinakunoghwa peni kangulikanila ng'obhe kutabhala lulimi lwake, kuntundamila Chapanga kwa ywombe, chepa kilibhi na kangulikuluha mwene.
JAM 1:27 Mundu ywakantundamila Chapanga muyiunoghwa Kutundamila kwa maha na kwanga kinyakali muulongolo ghwa Tate Chapanga ndo aku, Kubhatangatila bhana alekwa na adala alekwa mu ghala ghaaghapala, na kulingikiha na matamilo gha bhandu bhanga kunhyubhalila Chapanga.
JAM 2:1 Maalongo bhangu, kiyaha munhyubhalila Bambo ghwetu Yesu Kilisito, Bambo ghwa ukulu, nkotoke kubhabhaghula bhandu,
